Title: Abahanzi barimo King James na Knowless basendereje ibyishimo abanya-Kigali muri Tour du Rwanda (Amafoto)
Body:
Abahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda barimo Butera Knowless, King James, Bruce Melodie, Bulldog nâ€™abandi bashimishije abanya-Kigali mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda.
Abahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda barimo Butera Knowless, King James, Bruce Melodie, Bulldog nâ€™abandi bashimishije abanya-Kigali mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda.
Iki gitaramo cyabaye kuri uyu wa 29 Gashyantare 2020, gihuriramo abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye mu Rwanda barimo ababarizwa muri Kina Music nka Butera Knowless, Igor Mabano, Nel Ngabo, P, Bulldogg, Bruce Melodie, Davis D na King James.
Ni nyuma yâ€™agace ka karindwi kasorejwe i Nyamirambo aho Umunya-Colombia Restrepo Jhonatan wa Androni Giocattoli - Sidermec yegukanye aka gace, yandika amateka mashya yo kuba umukinnyi wa kabiri wegukanye uduce tune twikurikiranya mu irushanwa rimwe.
Mu gitaramo cyakurikiyeho, ku rubyiniro habanjeho Rob Drabkin washimishije benshi mu ndirimbo ze zitandukanye biba akarusho ubwo yaririmbaga indirimbo izwi cyane mu Rwanda yâ€™abana yitwa â€˜Mbe Kanyamanza kezaâ€™.
Yakurikiwe nâ€™umuraperi S-Wrap nawe washimishije benshi mu muziki wiganjemo uwo mu njyana ya Trap.
Nel Ngabo ubarizwa muri Kina Music niwe wakurikiye uyu muhanzi ashimisha benshi mu ndirimbo zirimo â€˜Byakorohaâ€™ asoreza kuri â€˜Ya Motemaâ€™ yahuriyemo na P wahoze muri Dream Boyz.
Davis D ugezweho mu ndirimbo â€˜Dedeâ€™ niwe wakurikiyeho yishimirwa mu ndirimbo zitandukanye. Uyu muhanzi yahereye ku yitwa â€˜Biryogoâ€™, â€˜Sosoâ€™, â€˜Sexyâ€™, â€˜Like youâ€™ yahuriyemo na Seyn na Kevin Kade asoreza kuri â€˜Dedeâ€™.
Nyuma, Igor Mabano yahise ajya ku rubyiniro yishimirwa mu bihangano bye bitandukanye birimo indirimbo yise â€˜Ni ukuriâ€™, â€˜Go Backâ€™, â€˜Dear Mashukaâ€™ yafashijwe ku rubyiniro na Rob Drabkin, â€˜Gakeâ€™ asoreza kuri â€˜Iyo Utegerezaâ€™.
Yahise aha umwanya Platini wahoze muri Dream Boyz usigaye yitwa P, uyu muhanzi aririmba indirimbo ze zirimo â€˜Fata amanoâ€™ yakoranye na Safi Madiba ndetse na â€˜Romeo & Julietâ€™ ya Dream Boyz yahozemo.
Bruce Melodie niwe wari utahiwe! Uyu muhanzi yishimiwe mu ndirimbo yinjiriyeho yitwa â€˜Ndumiweâ€™, â€˜Katerinaâ€™, â€˜Kalibu nyumbaniâ€™ asoreza kuri â€˜Kungolaâ€™ yahuriyemo na Sunnny yahagurukije nâ€™iyonka muri iki gitaramo.
Aba bahanzi bakurikiwe na Bulldogg wahise yanzika nâ€™indirimbo ze zirimo â€˜Nkâ€™umusazaâ€™, â€˜Cinemaâ€™ na â€˜Zanaâ€™ na â€˜Mpe Enkoniâ€™. Uyu muhanzi ari mu bishimiwe bikomeye muri iki gitaramo.
Butera Knowless yaje akorera mu ngata uyu muhanzi mu ndirimbo yise â€˜Yudaâ€™, â€˜Nkorahoâ€™, â€˜Sweet Mutimaâ€™, â€˜Blessedâ€™, â€˜Day to dayâ€™.
Uyu muhanzikazi yishimiwe kuva atangiye kugeza asoje kuririmba. Abakunzi be bari bahimbawe ku buryo baririmbanaga nawe kuri buri ndirimbo yose yaririmbaga.
King James niwe washyize akadomo kuri iki gitaramo ahereye ku ndirimbo yise â€˜Icyangombwaâ€™ akajya anyuzamo akaganiriza abafana ababwira ati â€˜muriteguye kubyina?â€™ bose bakiriza icyarimwe bamwereka ko banyotewe no gutaramana nawe.
Yakomereje kuri â€˜Ayo arya ni ayanjyeâ€™, â€˜Ibareâ€™, â€˜Buhoro buhoroâ€™, â€˜Umuriro watseâ€™, â€˜Ganyobweâ€™ asoreza kuri â€˜Ndagutegerejeâ€™.
Uyu muhanzi ari muri bake babashije guhagurutsa buri wese wari uri muri iki gitaramo ndetse yeretswe urukundo mu buryo bukomeye.
Muri iki gitaramo habayemo nâ€™umwanya wo gupima ku buntu virusi itera sida nâ€™izindi ndwara, hakanatangwa inyigisho zitandukanye zifasha abaturage kubungabunga ubuzima bwabo.

Title: Trezzo Mahoro akomeje kwandika izina muri filime iri mu zigezweho kuri Netflix
Body:
Nyuma ya Ncuti Gatwa wubatse izina muri filime yitwa â€˜Sex Educationâ€™, yaciye ibintu kuri Netflix, undi munyarwanda witwa Trezzo Mahoro nawe ari mu bagezweho ku Isi yose muri filime iri guca kuri uru rubuga.
Nyuma ya Ncuti Gatwa wubatse izina muri filime yitwa â€˜Sex Educationâ€™, yaciye ibintu kuri Netflix, undi munyarwanda witwa Trezzo Mahoro nawe ari mu bagezweho ku Isi yose muri filime iri guca kuri uru rubuga.
Trezzo Mahoro yavukiye mu Rwanda gusa aba muri Vancouver, muri Canada. Yatangiye kwiyumvamo ibyo gukina filime ari mu mwaka wa nyuma wâ€™amashuri yisumbuye.
Yamamaye muri filime zitandukanye zirimo "The Magicians" yakinnyemo yitwa Ralphie, â€œThe X-Filesâ€ yakinnyemo yitwa Crewman ya Fox, "iZombie" yakinnyemo yitwa Darius, ubu agezweho muri filime Nyamerika yitwa â€˜To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love Youâ€™ ica kuri Netflix akinamo yitwa Lucas.
Iyi filime ni igice gishya kuko yabanjirijwe nâ€™ikindi cyitwaga â€˜To All the Boys Iâ€™ve Loved Beforeâ€™ yagiye hanze muri 2018.
Yanditse ikomowe ku gitabo cyâ€™umwanditsi wâ€™Umunyamerika witwa Jenny Han, yayobowe na Michael Fimognari yandikwa na Sofia Alvarez na J. Mills Goodloe.
Ivuga ku nkuru yâ€™umukobwa wagiye akunda abahungu bagiye bahura mu bihe bitandukanye, akajya abandikira amabaruwa noneho rimwe murumuna we aza kuyafata ayoherereza ba bahungu batanu baba barakundanye na we.
Umwe muri bo akaza kumubwira ngo bakundane ariko ari ukubeshya bagira ngo batere ishyari umukobwa baba basanzwe bakundana uba wamwanze, agace ka mbere karangira aba bombi baratangiye gukundana bya nyabyo.
Mu gace ka kabiri barakomeza bagakundana ariko hakaza undi muhungu bari baroherereje ibaruwa akanamusubiza nyuma bakaza guhurira ahantu bakagerageza gukundana ariko umukobwa akaza gusanga bitakunda.
Trezzo Mahoro[Lucas] aba ari umwe mu nshuti zâ€™uyu mukobwa ubusanzwe witwa Lana Condor uba akinamo yitwa Lara Jean, aba ari mu bo yigeze gukunda ndetse akanamwandikira ariko Lucas akamwanga kuko aba ari umutinganyi.
Trezzo Mahoro afite imyaka 23. Icyo ahuriyeho na Ncuti Gatwa nawe uherutse kwamamara cyane muri Sex Education ndetse ukurikirwa nâ€™abasaga miliyoni ebyiri kuri Instagram, nâ€™uko muri izi filime zatumye bamenyekana cyane bose bazikinamo ari abakundana bahuje ibitsina [abatinganyi].
Reba agace gato ka â€˜To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love Youâ€™, filime iri ku bica bigacika kuri Netflix yakinnyemo umunyarwanda

Title: Buravan, MichaÃ«l Sengazi na HervÃ© Kimenyi bazifashishwa mu kwezi ko kwizihiza imyaka 50 OIF imaze
Body:
Buri mwaka tariki 20 Werurwe, Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wâ€™Ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa (OIF) uyobowe na Louise Mushikiwabo, ibihugu biwugize byizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wawuhariwe.
Buri mwaka tariki 20 Werurwe, Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wâ€™Ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa (OIF) uyobowe na Louise Mushikiwabo, ibihugu biwugize byizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wawuhariwe.
Ni igikorwa cyatangiye mu 1988, nkâ€™uburyo abari muri uyu Muryango wa OIF uhurije hamwe abaturage bavuga Igifaransa basaga miliyoni 300 ku Isi, bakwishimira ururimi rwâ€™Igifaransa rukoreshwa na byinshi muri byo.
Kuri iyi nshuro muri uyu mwaka wa 2020, birihariye cyane cyane kuri Ambasade yâ€™u Bufaransa mu Rwanda. Ku rwego mpuzamahanga ho hazaba hizihizwa imyaka 50 uyu muryango wa OIF umaze utangijwe.
Iki gikorwa kizabera mu Rwanda ku bufatanye nâ€™Ibigo bya Leta bitandukanye birimo Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga ndetse nâ€™iyâ€™uburezi, abadipolomate bahagarariye ibihugu bigize uyu muryango nâ€™abandi bayobora OIF.
Muri Werurwe hateganyijwe ibikorwa bitandukanye mu Mujyi wa Kigali byâ€™umwihariko hazabanza icyo gutangiza ku mugaragaro uku kwezi nkâ€™uko kwizihiza isabukuru yâ€™imyaka 50 uyu muryango umaze.
ChargÃ© dâ€™Affaires muri Ambasade yâ€™u Bufaransa i Kigali, JÃ©rÃ©mie Blin na Juliette Bigo uyobora Ikigo Ndangamuco cyâ€™Abafaransa mu Rwanda bazagirana ikiganiro nâ€™itangazamakuru ku wa 04 Werurwe 2020 saa tanu za mu gitondo kuri Onomo Hotel.
Ibindi bikorwa biteganyijwe harimo igitaramo cyâ€™umuhanzi Yvan Buravan wegukanye Prix dÃ©couverte RFI mu 2018 kizabera muri Serena Hotel ku wa 20 Werurwe 2020, guhera saa mbili zâ€™umugoroba aho kwinjira bizaba ari ubuntu.
Ikigo Ndangamuco cyâ€™Abafaransa mu Rwanda cyateguwe nâ€™igikorwa cyâ€™amarushanwa kizahuza abanyempano mu kuvuga imivugo byâ€™umwihariko yo mu rurimi rwâ€™Igifaransa. Kizabera ku nzu yâ€™imyidagaduro ya Kimisagara ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020 hagamijwe kuzamura impano nshya. Uzaba uwa mbere umuvugo we uzatunganywa werekanwe mu gitaramo cya Buravan.
Hateganyijwe amarushanwa ya bandes dessinÃ©es [inkuru zishushanyije] yateguwe ku bufatanye na Ã©ditions BakamÃ©, abahize abandi bazatangazwa ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020 ibikorwa byabo bigaragazwe mu gihe cyâ€™icyumweru mu isomero rusange ryâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali mu gihe cyâ€™icyumweru.
Uku kwezi kuzasozwa na Wallonie-Bruxelles, MichaÃ«l Sengazi watwaye Prix RFI Talents du rire 2019 na HervÃ© Kimenyi bazataramira abazitabira umugoroba wiswe Francofourires , mu gitaramo cyâ€™urwenya kizabera muri Kigali Cultural Village ku wa 28 Werurwe.
Uyu muryango washingiwe i Niamey muri Niger tariki 20 Werurwe 1970, utangizwa nâ€™ibihugu 21 byiganjemo ibyahoze bikolonijwe nâ€™u Bufaransa.
Kuri ubu ugizwe nâ€™ibihugu 84 birimo ibinyamuryango byuzuye 54, ibihugu bine byiyunze nâ€™ibihugu 26 byâ€™indorerezi.
Louise Mushikiwabo niwe muyobozi wawo, yatangiye kuwuyobora muri Mutarama 2019.

Title: Abagura mbere amatike yâ€™igitaramo cyo gushimira CÃ©cile Kayirebwa bagabanyirijwe
Body:
Abashinzwe gutegura igitaramo â€˜Ikirenga mu bahanzi 2020â€™ cyo gushimira umuhanzi wabaye indashyikirwa mu kwimakaza umuco nyarwanda abinyujije mu ndirimbo, bagabanyirije ibiciro abari kugura amatike mbere yâ€™igitaramo.
Abashinzwe gutegura igitaramo â€˜Ikirenga mu bahanzi 2020â€™ cyo gushimira umuhanzi wabaye indashyikirwa mu kwimakaza umuco nyarwanda abinyujije mu ndirimbo, bagabanyirije ibiciro abari kugura amatike mbere yâ€™igitaramo.
Uyu mwaka, CÃ©cile Kayirebwa azashimirwa mu gitaramo â€œIkirenga mu bahanziâ€œ giteganyijwe tariki ya 8 Werurwe 2020, mu birori bizabera muri Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village (KCEV) hahoze hitwa Camp Kigali.
Kugeza ubu amatike ari kugura 20000 frw,10000 frw na 5000 frw ku batabashije kuyagura bifashishije Airtel.
Kugeza ubu amatike ari gucururizwa ahantu hatandukanye harimo ahakorera Serivise za Airtel muri Kigali nka Remera ku cyicaro gikuru , Nyabugogo na Nyamirambo.
Aya matike kandi agurirwa muri Camellia ku Gisimenti, UTC, CHIC na KBC, Simba Supermarket, no muri T2000 ahakorera Monaco, I Nyarutarama kuri Tenis Club, Simba yo mu Mujyi na Blues Coffee ndetse no muri gare yo mu Mujyi.
Ku bantu bari kugura amatike bakoresheje Airtel Money, itike igura ibihumbi 20 000Frw yashyizwe kuri 18000Frw mu gihe iya 10 000Frw iri kugura 9000Frw. Naho iya 5000Frw ikagura ibihumbi 4000Frw.
Uzagura tike kumunsi wâ€™igitaramo Kwinjira mu myanya yâ€™icyubahiro ni ukwishyura tike ya 25000 Frw (VVIP), mu gihe ahasanzwe azaba ari 15000 Frw (VIP) ndetse na 10000 Frw ahasigaye hose.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere hagiye gutangwa ishimwe ku muhanzi watoranyijwe nkâ€™Ikirenga mu Bahanzi abikesha mu kwimakaza no guteza imbere â€˜umuco nyarwanda abinyujije mu buhanzi.
Iki gitaramo kizitabirwa nâ€™abahanzi barimo Muyango, Mariya Yohani, Mani Martin, Sentore Jules, Karasira Clarisse, Itorero Ibihame byâ€™Imana, Mushabizi nâ€™Ababeramuco.

Title: Miss Nishimwe Naomie yasubije abamwibasiye kubera amanota yagize mu kizamini cya Leta
Body:
Nyuma yâ€™uko amanota yâ€™ibizamini bisoza amashuri yisumbuye agiye hanze, ku mbuga nkoranyambaga benshi bibasiye Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda mu 2020 Nishimwe Naomie bamunenga kugira amanota make.
Nyuma yâ€™uko amanota yâ€™ibizamini bisoza amashuri yisumbuye agiye hanze, ku mbuga nkoranyambaga benshi bibasiye Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda mu 2020 Nishimwe Naomie bamunenga kugira amanota make.
Uyu mukobwa yatorewe kuba Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda mu mpera zâ€™icyumweru gishize yambikwa ikamba mu birori byabereye mu Intare Conference Arena, asimbura Nimwiza Meghan.
Impamvu yo kwibasira uyu mukobwa ni uko ubusanzwe byari bimaze kumenyerwa ko benshi muri ba Nyampinga bâ€™u Rwanda batsindaga ibizamini bya leta ku manota yo hejuru, ariko we yagize 13 mu Mibare, Ubukungu nâ€™Ubumenyi bwâ€™Isi.
Mu kiganiro Amahumbezi kuri Radiyo Rwanda, Nishimwe Naomie yabajijwe icyo avuga ku bantu bamunenze ko yagize amanota make mu kizamini cya leta.
Ati â€œNtabwo ushobora kubuza abantu kuvuga, hari nâ€™igihe wakora ibyiza nâ€™ubundi bakavuga. Njye rero ubu ndi kureba ibikorwa byanjye nta kindi nitayeho [â€¦] biriya ni ahahise hanjye ubu ndi kubaho byâ€™aka kanya, ndi kureba ubuzima ndi kubaho aka kanya.â€
Abajijwe uko yakiriye amanota yagize, Nishimwe yavuze ko nawe atashimishijwe nâ€™uko yitwaye mu bizamini bya leta gusa ko yabikoze nyuma yâ€™igihe ahuye nâ€™uburwayi bukomeye ku buryo ashimira Imana kuba akiriho.
 Ati â€œUko mwabibonye nanjye niko nabibonye, sinishimiye amanota nagize, si impamvu ngiye gutanga ariko ubuyobozi bwâ€™ikigo cyanjye burabizi. Umwaka nakozemo ikizamini ni umwaka narwayemo cyane nubwo ariko na none ntabigira impamvu. Byibuza ndashima Imana ko nkiriho.â€
Nishimwe Naomie yigaga muri Glory Secondary School, yarangije mu mwaka wa 2019 mu ishami rya MEG.
Uyu mukobwa wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda mu 2020 muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 yari yiyamamarije mu Mujyi wa Kigali agaragaza umushinga wo kurwanya ukwigunga mu banyarwanda.
Ubuzima bwa Miss Nishimwe Naomie ku ishuri aho yigaga

Title: Miss Akacu Lynca yambitswe impeta nâ€™umusore bamaze igihe bakundana
Body:
Miss Akacu Lynca wabaye igisonga cya kabiri muri Miss Rwanda mu 2015 yambitswe impeta nâ€™umusore uzwi nka Guy Alain bamaze igihe mu rukundo wamusabye ko yazamubera umugore undi nawe aremera.
Miss Akacu Lynca wabaye igisonga cya kabiri muri Miss Rwanda mu 2015 yambitswe impeta nâ€™umusore uzwi nka Guy Alain bamaze igihe mu rukundo wamusabye ko yazamubera umugore undi nawe aremera.
Mu mpera zâ€™icyumweru cyashize nibwo umusore witwa Guy Alain uririmba indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana yafashe icyemezo cyo kwambika impeta Miss Akacu Lynca amusaba ko yazamubera umugore.
Abinyujije kuri Instagram ye Guy Alain yagize ati â€Byabaye, nateye ivi musaba ko twakomezanya urugendo arabyemera! Niba muzi Lynca muzi uburyo ndi umusore wâ€™umunyamugisha, niba munzi muzi ukuntu ndi umunyamugisha kugira Lynca, niba mutuzi twese, muzi uburyo ndi umunyamugisha kubana na Lynca muri ubu buzima. Ndagukunda Lynca.â€
Guy Alain ni umwe mu bagize itsinda rya muzika riririmba indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza â€œAlive and Freedâ€, amaze imyaka hafi ine bimenyekanye ko akundana na Miss Akacu Lynca.
Miss Akacu Lynca ufite imyaka 23, yabaye igisonga cya kabiri cya Miss Rwanda akurikiye Uwase Vanessa RaÃ¯ssa wabaye igisonga cya mbere. Bombi bari bagaragiye Kundwa Doriane watowe nka Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda mu 2015.

Title: Filime zisaga 230 ziri guhatanira kwitabira iserukiramuco rya Mashariki African Film Festival
Body:
Iserukiramuco rya filimi nyafurika, Mashariki African Film Festival rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya gatandatu aho abakora filime bo mu bihugu bitandukanye byo muri Afurika no hanze yaho bazitabira.
Iserukiramuco rya filimi nyafurika, Mashariki African Film Festival rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya gatandatu aho abakora filime bo mu bihugu bitandukanye byo muri Afurika no hanze yaho bazitabira.
Iri serukiramuco ryâ€™uyu mwaka rifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti â€œKagire inkuru (tell the tale)â€. Iyi nsanganyamatsiko yatekerejwe mu rwego rwo gushishikariza kubara inkuru zigisha kandi zubaka umuryango uzira umuze.
Mashariki African Film Festival ni iserukiramuco ngarukamwaka rigamije kumenyekanisha filime zikorerwa muri Afurika ndetse nâ€™izo mu Rwanda no kuzikundisha abanyafurika nâ€™isi yose muri rusange. Uyu mwaka iri serukiramuco rizaba guhera tariki 21 kugeza kuri 27 Werurwe 2020.
Kugeza ubu filime zigera mu 218 zamaze kwiyandikisha zisaba kuzitabira iri serukiramuco, nyuma ya tariki 25 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo hazamenyakana filime zabashije kwemererwa kuzitabira Mashariki African Film Festival.
Filime zizerekanwa muri iri serukiramuco ni izakozwe nâ€™abanyafurika kandi zivuga inkuru zerekeranye na Afurika, zikaba zarakozwe nibura guhera muri 2018-2019. Uretse kwerekana filime, hazaba hari gahunda yo gutanga amasomo ajyanye na sinema, guhemba filime nâ€™abakora filime mu byiciro bitandukanye.
Filime zizerekanwa ndetse nyuma yo kwerekanwa hazajya haba umwanya wâ€™ibibazo nâ€™ibisubizo mu gihe uwakoze iyo filime ahari.
â€˜Girls in Cinemaâ€™ ni kimwe mu bizaba bigize Mashariki African Film Festival muri uyu mwaka, iyi ikaba ari gahunda yo gushishikariza umubare munini wâ€™abakobwa kwitabira kujya muri sinema. Hateganyijwe gahunda zo kwigisha abakobwa gukora filime bifashishije telefoni zigezweho (smartphones), nka kimwe mu bikoresha bihendutse ugereranyije nâ€™ibindi bikoresho nkenerwa mu gukora filime.
Mashariki African Film Festival igamije guteza imbere sinema ya Afurika nâ€™inkuru zâ€™Abanyafurika ubwabo ari nazo zerekanwa cyane kurusha izo mu bindi bihugu. Izakorewe hanze ya Afurika zerekanwa muri iri serukiramuco ni izikubiyemo inkuru zivuga kuri Afurika gusa.

Title: Paris: Abantu 30 bafashwe bashinjwa guteza imvururu hafi yâ€™aho Fally Ipupa yakoreye igitaramo
Body:
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 Fally Ipupa yakoreye igitaramo gikomeye mu Mujyi wa Paris mu Bufaransa, abagera kuri 30 batawe muri yombi kubera guteza imvururu hafi yâ€™aho iki gitaramo cyari kubera bagambiriye kubuza abantu kukitabira.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 Fally Ipupa yakoreye igitaramo gikomeye mu Mujyi wa Paris mu Bufaransa, abagera kuri 30 batawe muri yombi kubera guteza imvururu hafi yâ€™aho iki gitaramo cyari kubera bagambiriye kubuza abantu kukitabira.
Mbere yâ€™iki gitaramo, ahagana saa kumi nâ€™ebyiri zâ€™umugoroba hafi yâ€™aho bategera â€™Gare de Lyonâ€™, i Paris, hagaragaye inkongi yatewe nâ€™abigaragambya bagamije kubuza abantu kwitabira igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa, cyaberaga hafi aho.
Aba biganjemo abarwanya ubuyobozi bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, batwitse ibishyirwamo imyanda ndetse nâ€™utumoto duto twari aho.
Icyakora bakomwe mu nkokora na Polisi yâ€™u Bufaransa nâ€™abazimya umuriro bahise bawucyaha.
Umunyamakuru wa BBC wari uri aho byabereye yagize atiâ€ Hari umwotsi mwinshi cyane, abantu biruka batwika ibintu. Byagaragaraga ko barakaye. Urujya nâ€™uruza rwari rwakumiriwe mu byerekezo byose. Byari akagaâ€.
â€œAbigaragambya bajugunyaga buri kimwe bashoboye kuri polisi ndetse nâ€™abazimya inkongi bageragezaga gukora akazi kabo. Batwikaga buri kimwe bashoboye kandi bakakirwanisha.â€
Igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa cyabereye ahitwa Accor Hotels Arena.
Polisi yabashije gukumira ko aba bigaragambyaga irabatatanya ndetse ntibabangamira igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa, kuko byarangiye kibaye cyitabirwa nâ€™abarenga 20 000.
Abigaragambyaga bari bagamije gukumira abantu kwitabira igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa ushinjwa kuba inshuti ya hafi ya Perezida Felix Tshisekedi umaze umwaka ayobora Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Polisi yavuze ko yataye muri yombi abantu 30 mu gihe abarenga 54 bo baciwe amande bashinjwa kugira uruhare muri iyi myigaragambyo.
Nyuma yâ€™igitaramo cyagenze neza, Fally Ipupa abinyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga yashimiye buri umwe wakitabiriye ndetse anihanganisha abatabashije kwinjira kubera ko amatike yari yarashize cyera.

Title: U Budage: Filime â€˜Notre-Dame du Nilâ€™ yegukanye igihembo mu iserukiramuco rikomeye â€œBerlinale 2020â€
Body:
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 Filime â€˜Notre-Dame du Nilâ€™ yegukanye igihembo cya Filime nziza â€œBest Filmâ€ mu iserukiramuco rikomeye ryitwa â€œBerlinale 2020â€ [ Berlin International Film Festival] ryabaga ku nshuro ya 70.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 Filime â€˜Notre-Dame du Nilâ€™ yegukanye igihembo cya Filime nziza â€œBest Filmâ€ mu iserukiramuco rikomeye ryitwa â€œBerlinale 2020â€ [ Berlin International Film Festival] ryabaga ku nshuro ya 70.
Berlinale [Berlin International Film Festival] ni iserukiramuco mpuzamahanga rya Filime rikomeye mu gihugu cyâ€™u Budage no ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi yabaga ku nshuro ya 70.
Berlinale muri uyu mwaka yatangiye tariki Tariki 20 Gashyantare izageza ku itariki ya 1 Werurwe 2020. Aha Filime â€˜Notre-Dame du Nilâ€™ yakomotse ku gitabo cya Mukasonga Scholastique ikaba yegukanye igihembo cya filimi nziza â€œBest Film â€œ.
Iyi filime yashibutse ku gitabo cyanditswe na Mukasonga, Umunyarwandakazi uba mu Bufaransa cyasohotse mu 2012, kigahabwa ibihembo mpuzamahanga bibiri ari byo Prix Renaudot na Prix Ahmadou Kourouma.
Muri iki gitabo Mukasonga agaragaza itotezwa ryakorerwaga abakobwa bâ€™abanyeshuri bakomokaga mu bwoko bwâ€™Abatutsi mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Umwanditsi avuga ibyabereye mu Kigo cyâ€™amashuri yisumbuye cyitwaga Notre Dame du Nil cyari icyâ€™abakobwa gusa.
Nyuma yâ€™imyaka umunani iki gitabo gisohotse, ikigo gikora filime cyitwa Les Films du Tambour kiyobowe na Marie Legrand na Rani Massalha, bari kumwe nâ€™umuhanga mu gutunganya filime Atiq Rahimi, baje mu Rwanda gukora filime ishingiye kuri iki gitabo.
Iyi filime yakiniwe mu Karere ka Musanze no muri Rutsiro ku Ishuri rya Murunda, igaragarano abakobwa bâ€™Abanyarwandakazi bagera kuri 20 barimo Amanda Mugabekazi, Malaika Uwamahoro, Albina Sydney Kirenga, Rubango Belinda na Clariella Bizimana.

Title: Adrien Misigaro na Gentil Misigaro bageze mu Rwanda aho bagiye gukorera ibitaramo bikomeye (Video)
Body:
Abahanzi bamaze kubaka izina mu buryo bukomeye mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Adrien Misigaro na Gentil Misigaro baje mu Rwanda aho bitabiriye ibitaramo bazahuriramo na Israel Mbonyi.
Abahanzi bamaze kubaka izina mu buryo bukomeye mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Adrien Misigaro na Gentil Misigaro baje mu Rwanda aho bitabiriye ibitaramo bazahuriramo na Israel Mbonyi.
Aba bahanzi bageze ku kibuga cyâ€™indege cya Kanombe ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare bari kumwe nâ€™irindi tsinda ryâ€™abaririmbyi bazafatanya nabo.
Adrien Misigaro yabwiye itangazamakuru ko yababajwe cyane no gufungwa kwa Fireman nubwo ntacyo yari kubikoraho kuko gahunda zagombaga gukomeza mu gihe umuntu yaguye mu makosa.
Ati â€œNkâ€™umukozi wâ€™Imana ndamusengera nta kindi kintu nabivugaho, gahunda za leta zigomba gukomeza kuko umuntu iyo ari mu makosa aba agomba gufungwa yaba arengana akarenganurwa. Hari gahunda tuzakorana, hari nâ€™indirimbo ze twakoze.â€
Gentil Misigaro we yavuze ko yari akumbuye mu Rwanda ndetse anagaragaza ko ari ahantu ahoza ku mutima cyane ko yanaje yambaye imyambaro yahakorewe.
Mu mwaka wa 2019 nibwo Adrien Misigaro yagiye gusura urubyiruko ruri kugororerwa i Iwawa, iki gihe uyu muhanzi yavuyeyo atangije Ubukangurambaga yise â€œMelody of New Hopeâ€ bugamije gukangurira urubyiruko rutandukanye kwirinda no kwitandukanya nâ€™ibiyobyabwenge.
Asubiye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aho asanzwe atuye, uyu muhanzi uri mu bagezweho muri Diaspora mu bakora indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana yasobanuriye ubuyobozi bwâ€™itorero asengeramo ibyo avuyemo mu Rwanda.
Nyuma yo kwishimira iki gikorwa yatangije, ubuyobozi bwâ€™Itorero asanzwe asengeramo muri Amerika bwiyemeje kumutera ingabo mu bitugu bukamushyigikira ndetse kugeza ubu uhereye ku muyobozi wâ€™iri torero nâ€™abandi bakozi bâ€™Imana bafatanya umurimo bazamuherekeza mu bitaramo ateganya gukorera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020.
Ibi bitaramo byiswe â€œEach one reach oneâ€ byateguwe mu rwego rwo gukangurira buri wese mu banyarwanda kuba bafasha byibuza umuntu umwe wabaswe nâ€™ibiyobyabwenge kubivamo bityo bigafasha kwihutisha ubukangurambaga bwa â€œMelody of New Hopeâ€.
Mu gihe azamara mu Rwanda, Adrien Misigaro nâ€™ikipe bazaba bari kumwe bazasura ibigo bitandukanye bifasha ababaswe nâ€™ibiyobyabwenge.
Igitaramo cyâ€™i Kigali kizaba tariki 8 Werurwe 2020 muri Intare Arena mu gihe tariki 15 Werurwe 2020 bazakomereza muri Kaminuza yâ€™u Rwanda, Ishami rya Huye muri Auditorium.

Title: Joeboy yashimishije abitabiriye igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction (Amafoto)
Body:
Amaso yâ€™abakunzi bâ€™umuziki byâ€™umwihariko wa Jazz ahora ashyugumbwa kureba igitaramo ngarukakwezi cya Kigali Jazz Junction kimaze kubaka izina kandi kikaba kiri mu byitabirwa cyane.
Amaso yâ€™abakunzi bâ€™umuziki byâ€™umwihariko wa Jazz ahora ashyugumbwa kureba igitaramo ngarukakwezi cya Kigali Jazz Junction kimaze kubaka izina kandi kikaba kiri mu byitabirwa cyane.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020, nabwo abakunzi bâ€™umuziki bari babukereye bambariye kureba abahanzi bakomeye barimo Davis D ugezweho mu ndirimbo yitwa â€˜Dedeâ€™ na Niyo Bosco uri mu bahanzi bari kuzamuka neza mu ndirimbo zitanga ubutumwa ku buzima bwa buri munsi.
Umunya-Nigeria Joseph Akinfenwa Donus umaze kwamamara nka Joeboy nawe yari ari mu bafitiwe amatsiko cyane ko afite ibihangano bigezweho mu Rwanda no muri Afurika muri rusange.
Abakobwa bâ€™ibizengerezi bakibyiruka bari biganje muri iki gitaramo bakamejeje, isegonda ku rindi babyinana imbaduko idasanzwe ndetse byarimba bagasanga abahanzi ku rubyiniro bakabafasha kubyina indirimbo zabo.
Niyo Bosco niwe wabimburiye abandi aririmba indirimbo zitandukanye zâ€™abandi bahanzi ndetse anasusurutsa abantu mu zindi ze zirimo â€˜Ibangaâ€™ na â€˜Ubigenza Uteâ€™ zazamuye amarangamutima ya buri wese wamurebaga.
Uyu muhanzi ubusanzwe witwa Niyokwizerwa Bosco, afite ubumuga bwo kutabona ariko atangaza benshi kubera uburyo akirigita imirya ya guitar.
Davis D nawe yaje amukorera mu ngata mu ndirimbo ze nka â€˜Dedeâ€™, â€˜Biryogoâ€™, â€˜Sexyâ€™, â€˜Sosoâ€™ nâ€™izindi zitandukanye. Ubusanzwe yitwa Icyishaka David ni umwe mu bahanzi baririmba Afrobeat bafite uburyo butandukanye nâ€™abandi baririmbamo bigashimisha benshi.
Uyu musore yageze kuri â€˜Dedeâ€™ ikunzwe mu bice byose byâ€™igihugu abantu bose nâ€™uwari wicaye bahagurukira icyari mwe bacinya akadiho karahava cyane ko iyi iri mu ndirimbo zikunzwe cyane.
Yaririmbye mu buryo bwa Semi Live ariko kuva ku ndirimbo ye ya mbere kugeza ku yo yasorejeho abantu hafi ya bose wabonaga akanyamuneza ari kose bishimiye ibihangano bye kandi bacinya akadiho nta nkomyi.
Joeboy niwe wari utegerejwe! Abantu babwiwe ko agiye gusesekara ku rubyiniro bose nkâ€™abitsamuye basakuriza icyarimwe berekana ko bamwishimiye ku nshuro ye ya mbere aje mu Rwanda.
Yaririmbye indirimbo ze zitandukanye guhera ku ya mbere kugeza ku ya nyuma abantu ubona akanyamuneza ari kose bafatanya nawe kuririmba. Yaririmbye mu buryo bwa Playback.
Uyu musore wâ€™imyaka 22, yavutse ku wa 21 Gicurasi 1997 mu Mujyi wa Lagos muri Nigeria, akaba ari umwanditsi nâ€™umuririmbyi. Abarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya emPawa Africa.
Yize muri Kaminuza ya Lagos izwi nka UNILAG aho yakuye impamyabumenyi mu bijyanye nâ€™imicungire yâ€™abakozi.
Joeboy yatangiye kuririmba ubwo yari afite imyaka 16. Ku myaka 17 akora indirimbo ye ya mbere yise â€˜Gbeseyinâ€™. Yasubiyemo â€˜Shape of Youâ€™ ya Ed Sheeran yakirwa neza ndetse inatumbagiza izina rye ku rwego ruhambaye.
Uyu muhanzi akimara kuririmba iyi ndirimbo ya Sheeran yahise yemererwa na MrÂ Eazi ubufasha ndetse anamusinyisha mu nzu ye ifasha abahanzi ya Eaziâ€™s "Banku" Music.
Mu ndirimbo yakoze zamenyekanye harimo â€˜Babyâ€™, â€˜Beginningâ€™, â€˜All of Youâ€™ nâ€™izindi nyinshi zatumye muri iki gihe abarirwa mu bahanzi bahagaze neza muri Nigeria. Amaze gukora album imwe yise â€˜Love & Lightâ€™. Joeboy aherutse gusohoka ku rutonde rwa BBC rwâ€™abahanzi bo kwitega mu 2020.
Joeboy yaje mu Rwanda abisikana nâ€™Umuraperi Jidenna Theodore Mobisson [Jidenna] nawe wo muri Nigeria waherukaga gutaramira mu Rwanda tariki 29 Ugushyingo 2019 mu gitaramo cyitabiriwe mu buryo bukomeye cyabereye muri Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village hazwi nka Camp Kigali.
Amafoto: Uwihanganye Hardy

Title: Miss World yahaye ikaze Miss Nishimwe Naomie uzitabira iri rushanwa uyu mwaka
Body:
Ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020 Nishimwe Naomie yatsindiye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda, uyu mukobwa wahise anabona itike yo kwitabira irushanwa rya Miss World 2020 yamaze guhabwa ikaze nâ€™abaritegura.
Ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020 Nishimwe Naomie yatsindiye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda, uyu mukobwa wahise anabona itike yo kwitabira irushanwa rya Miss World 2020 yamaze guhabwa ikaze nâ€™abaritegura.
Babinyujije ku rukuta rwabo rwa Twitter, Ubuyobozi bwa Miss World bwagize butiâ€ Mudufashe duhe ikaze Nishimwe Naomie mu muryango wa Miss World.â€
Miss Nishimwe watsindiye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yahise ahabwa itike yo guhagararira u Rwanda mu irushanwa rya Miss World rizaba riba ku nshuro ya 70.
Uyu mukobwa afite umushinga wo kurwanya Kwiheba mu rubyiruko, cyane ko yasanze ari ikibazo gikomeye kandi akenshi abantu badaha agaciro.
Miss Nishimwe muri Miss World azaba abaye umunyarwandakazi wa gatanu witabiriye iri rushanwa u Rwanda ruzaba rwujuje imyaka itanu rwitabira.
Mutesi Jolly niwe mukobwa wa mbere witabiriye Miss World mu 2016, kuva icyo gihe u Rwanda ntirugisiba mu irushanwa.
Nimwiza Meghan niwe Munyarwandakazi uherutse muri iri rushanwa ryabereye mu mujyi wa Londres mu Bwongereza mu mpera za 2019.
Nta mukobwa nâ€™umwe wari wahagararira u Rwanda ngo acyure ikamba iryo ariryo ryose nubwo bagerageza kwitwara neza.

Body:

Title: Senderi yahawe igihembo nâ€™akarere ka Kirehe
Body:

Yabwiye IGIHE ko yahawe iki gihembo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020 muri aka karere akomokamo.
Ati â€œNaraye mpawe igihembo cyâ€™indashyikirwa nâ€™akarere ka Kirehe nkâ€™umuhanzi uhavuka ugerageza gushimisha abaturage baho nâ€™utundi turere muri gahunda zâ€™iterambere ryâ€™igihugu, mu kurinda ibyagezweho no kubyongera biciye mu bihangano byâ€™uburere mboneragihugu.â€

Uyu muhanzi yahawe iki gihembo ku munsi wo gusoza ibyitwa â€˜Open Dayâ€™ bikorwa nâ€™abatuye muri aka karere, uyu akaba ari munsi abantu nâ€™ibigo byigenga bakorera mu karere bose bahurira mu imurikabikorwa bakerekana ibyo bamaze kugeza ku baturage hanarebwa gahunda zâ€™ibihe biri imbere.

Title: Musanze: Bizihiwe nâ€™umuziki wâ€™abahanzi bakomeye mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda (Amafoto)
Body:
Byari ku nshuro ya kabiri muri uyu mwaka habaye igitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda iri kugana ku musozo, aho abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye bataramiye abanya-Musanze bigatinda.
Byari ku nshuro ya kabiri muri uyu mwaka habaye igitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda iri kugana ku musozo, aho abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye bataramiye abanya-Musanze bigatinda.
Ni mu gitaramo cyabaye nyuma yâ€™agace kâ€™iri rushanwa rimaze kuba ubukombe mu magare ribera mu Rwanda, kabaye kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020 aho Umunya-Colombia Restrepo Jhonatan yegukanye aka gace ka Gatanu ka Tour du Rwanda 2020 ka Rubavu-Musanze, akoresheje 2h 08â€™19â€.
Mujyi wa Musanze hari hashyushye bose biteguye kwirebera aba banyonzi, banabukereye kwirebera abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye bagombaga kubataramira kakahava muri stade Ubworoherane yo muri aka karere.
Guhera saa kumi,abantu banyuranagamo basiganwa buri wese ashaka umwanya wâ€™imbere ngo aze kwirebera umuhanzi yihebeye nta nkomyi.
Iki gitaramo cyabaye nyuma yâ€™ikindi cyabereye mu karere ka Rubavu mu Ntara yâ€™Uburengerazuba kuri Kivu Beach iruhande rwa Serena Hotel kuwa Gatatu tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020. Cyari cyitabiriwe nâ€™umubare munini wâ€™abakunzi bâ€™umuziki biganjemo cyane urubyiruko.
Abatandukanye bakomeye mu Rwanda biganjemo ababarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya Kina Music hamwe na King James, Bulldogg, Davis D na Bruce Melodie ndetse na Rob Drabkin na S-Wrap bari baturutse muri Amerika nibo basusurukije abari bitabiriye.
Saa kumi nâ€™ebyiri zishyira saa moya ku rubyiniro habanjeho Rob Drabkin washimishije benshi mu ndirimbo ze zitandukanye biba akarusho ubwo yaririmbaga indirimbo izwi cyane mu Rwanda yâ€™abana yitwa â€˜Mbe Kanyamanza kezaâ€™.
Yakurikiwe nâ€™umuraperi S-Wrap nawe washimishije benshi mu muziki wiganjemo uwo mu njyana ya Trap.
Davis D ugezweho mu ndirimbo â€˜Dedeâ€™ niwe wakurikiyeho yishimirwa mu ndirimbo zitandukanye. Uyu muhanzi yahereye ku yitwa â€˜Biryogoâ€™, â€˜Sosoâ€™, â€˜Sexyâ€™ asoreza kuri â€˜Dedeâ€™.
Nel Ngabo ubarizwa muri Kina Music niwe wakurikiye uyu muhanzi ashimisha benshi mu ndirimbo zirimo â€˜Whyâ€™ iri mu zo yahereyeho, â€˜Nzahindukaâ€™, â€˜Byakoroha asoreza kuri â€˜Ya Motemaâ€™ yahuriyemo na P wahoze muri Dream Boyz.
Bakiri ku rubyiniro P yahise asangwayo na Polisi yâ€™u Rwanda, bakora ubukangurambaga iherutse gutangiza nâ€™abafatanyabikorwa bayo bwâ€™ibyumweru 52 bugamije kurwanya no gukumira impanuka buzwi nka â€œGerayo Amahoroâ€.

Title: Umunyarwenya Kenny BlaQ witabiriye Seka Live yageze i Kigali
Body:
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 27 Gashyantare 2020, umunyarwenya wo muri Nigeria Kenny BlaQ yageze i Kigali aho yitabiriye igitaramo cya Seka Live isoza uku kwezi.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 27 Gashyantare 2020, umunyarwenya wo muri Nigeria Kenny BlaQ yageze i Kigali aho yitabiriye igitaramo cya Seka Live isoza uku kwezi.
Guhera mu ntangiriro zâ€™umwaka wa 2020 Arthur Nation isanzwe itegura ibirori bya Seka Live batangaje ko bigeye kujya biba buri kwezi. Muri uku kwzi hatahiwe icyatumiwemo Ndumiso Lindi wo muri Afurika yâ€™Epfo nâ€™umunya Nigeria Kenny BlaQ.
Akigera ku kibuga cyâ€™indege i Kanombe, BlaQ a yakiriwe na Nkusi Arthur kimwe nâ€™ikipe ya Arthur Nation.
Iki gitaramo cyâ€™urwenya kizaba ku wa 29 Gashyantare. Ndumiso Lindi nawe uzataramira muri iki gitaramo byitezwe ko we agomba kugera i Kigali mu masaha make ari imbere kuri uyu wa Gatanu.
Aba banyarwenya baturutse hanze bazafatanya nâ€™abakizamuka mu Rwanda barimo; Nimu Roger,Mercy, Patrick, Milly na Captain Father.
Kwinjira muri iki gitaramo kizabera muri Kigali Marriott Hotel bizaba ari 10 000 Frw mu myanya isanzwe na 20 000 Frw mu myanya yâ€™icyubahiro.
Muri iki gitaramo itsinda ryâ€™abacuranzi rya Neptune z Band ndetse na Nep Djs nibo bazaba basusurutsa abakunzi bâ€™umuziki.

Title: Tonzi yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise â€œHejuru ya byoseâ€
Body:
Uwitonze Clementine benshi bazi ku izina rya Tonzi wamamaye cyane mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, yashyize hanze indirimbo ye nshya yise â€œHejuru ya byoseâ€.
Uwitonze Clementine benshi bazi ku izina rya Tonzi wamamaye cyane mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, yashyize hanze indirimbo ye nshya yise â€œHejuru ya byoseâ€.
Iyi ndirimbo nshya ya Tonzi yumvikanamo ubutumwa bwibutsa abantu ko hejuru yâ€™ibiba byose ku Isi haba hari Imana iba iri hejuru.
Igitero cya mbere cyâ€™iyi ndirimbo Tonzi agira atiâ€œHejuru yâ€™ibyo twibaza tudafitiye ibisubizo, aho ubwenge ubuhangange nâ€™imbaraga birangirira, ibyo twibwira ko twashoboye turasanga twarabishobojwe nâ€™Imana umugenga wa byose uri hejuru yâ€™ibituvuna, hejuru yâ€™ibihe bihindukaâ€.
Iyi ndirimbo mu buryo bwâ€™amajwi yakozwe inatunganywa na Camarade mu gihe amashusho yayo yo yafashwe akanatunganywa na Eliel Sando.
Tonzi ni umuhanzikazi ukunze guhamya ko yakuranye impano yo kuririmba aho yatangiye kuririmba akiri umwana muto cyane bagomba kuhagarika ku meza kugira ngo abantu bamubone. Impano yaje kwaguka ajya mu makorali atandukanye, mu mwaka wa 2004 atangira umuziki ku giti cye.
Ni umwe mu bahanzi bâ€™igitsinagore baririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana umaze kwagura umwuga we mu buryo bukomeye.

Title: Uko MrÂ Eazi yabereye ikiraro Joeboy ugiye gutaramira mu Rwanda
Body:
Umuhanzi wo muri Nigeria Joseph Akinfenwa Donus umaze kwamamara nka Joeboy agiye gutaramira muri Kigali Jazz Junction izaba ku wa 28 Gashyantare uyu mwaka, yavuze uko MrÂ Eazi yamubereye ikiraro kimwinjiza mu muziki yari asanzwe akora nko kwishimisha.
Umuhanzi wo muri Nigeria Joseph Akinfenwa Donus umaze kwamamara nka Joeboy agiye gutaramira muri Kigali Jazz Junction izaba ku wa 28 Gashyantare uyu mwaka, yavuze uko MrÂ Eazi yamubereye ikiraro kimwinjiza mu muziki yari asanzwe akora nko kwishimisha.
Uyu musore yabitangaje mu kiganiro nâ€™itangazamakuru gitegura igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction kizaba kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020, aho azahuriramo na Davis D ndetse na Niyo Bosco uri mu bahanzi bagezweho muri iki gihe.
Joeboy yabajijwe uko yahuye nâ€™umuhanzi Oluwatosin Ajibade [MrÂ Eazi] usanzwe afite inzu ifasha abahanzi ya emPawa Africa, ari nayo yazamuye Joeboy ugezweho muri iki gihe.
Mu gusubiza Joeboy yavuze ko yahuye na MrÂ Eazi mu buryo butangaje, ati â€œNigaga muri kaminuza ya Lagos [UNILAG], nakoraga umuziki wo kwishimisha. Igihe kimwe nashyize amashusho ndi kuririmba ku rubuga rwa Instagram arayibona tuza kumenyana kubera impano yari yambonanye atangira kumfasha atyo.â€
Yavuze ko afata MrÂ Eazi nkâ€™umuntu washyize itafari ku muziki we ndetse byâ€™umwihariko akishimira kuba aba muri iyi nzu ye ifasha abahanzi.
Iki gitaramo ategerejwemo giteganyijwe ku wa 28 Gashyantare 2020. Joeboy yatowe nâ€™abakurikira urubuga rwa Twitter rwâ€™abakunzi ba Kigali Jazz Junction ku majwi 66.2% ahigitse Innos B wo muri RDC wakoranye indirimbo na Diamond Platnumz ndetse nâ€™Umunya-Kenya Stella Mwangi.
Joeboy ni umwe mu bahanzi bagezweho cyane muri Afurika muri iki gihe ndetse mu banyabirori bo muri Kigali baramuzi cyane kuko indirimbo ze zidasiba gucurangwa mu tubyiniro dutandukanye yaba muri Kigali no hanze yayo. Indirimbo ze zamamaye cyane mu 2019. Aririmba cyane Afro Pop na R&B.
Uyu musore wâ€™imyaka 22, yavutse ku wa 21 Gicurasi 1997 mu Mujyi wa Lagos muri Nigeria, akaba ari umwanditsi nâ€™umuririmbyi. Abarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya emPawa Africa.
Yize muri Kaminuza ya Lagos izwi nka UNILAG aho yakuye impamyabumenyi mu bijyanye nâ€™imicungire yâ€™abakozi.
Joeboy yatangiye kuririmba ubwo yari afite imyaka 16. Ku myaka 17 akora indirimbo ye ya mbere yise â€˜Gbeseyinâ€™. Yasubiyemo â€˜Shape of Youâ€™ ya Ed Sheeran yakirwa neza ndetse inatumbagiza izina rye ku rwego ruhambaye.
Uyu muhanzi akimara kuririmba iyi ndirimbo ya Sheeran yahise yemererwa na MrÂ Eazi ubufasha ndetse anamusinyisha mu nzu ye ifasha abahanzi.
Mu ndirimbo yakoze zamenyekanye harimo â€˜Babyâ€™, â€˜Beginningâ€™, â€˜All of Youâ€™ nâ€™izindi nyinshi zatumye muri iki gihe abarirwa mu bahanzi bahagaze neza muri Nigeria. Amaze gukora album imwe yise â€˜Love & Lightâ€™. Joeboy aherutse gusohoka ku rutonde rwa BBC rwâ€™abahanzi bo kwitega mu 2020.
Nadege Gaju ushinzwe iyamamazabikorwa muri Volkswagen yavuze ko muri iki gitaramo buri muntu uzakitabira akoresheje Move Ride azagabanyirizwa 10% yâ€™amafaranga yâ€™urugendo.
Kugira ngo ubashe gukora ingendo mu modoka zitandukanye za Volkswagen zirimo Polo, Passat na Teramont bigusaba kubanza gushyira muri telefoni yawe yaba ikoresha Android cyangwa iOS, â€˜applicationâ€™ ya â€˜Moveâ€™.
Usabwa kubanza gufungura konti ukoresheje e-mail cyangwa nimero yawe ya telefoni (Sign up), ubundi gahita winjiramo (Log in).
Mbere yâ€™iki gitaramo uyu muhanzi arahura nâ€™abantu banasangire mu mugoba bise "Meet and Greet" kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020 kuri Marriott Hotel ahaba hacurangira itsinda rya Nep Djs kwinjira bikaza kuba ari ubuntu kuri buri wese ubyifuza.
Ni umugoroba wahura nâ€™uyu muhanzi mukifotozanya mukanasangira mbere yuko igitaramo nyiri izina kiba.

Title: Itorero New Life Bible Church ryateguye igiterane cyizitabirwa nâ€™abashumba bakomeye muri Afurika
Body:
Buri mwaka itorero New Life Bible Church ritegura igiterane gikomeye kandi kiri ku rwego mpuzamahanga cyiswe Refresh Africa Conference.
Buri mwaka itorero New Life Bible Church ritegura igiterane gikomeye kandi kiri ku rwego mpuzamahanga cyiswe Refresh Africa Conference.
Ni igiterane kiba gikubiyemo inyigisho zo guhemburwa kâ€™umugabane wa Afurika ndetse no kuramya Imana kugira ngo habeho ubutumwa bwâ€™impemburo.
Muri 2020, iki giterane giteganyijwe kubera kuri New Life Bible church guhera tariki ya 8 kugeza ku itariki ya 15 Gashyantare 2020.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye nâ€™itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Rev Dr Charles Mugisha Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Africa New Life Ministries na New Life Bible Church yavuze ko igiterane cyâ€™uyu mwaka gifite umwihariko wâ€™uko abantu bazahabwa inyigisho zâ€™impemburo hagamijwe kugira umutwaro wo guhembura Afurika.
Yavuze ko hazabaho ibihe byihariye byo kuramya Imana byimbitse hifashishijwe abaramyi biteguye kandi bagiye kujya mu mwiherero ari nako barushaho gusenga kugira ngo hazabeho guhembuka byuzuye binyuze mu kuramya Imana.
Uyu mushumba kandi yavuze ko hatumiwe abakozi bâ€™Imana batandukanye barimo Pasiteri Lincoln Serwaga ukorera ivugabutumwa mu Bwongereza uyu akaba ari mu bashumba bakomeye ndetse bajyanye ivugabutumwa ku byanyafurika bari muri diaspora.
Hari kandi abandi bavugabutumwa barimo Pasiteri James Kato,Pasiteri Chris Rue,Pasiteri Jide Laore,Pasiteri Ryan Holladay,ndetse na Pasiteri Charles Mugisha ari na we uzakira aba bakozi bâ€™Imana.
Refresh Africa Conference ni igiterane kimaze imyaka itanu kiba, nkuko bitangazwa nâ€™ubuyobozi bukaba buvuga ko cyahembuye imitimba ya benshi muri iyo myaka yose yewe ngo hari nâ€™ubuhamya butandukanye bugaragaza ko hari nâ€™abakize indwara.

Title: Abahanzi bakomeye basusurukije abanya-Rubavu mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda (Amafoto)
Body:
Abahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda biganjemo ababarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya Kina Music hamwe na King James, Bulldogg na Bruce Melodie bashimishije abanya-Rubavu mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda.
Abahanzi bakomeye mu Rwanda biganjemo ababarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya Kina Music hamwe na King James, Bulldogg na Bruce Melodie bashimishije abanya-Rubavu mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda.
Ni igitaramo cyabaye kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 26 Gashyantare 2020, nyuma yisiganwa rya Tour du Rwanda 2020 ryavaga mu karere ka Rusizi-Rubavu aho Natnael Tesfatsion ukomoka muri ErythrÃ©e yegukanye ka agace akoresheje amasaha atanu, iminota 34 nâ€™amasegonda 46, agahita anafata umwanya wa mbere ku rutonde rusange.
Iki gitaramo cyabereye mu karere ka Rubavu mu Ntara yâ€™Uburengerazuba kuri Kivu Beach iruhande rwa Serena Hotel. Cyari cyitabiriwe nâ€™umubare munini wâ€™abakunzi bâ€™umuziki biganjemo cyane cyane urubyiruko.
Cyahuriyemo abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye aho ku rubyiniro habanjeho abanyamerika Rob Drabkin washimishije benshi mu ndirimbo yaririmbwaga kera nâ€™abana ivuga ngo â€˜Mbe Kanyamanza kezaâ€™ yanzika nâ€™izindi ze yicurangira guitar, ibintu byanejeje abatari bake.
Yakurikiwe nâ€™umuraperi S-Wrap nawe wishimiwe cyane, uyu azwi cyane mu Rwanda kubera Remix yâ€™indirimbo ya Igor Mabano bahuriyemo yâ€™iyitwa â€˜Backâ€™.
Aba bakurikiwe na Nel Ngabo washimishije abari bitabiriye mu ndirimbo ze zitandukanye zirimo â€˜Byakorohaâ€™, â€˜Whyâ€™, â€˜Nzahindukaâ€™ ageze ku yitwa â€˜Ya motemaâ€™ ahamagara Platini wahoze muri Dream Boyz ubu wiyise P, aba ari nayo asorezaho.
Davis D uri mu bahanzi bakunzwe nawe yashimishije abari bitabiriye iki gitaramo mu ndirimbo ze zitandukanye zirimo â€˜Biryogoâ€™, â€˜Sosoâ€™, â€˜Like Youâ€™ yahuriyemo na Seyn na Kevin Kade, â€˜Sexyâ€™ asoreza kuri Dede yahagurukije benshi.
Uyu muhanzi akimara gusoza kuyiririmba yahise ava ku rubyiniro ariko abantu bakavugira mu matamatama ko bibaye byiza yayisubiramo, cyane ko iri mu zigezweho mu Rwanda cyane mu rubyiruko ari narwo rwinshi rwari rwitabiriye.
Yakurikiwe na Igor Mabano waririmbye indirimbo ze zitandukanye zirimo â€˜Backâ€™, â€˜Iyo Utegerezaâ€™, â€˜Dear Mashukaâ€™ yafashijwemo na Rob Drabkin nâ€™izindi.
Bulldogg niwe wakurikiye uyu muhanzi, yishimirwa bikomeye mu bihangano bye bitandukanye. Yaririmbye indirimbo ze zirimo â€˜Cinemaâ€™, â€˜Nkâ€™umusazaâ€™, â€˜Kaza Rohoâ€™ na â€˜Mpe Enkoniâ€™.
Bruce Melodie wakurikiye uyu muraperi yinjiriye ku rubyiniro mu ndirimo yise â€˜Ndumiweâ€™ ahita yanzika nâ€™izindi zirimo â€˜Freshâ€™ igezweho muri iki gihe, â€˜Ikinyaâ€™, â€˜Katerinaâ€™ asoreza kuri â€˜Kungolaâ€™ yahagurukije abantu hafi ya bose bari bitabiriye.
Bruce Melodie yakurikiwe na Butera Knowless waje ku rubyiniro imvura isa nâ€™ishaka kugwa ariko nawe yishimirwa mu bihangano bitandukanye ahamya ibigwi nkâ€™umwe mu bategarugori bafite izina rikomeye kandi bamaze igihe kinini mu muziki.
Yaririmbye indirimbo zitandukanye zirimo â€˜Baramushakaâ€™, â€˜Yudaâ€™, â€˜Sweet Mutimaâ€™, â€˜Nkorahoâ€™ asoreza kuri â€˜Day to Dayâ€™. Buri ndirimbo yose yaririmbye yafashwaga nâ€™abana, ndetse gututumba kwâ€™imvura kwabaye nkâ€™ukuvaho nâ€™ibijojoba byayo birashira maze abantu babyina birekuye.
King James niwe wasoje iki gitaramo yishimirwa byâ€™ikirenga kurusha abandi bose bari bamubanjirije.
Uyu musore umaze igihe kinini ari umwe mu bafite igikundiro, yaririmbye indirimbo ze zitandukanye ahereye ku yitwa â€˜Rastaâ€™, â€˜Agatimatimaâ€™, â€˜Abo Boseâ€™, â€˜Ayo arya ni ayanjyeâ€™ yagezeho agahamagara ku rubyiniro Bulldogg bayihuriyemo akaza akamufasha.
King James yashyize ubushyuhe mu bari bitabiriye iki gitaramo ubwo yanzikaga nâ€™indirimbo zibyinitse zirimo â€˜Kuko turi kumweâ€™, â€˜Umuriro watseâ€™, â€˜Ganyobweâ€™ ndetse na â€˜Ndagutegereje cyaneâ€™ yasorejeho.
Muri iki gitaramo hari umwanya wo gupima ku buntu virusi itera sida nâ€™izindi ndwara, hakanatangwa inyigisho zitandukanye zifasha abaturage kubungabunga ubuzima bwabo.
Byâ€™umwihariko hatangiwemo ubutumwa bujyanye no kwirinda indwara ya Coronavirus imaze iminsi ihitana abantu mu bice bitandukanye byâ€™Isi byâ€™umwihariko mu Bushinwa cyane ko ari naho yatangiriye.
Biteganyijwe igitaramo nkâ€™iki kiza kubera no mu karere ka Musanze mu Majyaruguru kuri uyu we Kane tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020 ndetse no mu Mujyi wa Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 29 Gashyantare 2020 muri Kigali Car Free Zone.

Title: James na Daniella nâ€™abo bazafatanya bahishuye aho bageze imyiteguro yâ€™igitaramo â€œMpa Amavuta Live Concertâ€
Body:

James yavuze ko iki gitaramo kizatangira saa cyenda zâ€™amanywa aho imiryango izaba ifunguye saa munani zâ€™amanywa, saa munani nâ€™igice kugeza saa cyenda bazaba bari gusenga, saa cyenda umuhanzi wa mbere azaba ageze ku rubyiniro kuko igitaramo kizarangira saa moya zâ€™umugoroba.
Maya Fabrice mu kiganiro nâ€™abanyamakuru yashimiye Imana ko igitaramo cya mbere cya James na Daniella kigiye kubera muri Kigali Arena.
Ari James na Daniella cyangwa abahanzi bazafatanya bavuze ko imyiteguro yâ€™iki gitaramo bayigeze ku musozo ku buryo biteguye kuzashimisha abazitabira iki gitaramo.
James na Daniella bafite igikundiro cyo ku gasongero mu bihebeye ibihangano byo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, bateguye igitaramo gikomeye bahurijemo couple zâ€™abaramyi zikunzwe mu gihugu.
Iki gitaramo cyiswe â€œMpa Amavuta Live Concertâ€ gitegerejwe kubera muri Kigali Arena ku wa 1 Werurwe 2020.
James na Daniella bagiteguye bagamije kumurika album yabo ya mbere bise â€œMpa Amavutaâ€™â€™ izaba iriho indirimbo umunani.
Cyatumiwemo abahanzi bakomeye barimo andi ma-couple azwi cyane mu muziki wo kuramya Imana arimo iya Ben na Chance; Tuyizere Papi Clever na Ingabire Dorcas; Maya na Fabrice na Amanda Fung na Kavutse Olivier babarizwa muri Beauty for Ashes.
Abazacyitabira kandi bazataramirwa nâ€™abahanzi barimo Prosper Nkomezi uri mu bafite igikundiro, RenÃ© Patrick, Ndayisenga Esron wamamaye muri True Promises na Gaby Kamanzi.
Couple ya James Rugarama na Daniella Mukiza ifitanye abana babiri. Ni imwe mu zakoze umuziki ukabasha kugera ku kigero nkâ€™icyo uyu munsi bariho. Bavuga ko kuba indirimbo zabo ziri kwamamara cyane mu buryo bwihuse ari ubushake bwâ€™Imana nâ€™amasengesho yabo adasiba.
Mu minsi ishize babwiye IGIHE ko babanye igihe kinini babitsanya amabanga, nyuma bafata umwanzuro wo kugirana umubano wâ€™urukundo no kuririmbana nka Couple.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere James na Daniella bagiye gukorera igitaramo mu Rwanda, gusa si cyo cya mbere bakoze kuva batangiye umuziki kuko hari icyo bakoreye muri Uganda mu mpera za 2017.
Kwinjira muri â€œMpa Amavuta Live Concertâ€ ku bazagura amatike mbere ni 3 000 Frw, 15 000 Frw na 30 000 Frw ku bazagura amatike mbere mu gihe abazayagurira ku muryango bizaba ari 5 000 Frw, 10 000 Frw na 20 000 Frw.

Title: Abazitabira igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction bakoresheje Move bagabanyirijwe ibiciro byâ€™ingendo
Body:
Abazitabira igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction cyatumiwemo umuhanzi wo muri Nigeria Joseph Akinfenwa Donus umaze kwamamara nka Joeboy bakoresheje imodoka zâ€™uruganda rwa Volkswagen, zikora mu buryo bwa Move bamaze kugabanyirizwa ibiciro byâ€™ingendo.
Abazitabira igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction cyatumiwemo umuhanzi wo muri Nigeria Joseph Akinfenwa Donus umaze kwamamara nka Joeboy bakoresheje imodoka zâ€™uruganda rwa Volkswagen, zikora mu buryo bwa Move bamaze kugabanyirizwa ibiciro byâ€™ingendo.
Igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction iteganyijwe ku wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 izaririmbamo umunya Nigeria Joeboy, Davis D na Niyo Bosco.
Abategura iki gitaramo bamaze gutangaza ko buri muntu uzakitabira akoresheje Move Ride azagabanyirizwa 10% yâ€™amafaranga yâ€™urugendo.
Uburyo bwa â€˜Moveâ€™ bufasha abakeneye gutega imodoka zarwo mu Mujyi wa Kigali, bakishyura bitewe nâ€™intera bagenze.
Kugira ngo ubashe gukora ingendo mu modoka zitandukanye za Volkswagen zirimo Polo, Passat na Teramont bigusaba kubanza gushyira muri telefoni yawe yaba ikoresha Android cyangwa iOS, â€˜applicationâ€™ ya â€˜Moveâ€™.
Usabwa kubanza gufungura konti ukoresheje e-mail cyangwa nimero yawe ya telefoni (Sign up), ubundi gahita winjiramo (Log in).
Iyo birangiye uhabwa umwanya wuzuzamo aho uherereye nâ€™aho wifuza kujya, ubundi bakakwereka ubwoko bwâ€™imodoka zihari nâ€™ikiguzi cyâ€™urugendo bigendana bitewe nâ€™ubwoko bwâ€™imodoka ukeneye nâ€™intera ushaka kugenda, wowe ukihitiramo iyo ushaka.
Urugendo rwishyurwa ku munota cyangwa ibilometero, kandi mu kwishyura hifashishwa amafaranga yoherezwa kuri telefoni igendanwa cyangwa ikarita ya banki. Ku munsi abasaga 120 bakoresha â€˜Move Rideâ€™ mu ngendo zabo zitandukanye.
Muri iki gitaramo cya Jazz Junction hazataramira Davis D ugezweho muri iyi minsi kubera indirimbo ye â€œDedeâ€ ndetse na Niyo Bosco wagaragaje ko nubwo afite ubumuga bwo kutabona impano ye yâ€™umuziki ari ikirenga.
Kuri ubu Niyo Bosco agezweho mu ndirimbo ye ya mbere yasohoye mu minsi ishize akayita â€œUbigenza ute?â€
Joeboy yatangiye kuririmba ubwo yari afite imyaka 16. Ku myaka 17 yakoze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise â€˜Gbeseyinâ€™. Yasubiyemo â€˜Shape of Youâ€™ ya Ed Sheeran yakirwa neza ndetse inatumbagiza izina rye ku rwego ruhambaye.
Uyu muhanzi akimara kuririmba iyi ndirimbo ya Sheeran, yahise yemererwa na MrÂ Eazi ubufasha ndetse anamusinyisha mu nzu ye ifasha abahanzi ya Eaziâ€™s "Banku" Music.
Mu ndirimbo yakoze zamenyekanye harimo â€˜Babyâ€™, â€˜Beginningâ€™, â€˜All of Youâ€™ nâ€™izindi nyinshi zatumye muri iki gihe abarirwa mu bahanzi bahagaze neza muri Nigeria.
Amaze gukora album imwe yise â€˜Love & Lightâ€™. Joeboy aherutse gusohoka ku rutonde rwa BBC rwâ€™abahanzi bo kwitega mu 2020.
Joeboy agiye kuza mu Rwanda abisikana nâ€™Umuraperi Jidenna Theodore Mobisson [Jidenna] nawe wo muri Nigeria uheruka gutaramira mu Rwanda tariki 29 Ugushyingo 2019 mu gitaramo cyitabiriwe mu buryo bukomeye cyabereye muri Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village hazwi nka Camp Kigali.

Title: Yvan Buravan yasabye RIB gukurikirana umutekamutwe wamwiyitiriye uri kwiba abantu
Body:
Burabyo Yvan wamenyekanye cyane mu muziki wâ€™u Rwanda nka Yvan Buravan kuri ubu uri kubarizwa ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi yasabye Ubugenzacyaha bwâ€™u Rwanda gukurikirana umutekamutwe wamwiyitiriye akaba ari kwiba abantu.
Burabyo Yvan wamenyekanye cyane mu muziki wâ€™u Rwanda nka Yvan Buravan kuri ubu uri kubarizwa ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi yasabye Ubugenzacyaha bwâ€™u Rwanda gukurikirana umutekamutwe wamwiyitiriye akaba ari kwiba abantu.
Uyu mutekamutwe utaramenyekana ari kwifashisha imbuga nkoranyambaga yiyita Yvan Buravan ubundi akabwira abakunzi bâ€™uyu muhanzi ko hari umushinga wâ€™indirimbo ari gukorana na Diamond bityo akeneye ubufasha bwabo.
Uyu mutekamutwe abinyujije kuri Facebook yagize atiâ€Yvan Buravan ndabasuhuje kandi mbashimiye mbikuye ku mutima urukundo mukomeje kunyereka. Ariko ndamenyesha abafana banjye bwâ€™umwihariko abakunzi banjye ko mfitanye umushinga na Diamond none nkaba mbasaba inkungaâ€.
Uwo mutekamutwe yanashyizeho nimero za telefone, asaba abamukurikira kumwoherereza ubufasha.
Uyu muhanzi akimara kubona ubu butumwa yahise abimenyesha Ubugenzacyaha bwâ€™u Rwanda abasaba ko umuntu uri gukoresha iyi nimero yakurikiranwa cyane ko yamwiyitiriye kandi akomeje kwiba abantu ibyabo.
Yagize ati "Niba ari MTN cyangwa RIB ndabasaba kunkiza iyi nimero nâ€™uyikoresha kuko si njyewe, nagiye numva inkuru nyinshi mbi zâ€™abibeshye ko ari njyewe uyikoresha."
Yvan Buravan ari ku mugabane wâ€™Uburayi nyuma yuko tariki 14 Gashyantare 2020 yataramiye muri SuÃ¨de, nyuma yâ€™igitaramo akaba yarakomeje gahunda ze bwite mbere yuko agaruka mu Rwanda.

Title: TMC yerekeje muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika
Body:
Mujyanama Claude uzwi nka TMC wo mu itsinda rya Dream Boys ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 25 Gashyantare 2020 yerekeje muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bibyutsa amarangamutima yâ€™abatekereza ko agiye ubutazagaruka akaba atumye itsinda rigiye gusenyuka.
Mujyanama Claude uzwi nka TMC wo mu itsinda rya Dream Boys ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 25 Gashyantare 2020 yerekeje muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bibyutsa amarangamutima yâ€™abatekereza ko agiye ubutazagaruka akaba atumye itsinda rigiye gusenyuka.
Kuva mu minsi ishize umwuka wagiye uba mubi mu itsinda rya Dream Boys, abakurikiranira hafi ibyâ€™umuziki bagahamya ko iri tsinda riri mu marembera.
Uyu mwuka wazamutse ubwo TMC yari amaze kumurika igitabo cyâ€™ubushakashatsi yari yarakoze arangiza icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza. Iki gihe mu kiganiro na IGIHE yavuze ko yifuza gukomeza amasomo ye ariko byaba byiza akiga hanze yâ€™u Rwanda.
Nyuma yâ€™aya magambo abantu banyuranye batangiye kubona ko abagize Dream Boys badahuje intego ndetse bitizwa umurindi nuko nyuma buri wese muri iri tsinda yatangiye kwikorana umuziki ku giti cye.
Platini yahinduye izina yitwa P uyu akaba yarasohoye indirimbo zinyuranye wenyine atari kumwe na TMC mu gihe nâ€™undi nawe hari izo yakoze wenyine.
Muri iyi minsi Platini ari kugaragara wenyine mu kazi ka Tour du Rwanda aho ari gukorana na CANAL+ benshi bari batangiye kwibaza igihatse ibi byose.
 Kugeza ubu TMC yamaze kwerekeza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, hakaba hari nâ€™amakuru ahamya ko uyu muhanzi atazagaruka mu Rwanda ukundi ahubwo agiye gushaka uko yakomerezayo amasomo ye.
Icyakora ubwo yahagurukaga i Kanombe TMC yagiranye ikiganiro kigufi na IGIHE ashimangira ko agiye muri Amerika ariko atagiye burundu.
Uyu muhanzi yagize atiâ€ Ngiye muri Amerika muri gahunda zanjye, mugenzi wanjye Platini arabizi yewe ntanikibazo na kimwe gihari.â€
Yakomeje agira atiâ€ Gahunda zanjye nizirangira nzagaruka kandi si cyera, wenda bizanafata icyumweru kimwe.â€
Gusa nubwo TMC avuga ko atagiye guhera muri Amerika ku mbuga nkoranyambaga benshi siko babifata bitewe nuko umwuka wari uhagaze mu itsinda.
Dream Boys ni itsinda ryâ€™umuziki rigizwe nâ€™abasore babiri aribo Mujyanama Claude uzwi nka TMC ndetse na Nemeye Platini wamenyekanye nka Platini.
Aba basore bamaze imyaka irenga icumi bakorana umuziki bakunzwe mu ndirimbo zinyuranye cyane ko bafite album zirenga esheshatu zose zamaze gusohoka ndetse bamurikiye abakunzi babo.

Title: Niyo Bosco yashimiye Adrien Misigaro wamufashije gukora indirimbo â€œIbangaâ€
Body:
Niyo Bosco wasohoye indirimbo nshya yise â€œIbangaâ€ yashimiye bikomeye Misigaro Adrien wamufashije mu ikorwa ryâ€™iyi ndirimbo.
Niyo Bosco wasohoye indirimbo nshya yise â€œIbangaâ€ yashimiye bikomeye Misigaro Adrien wamufashije mu ikorwa ryâ€™iyi ndirimbo.
Uyu muhanzi ukomeje kwigarurira imitima ya benshi mu kiganiro na IGIHE yagize atiâ€ Ndashimira Adrien Misigaro, ku bufasha yampaye mu ikorwa ryâ€™iyi ndirimbo yaramfashije ndamushimira cyane.â€
Uyu muhanzi ntabwo nyigeze atangaza ubwoko bwâ€™impano Misigaro yamuhaye.
Niyo Bosco yongeye gusaba Abanyarwanda kumukundira impano afite mu muziki aho kumugirira impuhwe kubera ikibazo afite cyo kuba afite ubumuga bwo kutabona.
Atiâ€ Ndabasaba ko bakumva ibihangano byanjye bagakunda impano yanjye ntibankundire ibindi cyangwa ngo bumve ko bankunze kubera impuhwe zâ€™ikibazo mfite.â€
Adrien Misigaro washimiwe cyane na Niyo Bosco ni umuhanzi wâ€™indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana utuye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Indirimbo â€œIbangaâ€ ya Niyo Bosco ikubiyemo ubutumwa bukangurira abantu kugira ibanga, agaragazamo ingaruka zikunze kuba ku bantu batarigira.
Mu nyikirizo yâ€™iyi ndirimbo uyu muhanzi agira atiâ€Ibanga ni igihamya cyemeza ko uri umwizerwa, kugira ibanga nibyo bishimangira ubupfura bwawe. Uko waba uri kose utagira ibanga amagambo uvugwa niyo menshi kurusha ayo avuga! Jya uvuga uziga [â€¦].â€
Niyokwizerwa Bosco wamenyekanye nka Niyo Bosco ni umusore wâ€™imyaka 20 yâ€™amavuko ukora umuziki ariko afite ubumuga bwo kutabona.
Iyi ndirimbo ye nshya mu buryo wâ€™amajwi yakorewe muri Uno Record ikorwa na Producer witwa Santana mu gihe amashusho yayo yafashwe akanatunganywa na Bagenzi Bernard uri mu bagezweho muri iyi minsi.
Ikiganiro na Niyo Bosco washimiye bikomeye Adrien Misigaro wamufashije mu ndirimbo "Ibanga"
Indirimbo "Ibanga" Niyo Bosco aherutse gushyira hanze

Title: Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo bakoze mu rurimi rwâ€™Ikirashi
Body:
Abahanzi babiri bavuka mu Karere ka Kirehe aribo Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo iririmbwe mu rurimi shami ruzwi nkâ€™Ikirashi mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha uru rurimi banarurinda kuzimira.
Abahanzi babiri bavuka mu Karere ka Kirehe aribo Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo iririmbwe mu rurimi shami ruzwi nkâ€™Ikirashi mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha uru rurimi banarurinda kuzimira.
Iyi ndirimbo bayisohoye kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21Gashyantare 2020 ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga wâ€™ururimi kavukire. Uyu munsi ukaba warizihirijwe mu Karere ka Kirehe ahahawe umwanya ururimi shami rwâ€™ikinyarwanda rukoreshwa na bamwe mu baturage bo mu Karere ka Kirehe ruzwi nkâ€™Ikirashi.
Abaturage bakoresha uru rurimi bahawe umwanya baganira banabyina imbyino zitandukanye ziririmbwe muri uru rurimi rwâ€™ururashi. Abaturage bahimbawe cyane nyuma yo kumva ko abahanzi babiri bakomoka muri aka Karere babakoreye indirimbo bise Ikirashi aho bafatanyije nabo mu kuyibyina.
Senderi yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo bayikoze bagira ngo bashimire leta ku iterambere imaze kugeza ku baturage bavuga ikirashi.
Yagize ati â€œMbere 1994 abaturage bavuga Ikirashi bari babayeho nabi bamwe barwaye imvunja ibirenge bikitambika none ubu batujwe mu midugudu bahabwa agaciro ntabwo bakibayeho nka mbere.â€
Yongeyeho ati â€œIkindi twayikoze kubera uyu munsi mpuzamahanga wâ€™ururimi kavukire kugira ngo abantu bareke kwibagirwa indimi zacu gakondo.â€
Yavuze ko gufata amafaranga yabo bakayasohoramo indirimbo ari ukugira ngo bakomeze guteza imbere uru rurimi kugira ngo rwoye kuzima ahubwo abantu bakomeze baruvuge.
Intore Tuyisenge we yavuze ko bakimara kumenya ko uyu munsi mpuzamahanga uzizihirizwa mu Karere ka Kirehe barebye umusanzu batanga bagasanga bakwiye gukora indirimbo ishishikariza abantu gukomeza kwibuka ururimi rwâ€™Ikirashi.
Ati â€œIyo ururimi rutabungabunzwe rurazimira, njye na Senderi twahisemo rero gukora iyi ndirimbo kugira ngo turusigasire. Iyo tuvuze Ikirashi bimfasha kwibuka abakurambere bacu muri aka Karere tuvukamo kuko nirwo bavugaga nubwo twe tutagize amahirwe yo kurumenya neza.â€
Tuyisenge yavuze ko bagiye kongera imbaraga mu kurusakaza kugira ngo rumenyekane cyane. Yavuze ko kuri ubu inyinshi mu ndirimbo ze azajya agerageza agashyiramo amagambo make yâ€™ururimi rwâ€™Ikirashi.
Abakuze bakoresha ururimi rwâ€™Ikirashi bafite agahinda baterwa nuko abato batagishaka kurumenya ngo kuko ku ishuri batarukoresha bakibaza uburyo nibasaza ruzakendera bikabababaza.
IGIHE yaganiriye na bamwe mu barukoresha batubwira amagambo amwe namwe nâ€™ibisobanuro byayo mu Kinyarwanda.
Gusuhuzanya mu Kirashi iyo ari mu gitondo bakoresha â€˜Murayire ge, haba hacyeye bagakoresha â€˜Agandaâ€™ cyangwa â€˜Musibire geâ€™ kubwira umuntu uti â€œAmakuru ki uvuga Agandi shi, Mwiriwe mute bavuga Mwasiba kurungi. Iyo ushaka kubwira umuntu uti uvuye he bakoresha Waruga hi, muryoherwe ni Munuriwe.
Ibice byâ€™umubiri nkâ€™izuru ryitwa Enyindo, ukutwi ni ugutwi, irisho ni ijisho, urutoki rwâ€™insina ni Engemu, amasaka yitwa umugusha, amashaza akitwa ubushaza, ibishyimbo byitwa ibiharage, ibitoki ni ibitiki ihene ni Embuzi, inka ni Ente.

Title: Young Grace yavuze impamvu yabatirishije umwana we muri Kiliziya Gatolika kandi asengera mu rindi dini
Body:
Abayizera Marie Grace wamenyekanye nka Young Grace muri Hip Hop yâ€™u Rwanda, mu minsi ishize yabatirishije umwana we mu Kiliziya Gatolika bitera urujijo abasanzwe bakurikira uyu muraperikazi uzwiho kuba asengera mu itorero ryitwa â€œRiver of Joy and Hope Ministriesâ€.
Abayizera Marie Grace wamenyekanye nka Young Grace muri Hip Hop yâ€™u Rwanda, mu minsi ishize yabatirishije umwana we mu Kiliziya Gatolika bitera urujijo abasanzwe bakurikira uyu muraperikazi uzwiho kuba asengera mu itorero ryitwa â€œRiver of Joy and Hope Ministriesâ€.
Ku Cyumweru tariki 23 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo Young Grace yabatirishije umwana we Amata Anca Aeâ€™eedah Ai â€˜Diamanteâ€™ muri Kiliziya Gatolika mu Karere ka Rubavu.
Uku kubatirisha uyu mwana muri Kiliziya Gatolika kwa Young Grace kwateye urujijo abasanzwe bakurikirana uyu muhanzikazi cyane ko asanzwe ari umukirisitu usengera mu itorero riyoborwa nâ€™umushumba Sultan Eric.
Ibi bigaragazwa nâ€™uko mu Ukwakira 2019 uyu muhanzikazi yari yagiye guhesha umugisha umwana we mu itorero asengeramo.
Mu kiganiro na Young Grace yabwiye IGIHE ko we yahisemo kubatirisha umwana we muri Kiliziya Gatolika kuko nawe ariho yaherewe amasakaramentu.
Ati "Namubatirishije muri Kiliziya Gatolika kuko mu rugo bose ni abakirisitu bo muri kiliziya kandi nanjye ndi umugatolika, muri â€œRiver of Joy and Hope Ministriesâ€ nsengerayo kuko ahantu hose bavuga Imana bemera Yezu nahasengera ariko ndi umugatolika wemewe.â€
Mu Ukwakira 2012 Young Grace yari yinjiye muri Islam, ahita ahabwa izina rya Housna. Icyo gihe yatangaje ko yinjiye muri Islam nyuma yâ€™inyigisho yahawe na bamwe mu nshuti ze bo muri iri dini akumva ziramunyuze akemera guhinduka.
Guhera mu 2016 uyu muraperikazi yaje kuva muri Islam ajya muri â€œRiver of Joy and Hope Ministriesâ€.

Title: USA: Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi yahamijwe ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu
Body:
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, rwahamije Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi muri Hollywood ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu abagore nâ€™abakobwa yakinishaga filimi.
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, rwahamije Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi muri Hollywood ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu abagore nâ€™abakobwa yakinishaga filimi.
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York rwamuhamije icyaha cyo mu rwego rwa mbere cyo guhatira imibonano yo mu kanwa, Miriam Harey wari umwungirije mu bijyanye no gutunganya filimi mu 2006.
Ni icyaha gihanishwa igihano kuva ku myaka itanu kugeza kuri 25 yâ€™igifungo. Hari ikindi cyaha yahamijwe cyâ€™umugore yafatiye muri Hotel yâ€™i New York mu 2013 gihanishwa igihano kitari munsi yâ€™imyaka ine.
Icyakora Weinstein wâ€™imyaka 67 yâ€™amavuko yahanaguweho ibindi byaha bitatu birimo bibiri bikomeye byo mu rwego rwa mbere byashoboraga gutuma afungwa burundu. Nyuma yâ€™urubanza uwo mugabo yasubijwe mu buroko gufungwa byâ€™agateganyo mu gihe ategereje isomwa ryâ€™urubanza ku Itariki 11 Werurwe 2020.
Aracyakurikiranyweho ibyaha byâ€™abagore babiri bo muri leta ya Los Angeles yafashe ku ngufu mu 2013. Abagore barenga 80 barimo ibyamamare mu gukina filimi nâ€™abana bamusabaga ubufasha ngo abagire ibyamamare bashinja uyu mugabo kubakorera ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.
Gukurikiranwa kâ€™uyu mugabo byatijwe umurindi nâ€™ubukangurambaga bwiswe MeToo bukangurira abagore kujyana mu butabera abagabo bakomeye bitwaza icyo bari cyo bagahohotera abagore.
Weinstein yamenyakanye cyane muri filimi yiswe Pulp Fiction yo mu 1994 ivuga ku byaha byâ€™ubujura, iyitwa The English Patient yo mu 1996 na Shakespeare in Love 1998 zombi zivuga ku rukundo.
Haleyi, wakoraga kuri imwe mu mateleviziyo Weinstein yavuze ko yamuhohoteye ubwo yamutumiraga mu nzu ye iri Manhattan. Yatanze ubuhamya avuga ko yamujyanye ku buriri akamwikubaho. Ni mu gihe Mann yavuze ko yamusuzuguraga cyane mu mubano wabo utarimo imibonano mpuzabitsina kugeza ubwo amufashe ku ngufu mu 2013.
Michelle Simpson Tuegel uhagarariye abahohotewe, mu rukiko yavuze ko yizeye ko nâ€™abandi bagore barakomeza kuzana abakora ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina mu nkiko.
Ati "Imbaraga umuntu yaba afite zose turi mu bihe bishya. igihe cya #MeToo kije gutamaza abakoresha imbaraga bafite mu guhohotera abagore."
Miriam Haley ubu ufite imyaka 42 yâ€™amavuko avuga ko yahohotewe na Harvey ytwaje kumufasha kuguma mu kazi ke ko kumwungiriza. Yamufashe ku ngufu ku itariki 10 Nyakanga 2006.

Title: U Butaliyani: Umuntu wa karindwi yishwe na Coronavirus
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™u Butaliyani bwatangaje ko abantu barindwi aribo bamaze guhitanwa nâ€™icyorezo cya Cronavirus, gikomeje guhitana benshi mu Bushinwa ariko cyageze no mu Burayi.
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™u Butaliyani bwatangaje ko abantu barindwi aribo bamaze guhitanwa nâ€™icyorezo cya Cronavirus, gikomeje guhitana benshi mu Bushinwa ariko cyageze no mu Burayi.
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™u Butaliyani bwatangaje kuri uyu wa Mbere ko bwahagaritse amashuri, za kaminuza, inzu ndangamurage nâ€™ibindi bikorwa bihuriza abantu hamwe nkâ€™imikino yâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru nâ€™ibikorwa ndangamuco.
Ibiro ntaramakuru byâ€™u Butaliyani, Ansa byatangaje ko umuntu wa karindwi yazize iyi ndwara, ikomeje kwibasira u Butaliyani bwâ€™amajyaruguru.
Byatangajwe ko umuntu witabye Imana ari umugabo wâ€™imyaka 80, wajyanwe mu bitaro mu cyumweru gishize mu mujyi wa Lodi, kubera indwara yâ€™umutima nkâ€™uko Reuters yabitangaje. Abaganga bavuga ko ashobora kuba yarandujwe Coronavirus nâ€™undi murwayi.
Umubare wâ€™abarimo guhitanwa nâ€™iyi ndwara ukomeje kwiyongera, mu gihe umuntu wa mbere wahitanwe na Cornavirus mu Butaliyani yapfuye ku wa Gatanu.
Abayobozi bavuga ko mu Bushinwa abantu bamaze kwandura ari 77 269 naho abanduye hanze yabwo ni 2 271. Abamaze guhitanbwa nayo ni 2 596, barimo 33 bamaze kugwa mu mahanga.
Kugeza ubu abantu bamaze gukira ni 24 854.

Title: Itorero ryâ€™igihugu Urukerereza ryakiriye abanyempano 100 bashya
Body:
Nyuma yo kuzenguruka igihugu hashakishwa abanyempano bashya bo kwinjira mu itorero ryâ€™Igihugu Urukerereza bikarangira habonetse 151, kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 23 Gashyantare 2020 i Kabuga aho bari gukorera umwiherero, hatoranyirijwe 100 bamaze kwinjizwa muri iri torero.
Nyuma yo kuzenguruka igihugu hashakishwa abanyempano bashya bo kwinjira mu itorero ryâ€™Igihugu Urukerereza bikarangira habonetse 151, kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 23 Gashyantare 2020 i Kabuga aho bari gukorera umwiherero, hatoranyirijwe 100 bamaze kwinjizwa muri iri torero.
Ijonjora ryâ€™abanyempano ijana bazajya mu mwiherero wâ€™Itorero Urukerereza ryabaye kuri iki Cyumweru i Kabuga aho bari bamaze iminsi mu mwiherero.
Bitunguranye umusaza wâ€™imyaka 51 witwa Ntahontuye Jean Marie wo mu Murenge wa Cyumba mu karere ka Gicumbi ucuranga umuduri, yagaragaye mu bahataniraga kwinjira mu itorero ryâ€™igihugu Urukerereza ndetse birangira anatsinze.
Mu itorero ryâ€™Igihugu Urukerereza bashakaga abanyempano mu byiciro bitanu aribyo abakaraza, intore, abaririmbyi, abacurangisha ibikoresho gakondo nâ€™imbyino zâ€™abakobwa.
Aba banyempano 100 binjiye mu itorero ryâ€™igihugu Urukerereza bari mu mwiherero wâ€™iminsi itanu ugamije kubafasha gusobanukirwa icyerekezo cyâ€™Itorero binjiyemo nâ€™icyâ€™Igihugu muri rusange, ukazasozwa ku wa Gatatu tariki 26 Gashyantare 2020.
Kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 24 Gashyantare 2020 bari kumwe na Mutangana Steven uyobora ishami ryâ€™Umuco muri Minisiteri yâ€™Urubyiruko nâ€™Umuco, basuye Urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ku Gisozi, banasura Ingoro yâ€™amateka yâ€™urugamba rwo guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.

Title: Ibidasanzwe byaranze Miss Nishimwe Naomie ubwo yigaga mu mashuri yisumbuye
Body:
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020, izina ryâ€™uyu mukobwa ryabaye ikimenyabose ritera ibyishimo abo mu muryango we inshuti nâ€™abamumenyeye mu irushanwa, ku ishuri aho uyu mukobwa yize ho biba ibindi.
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020, izina ryâ€™uyu mukobwa ryabaye ikimenyabose ritera ibyishimo abo mu muryango we inshuti nâ€™abamumenyeye mu irushanwa, ku ishuri aho uyu mukobwa yize ho biba ibindi.
Nyuma yuko hamenyekanye Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020, twifuje kumenya uyu mukobwa guhera mu bwana maze biba ngombwa ko tujya ku ishuri aho yarangirije amashuri yisumbuye tugirana ikiganiro nâ€™ubuyobozi bwâ€™ikigo ndetse nâ€™abanyeshuri babanye nawe.
Sibomana Alphonse, umuyobozi wâ€™ishuri rya Glory Secondary School aho Nishimwe Naomie yize kuva mu wa kabiri wâ€™amashuri yisumbuye kugeza arangije muri MEG (Maths-Economics-Geography) mu mwaka wa 2019, yabwiye IGIHE ko batatunguwe nuko uyu mukobwa yegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda cyane ko ari umukobwa mwiza, uzi ubwenge kandi wâ€™intangarugero mu myitwarire.
Yavuze ko Nishimwe ari umukobwa uzi kuvugira mu ruhame, bikaba imwe mu ndangagaciro zigishwa abanyeshuri babo kugira ngo bazagire icyo bigezaho mu buzima.
Yagize atiâ€Twe tugira Ministeri zitandukanye, harimo iyâ€™umuco na siporo kenshi rero bakunda kugira amarushanwa yâ€™abanyempano atuma abana bitinyuka bakagaragaza impano zabo, ishinzwe gutegura abanyeshuri kuzavamo abayobozi beza bâ€™ejo hazaza iyi ikaba urebye ifasha abanyeshuri gutinyuka kuvugira mu ruhame, nâ€™izindi. â€
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko ubumenyi Nishimwe Naomie yakuye muri iri shuri aribwo bwamufashije no mu rugendo rwe rwo kuba Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda.
Sibomana yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu mukobwa ubusanzwe imico ye yari nta makemwa ku ishuri cyane ko nta kosa yari yagafatiwemo iryo ariryo ryose ryari gutuma yatumwa nkâ€™umubyeyi cyangwa akirukanwa.
Ati â€œNaomie yize hano kuva mu wa kabiri wâ€™amashuri yisumbuye kugeza arangije, yari umukobwa uzwiho gusetsa cyane, nta makosa yakunze kumuranga mu buzima bwe bwo ku ishuri.â€
Yavuze ko uyu mukobwa yari afite imyitwarire myiza ku buryo abarezi nâ€™abanyeshuri bagenzi be babimukundiraga ndetse byatumye banamuba hafi mu rugendo rwe rwo kwiyamamariza kuba Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda.
Mu bijyanye nâ€™amasomo, umuyobozi wâ€™iri shuri yavuze ko uyu mukobwa yatsindaga neza, atiâ€ Dufite amanota tugenderaho twimura abanyeshuri, Naomie ntiyigeze asibira nâ€™umunsi wa rimwe, urumva ko yatsindaga.â€
Umuyobozi wâ€™ikigo Nishimwe Naomie yizeho yavuze ko bakimenya ko uyu mwana ari muri Miss Rwanda bakanguriye abanyeshuri kumushyigikira yaba mu buryo bwo kumutora ndetse nâ€™ubundi bwose bushoboka.
Isheja Ricky Junior uhagarariye abandi banyeshuri muri Glory Secondary School yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu mukobwa yari umuntu usetsa kandi uzi kubana nâ€™abantu ku buryo ari umwe mu bari bishimiwe cyane mu kigo.
Ati â€œNishimwe Naomie yari umukobwa ukunda gusetsa cyane, nimwiza cyane twamufataga nkâ€™uwa mbere mu burang. Nibyadutunguye kuba yabaye Miss Rwanda.â€
Umukundwa Keilla bucura bwo kwa Nishimwe Naomie na we wiga muri iki kigo mukuru we yanyuzemo, yabwiye IGIHE ko bishimiye cyane iyi ntsinzi.
Umukundwa wiga mu wa kane HEG (History-Economics -Geography) yavuze ko yaba mu rugo ndetse no ku ishuri bishimiye gutsinda kwa mukuru we wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ku ishuri yigagaho Nishimwe Naomie azwi nkâ€™umukobwa wâ€™uburanga ariko usetsa cyane ku buryo abanyeshuri hafi ya bose bari bamuzi.
Nishimwe Naomie si we wa mbere wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda avuye muri iki kigo cya Glory Secondary School cyane ko mu 2015 havuye na Kundwa Doriane.
Usibye aba bakobwa begukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda ariko iki kigo kibitse andi Makamba nkâ€™irya Lynca Akacu wabaye igisonga cya kabiri cya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda mu mwaka wa 2015.
Aha hize kandi Marie dâ€™Amour Uwase Rangira wabaye igisonga cya gatatu cya Miss Rwanda 2016, Ndahiro Liliane wabaye Miss Congeneniality 2018 na Gaju Anitha witabiriye Miss Rwanda 2019.

Title: Miss Uwimana wâ€™i Burundi yatunguwe nâ€™ibirori bya Miss Rwanda abigereranya na Miss Universe
Body:
Miss University Africa Burundi, Uwimana Dative, witabiriye irushanwa rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020, yanyuzwe nâ€™ibirori yabonye avuga ko agereranyije ntaho bitaniye nâ€™ibyo ajya abona bya Miss Universe.
Miss University Africa Burundi, Uwimana Dative, witabiriye irushanwa rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020, yanyuzwe nâ€™ibirori yabonye avuga ko agereranyije ntaho bitaniye nâ€™ibyo ajya abona bya Miss Universe.
Ku wa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo habaye ibirori byo gutora Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 ikamba ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie imbere yâ€™abafana benshi.
Ibi birori byari byitabiriwe nâ€™abakobwa bafite amakamba yâ€™ubwiza mu bihugu bitandukanye bifuje kwitabira Miss Rwanda ndetse banayikurikiranye imbonankubone.
Uwimana Dative Miss University Africa 2019 wari waturutse i Burundi mu kiganiro na IGIHE yagize ati â€Ibirori byari bimeze neza, urwego abategura irushanwa bagezeho ni ibintu byiza cyane, ni ikintu cyantangaje wagira ngo ni Miss Universe.â€
Uyu mukobwa icyakora nubwo yashimye urwego rwâ€™imitegurire nâ€™uburyo iri rushanwa ryagenze yavuze ko ikintu cyazitonderwa ubutaha ari ikijyanye nâ€™umwanya kuko byakererewe.
I Burundi aho uyu mukobwa aturuka baheruka gutora Nyampinga mu 2017 guhera 2018 kugeza ubu ntawo barongera gutora umukobwa uhiga abanda uburanga ku rwego rwâ€™Igihugu.
Ibi birori byitabiriwe na ba nyampinga baturutse mu bindi bihugu baje kwihera ijisho umukobwa wegukana ikamba.
Usibye Uwimana hari na Nyampinga wa Tanzania, Sylivia Sebastian, watowe mu 2019; Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana; Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana nâ€™igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi; Miss Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudani yâ€™Epfo na Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda.
Ikiganiro na Uwimana Dative wari waturutse i Burundi

Title: Abanyarwanda basogongejwe ku muco wo muri SÃ©nÃ©gal mu gitaramo kidasanzwe (Amafoto)
Body:
Abahanzi babiri bo muri Senegal, Faada Freddy na Nâ€™Dongo D basusurukije abitabiriye igitaramo Live & Unplugged cyabereye i Kigali, cyibanda ku kugaragaza umuco wo muri Senegal, mu burengerazuba bwa Afurika.

Habanje DJ Juls ashyushya abari aho binyuze mu miziki yavangaga, irimo indirimbo nyarwanda nâ€™inyamahanga, akanyuzamo agashyiramo izo muri Senegal byâ€™umwihariko.

Title: Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 (Amafoto na Video)
Body:
Ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie winjiye mu irushanwa ahagarariye Umujyi wa Kigali, Igisonga cya Kabiri cyabaye Umutesi Denise [No43] naho Igisonga cya mbere ni Umwiza Phionah [No47].
Ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 ryambitswe Nishimwe Naomie winjiye mu irushanwa ahagarariye Umujyi wa Kigali, Igisonga cya Kabiri cyabaye Umutesi Denise [No43] naho Igisonga cya mbere ni Umwiza Phionah [No47].
Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda wâ€™umwaka wa 2020, asimbura Nimwiza Meghan wari ufite iriheruka yambitswe muri Gashyantare 2019.
Uyu mukobwa wâ€™imyaka 20 yatowe mu birori byabereye mu Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo ku mugoroba wo ku wa 22 ushyira mu rukerera rwo ku wa 23 Gashyantare 2020. Nishimwe yabaye Nyampinga wa munani utowe mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda.
Urugendo rwo guhitamo Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda rwari rumaze iminsi 64 kuva ku ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze ryabereye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku wa 21 Ukuboza 2019.
Nishimwe yagizwe Nyampinga hagendewe ku kimero nâ€™ubwiza, kugira ubumenyi kurusha abandi ndetse nâ€™umuco nkâ€™imwe mu nkingi zâ€™ubuzima bwâ€™igihugu.
Uyu mukobwa yahiriwe cyane kuko yanagizwe Nyampinga uberwa nâ€™amafoto (Miss Photogenic).
Abakobwa 20 [baje kuvamo umwe] bâ€™ikimero bageze mu cyiciro cya nyuma cyâ€™irushanwa batoranyijwe muri 54 batsinze amajonjora yabereye mu ntara zose zâ€™igihugu aho abagera kuri 400 bari biyandikishije.
Mu byashingiweho batoranya Nyampinga harebwe uburanga (amanota 30%), ubuhanga mu kuvuga (amanota 40%) nâ€™uko umukobwa yiyerekanye (amanota 30%) byose bikagira igiteranyo cyâ€™amanota ijana.

Uyu mukobwa yahise anashyikirizwa urufunguzo rwâ€™imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift yagenewe. Iyi modoka nshya (Zero Kilometre) yatanzwe na Suzuki binyuze muri Rwanda Motor.
Nishimwe yize ibijyanye nâ€™Imibare, Ubukungu nâ€™Ubumenyi bwâ€™Isi (MEG). Ubwo yiyamamarizaga i Kigali ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020, Nishimwe yavuze ko nahabwa ikamba azita ku mushinga wo kugabanya agahinda gakabije mu rubyiruko (depression).

Icyo wamenya ku bihembo abakobwa bazahabwa muri Miss Rwanda 2020
Â 	Ibihembo bya Miss Rwanda 2020
Umukobwa wabaye Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda yagenewe imodoka nshya (Zero Kilometre) yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift 2019 yatanzwe na Suzuki binyuze muri Rwanda Motor.
Azahabwa umushahara wâ€™ibihumbi 800 Frw ku kwezi mu gihe cyâ€™umwaka, aya akazatangwa na Africa Improved Foods.
Uzatorwa nka Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda yemerewe kwivuza ku buntu ku ivuriro ryitwa Ubuzima Polyclinique no gusohokera muri Camellia agafata icyo ashaka mu gihe kingana nâ€™umwaka azamarana ikamba.
Uzegukana ikamba rya Miss Rwanda kandi yemerewe itike yâ€™indege izamujyana i Dubai nâ€™ibindi byose bijyanye nâ€™urugendo azakora mu rwego rwâ€™ikiruhuko, iyi ikazatangwa na kompanyi yitwa Multi Design Group.
Keza Salon yemeye gukorera umukobwa uzegukana ikamba ibijyanye nâ€™imisatsi ndetse no kwita ku bwiza bwe mu gihe cyâ€™umwaka wose.
Uzegukana ikamba kandi azaba yemerewe â€œPrintingâ€ ku buntu ku bintu byose azaba ashaka muri Smart Design, mu gihe True Connect yo yamwemereye internet yâ€™umwaka ku buntu.
Mu gihe agiye mu birori, umukobwa uzegukana ikamba azajya yambikwa na Ian Boutique ku buntu mu gihe azajya anahabwa imyenda ya Siporo yâ€™ubuntu muri Magasin Sport Class.

Imihanda myinshi iri kwerekeza i Rusororo ku Intare Arena ahatangarizwa Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020.
Abitabiriye ibi birori bashyiriweho imodoka zibakura kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera zibageza i Rusororo.
Mu masaha ya saa Kumi nâ€™imwe, abantu benshi bageze aho irushanwa ribera, baserutse bafite ibyapa biriho amazina yâ€™abakobwa bashyigikiye bifuza ko aribo bakwambikwa ikamba.
Urebye ku maso yabo bifitiye icyizere, bambariye gushyigikira abakobwa babo no kuza kubabona bashinjagirana isheja bambikwa ikamba.
Usibye ibyapa, bambaye imipira iriho amazina nâ€™amafoto yâ€™abo bashyigikiye. Bicaye ahantu hamwe ku buryo umuriri wabo ushobora gusakara ukagera kuri benshi mu bateraniye mu Intare Arena.
Irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ryatangiriye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku wa 21 Ukuboza 2019, ahatoranyirijwe abakobwa batandatu bemerewe guhagararira Intara yâ€™Uburengerazuba; ku wa 28 Ukuboza 2019 mu Karere ka Musanze hatoranyijwe abakobwa batandatu bahagarariye Amajyaruguru.
Umwaka wa 2020 watangiye irushanwa rikomereza mu Karere ka Huye aho ku wa 4 Mutarama havuye abakobwa barindwi bahagarariye Amajyepfo. Ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze mu ntara ryasorejwe mu Karere ka Kayonza, ahavuye abakobwa 15 bahagarariye Uburasirazuba mu gihe ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020, abakobwa 20 batoranyirijwe guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali.
Mu bakobwa 400 bose bageze ahabereye ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze, 54 gusa ni bo bemeje abagize akanama nkemurampaka bemererwa gukomeza mu cyiciro cya nyuma cyasize havuyemo 20 bagiye mu mwiherero wâ€™ibyumweru bibiri wabereye muri La Palisse Hotel i Nyamata.
Abakobwa 20 batangiye umwiherero ku wa 9 Gashyantare 2020, ariko Ingabire Jolie Ange ntiyagize amahirwe yo gukomeza kuko yasezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Irushanwa ryâ€™ubwiza mu Rwanda ryatangiye mu 1993 icyo gihe Nyampinga yabaye Miss Uwera Dalila, ryambitswe Bahati Grace mu 2009, mu 2012 rihabwa Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore, mu 2014 ryambikwa Akiwacu Colombe, Kundwa Doriane arihabwa mu 2015, Mutesi Jolly atorwa mu 2016, Iradukunda Elsa afata irya 2017, irya 2018 ryahawe Iradukunda Liliane mu gihe iriheruka mu 2019 ryatwawe na Nimwiza Meghan.
