Title: Amateka yâ€™ibyorezo byâ€™inzara, indwara zâ€™abantu nâ€™amatungo byayogoje u Rwanda kugeza mu 1946
Body:
Mbere yâ€™imyaka 74 ishize(1946-2020) ishize, u Rwanda rwabaye mu byorezo byâ€™inzara, indwara zâ€™abantu nâ€™amatungo, byoretse imbaga yâ€™abatagira ingano, bishegesha igihugu ku buryo ubuyobozi bwariho icyo gihe bwagiye bufata ingamba zikomeye.
Mbere yâ€™imyaka 74 ishize(1946-2020) ishize, u Rwanda rwabaye mu byorezo byâ€™inzara, indwara zâ€™abantu nâ€™amatungo, byoretse imbaga yâ€™abatagira ingano, bishegesha igihugu ku buryo ubuyobozi bwariho icyo gihe bwagiye bufata ingamba zikomeye.
Igitabo â€œImizi yâ€™u Rwandaâ€ cyanditswe nâ€™umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, kigaragaza ko ubwo hari hashize imyaka mike umwami Mibambwe Sentabyo yimye ingoma, ni ukuvuga ahasaga mu wa 1746, mu Gisaka hateye ubushita burimbura abatagira ingano.
 Icyo ihe mu Rwanda hari intambara itoroshye hagati ya Mibambwe Sentabyo na Gatarabuhura washakaga ingoma ku mbaraga. Sentabyo yahashyije Gatarabuhura ahungira mu Gisaka. Mu gihe biteguraga gutera mu Gisaka hateye indwara yâ€™ubushita bituma Abanyarwanda batinya gutera yo ngo batazana icyo cyorezo ndetse nâ€™ umwami ubwe aca iteka ko nta muntu ugomba kwambuka Nyabarongo agana iburasirazuba bwâ€™u Rwanda kugira ngo atagira aho ahurira nâ€™iyo ndwara.
Umwami na we yarimutse aza gutura muri Taba ya Gitarama ahitwa i Remera ndetse nâ€™amato yose yambutsaga abantu muri Nyabarongo abuzwa kongera kwambutsa abantu mu rwego rwo gushyira mu kato igice cyâ€™uburasirazuba.
Kimenyi Getura umwami wategekaga i Gisaka icyo gihe ; na we yatinyaga u Rwanda kandi ahora azi neza ko isaha ku isaha igihugu cye cyaterwa nâ€™abanyarwanda bakacyigarurira. Ibyo byatumye yigira inama yo gushyigikira Gatarabuhura akanamutiza amaboko bagafata ubutegetsi mu Rwanda bityo na we igihugu cye kikagira amahoro.
Yashyizeho Inkoto( Bariyeri) hirya no hino mu gihugu cyane cyane ku mbibi zihuza u Rwanda nâ€™i Gisaka.
Uyu mwami Kimenyi Getura yaje guhimba amayeri yo kohereza umuntu mu Rwanda agenda yiyita ko ahunze igihugu bityo akaba ashaka ubuhungiro ku mwami Sentabyo. Uwo muntu ngo yaje yitwaje nâ€™impano yâ€™impuzu ikoze neza, ariko iyi mpano yari iyâ€™uburozi kuko ngo yari yarambawe nâ€™umunyabushita.
Sentabyo ntiyagize amakenga yâ€™ikigambiriwe, yahise akenyera iyo mpuzu imwanduza ubushita ari nabwo bwamuhitanye. Nubwo Sentabyo yahitanywe nâ€™ubushita, yagerageje gukingira abanyarwanda, ntibabwandura ngo bubakukumbe. Yategetse ko nta munya-Gisaka winjira mu Rwanda, abanyarwanda nabo babuzwa kujyayo ndetse mu gihugu hose hashyirwaho za bariyeri (Inkoto) zikumira abashoboraga kukinjirana mu Rwanda.
Hagati yâ€™umwaka wa 1746 na 1946, mu Rwanda hadutse indwara zâ€™ibyorezo zitandukanye zahitanye nâ€™amatungo. Muri zo twavuga nko mu 1890-1891 ubwo hateraga indwara yâ€™amatungo yitwa Muryamo yibasiraga cyane amatungo magufi, mu 1907-1908 hateye indwara yâ€™amatungo yitwa Uburenge bwibasiraga cyane inka, mu 1920-1927 hateye indwara yâ€™amatungo yitwa Iragara, mu 1934-1935 hongeye gutera Muryamo yibasira cyane cyane amatungo magufi nâ€™indwara yâ€™amatungo yitwa Amashuye bwibasiraga cyane inka inka yadutse mu 1936-1937.
Kugira ngo abami bâ€™u Rwanda bahoshe ibyo byorezo byibasiraga amatungo, bakoraga imihango yo gufukura amariba mashya bakayatera nâ€™ibyuhagiro bivura izo ndwara nâ€™indi mihango yateganywaga nâ€™Ubwiru.
U Rwanda kandi rwigeze kugira nâ€™ibihe byâ€™amapfa akomeye hatera ibyorezo byâ€™inzara, zihitana abatari bake. Nko mu 1890 hateye inzara bise Muhatibicumuro, mu 1902 -1903 hateye inzara bise Ruyaga, mu 1917-1918 hateye Rumanura( Rumanurimbaba), mu 1924-1925 hateye Gakwege, mu 1927-1928 hateye Urwakayihura ( Yitiriwe Kayihura wataraga u Bugoyi kuko ariho yatangiriye), mu 1931 hateye inzige ziyogoza imyaka naho mu 1942-1944 hatera Ruzagayura.
Mu bihe byâ€™inzara nâ€™amapfa, Abami bâ€™amatungo nâ€™imyaka bajyaga mu miterekero, bagatanga imbuto nâ€™ibyuhagiro byâ€™imyaka kugira ngo irumbuke. Kera mu Rwanda hakundaga gutera Inzara bitaga amazina bahereye ku cyayiteye, cyangwa se ku bimenyetso byayo no ku nkurikizi zayo
Mu byorezo byâ€™inzara , Abami bâ€™imbuto bajyaga ku misozi miremire, bakahaca ibiraro, bagaterekera, ari na ko bavuza ingoma; imvura yabaga yahagamye, ikagwa. Ibyonnyi na byo byatera mu mirima, Abahoryo bakazivuma zikagenda.
Hari nâ€™indwara zâ€™ ibyorezo zateraga mu bantu ku mpamvu zo kubura imiti zikarimbura imbaga , abarokotse zikabasigira ubusembwa. Indwara zâ€™ibyorezo zateye mu Rwanda zikibasira abantu, zirimo ubushita bwateye hagati ya 1893 na 1894, mu 1916-1917 bwarongeye buratera, mu 1917-1918 ; hateye Mugiga inagaruka mu 1935 naho mu 1945 hatera ibihara.
Iyo ibyorezo byâ€™indwara nkâ€™izo byateraga, Abami bâ€™ imbuto nâ€™amatungo batangaga amasubyo, ariyo miti yâ€™amahumane yo gucubya ibyo byorezo byâ€™indwara.
Mu Rwanda rwa kera habaga nâ€™indi mihango yajyanaga nâ€™ingoma, igakorwa nâ€™abavubyi bâ€™imvura, bakayikorera ahantu inkuba yabaga yakubise, bakahaterekerera , kugira ngo bahavane umwaku wayo , bakahagangahura.

Title: Incamake ku gitabo â€œStop Working for Uncle Samâ€ gikebura abahora barambirije ku mushahara
Body:
Si henshi wasanga bashishikariza abantu gushaka akazi, ahubwo bahora babashishikariza kugahanga bakagaha abandi nkâ€™imwe mu ntwaro zo kwivana mu bukene no guteza imbere igihugu.
Si henshi wasanga bashishikariza abantu gushaka akazi, ahubwo bahora babashishikariza kugahanga bakagaha abandi nkâ€™imwe mu ntwaro zo kwivana mu bukene no guteza imbere igihugu.
Abafite akazi na bo bararira, bamwe binubira umushahara wâ€™intica ntikize bahabwa, abandi barambiwe guhora bafatirwa imyanzuro yâ€™icyo bakora, igihe bagikorera nâ€™uko bagikora nta ruhare babigizemo.
Sunday Adelaja ni umupasiteri wo muri Nigeria, yabavunnye amaguru mu gitabo cye â€˜Stop Working for Uncle Samâ€™ cyasohotse mu 2017.
Ni igitabo kigaragaza inzira zose wanyuramo ukareka gukorera abandi, aho gukoreshwa ugatangira gukoresha abandi.
Iki gitabo kigereranya abakorera umushahara nkâ€™abacakara bahorana ubukene bwâ€™amafaranga, bagenerwa utuvungukira ku murundo wâ€™ibyo baba babiriye icyuya, kandi hari uburyo nabo bakwiteza imbere.
Umwanditsi asobanura Uncle Sam nkâ€™ahantu hose ujya gushaka akazi cyangwa uburyo bwâ€™imikorere aho imibereho yawe yose uyikesha uwo muntu cyangwa urwo rwego ruguha umushahara.
Kubaho ukorera abandi Sunday abigereranya nkâ€™ubucakara buburizamo ubwigenge bwâ€™umuntu, aho ukora icyo bakubwiye cyose nta mwanya wo gutekereza cyangwa gukora ibintu nkâ€™uko wowe ubishaka.
Ati â€œMu gihe ukorera Uncle Sam, uba wishyira mu bucakara ku bushake bwawe kubera ko akwishyura udufaranga twâ€™intica ntikize. Kubera utwo tuntu duke, uremera ukagurisha ubuzima bwawe, ukagurisha ukwishyira ukizana kwawe, uba uboshye udashobora guhindukira ngo ugane iburyo cyangwa ibumoso.â€
â€œNtushobora kuvuga ngo ugiye mu biruhuko igihe ushakiye umukoresha wawe atabyemeye. Ntushobora kwihitiramo ngo ngiye aha nâ€™aha mu gihe wenda cyâ€™ukwezi, uba uziritswe.â€
Ni igitabo kigaragaza uburyo bwo guhunga ubucakara bwo kuba umukozi ahubwo ukaba umukoresha, ukareka kuba wa muntu uhorana ubukene kandi ukora buri munsi.
Iki gitabo kigaragaza kandi ko abantu bose badakwiye kumva ko bakwikorera, ahubwo bashobora gukorera abandi, bakitanga bishoboka ariko batameze nkâ€™abacakara.
Agira inama abantu ko bakwiriye kwirinda kuguma mu kazi banga, kuko uko kukagumamo bituma bagakora nabi kurusha, bikarangira bashwanye nâ€™abakoresha babo.
Ingingo yo gukoresha igihe neza, nayo umwanditsi ayigarukaho, aho asobanura ko igihe kigereranywa nâ€™ubuzima, kugikoresha nabi bikaba bisa no kwangiza ubuzima bwawe.
Asobanura kandi ibyiza byo kwiga, ariko mu bundi buryo, aho usanga abantu benshi bumva ko kwiga bakaminuza bihagije kugira ngo babeho mu buzima bwiza bifuza, aho avuga ko atari byo ndetse bitanahuye.
Iki gitabo cyâ€™amapaji 292 kiboneka kuri Amazon.

Title: Ibyâ€™ingenzi mu gitabo â€˜Let the People Pick the Presidentâ€™ kinenga uburyo amatora muri Amerika akorwamo
Body:
Hashize igihe abaturage binubura uburyo bwo kubara amajwi bwiswe â€˜Electoral Collegeâ€™ bukoreshwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Nubwo bose babyinubira, nta nâ€™umwe wigeze abyandika mu buryo busomeka neza nkâ€™uko Jesse Wegman yabikoze mu gitabo cye gishya â€œLet the People Pick the President.â€
Hashize igihe abaturage binubura uburyo bwo kubara amajwi bwiswe â€˜Electoral Collegeâ€™ bukoreshwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Nubwo bose babyinubira, nta nâ€™umwe wigeze abyandika mu buryo busomeka neza nkâ€™uko Jesse Wegman yabikoze mu gitabo cye gishya â€œLet the People Pick the President.â€
Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Amerika yagerageje inshuro zisaga 700 guhindura cyangwa kuvanaho iryo tegeko ariko byaranze. Ni uburyo bwo gutora butumvwa kimwe nâ€™abatuye Amerika.
Electoral College muri Amerika, abatora babarwa ni abo bise â€˜electorsâ€™ 538 muri Leta 50, barimo abasenateri 100, abadepite 435 nâ€™abandi batatu ba District of Columbia. Abo mu bigaragara nibo batora ugomba kuba Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Leta zigenda zirushanya umubare wâ€™abatora nkâ€™uko zirutanwa mu bunini cyangwa umubare wâ€™abaturage. Hagendewe ku ibarura ryâ€™abaturage rya 2015, California ituwe na 39 144 818 ibarirwa abatora 55; Texas ifite 27 469 114 ikagira abatora 34; New York ituwe na 19 795 791 ikagira abatora 31 naho Pennsylvania ituwe na 12 802 503 ifite abatora 21.
Kugira ngo byumvikane, igihe umukandida runaka atowe nâ€™abaturage benshi muri California, ahita ahabwa abatora (electors) 55 hatitawe ku majwi abandi bari bahanganye bagize. Bivuze ko afatwa nkâ€™uwatowe nâ€™abatuye iyo Leta bose kandi atari ko biri.
Utsinda ni ugira hejuru ya kimwe cya kabiri cya ba electors 538 kingana nâ€™abantu 270.
Ni uburyo bamwe bafata nkâ€™ubudatanga ubwisanzure, kuko ibyo abaturage benshi bahisemo atari ihame ko ari byo byemezwa nkuko amahame ya demokarasi abiteganya.
Umukandida ashobora gutorwa nâ€™abaturage benshi ariko kuko yatowe nâ€™abo muri Leta zidatuwe cyane kabone nâ€™aho zaba ari nyinshi, agatsindwa kuko abo muri Leta zituwe cyane bamutoye ku bwinshi, akikubira ba ba â€˜electorsâ€™ iyo Leta igenerwa.
Ikindi gishobora kubitera ni uko muri Leta atagizemo ubwiganze, ayo majwi yâ€™abamutoye asa nkâ€™abaye imfabusa kandi wenda iyo aza guteranywa nâ€™ayâ€™ahandi yagize ubwiganze bwinshi, ari we washoboraga kuza imbere.
Byarabaye mu 2016, ubwo Hillary Clinton yatsindwaga ku munota wa nyuma na Donald Trump nyamara Clinton ari we watowe na benshi.
Mu matora atanu ya Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aherutse, inshuro ebyiri zose hari abagiye batorwa atari uko batowe nâ€™abaturage benshi ahubwo kuko uburyo bwa Electoral College bwabahaye ababahagararaira benshi kubera Leta zituwe cyane batsinzemo, nyamara wabara abaturage bose babatoye no muri za Leta zituwe na bake, ugasanga nibo bari batsinze cyane.
Nâ€™iyo uwatowe na benshi ari we ubaye Perezida, akenshi abaturage ntibabona uruhare rwabo rwâ€™ako kanya mu kumushyiraho, kuko amajwi yabo avunjwamo ibyo bindi byiswe â€˜electorsâ€™ hakagira ababanza kuyaha umugisha mbere yo gutangaza uwatsinze.
Igitabo cya Jesse Wegman kigaragaza ko mu gihe Amerika igiye kujya mu matora ya Perezida mu Ugushyingo 2020, uburyo bukoreshwa Perezida atorwa bukwiriye guhindurwa kuko budakoresha ukuri nâ€™umucyo.
Let the People Pick the President ni igitabo kijya mu mizi itangiriro ryâ€™ubwo buryo bwiswe â€˜Electoral Collegeâ€™ nâ€™amakuru atandukanye yagiye atangwa na bamwe mu bagiye bagira uruhare mu matora ya Perezida yagiye aba guhera mu mwaka wa 2000, bagaragaza impamvu ubwo buryo butakijyanye nâ€™igihe.
Iki gitabo cyasohotse tariki 17 Werurwe 2020, kiboneka ku iguriro rya internet rya Amazon no ku zindi mbuga za internet zisomerwaho ibitabo.

Title: Bimwe mu bitabo byâ€™Abanyarwanda byagufasha muri iki gihe cya coronavirus
Body:
Gusoma ni bumwe mu buryo bwo kwiyungura ubwenge, bukaba uburyo bwo kuruhuka no kwinezeza mu gihe ufite umwanya uhagije.
Gusoma ni bumwe mu buryo bwo kwiyungura ubwenge, bukaba uburyo bwo kuruhuka no kwinezeza mu gihe ufite umwanya uhagije.
Muri ibi bihe Abanyarwanda bagiriwe inama yo kuguma mu ngo kugira ngo hahashywe icyorezo cya Coronavirus, gusoma igitabo ni bumwe mu buryo bwafasha kubyitwaramo neza, ntikibe igihe cyâ€™ubwoba no gupfusha ubusa ahubwo kikaba umwanya wo kwiyungura ubwenge no kumenya byinshi.
Ubwanditsi bwâ€™ibitabo mu Rwanda bukomeje gutera imbere, ariyo mpamvu IGIHE yatoranyije bimwe mu bitabo byâ€™Abanyarwanda biri mu ngeri zitandukanye bishobora gufasha abantu kumererwa neza muri ibi bihe.
La mort ne veut pas de moi, Yolande Mukagasana
La mort ne veut pas de moi ni igitabo Yolande Mukagasana yanditse mu mwaka wa 1997 nyuma yâ€™imyaka itatu Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ibaye. Kigaruka ku buzima bubi Abatutsi baciyemo mu gihe cya Jenoside. Bavuga ko â€˜Imana yirirwa ahandi igataha i Rwandaâ€™, ariko Mukagasana mu gitabo yibaza niba guhera tariki 6 Mata 1994 yari ikiri mu Rwanda koko, cyangwa niba yari yarusigiye sekibi.
Intwari zâ€™Imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro, Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu
Iki gitabo cyasohotse mu mwaka wa 2018. Gikubiyemo amateka yâ€™imyubakire yâ€™u Rwanda nkâ€™igihugu, umushinga waraje benshi rwantambi bawutekereza, na nyuma yo kuwunoza, ukabaraza ishinga mu ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryawo.
Indege yâ€™ubumwe Rwanda rwâ€™ubu, FranÃ§ois Xavier Gasimba Munezero
Igitabo â€˜Indege yâ€™ubumwe Rwanda rwâ€™ubuâ€™ cya FranÃ§ois Xavier Gasimba Munezero, cyasohotse mu 1999. Ni igitabo cyâ€™inkuru mpimbano ikoze mu buryo bwâ€™igisigo, ivuga kuri Guverinoma yâ€™Ubumwe yagiyeho nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Mu buryo busa nkâ€™ubutebya, Gasimba agaragaza u Rwanda nkâ€™indege, itwawe nâ€™abayobozi batandukanye bagenda bafata imyanzuro itandukanye ngo indege itarohama.
Petit Pays, GaÃ«l Faye 
Iki gitabo cyanditswe mu mwaka wa 2016, cyandikwa na GaÃ«l Faye, Umufaransa uvuka ku mubyeyi wâ€™umunyarwanda. Avugamo ubuzima bwe, aho agaruka ku buzima bwâ€™umwana wavukiye i Burundi akabyarwa nâ€™umunyarwandakazi wâ€™impunzi nâ€™umuzungu wâ€™umufaransa wakoreraga i Burundi. Uwo mwana avuga uko yabonaga ubuzima muri icyo gihe, ibibazo byâ€™amoko, Hutu na Tutsi.
Uwo mwana ufite hagati yâ€™imyaka 10 na 15 aba yibuka uburyo ubuto bwe bwaje kwicwa nâ€™ibibazo bya politike zo muri aka karere. Anavuga ku kibazo cyo kuvuka ku babyeyi badahuje uruhu.
Gukira Bishobokera Buri Wese, Ariko Biraharanirwa, Dieudonne Dâ€™amour Nordkvist Hakizimana
Cyanditswe na Dieudonne Dâ€™amour Nordkvist Hakizimana mu mwaka wa 2019. Gikubiyemo amabanga menshi yatuma ukira mu kanya gato abari bakuzi udafite nâ€™urwara rwo kwishima bagatangira gutangazwa nâ€™impinduka zaje mu buzima bwawe.
Rwanda means The Universe, Louise Mushikiwabo
Mu mwaka wa 2006 ubwo yabaga muri Leta Zuze Ubumwe za Amerika, Louise Mushikiwabo yasohoye igitabo â€˜Rwanda means The Universeâ€™ (U Rwanda bisobanuye Isanzure) cyâ€™amapaji 384 yafatanyije nâ€™umunyamakuru Jack Kramer.
Igitabo cya Mushikiwabo cyanditse mu buryo bwâ€™ibarankuru nâ€™itangabuhamya. Inkuru ya Mushikiwabo ayitangira mbere gato yâ€™ihanurwa ryâ€™indege yari itwaye Perezida Juvenal Habyarimana mu 1994, avuga uko yari abayeho muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho yabaga ndetse nâ€™ibyo inshuti ze zakundaga kumubaza ku mubano, amateka nâ€™imibereho yâ€™abanyarwanda.
Mushikiwabo na Kramer bagaragaza ubugome Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yakoranywe nâ€™uburyo bigaragara ko yari yarabanje gutegurwa. Iki gitabo kijya mu mizi yâ€™imibereho yâ€™abanyarwanda mbere yâ€™abakoloni, ubwo abanyarwanda babagaho nta yindi si bazi ari naho izina ryâ€™igitabo ryaturutse.
Untamed, Beyond Freedom, Uwineza Celine
Igitabo â€˜Untamed, Beyond Freedomâ€™ cyanditswe na Uwineza Celine, gisohoka muri Mata 2019. Yanditse ku buzima yabayemo we nâ€™umuryango we muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ubwo yicirwaga benshi mu muryango akiri umwana muto.
Iki gitabo cyâ€™amapaji 149 cyanditse mu buryo bwo kubara inkuru. Uwineza atangirana ibaruwa yandikiye mama we wishwe tariki 10 Mata 1994 hamwe na bakuru be babiri na musaza we, abamenyesha agahinda afite nyuma yo kubabura nâ€™uburyo akumbuye kuzongera kubabona.
Intwari Mpinduramatwara Paul Kagame, Richard Hategekimana
Iki gitabo â€œIntwari Mpinduramatwara Paul Kagameâ€, kigaragaza ibikorwa bya Perezida Kagame byâ€™indashyikirwa nuko yagaruriye u Rwanda ikuzo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Icyo gitabo cyâ€™amapaji 98 kigaragaza uburyo igice kimwe cyâ€™Abanyarwanda bari barahejejwe hanze ariko akabacyura, ndetse akanahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, yanaguyemo abasaga miliyoni mu gihe cyâ€™amezi atatu.
Mitingi Jenosideri, Imbundo, Imbarutso yâ€™imbunda yarimbuye imbaga , Edouard Bamporiki
Iki gitabo cyasohotse mu 2017, ni icya Edouard Bamporiki. Gikubiyemo ubuhamya bwâ€™abantu 67 bakoze Jenoside ndetse na bamwe mu bana bavutse ku babyeyi barokotse nyuma yo gufatwa ku ngufu nâ€™abajenosideri.
Lâ€™oncle GynÃ©cologue, Numuhire Caroline
Iki gitabo cya Numuhire Caroline, gikubiyemo inkuru yâ€™umwana wâ€™umukobwa wahohotewe na nyirarume wamusuzumaga igihe yari atwite.
Inkuru iri muri iki gitabo ishingiye ku mwana wâ€™umukobwa watewe inda nkâ€™urwibutso asigiwe nâ€™inshuti ye magara yari irwaye kanseri, nyuma yo gutereranwa nâ€™umuryango we, ahitamo kubiganiriza nyirarume wari inzobere mu kuvura indwara zâ€™abagore ariko ntiyamubera imfura, amufata ku ngufu.
Moi, Le dernier Tutsi, Charles Habonimana
â€˜Moi le dernier Tutsiâ€™, ni igitabo cyanditswe na Charles Habonimana gisohoka mu 2019. Gikubiyemo ubuhamya bwâ€™imibereho yâ€™Umututsi mbere ya Jenoside, inzira yâ€™umusaraba we ubwe yanyuzemo mu gihe cya Jenoside nâ€™uburyo Ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi zamurokoye.
Ubumwe bwâ€™Abanyarwanda mu mateka yabo, Innocent Nizeyimana
Iki ni gitabo cyasohotse mu mwaka wa 2015. Umwanditsi agaragaza imibanire yâ€™Abanyarwanda mbere yâ€™uko abazungu baza mu Rwanda, uko iyo mibanire myiza yaje kugenda ihinduka mibi buhoro buhoro bitewe nâ€™imiyoborere mibi yâ€™ubukoroni ndetse nâ€™uburyo Abatutsi batangiye kwirukanwa mu Rwanda. Iki gitabo gisoza kivuga uko abakoroni basizeho Repubulika ya mbere yagombaga gukomeza gukora ku nyungu zabo
Inzira yâ€™Inzitane yo kwibohora, NDAHIRO Logan
Iki gitabo cyanditswe na nyakwigendera Ndahiro Logan mu mwaka wa 2017. Gikubiyemo inzira igoye ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi zanyuzemo mu rugendo rwo kubohora Abanyarwanda.
Un abrege de lâ€™ethno histoire du Rwanda, Alexis Kagame
Ni igitabo cyanditswe nâ€™inzobere mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda, Padiri Alexis Kagame. Kivuga ku mateka yâ€™u Rwanda guhera mu 1853 kugeza mu 1972, kikaba cyarasohotse mu 1972.
Rwanda demain! Une Longue Marche vers la transformation, Dr Kimonyo Jean Paul
Iki gitabo cyasohotse mu 2018, kivuga ku mbogamizi nâ€™ibitekerezo byiza byaranze inzira yo kongera kwiyubaka kâ€™u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Goliyati Araguye, Mgr Birindabagabo Alexis
Iki gitabo cyasohotse mu 2019, cyanditswe na Musenyeri Birindabagabo Alexis. Gikubiyemo inzira nâ€™uburyo bwakwifashishwa mu guca ibiyobyabwenge mu Rwanda. Harimo inshingano za buri wese mu kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge, icyo buri wese asabwa, inyungu zo kubirandura mu Rwanda nâ€™ubuhamya bwâ€™abasore bakoreshejwe nâ€™ibiyobyabwenge bakica mugenzi wabo.
Rwanda 1959-1962, La RÃ©volution manquÃ©e, Antoine Mugesera
Iki gitabo cyasohotse mu 2018, gisobanura uburyo impinduramatwara yo mu 1959 yiswe â€˜revolisiyoâ€™ atari yo kuko icyo impinduramatwara ziba zigamije kitagezweho.
Undi Munsi, Maniraguha Ferdinand
Iki gitabo cyiswe â€˜Undi Munsiâ€™ cyasohotse mu wa 2019, gikubiyemo inkuru mpimbano yâ€™urukundo rwâ€™umukobwa Naila nâ€™umusore Gisa bakundanye, urukundo rwabo rukaza kwicwa nâ€™ishyari ryâ€™abatarabifurizaga ineza.
New Rwanda From Hell to Heaven, Bamurangirwa Patricia
Iki gitabo cyamuritswe muri Mutarama 2020. Havugwamo uburyo u Rwanda rwabashije kwivana mu mahano ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ubu akaba ari igihugu cyâ€™icyitegererezo muri Afurika.

Title: Rutangarwamaboko yasobanuye uko ubupfumu yaburazwe na sekuruza nâ€™impamvu yo guterekera (video)
Body:
Rutangarwamaboko yasobanuye byinshi birimo uko yarazwe na sekuruza kuba umuvuzi gakondo ndetse nâ€™impamvu akora imigenzo imwe nâ€™imwe yo hambere yacwekereye mu Rwanda rwâ€™ubu.
Rutangarwamaboko yasobanuye byinshi birimo uko yarazwe na sekuruza kuba umuvuzi gakondo ndetse nâ€™impamvu akora imigenzo imwe nâ€™imwe yo hambere yacwekereye mu Rwanda rwâ€™ubu.
Rutangarwamaboko usanzwe ari umushakashatsi, umwigisha wâ€™ubuzima bushingiye ku muco akaba nâ€™inzobere mu byâ€™umuco, amateka, imbonezabitekerezo (Filosofiya) nâ€™ubuzima bwa muntu bushingiye ku myizerere, imyumvire, imitekerereze, imyitwarire ndetse nâ€™imigirire.
Ni umugabo wâ€™abana babiri yabyaranye na Umuziranenge Sana Cynthia, barimo imfura yabo bise Umugiramana nâ€™ubuheta bise Benimana. Izina Rutangarwamaboko arikomora kuri sekuruza wari umukuru wâ€™imandwa.
IGIHE yamusuye imuganiriza byinshi ku buzima bwe abantu benshi batazi.
Uko yabaye umupfumuâ€¦
Ubusanzwe yitwa Nzayisenga Modeste ni umuganga ubugira gatatu, kuko yabyize muri kaminuza mu bijyanye nâ€™ubuzima bwo mu mutwe, akaba umuganga nkâ€™umupfumu ndetse akanaba we nkâ€™umunyempano wabirazwe.
Ati â€œSogokuruza Rutangarwamaboko yari umugangahuzi, umuganga akaba nâ€™umupfumu akaba nâ€™umukuru wâ€™imandwa mu nduga hose, ari iki gihe twamugereranya na ba musenyeri. Niho nabikuye nkâ€™umurage. Hari uburyo umubyeyi agenda abiraga abazakurikiraho, ni naho izina Rutangarwamaboko bituruka.â€
Yumvikanisha ko akiri umwana aribwo yatangiye kwiyumvamo impano yo kuvura ndetse akajya abiganiriza se, utaramuciye intege ahubwo akamwumvisha ko ari ibintu agomba gukorera.
Ati â€œNdi umuganga kandi nkâ€™impano kuko mvuka kumwe umwana akura afite imyaka itanu cyangwa irindwi, barambazaga bati uzakora iki? Data yarabimbazaga nkamubwira ko nzaba umuganga, akambwira ko ngomba kubyitaho, nanjye nkamubwira nti sinzaba umuswa. Akavuga ati nkâ€™ubu mu Rwanda dufite umuganga umwe ubaga umutwe ntigeze menya, nkamubwira nti nzaba uwa kabiri kandi nzamurusha.â€
Yashoje kaminuza atangiza uburyo bushingiye ku muco nyarwanda mu kuvura indwara nâ€™ibibazo byo mu mutwe avura abarwayi bari barananiranye, byâ€™umwihariko baraciye kuri za kirazira barasara ibintu ahanini ubuvuzi mvamahanga bwigwa mu ishuri buyoberwa.
Rutangarwamaboko yakuriye kwa Sekuruza, ndetse aza kugenda akurira mu maboko ye kuko akenshi yamutumaga imiti bigatuma agenda akerebuka mu Kinyarwanda no mu kuvura.
Yamusigiye imiringa yambara ku maboko yise â€˜Imiringa yâ€™imirindaâ€™ imurinda ibintu byakototera umuntu byâ€™amandu nâ€™amarozi ndetse ikaba nâ€™umurimbo.
Impamvu akunda gukora imihango yo kubandwa no guterekera kandi abenshi batakibikozwa muri iki gihe
Rutangarwamaboko akunda gukora imihango itandukanye itagikorwa cyane mu Rwanda rwâ€™ubu irimo kubandwa, guterekera nâ€™indi itandukanye yakorwaga mu gihe cyo hambere.
Avuga ko impamvu abantu benshi batakiyikora ari uko bafite ukutamenya kuko ariwo muco wâ€™abanyarwanda kandi bikaba byakabaye akarango kuri buri wese ukomoka mu Rwanda.
Ati â€œHari igitabo kimwe ndi kwandika cyitwa nyina wâ€™umugome ni ubugoryi. Ubugome abantu tugirira abandi natwe twigirira bituruka ku kutamenya, nâ€™ubu rero hariho ibintu byacu byabaye nkâ€™ibishitani cyangwa bikaba interamatsiko ku bandi ku buryo abantu babikubonamo bagatangara kandi ubundi bwari bwo buzima. Ni ukutamenya, ni uguhona, ni ubugoryi. Ntekereza ko abantu nibahonoka bazagenda bamenya ko umuco arirwo rutirigongo twigoragorezaho gutsinda ubugorogoro bwose, niwo uduha akito mu bandi tukagira icyo twitirirwa, bakavuga bati uriya ni umunyarwanda kubera ibi nâ€™ibi. Arangwa nâ€™imihango nâ€™imigenzo.â€
â€œNko kubandwa no guterekera ni imihango, nkimara gusobanukirwa ibyo aribyo, kirazira aribyo, maze gukura nabonye abo byasajije kubera ko baciye kuri iyo kirazira. Utagira imihango ntagira ibyo ahanga ntagira nâ€™ibyo ahangamura byamuhangaye kimwe nâ€™utagira imigenzo ntagira uko agenza.â€
Kuri we yemeza ko abantu bâ€™iki gihe kubera ko badashamadukira kubandwa no guterekera ari ikibazo gikomeye kuko bifite umumaro mu kwegeranya umuntu nâ€™abakurambere be.
Ati â€œNinde wamenya icyo kubandwa aricyo ntabandwe cyangwa ntabyifuze kuko biva ku nshinga â€˜kubandaâ€™ bivuga komatanywa. Abanyarwanda rero babandwa kabiri, bwa mbere bomatanywa nâ€™Imana yâ€™i Rwanda bwa kabiri bomatanywa nâ€™abakurambere. Abazimu nibo batuma tutazima, ariko uramuvuga abantu bakikanga. Hatari iyo mihango nâ€™imigenzo wazamenya aho uvuka se ? wazamenya agasozi kanyu ? Guterekera biva ku nshinga gutereka, umuteguro ugiriye abakuru, abanyacyubahiro, abegeramana, ababyeyi mu mutima wawe kugira ngo ubwo urya urye nkabo, ubwo unywa unywe nkabo.â€
Rutangarwamaboko asanzwe atuye ku Gisozi ho mu Karere ka Gasabo mu Mujyi wa Kigali ndetse anafite ivuriro ryâ€™ubuvuzi bushingiye ku muco riherereye i Nyarutarama.

Title: Uko u Rwanda rwahuye nâ€™ibyorezo byâ€™inzara, ibisebe nâ€™indwara zâ€™amatungo ku ngoma ya Mutara Semugeshi
Body:
Mu myaka isaga 477 (1543-2020) ishize, u Rwanda rwahuye nâ€™ibyorezo birimo umuze ukomeye, ibisebe byâ€™umufunzo, ibyorezo byâ€™inzara, indwara zâ€™abantu nâ€™amatungo, byoretse imbaga yâ€™abatagira ingano.
Mu myaka isaga 477 (1543-2020) ishize, u Rwanda rwahuye nâ€™ibyorezo birimo umuze ukomeye, ibisebe byâ€™umufunzo, ibyorezo byâ€™inzara, indwara zâ€™abantu nâ€™amatungo, byoretse imbaga yâ€™abatagira ingano.
Ibyorezo bikomeye u Rwanda rwahuye nabyo, byabimburiwe nâ€™icyatangiye ku ngoma ya Mutara Semugeshi mu ntango yâ€™urwimo rwe ahasaga mu wa 1543.
Muri ibyo bihe Ruganzu Ndoli yatanze atunguranye ubwo yicwaga nâ€™umuhinza Bitibibisi. Kubera amakimbirane yari ibwami umugabekazi Nyirarumaga yaranze kurekura ubugabekazi, Semugeshi yabuze umwiru wamwimika akamuha Inyonga ( Ibimenyetso byâ€™ubwami) ngo abe umugenga wâ€™ingoma yâ€™u Rwanda. Mpande ya Rusanga wari umwiru mukuru wâ€™ingoma ya Ndoli, niwe wafashe iya mbere mu kugumura abandi Biru mu kwanga kugaragaza aho bahagaze mu kwimika Semugeshi na Nyina Nyirakabogo.
Semugeshi agisha nyina inama, nyina aramusubiza ati â€œSo Ruganzu Ndoli, yari yaranywanye na Mutaga Nyamubi umwami wâ€™u Burundi, none genda aguhe Abiru baze bakore imihango yo kukwimika. Ubundi utware ingoma ya so, kuko nta wundi wo kuyizungura uhariâ€.
 Semugeshi ashyira nzira yitabaza Mutaga Nyamubi umwami wâ€™u Burundi amuha abiru bimitsi barimo Nyamwonda wa Rurenge na Gahenda ka Nyabayobya. Imihango yo kwimika Semugeshi yabereye i Mwaka wa Rukoma muri Mushubati ( ubu ni mu Karare ka Muhanga mu Murenge wa Nyarusange), imihango irakorwa, bamuha izina ryâ€™ubwami rya Bicuba I Semugeshi.
Nyuma yâ€™iyimikwa rya Bicuba Semugeshi, yahuye nâ€™akaga gakomeye cyane arwara ijisho rirabyimba, ryitambikwamo nâ€™ikintu kimeza nkâ€™umwashi nâ€™inkingi. Mu gisenge cyâ€™inzu ye hitambikamo ikintu kimeze nkâ€™ukwezi. Abaturage bâ€™u Rwanda nabo, ntibabonye amahwemo, bahuye nâ€™amahano yâ€™umuze utarigeze ubaho bokamwa nâ€™inzara nâ€™indwara zâ€™ibinyoro nâ€™ibisebe byâ€™umufunzo.
Abantu ba hafi ya Semugeshi baje kumubwira bati â€œBariya Biru Mutaga yakoherereje ntibazi imihango yâ€™iyimikabami ryâ€™I Rwanda, mubwire akoherereze abandi, bakureho iyi miziro yatumye uberama igakururira rubanda rwâ€™umwami umuze nâ€™amapfaâ€.
Nuko Semugeshi atuma kuri Mutaga Nyamubi umwami wâ€™u Burundi amwoherereza umuvuzi gakondo we ngo atange umuhamuro wâ€™ibyo biza, na we amwoherereza Kiniga cya Rumanura ngo aze ahoshe ayo mahano. Kiniga cya Rumanura asesekara ibwami kwa Semugeshi, asanga ibintu byacitse, ibinyoro nâ€™ibisebe byâ€™umufunzo nâ€™ibindi bigeze banyarwanda habi! Abantu ba hafi ba Semugeshi bari aho, bati â€œNimushake Mpande ya Rusanga, aduhe umuzi nâ€™umuhamuro wâ€™izi manza zagwiririye u Rwandaâ€.
Umwami Semugeshi atuma abantu be ngo babaririze aho Mpande ya Rusanga yaba aherereye, basanga yaragiye kure cyane ahitwa: I Cyotamakara cyâ€™I Buhanga ( ubu ni mu Murenge wa Ntyazo wo mu karere ka Nyanza), ari umusaza wa cyane, yarakennye bitavugwa inzara imugeze kure.
Ubwo Mpande ya Rusanga asubiza abantu bari boherejwe na Semugeshi ati â€œNdashaje, ndashonje, nambaye ubusa, nahinguka nte imbere yâ€™umwami?â€™, bajya kubibwira umwami Semugeshi, afata inka ebyiri zâ€™imbyeyi, imyambaro ikoze mu mpu nâ€™ingobyi yo ku muheka, bamujyana ibwami.
Kera kabaye Mpande ya Rusanga arashyira agera ibwami, akigera ibwami akabona ibirimo kuhabera. Nuko aramubaza ati â€œWimitswe na ba nde?â€ Semugeshi ati â€œNi Abiru bâ€™i Burundi barimo Nyamwonda wa Burenge na Nyagahenda ka Nyabayobya.â€ Mpande ya Rusanga ati â€œWimikiwe he?â€ Semugeshi ati â€œNimikiwe i Mwaka wa Rukomaâ€.
Mpande ya Rusanga abwira Semugeshi ati â€œBariya Biru bâ€™i Burundi bakwimitse, nta kiza bashakira u Rwanda. Kukwimikira i Mwaka ugasohokera ku Ntosho, ni ikimenyetso cyâ€™uko Abanyarwanda babaroze kwicwa nâ€™inzara ikomotse ku mapfa bakazajya birirwa bahonda inguri zâ€™ibikoro nâ€™amateke bashaka amaramuko. Gushokera inka zâ€™amashashi, ni ikimenyetso cyo kutagira uburumbuke bwâ€™abantu, imyaka nâ€™amatungo mu gihugu. Gusohokana igicuba cyaramvuwe mu Mutake, ni ukwifuriza Abanyarwanda guhora bataka nta kugoheka nâ€™amahoro muri bo. Gusohokera mu Mutobo, ni ukurwara ibinyoro nâ€™ibisebe byâ€™imifunzo bizabahitana igihugu kikaba umwirare.â€
Mpande ya Rusanga abwira Nyirarumaga ati â€œImpamvu igihugu cyahuye nâ€™akaga kâ€™iriya mize nâ€™amapfa akaze, ni ariya marira ya Nyirakabogo urara arira ko wanze kurekura ingoma, kandi Ruganzu yaraguhaye umuhungu we Semugeshi ngo umubere umujyanama, none kugira ngo igihugu gikire nuko amarira ya Nyirakabogo yakama, kuko nta mugisha wo guhora umugabekazi aririra mu gihugu, fata inzira uhunge uve mu gihugu ujye i Burundi ubise Nyirakabogo nâ€™umuhungu we Semugeshi bime ingoma.â€
Nyirarumaga ashorera inka ze ashyira nzira nâ€™abaja be bacikira i Burundi. Nyirarumaga akigera ku cyambu, haje inkuba itagira imvura irivovota, nyuma haza imirabyo iramukubakuba iramuyora imujyana mu kirere aburirwa irengero. Nuko Mpande ya Rusanga wari wabaherekeje ngo abambutse, abonye ibyo bibaye, abwira abakobwa ba Nyirarumaga ati â€œNimuhumure buriya Nyirarumaga asanze Ruganzu Ndoli, mujye muri ubu bwato nâ€™inka zanyu mwambuke mwigire i Burundi mu Rwanda nta mwanya mukihafiteâ€. 
Mpande ya Rusanga ageze ibwami ahamagara Abiru bose nâ€™abakuru bari barigumuye, bakora inama yo kohera ayo mahano yagwiririye igihugu, akaba amaze kugitsembamo abenegihugu. Nuko batangira inzira yo gukora imihango nâ€™imigenzo yâ€™ubwiru bwâ€™iyakorwaga mu kohera amahano yabaga yagwiririye igihugu.
Mbere yuko batangira imihango yo kweza igihugu no gukiza ubwandure bwâ€™abaturage babanje kubakira Semugeshi urugo I Bunyogombe ngo abe ariho atura bamugangahure, bamutera ibyuhagiro nâ€™imitsindo yâ€™ingoma yâ€™u Rwanda, kuko mbere yaho yari atuye mu rugo rwa se Ruganzu Ndoli rwari I Ruhashya. Kandi umwami yagombaga gukorerwa imihango yose ari mu ngoro ye nshya.
 Kugira ngo umuhango wo kohera ayo mahano ukorwe, bitabaje amazi yâ€™Ubuhoro yo mu mariba ya Rwezangoro ( mu Murenge wa Muhima), ayo mu iriba rya Shaki, ayo mu iriba rya Kabuye ka Jabana, ayo mu iriba rya Mbizi, amariba yavomwagaho amazi yâ€™ubuhoro, akiza ubwandure agahumanura abahumanye. Yose bayahuriza hamwe mu iriba rya Kabyaza ryari munsi yâ€™umusozi wa Nyamweru nuko bayakoreraho imihango yo kwiyeza no kweza igihugu, ngo abaturage bakire ubwandure, bagire ubuhoro nâ€™amahoro, bagire uburame nâ€™ubuziramuze.
Nyuma yâ€™iyo mihango Mpande ya Rusanga yahise ahakorera imihango yâ€™ubwimitsi yimika Semugeshi, amwambura izina yari yahawe nâ€™Abiru bâ€™I Burundi rya Bicuba, amuha izina ryâ€™ubwami rya Mutara Nsoro. Niko gukurizaho kwitwa Mutara Nsoro Semugeshi. Mu gihe bakiri muri ibyo, nibwo babonye ikirere gihindutse, igicu kirakuba babona imvura iraguye, icyorezo gicika mu Rwanda, amapfa arazima, Abanyarwanda bava ibuzimu bajya ibuzima.

Title: Scholastique Mukasonga yasohoye igitabo kivuga kuri Kibogo wafatwaga nkâ€™umukiza wâ€™abanyarwanda
Body:
Umunyarwandakazi Scholastique Mukasonga yasohoye igitabo yise â€˜Kibogo est montÃ© au cielâ€™ kivuga uko Kibogo woherejwe nâ€™Imana nkâ€™umukiza wâ€™u Rwanda yagiye mu Ijuru.
Umunyarwandakazi Scholastique Mukasonga yasohoye igitabo yise â€˜Kibogo est montÃ© au cielâ€™ kivuga uko Kibogo woherejwe nâ€™Imana nkâ€™umukiza wâ€™u Rwanda yagiye mu Ijuru.
Mbere yâ€™uko abamisiyoneri bazana inkuru nziza ya Yezu i Rwanda bivugwa ko uwo Kibogo ari we wafatwaga nkuko Abakristu bafata Yezu .
Scholastique Mukasonga ni Umwanditsi wâ€™umunyarwanda abakunda gusoma ibitabo nâ€™abakurikiranira hafi ibijyanye na sinema bibuka filimi Notre Dame du Nil ishingiye ku gitabo cye yasohotse muri Gashyantare 2020.
Igitabo cya Mukasonga â€™ Kibogo est montÃ© au Cielâ€™gifite paji 160. Cyasohowe nâ€™inzu isohora ibitabo yo mu Bufaransa, Ã©ditions Gallimard. Ni ubwoko bwâ€™ibitabo byâ€™inkuru ndende mpimbano cyangwa se Roman (Novel).
 Ugendeye ku mateka ya Kibogo uvugwa mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda wumva ari igitabo kigaragaza ko imyemerere cyangwa ibisa nâ€™ibyo abanyamadini bigisha kuri Yezu hari uwari uhari kandi abifite mbere.
Agace gasa no gutera amatsiko yashyize ku rubuga Gallimard, kabaza uwaba yaragiye mu Ijuru hagati ya Kibogo wâ€™i Rwanda na Yezu yita uwâ€™abamisiyoneri ndetse nyuma yo kujya mu Ijuru akagirira abantu ineza.
Ati "Ari Kibogo, umuhungu wâ€™umwami na Yezu wâ€™abamisiyoneri ni nde wazamutse mu Ijuru? wongeye kugusha imvura, agakiza abantu amapfa nâ€™inzara?"
Akomeza yibaza niba abantu bakwiye kwizera inkuru cyangwa imigani baciriwe nâ€™abera kurusha kwizera izo babwiye nâ€™ababyeyi babo amanywa nâ€™ijoro. Ati "Ese birakwiye ko twakwizera imigani twaciriwe nâ€™abagabo bâ€™abera bâ€™ubwanwa burebure cyangwa twakwemera iyo ababyeyi bacu baducira buri mugoroba."
Igitabo cyitwa Le Rwanda ancien cyanditswe na De Lacger, kuva ku rupapuro rwa 167 kugeza ku rwa 68 kigaragaza ko mbere yâ€™umwaduko wâ€™ubukirisitu mu Rwanda hari imyizerere gakondo idafite aho itandukaniye nâ€™ubukirisitu ndetse ikaba yari ifite akarusho ko kuba ishingiye ku muco gakondo wâ€™abanyarwanda.
Ayo makuru yemeza ko mu Rwanda hahoze inkuru nziza yâ€™â€œumukiza (umutabazi) Kibogo", yaje guteshwa agaciro nâ€™inkuru nziza yâ€™â€œumukiza (umutabazi) Yezuâ€œ yazanywe nâ€™abakoloni.
Mu Rwanda rwa kera umutabazi yari umuntu wemeraga gutanga amaraso ye ku bushake akameneka ku butaka bwâ€™umwanzi bigatuma umwica cyangwa uwo amenekeye mu gihugu atsindwa.
Ibi ngo byaba byaratangiwe na â€œKibogoâ€œ, izina ryâ€™Ikinyarwanda rikomoka ku nshinga kubogora ihwanye nâ€™iyo mu gifaransa bita â€œsauverâ€œ, â€œredresserâ€œ cyangwa se â€˜Gutabaraâ€™.
Igitekerezonkomoko cyâ€˜umutabazi Kibogo mu Rwanda
Mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda dutangira kumva ibyâ€™Umutabazi bwa mbere muri wa mugani wâ€™Ibimanuka mu gice cya wo cyâ€™Umugani uvanze nâ€™igitekerezo.
Lacger yanditse agira ati â€œUbwo Kigwa nâ€™umuvandimwe we Mututsi na mushiki wabo Nyampundu bacibwaga mu ijuru bitewe nâ€™icyaha cya nyina wamennye ibanga ryâ€™Imana, bururukiye mu Mubali bavuye mu ijuru. Bagera mu Mubali rero, bibonye bambaye ubusa bakennye. Hashize iminsi icumi bafite agahinda gakabije, bafite inzara, inyota nâ€™imbeho bifuza gupfa gusa, bambaza Imana bati: Mana yâ€™u Rwanda tugirire impuhwe utubabarire. Muri ako kanya inkuba ikubitira mu kirere maze umurabyo ukongeza ibyatsi byumye maze babona agashirira baragafatisha babona umuriro barota.â€
â€œHashize iminsi ijuru rirakinguka babona hamanutse impeke, ibishyimbo, amasaka nâ€™insina yâ€™imineke. Hashize iminsi na none mu ijuru hamanuka ikibumbe cyâ€™ubutare bwo gucuramo ibyuma nâ€™amasuka bati: Imana ni yo itwoherereje ibi byoseâ€.
Ngo icyo gihe maze ni bahinze batihingishije! Muri ako karere bamanukiyemo, hari hatuye imiryango itatu: Abasinga, Abazigaba nâ€™Abatwa bo mu ishyamba. Abo bantu bose bari barakomotse mu ijuru aho ba sekuruza bari barirukanywe bitewe nâ€™icyaha bahakoreye. Kubera ko bo batari barigeze basaba Imana imbabazi, ni cyo cyatumye ibarekera mu butindi nâ€™ubukene. Abo baje nyuma nibo babatungishije.
Ubwo Kibogo yicwaga nâ€™abagome nyuma Imana ikamuzura
Kugira ngo abo bantu batazarimbuka bagashiraho, byatumye Imana yohereza Umutabazi Kibogo aza ku ruhembe rwâ€™umurabyo arababwira ati â€œMwitinya nimuhumure ni Imana ibantumyeho! Nzaba umuhuza wanyu nâ€™Imana kandi icyo muzasaba cyose niba ari cyiza Imana izakibaha!. Umutabazi ni impongano yâ€™Imana ku bana bayo bayiringira.â€
Nyuma ariko abagome ngo baramufashe bamumanika ku giti bakoresheje ibyuma bisongoye baramwica. Imana yaje komora ibikomere bye imugaruramo ubuzima hanyuma Imana yohereza umurabyo umuzamura mu kirere asubira ku Mana.
Lacger yavuze ko iyo u Rwanda rugize amakuba, umuzimu wâ€™Umutabazi aza gutura muri umwe mu bana bâ€™Umwami agahinduka Umutabazi agakiza igihugu.
Bavuga ko abatambyi bo mu Mubali aribo bamubambye bakamwica ariko ko â€œImana yomoye ibikomere bye imugaruramo ubugingo hanyuma yohereza nâ€˜umurabyo umuzamura mu kirere asubira ku Manaâ€.

Title: Indirimbo umwami Yuhi Musinga yaririmbye ubwo yacibwaga mu Rwanda
Body:
Umwami Yuhi V Musinga, ni umwe mu bayoboye u Rwanda mu bihe bibi , ayobora ubwo abakoloni bageraga mu Rwanda bagashaka kumwambura ubutegetsi, yabangira bakamwirukana mu gihugu.
Umwami Yuhi V Musinga, ni umwe mu bayoboye u Rwanda mu bihe bibi , ayobora ubwo abakoloni bageraga mu Rwanda bagashaka kumwambura ubutegetsi, yabangira bakamwirukana mu gihugu.
Musinga yimye ingoma ahagana muri Werurwe 1897, ayambuye mukuru we bahuje se, Mibambwe IV Rutarindwa. Byakurikiwe no kwitwikira mu nzu kwa Rutarindwa nâ€™umuryango we wose amaze kumenya ko yagambaniwe.
Musinga yimye ingoma akiri muto, ku myaka 14 gusa, ari nayo mpamvu mu minsi ye ya mbere yayoborerwaga na nyina Kanjogera. Ni imyaka yari iruhije kuko Abakoloni bâ€™Abadage nâ€™abamisiyoneri ba mbere bari bari kwinjira mu Rwanda, bashaka abayoboke mu banyarwanda.
Kubera kwanga amabwiriza bamuhaga nâ€™uburyo bashakaga kuyobora u Rwanda, Abakoloni birukanye umwami Musinga mu Rwanda mu Ukwakira 1931.
Saa yine nâ€™igice ku wa 14 Ukwakira 1931 igihiriri ryâ€™abaja cyahagurutse i Nyanza giherekeje Musinga, abagore be batanu nâ€™abana be icyenda na nyina Kanjogera nâ€™abo mu muryango wabo, bajyanwa mu nzu yari yabateguriwe i Kamembe.
Mu gitabo cyiswe Rucunshu, cya Ruhashya Ã‰pimaque, ku ipaji ya 94 kugeza kuya 95, hagaragara indirimbo bivugwa ko yahimbwe nâ€™Umwami Musinga ubwo yacibwaga akajyanwa i Kamembe akavaha ajya i Moba.
Muri iyo ndirimbo, Musinga agaragaza ko yari umwami mwiza uzi kurinda igihugu kandi ufasha abababaye. Agaragaza ko yaciwe mu gihugu nta cyaha yakoze, nâ€™agahinda atewe no gusiga igihugu cye, abaturage be nâ€™abana be.
Ntabwo bizwi neza niba iyo ndirimbo ariyo Musinga yihimbiye ubwe dore ko ntaho amateka amugaragaza nkâ€™umusizi, cyangwa niba ari iyo yahimbiwe ikamwitirirwa.

Title: Imvugo igaragaza icyubahiro inka zahabwaga mu muco nyarwanda
Body:
Inka si itungo nkâ€™ayandi mu mibereho yâ€™Abanyarwanda ndetse uburyo bayifata, uko bayivuga nâ€™ibyo bayikorera, bigaragaza ko kuva hambere yahabwaga icyubahiro gikomeye.
Inka si itungo nkâ€™ayandi mu mibereho yâ€™Abanyarwanda ndetse uburyo bayifata, uko bayivuga nâ€™ibyo bayikorera, bigaragaza ko kuva hambere yahabwaga icyubahiro gikomeye.
Amateka agaragaza ko inka yahoze ari ikimenyetso gikomeye cyâ€™ubukungu bwâ€™igihugu, uwabaga ayifite ntiyarwazaga bwaki, ntiyarumbyaga imyaka, ntiyaburaga abagaragu nâ€™inshuti.
Akenshi ikintu cyabaga cyubashywe mu Rwanda rwo hambere, ibigikomokaho byagiraga ivugwa ryihariye ritandukanye nâ€™ibindi bisanzwe, bikitabwaho na buri wese yaba umukuru nâ€™umuto, bajya kugira icyo bavuga ku nka cyangwa ikindi cyahawe agaciro gakomeye, bakigengesera, bikaba bizwi mu Kinyarwanda nkâ€™Ikeshamvugo.
Inka iri mu bintu bitagatifu mu muco nâ€™amateka yâ€™u Rwanda, byubahwa kandi bitinywa byagize uruhare runini mu mushinga wo kurwubaka.
Inka nâ€™ibiyikomokaho nkâ€™amata, amavuta nâ€™ibikoresho byifashishwa mu bworozi bwâ€™inka birimo ibyansi, byagiye bihabwa umwihariko mu muco wâ€™u Rwanda.
Nkâ€™uko tubikesha igitabo â€œIkeshamvugo mu Kinyarwandaâ€ cyâ€™Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu , Inzobere mu Busizi, Umuco, Ubuvanganzo nâ€™amateka yâ€™u Rwanda, tugiye gukomoza ku ikeshamvugo rikoreshwa ku Nka nkâ€™umutungo wâ€™ikirenga mu gihugu, wagize uruhare rwâ€™ikirenga mu bukungu, mu mibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage, mu bubanyi nâ€™amahanga, mu mutekano nâ€™amahoro, mu mihango nâ€™imigenzo yâ€™Abanyarwanda nâ€™ibindi.

Title: Nyanza: Urubyiruko rwigishirijwe mu Rukari imirimo yakorwaga nâ€™abangavu nâ€™ingimbi mu Rwanda rwo hambere
Body:
Muri gahunda yo kwimakaza no gusigasira Umuco Nyarwanda, Ikigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Igihugu zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda cyateguye umunsi wo kwigisha abari kubyiruka imirimo yakorwaga nâ€™Abangavu nâ€™Ingimbi mu Rwanda rwo hambere ndetse nâ€™imikino bakinaga.
Muri gahunda yo kwimakaza no gusigasira Umuco Nyarwanda, Ikigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Igihugu zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda cyateguye umunsi wo kwigisha abari kubyiruka imirimo yakorwaga nâ€™Abangavu nâ€™Ingimbi mu Rwanda rwo hambere ndetse nâ€™imikino bakinaga.
Icyo gikorwa ngarukamwaka cyabereye mu Ngoro yâ€™Amateka yâ€™Abami iherereye mu Karere ka Nyanza ahazwi nko mu Rukari. Kuri iyi nshuro higishijwe abanyeshuri biga muri CollÃ¨ge du Christ Roi i Nyanza bo mu mwaka wa gatanu nâ€™uwa gatandatu biga mu ishami ryâ€™indimi nâ€™Ubuvanganzo.
Abanyeshuri bagera kuri 50 ni bo basuye iyo ngoro basobanurirwa byinshi, bigishwa gukora imirimo itandukanye irimo kwahura, kuragira, gucyura, kudahira no kuhira inka, kwahirira inyana, kwinikiza no gukamisha.
Umukozi ukuriye Ingoro yâ€™Abami yo mu Rukari, Gahongayire Yvonne, yavuze ko ari gahunda bateguye mu rwego rwo kwigisha abakiri bato Umuco Nyarwanda no kuwubakundisha.
Ati â€œNi uburyo twashyizeho bwihariye bwo kwigisha Abanyarwanda umuco nâ€™amateka duhereye ku rubyiruko; ikindi ni ukubungabunga ibikoresho byâ€™umuco gakondo no kugira ngo babimenye.â€
Gahongayire yasobanuye ko ikigamijwe ari ugusigasira umuco nâ€™ururimi no kumenyesha abakiri bato inkomoko yâ€™ibikoresho gakondo nâ€™akamaro kabyo.
Imirimo yakozwe nâ€™abakobwa irimo gukukira inka, gukubura, koza ibyansi, kubuganiza no gutereka amata. Naho abahungu bakoze imirimo irimo gukama inka; kuhira inka, kwahira ubwatsi nâ€™iyindi.
Mu gusoza iyo gahunda aba banyeshuri babonye nâ€™umwanya wo kwidagadura aho beretswe banakina imikino gakondo itandukanye irimo gusimbuka urukiramende, kumasha, kunyabanwa, gutera uruziga, hamwe no kurasa ku ntego.
Ubusanzwe iyo mikino abana bayigiraga mu itorero hagamijwe kubatoza kurangwa nâ€™indangagaciro zâ€™ubutwari no gukunda igihugu no kucyitangira.
Bamwe mu banyeshuri bitabiriye icyo gikorwa bashimiye Ikigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Igihugu zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda; bavuga ko bahigiye byinshi kandi bizabafasha mu mibereho yabo.
Mukeshimana Zula ati â€œIcyo nahigiye ni ubufatanye hagati yâ€™abagize umuryango; badusobanuriye uko kera imirimo yakorwaga mu rugo abagize umuryango bagafatanya. Ikindi nahungukiye ni ukumenya ibikoresho byakoreshwaga kera nkâ€™ibyansi nâ€™urusyo.â€
Rukimbira Godfred â€œIcyo namenye ni uko nâ€™iterambere rigomba kujyana nâ€™umuco kuko ubufatanye mu gukora imirimo ni indangagaciro zarangaga abanyarwanda. Nabonye uko abami babagaho mbona ni mateka meza.â€
Ingoro yâ€™Abami mu Rukari igizwe nâ€™ibice bine; icya mbere ni Ingoro Umwami Yuhi V Musinga yabayemo nâ€™abandi bamubanjirije bose, igaragiwe nâ€™izindi nzu ebyiri za gakondo (Iyâ€™amata ndetse nâ€™iyâ€™inzoga). Igice cya kabiri kigizwe nâ€™inyambo (inka zâ€™amahembe ashyorongoshyoye).
Icya gatatu ni ingoro yâ€™Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, naho icya kane kigizwe nâ€™umusezero (aho Abami batabarije i Mwima).
Muri bimwe mu bintu bimurikwa mu Ngoro yâ€™Abami harimo ibikoresho bitandukanye birimo inteko (intebe umwami yicaragaho); Intwaro zigizwe nâ€™ingabo, umuheto, icumu nâ€™umutana urimo imyambi.
Harimo kandi Igisasiro (uburiri bwâ€™umwami), ibiseke, inkangara ndetse nâ€™agacuma yanyweragamo.

Title: Ibyâ€™ingenzi byabaga bigize ubukwe bwâ€™Abanyarwanda bo hambere
Body:
Ubukwe ni umwe mu mihango ikomeye mu buzima bwa muntu. Ni umuhango ukomeye kubera ko uhuza imiryango, ugatuma umuntu ashinga urugo rwe akabyara ndetse nâ€™igihugu kikunguka amaboko. Imihango yâ€™ubukwe yagendaga itandukana hagendewe ku muco, idini nâ€™akarere abantu baherereyemo.
Ubukwe ni umwe mu mihango ikomeye mu buzima bwa muntu. Ni umuhango ukomeye kubera ko uhuza imiryango, ugatuma umuntu ashinga urugo rwe akabyara ndetse nâ€™igihugu kikunguka amaboko. Imihango yâ€™ubukwe yagendaga itandukana hagendewe ku muco, idini nâ€™akarere abantu baherereyemo.
Mu Rwanda rwo hambere, ubukwe bwari ubwâ€™umuryango. Imiryango iyo yabonaga ko umusore cyangwa inkumi bakuze kandi ko bageze igihe cyo gushinga urugo, yatangiraga gutera intambwe zagenwaga nâ€™umuco.
Kurambagiza
Kurambagiza ni ukureba uburanga bwâ€™umukobwa cyangwa umuhungu, ubwiza, imico nâ€™imyifatire bye. Mu kurambagiza habagaho kumenya no kugenzura imyitwarire, imibereho, imikorere, isuku ndetse nâ€™umuryango umuhungu cyangwa umukobwa akomokamo kugira ngo bamenye niba yarahawe uburere.
Umuranga ni we wafashaga imiryango yâ€™abateganya gushyingiranwa kumenyana no gutunganya neza imihango ijyanye no kurambagizanya kwayo. Umuranga yabaga ari inshuti yâ€™imiryango yombi ishaka guhana abageni cyangwa akaba umuvandimwe wâ€™umuryango umwe, ariko aziranye nâ€™abantu bo mu muryango bashakamo amaboko.
Iyo umuranga yamenyeshaga imiryango uwo yatoranyije, umusore nâ€™inkumi bashoboraga guhura, bakamenyana cyangwa bakaganira mu buryo busanzwe.
Gusaba no gufata irembo
Gusaba no gufata irembo byakurikiraga kurambagiza, bikabera iwabo wâ€™umukobwa. Imisango yo gufata irembo no gusaba yarihutaga kuko ubusanzwe mu Kinyarwanda ntawimana irembo. Iyo umuryango wâ€™umusore wabaga wemerewe irembo, hakurikiragaho umuhango wo kurifata.
Mu gihe abo mu muryango wâ€™umusore bagiye kumufatira irembo babaga bageze iwabo wâ€™umukobwa, barakirwa bakazimanirwa maze uhagarariye umuryango wâ€™umukobwa akababaza ikibagenza.
Umuranga, se wâ€™umusore cyangwa undi umuryango wâ€™umusore watoranyije ni bo bajyaga gusaba no gufata irembo. Umuryango usaba watangaga inka yâ€™ifatarembo ku bifite cyangwa isuka ku baciriritse. Bwabaga aribwo bwa mbere imiryango yombi ihuye, ikaganira ku bijyanye nâ€™ubukwe bwâ€™abana babo, bakajya inama ku bizakorwa nâ€™ibizakenerwa.
Gusaba no gukwa
Gusaba umugeni ni umuhango wakurikiraga uwo gufata irembo, ukabera iwabo wâ€™umukobwa. Mu muhango wo gusaba, umuryango wâ€™umusore watoranyaga abakwe bajya kuwusabira, bakagenda bayobowe nâ€™umukwe mukuru, bitwaje inzoga yo gusabisha.
Wari umuhango wo guha agaciro imiryango kuko umusore ntiyabaga yemerewe gutwara umukobwa atamuhawe. Ibyo byari ikimenyetso cyâ€™uko umuryango wâ€™umuhungu uha agaciro umuryango wareze umukobwa.
Mu gihe cyo gusaba, umuryango wâ€™umukobwa ntiwahitaga wemerera umuryango wâ€™umusore umugeni, ibyo bikagaragaza kwihesha agaciro nkâ€™umuryango no kugahesha abawukumokamo.
Nyuma yo gusaba hakurikiragaho umuhango wo gukwa ugakorwa nâ€™umuryango wâ€™umusore kandi ukabera iwabo wâ€™umukobwa. Umusore yakwaga inka, isuka cyangwa andi matungo nubwo hose bavugaga ko bakoye inka.
Inkwano yabaga ari ikimenyetso hagati yâ€™imiryango yombi, ko ibaye inshuti. Inkwano yari ipfundo ryâ€™ubumwe hagati yâ€™imiryango yombi.
Mu muco Nyarwanda, inkwano ntiyabaga inzitizi. Yaba yabonetse cyangwa itabonetse, ntibyabuzaga ubukwe gutaha. Igihe inkwano yabaga ibuze, umusore yashoboraga gutenda, ni ukuvuga gufata igihe aba kwa sebukwe akora akazi gasimbura inkwano cyangwa agahabwa umugeni wâ€™ubuntu.
Gutebutsa
Ni umuhango wakurikiraga gukwa. Umuryango wâ€™umusore wajyaga iwabo wâ€™umukobwa hagamijwe kuganira ku gihe umugeni bazamubazanira (bazamubahekera).
Hari uduce gutebutsa byakorwaga inshuro zirenzwe imwe, umuryango wâ€™umukobwa ugakomeza kwihagararaho kugira ngo umuryango wâ€™umusore ubone agaciro kâ€™umukobwa wabo.
Kurongora no kurongorwa
Igihe iyo cyabaga kigeze, umuryango wâ€™umukobwa waramuhekaga ukamushyira umuryango wâ€™umusore. Iyo yabaga ageze kwa sebukwe, hari imihango yakorwaga yo kumwakira ikagenda itandukana bitewe nâ€™agace.
Hari nkâ€™aho iyo yabaga akiri mu bikingi byâ€™amarembo, yahagararaga hejuru yâ€™aho batabye urusyo, nyirabukwe akamukoza umwuko ku mpanga. Hari aho umugeni yinjiraga agasanga sebukwe yicaye ikambere akamwicaza ku bibero akanamuha inka yâ€™ibibero akabona kujyanwa mu mbere.
Mu gihe ibirori byâ€™ubukwe byabaga bigeze hagati, se wâ€™umusore yamujyanaga kurongora. Mu kurongora hakoreshwaga umwishywa, umusore akawambika umugeni hanyuma akivuga ati â€˜ndakurongoye ndi kanaka mwene kanakaâ€™ maze ababyeyi bakavuza impundu. Ibirori byarakomezaga kugeza mu gitondo, abaje baherekeje umugeni bagasezera bagataha.
Nyuma yâ€™uko abaje bahetse umugeni bageze iwabo wâ€™umukobwa bagashyikiriza ababyeyi be umwishywa. Hakurikiragaho umuhango wo kwakira umwishywa ukabanzirizwa no gucunda, guca hagati no kumara amavuta.
Nta mukobwa washyingirwaga yaratakaje ubusugi kuko kubutakaza byabaga ari igisebo ku mukobwa, umuryango akomokamo nâ€™igihugu. Uwabaga yatwise atarashyingirwa, yafatwaga nkâ€™uwatesheje igihugu ubusugi, kugira ngo igihugu gisubirane iryo shema ryâ€™ubusugi bwacyo, umukobwa bakamucira mu mahanga cyangwa bakamuroha.
Gutinya
Nyuma yo kurongorwa, hari iminsi umugeni yamaraga ari mu nzu adasohoka. Muri icyo gihe cyo gutinya yaboheraga nyirabukwe akebo kâ€™ibara rimwe, bitaga nyirabitabo. Gutinya byafashaga umukobwa kumenyerana nâ€™umuryango ajemo, akamenya imyitwarire nâ€™imico biranga umuryango mushya ajemo.
Gutwikurura
Ni umuhango wakorwaga hagamije gusohora umugeni kugira ngo bamuhe uburenganzira bwo kujya ahagaragara, kugira ngo atangire imirimo ye. Habanzaga gukura abageni mu nyegamo, kubogosha amasunzu, guha abana amata no kubereka imitwa.
Mu kwerekwa imitwa, urugo rushya rwahabwaga ibyangombwa nkenerwa birimo ibikoresho, ibiribwa nâ€™ibindi.
Umuryango wâ€™umukobwa wabaga wamuzaniye ibiribwa, imyaka nâ€™ibikoresho byo mu gikoni. Umukwe mukuru ni we watumwaga mu rugo ngo ayobore uwo muhango, aherekejwe nâ€™abakuze nâ€™amasugi.
Guca mu irembo no kuramukanya
Guca mu irembo byakorwaga nâ€™abageni bajya gusura iwabo wâ€™umukobwa. Uyu muhango wabaga nyuma yâ€™igihe runaka abashyingiwe baramenyereye urugo kandi baratangiye kurukorera.
Abageni bajyanaga na se wâ€™umuhungu, umuranga cyangwa se undi muntu washoboraga kubavugira ijambo. Bitwazaga inzoga, bagera iwabo wâ€™umukobwa bagasangira kandi bakaganira hagamijwe gushimira umuryango wâ€™umukobwa ko wabahaye umugeni mwiza.
Gusura abageni
Ni umuhango wakorwaga nâ€™iwabo wâ€™umukobwa ugakorwa nyuma yo guca mu irembo. Ababyeyi bâ€™umukobwa bateganyaga inzoga nâ€™izindi mpano bashyira urugo rushya, kugira ngo barufashe kwiteza imbere. Umuryango wâ€™umukobwa wabonaga umwanya uhagije wo kuganira nâ€™umukwe wabo kuko nta misango myinshi yabaga mu gusura abageni.

Title: Uko igihugu cya Nduga cyometswe ku Rwanda hakoreshejwe amayeri yâ€™ubushuti
Body:
Nduga ni agace kagize amateka menshi mu Rwanda, kaba igihugu cyâ€™igihangage u Rwanda tuzi ubu rutabaho, kukomeka ku Rwanda bisaba abami bâ€™u Rwanda gukoresha amayeri arimo kubanza kwiyunga bagashyirana abageni, u Rwanda rwuririra kuri ubwo bucuti rutera umwami wa Nduga.
Nduga ni agace kagize amateka menshi mu Rwanda, kaba igihugu cyâ€™igihangage u Rwanda tuzi ubu rutabaho, kukomeka ku Rwanda bisaba abami bâ€™u Rwanda gukoresha amayeri arimo kubanza kwiyunga bagashyirana abageni, u Rwanda rwuririra kuri ubwo bucuti rutera umwami wa Nduga.
Mu bihe byo ha mbere, kugira ngo igihugu kigire ubuzima gatozi cyitwe igihugu, ni uko cyagombaga kuba gifite ibintu bitanu byâ€™ingenzi, aribyo; Kugira ubutaka, kugira abaturage bacyitirirwa, kugira ingoma ngabe nkâ€™ikirango cyâ€™igihugu cyigenga, kugira umwami ukigenga nâ€™ingabo zikirwanirira.
Nduga cyari kimwe mu bihugu 29 byari bigize u Rwanda rwo hambere, ndetse kikaba kimwe mu byari bikomeye.
Igitabo â€œImizi yâ€™u Rwandaâ€, Umutumba wa mbere ndetse nâ€™igitabo â€œIntwari zâ€™imbanza zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiroâ€™â€™ byombi byâ€™umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, bigaragaza ko Nduga cyari mu bihugu byahanzwe bwa mbere mu Rwanda kuko yahanzwe ahasaga mu wa 600 mu kibariro cyâ€™ibihe byacu.
Kugira ngo abami bâ€™u Rwanda bigarurire kimwe mu bihugu gikomeye cya Nduga, hateweyo ibitero byinshi byagabweyo nâ€™abami bâ€™u Rwanda nka Cyilima Rugwe nâ€™umwuzukuru we Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi. Cyilima Rugwe, yabanje kohereza ibitero byâ€™ubushotoranyi ku ngoma ya Nduga, ahereye ku turere twari twegereye u Rwanda, nko mu gice cyâ€™Akarere kâ€™Amayaga kahanaga imbibi nâ€™u Rwanda, kitwaga â€œNduga Bunyagitundaâ€ katwarwaga na Mulinda wâ€™Umunnyugu ahatwarira Sabugabo, umwami wa Nduga.
 Nuko Cyilima Rugwe yigarurira ako gace yica Mulinda wâ€™Umunyungu watwaraga ako Gace. Kumutsimbura ku butegetsi, Cyilima yamushukishije kumushyingira, ingabo zimutera zitwa ngo ni abakwe bahetse umugeni, habaye ubucakura bwo mu rwego rwo hejuru kuko cyari igihugu gikomeye kandi cyâ€™abanyamaboko, ku buryo intambara yabo yari inkundura.
Kigeli Mukobanya wazunguye se Rugwe ku ngoma, nta cyo yigeze yongeraho ku gitero se yagabye mu Nduga, ahubwo yashyize imbaraga mu guhangana nâ€™igitero cya mbere cyâ€™Abanyoro no guhanaguraho igihugu cyâ€™u Bwanacyambwe bwari mu Majyepfo yâ€™ Iburasirazuba bwâ€™u Rwanda
Umuhungu wa Mukobanya, Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi, amaze kwima Ingoma ya Se Kigeli Mukobanya, yihatiye kwigarurira Nduga yâ€™Ababanda iranga imubera ibamba, bigera nâ€™aho Nduga igaba ibitero byambuka Nyabarongo, igihe kiza kugera atsinda Nduga ya Nkuba ya Sabugabo wari warazunguye se Sabugabo ku ngoma. Abanyiginya baje kwambuka Nyabarongo, basatira Ababanda barabatsinda, Nkuba ya Sabugabo aricwa, ingabo zitwaga â€˜Ibisigaâ€™ byari umutwe wâ€™Ingabo zâ€™Ababanda, zikubitirwa ahareba i Nzega, umuhungu wa Nkuba ari we Mashira ahungira mu Bugesera.
Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi, yahise ashyiraho Abatware be mu Nduga, maze umwe mu batware be, aza gucumbikira Mashira ya Nkuba atamuzi. Icyo gihe akarere ka Nduga kari kamaze iminsi mu mapfa, maze Mashira akihagera, ahurirana nâ€™uko imvura iguye, maze bituma abaturage ba Nduga bamuyoboka, baramwimika aba umwami rwihishwa.
 Abatware ba Sekarongoro bamaze kubimenya ko Mashira yimye barahunga, bahungira mu bice bidatuwe biteganye na Nyabarongo. Mibambwe amaze kubimenya, asaba Mashira ya Nkuba ya Sabugabo kuyoboka, kuko Ingoma ya Se yayimwambuye, Mashira aranga.
Mashira ya Nkuba ya Sabugabo watwaraga Nduga amaze kunanirana, Mibambwe yigiriye inama yo kugirana na we amasezerano, biremezwa Mashira ahamya ubwami bwa Nduga. Nyuma yaho imishyikirano yarakomeye, haziraho no gushyingirana. Nuko Mashira arongora Nyirantorwa umukobwa wa Mibambwe I Sekarongoro, na ho Mibambwe I Sekarongoro arongora Bwiza bwa Mashira budashira irora nâ€™irongorwa, bamwambuye Rugayi rwa Buzi wari utuye mu Burundi, wari waramushatse mbere. Icyo gihe na Gahindiro Semutakirwa wa Mibambwe Sekarongoro yarongoye Nyankeri ya Mashira. Icyo gihe umurwa wa Mibambwe Sekarongoro, wari i Mbilima na Matovu, hahoze ari mu Ngoma yâ€™u Buliza ( ubu ni mu Karere ka Gakenke mu Murenge wa Coko), naho Mashira atuye ku Mugina wa Jenda na Kabugondo hafi yâ€™i Busuri, i Cyeza no ku Mukingo.
Mu gitero cya Kabiri cyâ€™Abanyoro cyari kirangajwe imbere nâ€™umuhungu wa Nyabwongo II Buhemu, Abatasi bâ€™u Rwanda babwiye Mibambwe I Sekarongoro ko atazatsinda Abanyoro bari benshi bikabije ugereranyije nâ€™abaje mu gitero cya mbere, icyo gihe yagerageje kwitabaza umwami wâ€™u Bugesera Nsoro II Sangano, na Kimenyi II Shumbusho wâ€™i Gisaka na Mashira ya Nkuba ya Sabugabo, umwami wa Nduga, ibyo bihugu byanga kumutabara, bimutera utwatsi. Nuko Mibambwe Sekarongoro abonye ko asumbirijwe, kandi u Rwanda rwe rushobora gusibama, ahitamo guhunga, ahungana nâ€™Ingabo ze, abaturage ndetse nâ€™amatungo, berekeza i Bunyabungo (mu Ntara ya Kivu yâ€™Epfo ).
 Abanyoro bakurikiranye Mibambwe I Bunyabungo, Mashira abaha inzira. Abanyoro bahingutse, Abanyarwanda babanza kubatinya kubera ubwinshi bwabo gusa baza gukoresha amayeri babagwa gitumo, abanyarwanda baratsinda.
Mibambwe Sekarongoro yaje kugaruka mu gihugu cye amaze gutsinda, anyura kwa Sebukwe akaba nâ€™umukwe we Mashira wari utuye I Mwima ya Busasamana muri icyo gihe. Mashira rero yaje gusanganira Sebukwe nta cyo yikeka nubwo yanze kumutabara akanaha inzira abanyoro. Yarabazimaniye. Igihe kigeze hagati, ingabo za Mibambwe zaramufashe, Mibambwe Sekarongoro aramwica, afatanyije na Munyanya wavaga inda imwe na Mashira kwa se wa bo, amutsinda aho ngaho I Mwima, ingoma yabo Nyanihinda barayinyaga, ubutaka bwâ€™igihugu cya Nduga yâ€™ababada babwomeka ku Rwanda. Ibyo kwa Mashira birarimbuka, Nduga itsindwa itsinzwe noneho. Sekarongoro, ategekana umwete Nduga, kugira ngo itazongera kumwigaranzura ikamurushya nka mbere.
Nguko uko uruhererekane rwâ€™amateka yâ€™igihugu cya Nduga yagiye ahererekana, kugeza ku izima ryayo ubwo yigarurirwaga nâ€™u Rwanda ahasaga mu wa 1444, ku ngoma yâ€™umwami wâ€™u Rwanda, Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi.

Title: Umugambi wapfubye mu 1978 wo kohereza Abanyarwanda muri Tanzania na Gabon kubera ubwiyongere bwâ€™abaturage
Body:
Guhera u Rwanda rutangiye kubarwa nkâ€™igihugu nyuma yâ€™ubwigenge, ubuyobozi bwose bwagiyeho bwagowe no guhangana nâ€™ikibazo cyâ€™ubwiyongere bukabije bwâ€™abaturage, baberanye na kilometero kare 26338 rwahawe nâ€™abakoloni mu nama yâ€™i Berlin mu 1885.
Guhera u Rwanda rutangiye kubarwa nkâ€™igihugu nyuma yâ€™ubwigenge, ubuyobozi bwose bwagiyeho bwagowe no guhangana nâ€™ikibazo cyâ€™ubwiyongere bukabije bwâ€™abaturage, baberanye na kilometero kare 26338 rwahawe nâ€™abakoloni mu nama yâ€™i Berlin mu 1885.
Mu myaka ya 1970 nibwo iki kibazo cyagaragaye cyane, ndetse icyo gihe ibihugu bikomeye nâ€™imiryango mpuzamahanga bigira inama u Rwanda ko mu gihe nta gikozwe, bizarangira runaniwe kwita ku baturage barwo.
Muri iyo myaka Kiliziya Gatolika yasaga nâ€™iyashinze imizi haba mu buzima bwâ€™iyobokamana nâ€™ubwa Politiki mu Rwanda, ntiyemeraga uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro butari ubwa kamere ari nayo myemerere yayo kugeza ubu, mu gihe ubushakashatsi bwagaragazaga ko ubwo buryo butafatwa nkâ€™ubwahangana nâ€™ikibazo nyamukuru igihugu cyari gifite.
Mu 1978, u Rwanda rwabarirwaga abaturage miliyoni 4.8 utabariyemo impunzi zari mu mahanga. Hakurikijwe ubutaka buri mu gihugu bukoreshwa, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zarushyiraga mu bihugu bituwe cyane dore ko kilometero kare icyo gihe yabarirwaga abaturage basaga 400.
Guhera mu 1975, imyaka ibiri Habyarimana afashe ubutegetsi, ikibazo cyâ€™ubwiyongere bukabije bwâ€™abaturage cyari kimaze gufata indi ntera. Ibyo byakubitiyeho ko umuryango nyarwanda wari ukibaswe nâ€™imyumvire gakondo yâ€™uko kubyara abana benshi, ari umugisha, bikaba amaboko nâ€™ubukungu.
Hiyongeragaho ko benshi mu baturage ari abayoboke ba Kiliziya Gatolika itarakozwaga ibyo kuboneza urubyaro.
Habyarimana wari umuyoboke Gatolika anakorana nayo bya hafi kugeza no mu miyoborere, muri Nzeri 1977 yatumije uwari intumwa ya Papa mu Rwanda, Rotunno ngo baganire ku buryo igihugu cyatangiza gahunda yo kuboneza urubyaro ariko bitabangamiye imyemerere Gatolika.
Inyandiko zâ€™ibanga za Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda icyo gihe, zigaragaza ko Rotunno yemeye ko ubwiyongere bwâ€™abaturage buri mu Rwanda bukwiriye gushakirwa umuti mu maguru mashya. Mu nama yagiriye Habyarimana harimo gukoresha uburyo bwa kamere mu guhangana nâ€™icyo kibazo.
Banki yâ€™isi mu 1977 yamenyesheje u Rwanda ko kugira ngo rugire ubushobozi bwo guhaza abaturage biyongera rufite ari uko umusaruro wâ€™ubuhinzi wiyongera ku kigero cya 3Â % buri mwaka.
Kimwe mu byo Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zashinjaga u Rwanda nka nyirabayazana wâ€™ubwiyongere bukabije bwâ€™abaturage, ni ukugendera ku bitekerezo bya Kiliziya Gatolika byo kuboneza urubyaro mu buryo bwa kamere.
Mu 1978, mu Rwanda habaye inama yiga ku kuboneza urubyaro, imiryango mpuzamahanga nka Pathfinder International yiyemeza gutanga ubufasha.
Icyo gihe hagaragajwe ko mu guhangana nâ€™ikibazo cyâ€™ubwiyongere bwâ€™abaturage mu Rwanda, kuboneza urubyaro ari cyo gisubizo gishoboka hagakoreshwa uburyo bwose bwaba gakondo nâ€™ubwa kizungu kandi abaturage bakabwegerezwa ari nako basobanurirwa imikorere yabwo.
Mu biro bya Perezida hashyizweho itsinda ryihariye ryita ku gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya gahunda yo kuboneza urubyaro, ari nabyo byaje kurangira mu 1981 hashinzwe Ofisi yâ€™Igihugu yita ku Mibereho yâ€™Abaturage, ONAPO, yari ishinzwe ibyo kuboneza urubyaro.
Gutuza abanyarwanda mu mahanga, umushinga wapfubye
Mu nama zitandukanye Leta yâ€™u Rwanda icyo gihe yagiye igirwa, harimo gushaka uburyo bamwe mu baturage bakimurwa bakajya gutuzwa mu mahanga, mu bihugu byabemera.
Iyi nama yahuje akanama ka Leta kagizwe nâ€™inzobere zitandukanye mu byâ€™ubuzima nâ€™imibereho myiza, ku matariki 18 na 19 Mata 1978 hemejwe ko Guverinoma ishyira imbaraga mu kuganira nâ€™ibihugu byifuza gutuza Abanyarwanda, bikagabanya igitutu cyari kuri Leta cyâ€™ubwiyongere bwâ€™abaturage.
Intumwa za Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga zamenyesheje ako kanama ko Tanzania yari yemeye kwakira no gutuza abanyarwanda bari hagati ya 400 000 na 1 000 000, bakabatuza ahantu hihariye.
Muri uko kwezi, uwari Minisitiri wâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga, Aloys Nsekalije yari yabwiye abanyamakuru ko u Rwanda ruzishimira kohereza abo banyarwanda muri Tanzania ariko bigakorwa mu buryo budahubukiwe kandi abagiye koherezwa bakabanza gutegurwa.
Ntibyatinze, tariki 11 Gicurasi 1978, Perezida Julius Nyerere yagiriye uruzinduko rwâ€™iminsi itatu mu Rwanda. Inyandiko zâ€™ibanga za Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zahishuwe na WikiLeaks, zigaragaza ko yemereye u Rwanda kwakira abaturage barwo, bagatuzwa mu bice byo mu Burengerazuba bwa Tanzania bitari bituwe.
Agiye guhaguruka asubira muri Tanzania, Nyerere yagize ati â€œTwiteguye no kwakira abanyarwanda 500 000 icya rimwe kuko dufite ahantu hanini hadatuwe. Abazaza bazashyirwa mu midugudu izwi nka Ujamaa nkuko abandi Banyatanzaniya bameze.â€
Uyu mushinga waheze mu mpapuro kuko nubwo u Rwanda na Tanzania byari byawemeranyijeho, ikiguzi cyose cyo gutuza abo baturage cyari kuri Leta yâ€™u Rwanda.
Inyandiko zâ€™ibanga za Amerika zerekana ko u Rwanda rwabigenzemo gahoro cyane, dore ko amikoro yo kubatuza yasaga nkâ€™aho ari menshi ahubwo rushyira imbaraga muri gahunda zo kuboneza urubyaro.
Mbere yo kuganira na Tanzania, Habyarimana yari yaciye undi muvuno wo kumvikana na Gabon abanyarwanda bamwe cyane cyane abafite ubumenyi runaka, bakajyanwa gutuzwa muri icyo gihugu cyari cyugarijwe nâ€™ubuke bwâ€™abakozi mu nzego nyinshi cyane cyane iza Leta.
Tariki 30 Nzeri 1976 Perezida Habyarimana yagiriye uruzinduko muri Gabon, we na Perezida Omar Bongo basinya amasezerano ane yâ€™ubufatanye arimo ayo kohereza abanyarwanda muri Gabon bakagenda nkâ€™abakozi.
Byari byitezwe ko nyuma yâ€™isinywa ryâ€™ayo masezerano, impande zombi zizashyiraho Komisiyo ihuriweho ishinzwe kuyashyira mu bikorwa.
Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigaragaza ko uwo mushinga nawo waje gupfuba kuko Gabon yagiye igaragaza ubushake buke mu kuwushyira mu bikorwa, cyane ko byari biyoroheye kubona abandi banyamahanga batayihenze kandi ba hafi no guteza imbere uburezi imbere mu gihugu kugira ngo ibone abaturage bayo bafite ubumenyi bukenewe.
U Rwanda rwakomeje guhangana nâ€™ubwiyongere bwâ€™abaturage hakoreshejwe kuboneza urubyaro ariko umusaruro bitanga ukaba muke.
Mu 1966, abaturarwanda bageraga kuri miliyoni eshatu, bagenda bazamuka aho mu 1988 rwari rutuwe nâ€™abaturage miliyoni esheshatu, mu gihe mu mwaka wa 2018 rwari rutuwe nâ€™abasaga miliyoni 12.
Ibimenyetso byerekana ko bazakomeza kwiyongera ku buryo mu 2032 bazaba bageze kuri miliyoni 16.9 mu gihe baba biyongereye cyane, cyangwa miliyoni 15.4 baramutse baboneje urubyaro.
Ikigo gishinzwe Ibarurishamibare kigaragaza ko bazaba barikubye gatatu mu 2050 urebeye ku bwiyongere bariho bwa 2.6% ku mwaka.

Title: CNLG yasohoye ibitabo bigaragaza ubugome Jenoside yakoranywe muri Cyangugu na Gitarama
Body:
Komisiyo yâ€™Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside, CNLG, yasohoye ibitabo bitatu bigaragaza amwe mu mateka mabi ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi cyane cyane muri Perefegitura ya Gitarama nâ€™iyahoze ari Cyangungu, harimo nâ€™ubuhamya bwâ€™uburyo abasirikare bâ€™Abafaransa bafataga Abatutsi ku ngufu.
Komisiyo yâ€™Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside, CNLG, yasohoye ibitabo bitatu bigaragaza amwe mu mateka mabi ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi cyane cyane muri Perefegitura ya Gitarama nâ€™iyahoze ari Cyangungu, harimo nâ€™ubuhamya bwâ€™uburyo abasirikare bâ€™Abafaransa bafataga Abatutsi ku ngufu.
Kuri uyu wa Kane nibwo CNLG yagaragaje ibi bitabo, hakaba harimo kimwe gikubiyemo ubuhamya bwâ€™uburyo Abatutsi batotojwe guhera mu 1973 bakanirukanwa mu mashuri.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na CNLG ibifashijwemo nâ€™abashakashatsi bayo barimo Mafeza Faustin wakoze ubushakashatsi kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Perefegitura ya Gitarama, Nikuze Donatien, we yakoze ubushakashatsi kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu yahoze ari perefegitura ya Cyangungu, naho Ntashamaje GÃ©rard we yashyize hamwe ubuhamya.
Nko muri Cyangungu, ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza uburyo Ingabo zâ€™Abafaransa zari muri ako gace zarebeyereye Interahamwe zicaga Abatutsi, ariko zinakora nâ€™amahano yo gufata Abatutsi ku ngufu no kubakorera ibindi bikorwa bya kinyamanswa.
Uyu mushakashatsi agaragaza ko Abafaransa bageze mu Nkambi ya Nyarushishi aho bagomba kurinda impunzi zâ€™Abatutsi, nyamara bakomeje gukorerwa ubwicanyi.
Agaragaza ko impunzi muri iyi nkambi zahabwaga ibiryo ariko nta nkwi zo kubitekesha, kandi ko byari ihame ko impunzi zijya hanze yâ€™inkambi gushakisha inkwi, uwasohokaga wese Interahamwe zahitaga zimwica abasirikare bâ€™Abafaransa bareba.
 Abafaransa mu bikorwa byo gusambanya Abatutsi
Iki gitabo kigaragaza ko Abafaransa baje muri OpÃ©ration Turquoise bageze i Nyarushishi, batambagijwe inkambi yose, ari nako bagenda bafata amafoto.
Bugaragaza ko nyuma yâ€™iminsi igera kuri itatu, bari bamaze kumenya ahaherereye abagore nâ€™abakobwa, maze batangira kujya baza kubatwara bakajya kubasambanya ku ngufu, mu gihe bari bashinzwe kubarinda.
Uwitwa Kambogo Constance watanze ubuhamya yagize ati â€œAbafaransa bafataga abakobwa ku manywa yâ€™ihangu bakabasambanya, bazaga mu nkambi bakazenguruka, bakagenda basohora abakobwa muri za burende, maze bagatoranya abo bashaka, babeshya ko ari abo kujya kubakorera isuku.â€
â€œIbyo ariko twaje kumenya ko byabaga ari ibinyoma, ko ahubwo babaga bagiye kubasambanya ku ngufu. Mu kubatoranya bavugaga ko bakeneye abakobwa bafite mu nda hato nâ€™amabere mato. Bamara gutoranya abo bishimiye, bahitaga babajyana mu mahema yabo, babagezayo bakabasambanya ku ngufu, abana bakagaruka bataye umutwe.â€
Avuga ko mu basambanyijwe ku ngufu i Nyarushishi harimo uwitwa Claudine wari ufite hagati yâ€™imyaka 14 na 15. Kumusambanya ku ngufu byamuviriyemo guhungabana kugera abaye nkâ€™umusazi.
Bakorerwaga kandi ibikorwa byâ€™ubunyamaswa birimo kubashyiramo urusenda, kubasambanya mu kanwa, mu kibuno, bakabafata amafoto babambitse ubusa nâ€™ibindi.
Yagaragaje ko abarangije kubasambanya bahitaga babahererekanya biyamira ko ari beza, ko batandukanye nâ€™abakobwa nâ€™abagore bâ€™iwabo.
Avuga ko uretse mu Nkambi ya Nyarushishi, Abafaransa basambanyije ku ngufu abagore nâ€™abakobwa ku Kibuga cyâ€™Indege cya Kamembe, kuri Stade Kamarampaka nâ€™ahandi.
Uwitwa Habimana Jean Bosco wari Interahamwe, avuga yari asanzwe akorana bya bugufi nâ€™abasirikare bâ€™Abafaransa, dore ko bari baramuhaye nâ€™imbunda.
Yavuze ko Abafaransa bari muri Stade bamusabye kubashakira abakobwa bo gusambanya.
Muri Perefegitura ya Gitarama, ubu bushakashatsi bugaragaza ko abatutsi benshi bahungiye i Kabgayi bazi ko ariho bazabona umutekano. Byaje kugaragara ko bahungiye ubwayi mu kigunda, kuko abari bagize komite yâ€™umutekano muri Perefegitura ya Gitarama hamwe na ba Burugumesitiri bajyanaga lisiti yâ€™Abatutsi bagomba kwicwa, bakabapakira amabisi bakajya kubicira muri Ngororero.
Guhera mu matariki ya 20 Mata 1994, buri munsi ngo hazaga amabisi yo gutwara Abatutsi bajyaga kwicirwa ku Cyome ku ruzi rwa Nyabarongo, ahahoze ari Komini Kibilira na Satinsyi.
Hari nâ€™abandi Batutsi biciwe mu mashyamba yari hafi ya Kabgayi. Mu makomini ya Ntongwe na Mugina, Abatutsi baho bishwe nâ€™Interahamwe zifatanije nâ€™abasirikare baturutse mu kigo cya gisirikare i Gako nâ€™impunzi zâ€™Abarundi.
Bugaragaza ko bishwe urwâ€™agashyinyaguro, kuko impunzi zâ€™Abarundi zavanagamo imitima yâ€™Abatutsi zimaze kwica zikayotsa.
Kwicwa urwâ€™agashinyaguro byabereye ahantu hatandukanye, nko muri Komini Musambira, Segiteri ya Nyarubaka aho ababyeyi basabwe guhamba abana babo bâ€™abahungu ari bazima, bikozwe nâ€™uwari ukuriye Interahamwe yâ€™umugore witwa Mukangango.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo yâ€™Igihugu Ishinzwe kurwanya Jenoside (CNLG), Dr Bizimana Jean DamascÃ¨ne, yavuze ko gukora ubu bushakashatsi bifasha cyane cyane abakiri bato kumenya amateka yaranze igihugu cyabo, no kumenya ko bafite inshingano yo guhangana nâ€™abakomeje kubiba urwango.
Yagize ati â€œIcya mbere ubu bushakashatsi CNLG ikora bugaragaza uko Jenoside yateguwe ikanashyirwa mu bikorwa bifasha urubyiruko kumenya amateka kuko abenshi bari bataravuka cyangwa bakaba bari bakiri batoiâ€
â€œBibafasha kumenya umwihariko wa buri karere, nubwo yateguwe mu gihugu cyose ariko usanga buri gace gafite ubugome bwahakorewe, ikindi ni ukugira ngo bamenye icyo leta yâ€™ubumwe bwâ€™abanyarwanda yakoze kandi bafate nâ€™ingamba zo kubisigasira kuko haracyari abantu bakirangwa nâ€™ingebitekerezo ya Jenoside batarava muri urwo rwango.â€
CNLG yizeye ko ibi bitabo bizafasha kwerekana ko abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi babeshya.

Title: Amateka ya Nduga, igihugu cyometswe ku Rwanda hakoreshejwe amayeri
Body:
Nduga ni agace kagize amateka menshi mu Rwanda, kaba igihugu cyâ€™igihangage u Rwanda tuzi ubu rutabaho, kukomeka ku Rwanda bisaba abami bâ€™u Rwanda gukoresha amayeri arimo kohereza ingabo zigize abakwe nâ€™abageni, bahageze bahagaba igitero gikomeye.
Nduga ni agace kagize amateka menshi mu Rwanda, kaba igihugu cyâ€™igihangage u Rwanda tuzi ubu rutabaho, kukomeka ku Rwanda bisaba abami bâ€™u Rwanda gukoresha amayeri arimo kohereza ingabo zigize abakwe nâ€™abageni, bahageze bahagaba igitero gikomeye.
Mu bihe byo ha mbere, kugira ngo igihugu kigire ubuzima gatozi cyitwe igihugu, ni uko cyagombaga kuba gifite ibintu bitanu byâ€™ingenzi, aribyo; Kugira ubutaka, kugira abaturage bacyitirirwa, kugira ingoma ngabe nkâ€™ikirango cyâ€™igihugu cyigenga, kugira umwami ukigenga nâ€™ingabo zikirwanirira.
Nduga cyari kimwe mu bihugu 29 byari bigize u Rwanda rwo hambere, ndetse kikaba kimwe mu byari bikomeye.
Nkâ€™uko tubikesha igitabo â€œImizi yâ€™u Rwanda, Umutumba wa mbere â€™â€™ ndetse nâ€™igitabo â€œIntwari zâ€™imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiroâ€™â€™ byombi dukesha Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere mu Busizi, umuco nâ€™amateka yâ€™u Rwanda, igihugu cya Nduga cyahoze kizwi nka â€˜Nduga yâ€™Ababandaâ€™. Ni kimwe mu bihugu byahanzwe bwa mbere ku butaka u Rwanda rufite ubu, kuko yahanzwe ahasaga mu wa 600 nyuma ya Yezu.
Umwami uzwi mu mateka ya Nduga mu gihe cyâ€™umwaduko wâ€™ingoma Nyiginya ni uwitwa Kibanda cya Rurenge. Abami batwaye Nduga ni Kimezamiryango nâ€™umuhungu we bitirinwaga, Kibanda, Sabugabo, Nkuba na Mashira.
Igihugu cya Nduga, cyari giherereye mu Rwanda rwâ€™Amajyepfo no hagati, kuri ubu kikaba cyari gikusanyije uturere twa Kamonyi, Muhanga, Ruhango na Nyanza, imirenge imwe nâ€™imwe yo mu Karere ka Gisagara ndetse na Huye.
Ingoma ya Nduga yategekwaga nâ€™Ababanda bafite igisekuruza cyabo kuri Kidanda cya Rurenge, ufite inkomoko mu Basinga bâ€™Abasangwabutaka, kikaba cyari gifite uturere tune.
Mu Turere twari tugize igihugu cya Nduga, harimo Akarere kâ€™Amayaga ariko karere kari kanini kuko kari gasanganyije igihugu cyose cya Nduga yâ€™Amajyepfo, ushyizemo umurongo ugabanyamo kabiri.
Akarere kâ€™Amayaga kari gaherereye mu Mirenge ya Runda, Gacurabwenge, Rugalika, Nyarubaka, Mugina na Nyamiyaga yo mu Karere ka Kamonyi, Imirenge ya Mbuye, Ruhango, Kinazi na Ntongwe yo mu Karere ka Ruhango nâ€™imirenge ya Busoro, Kigoma, Muyira, Kibilizi na Ntyazo yo mu Karere ka Nyanza. Hari kandi nâ€™Imirenge ya Mamba, Gikonko na Musha yo mu Karere ka Gisagara no mu Mirenge yâ€™Akarere ka Huye irimo Ruhashya, Rusatira na Kinazi.
Mu Turere twari tugize igihugu cya Nduga, harimo nâ€™Akarere kâ€™Akabagali kari aka kabiri mu bugari. Aho kari gaherereye kuri ubu ni mu Mirenge ya Kigoma, Simbi na Rwaniro yo mu Karere ka Huye, Imirenge ya Busasamana, Rwabicuma, Cyabakamyi na Mukingo yo mu Karere ka Nyanza nâ€™Imirenge ya Bweramana, Byimana, Kabagali, Kinihira na Mwendo yo mu Karere ka Ruhango.
Mu turere twari tugize igihugu cya Nduga kandi harimo nâ€™Akarere kâ€™Amarangara kari gaherereye mi mirenge ya Shyogwe, Nyamabuye, Muhanga, Mushishiro, Nyarusange na Cyeza yo mu Karere ka Muhanga nâ€™Imirenge ya Musambira na Nyarubaka yo mu Karere ka Kamonyi.
Akarere ka kane kari kagize Nduga ni akarere ka Ndiza kari gaherereye mu Mirenge ya Rukoma, Karama, Kayumba, Kayenzi na Ngamba yo mu Karere ka Kamonyi nâ€™imirenge ya Rugendabari, Kabacuzi, Kibangu, Rongi, Nyabinoni, Kiyumba yo mu Karere ka Muhanga.
Ku ikubitiro icyo gihugu cyahanzwe na Kimezamiryango cya Rurenge wari ufite gakondo nkuru yâ€™Abamezamiryango ku rutare rwa Mukingo ( Ubu ni mu mu Murenge wa Mukingo wo mu Karere ka Nyanza).
Nyuma yaje kuzungurwa nâ€™umuhungu we Kimezamiryango, waje kunyagwa igihugu na se wabo Kibanda, wari utuye i Gisari na Kibanda.
Kibanda cya Rurenge ari nawe murumuna wa Kimezamiryango cya Rurenge, yari yarahawe ubutware na Mukuru we Kimezamiryango bwo kumutwarira Akarere kâ€™Amayaga, ari nako kari kanini mu gihugu cya Nduga. Kibanda, akaba umugabo ugira amakarikari nâ€™ubuhangange butisukirwa, ku buryo izina se Rurenge yari yaramwise, yiyongereyeho izina rya â€œGisariâ€ bituruka ku nshinga â€œGusarikaâ€ bivuga â€œKutisukirwaâ€
Kibanda yaje gufata imisozi yari atuyeho yo mu Karere kâ€™Amayaga, ayitirira amazina ye yombi ya Gisari (Kitisukirwa) na Kibanda. Ayo mazina arahahama kugeza na bugingo nâ€™ubu. Gisari na Kibanda, ni imidugudu ituranye yo mu Kagali ka Kinazi yo mu Murenge wa Kinazi wo mu Karere ka Ruhango.
Mu gice gikurikiyeho, tuzabataturira, amateka yâ€™iherezo ryâ€™igihugu cya Nduga, nâ€™uko cyometswe ku butaka bwâ€™u Rwanda.

Title: Ubuzima bwâ€™indaya zâ€™i Kigali mu myaka ya 1970
Body:
Ibihe byose bigira abâ€™ubu, abâ€™imico isanzwe nâ€™idasanzwe, ibangamye nâ€™itabangamye yose icyo iba ihuriyeho ni ugutuma ubuzima bugenda mu gihugu.
Ibihe byose bigira abâ€™ubu, abâ€™imico isanzwe nâ€™idasanzwe, ibangamye nâ€™itabangamye yose icyo iba ihuriyeho ni ugutuma ubuzima bugenda mu gihugu.
Abahanga bavuga ko uburaya ari umwe mu myuga ikuze kurusha indi ku Isi nubwo nta bihamya bifatika, ariko bigaragara ko wakozwe kuva kera dore ko na Bibiliya iwuvugaho.
Abagore bibohoye, Femmes Libres de Kigali, ni izina ryari iryâ€™indaya i Kigali mu myaka ya 1970, iterambere ryâ€™Abanyaburayi ritangiye gusakara muri Afurika, imijyi itangiye gutera imbere, imishinga yâ€™abanyamahanga yisukiranya ubutitsa.
Ni umwuga wamye ukorwa mu bwihisho mu masaha yâ€™ijoro cyangwa ahihishe kandi uwukora ntiyishimire izina â€˜indayaâ€™, byatumye abinjiraga mu buraya barangije amashuri mu myaka ya 1970 bahindura izina, bakiyita â€˜Femmes Libres de Kigaliâ€™.
Ni umwuga wakozwe mu bihe bigoye ikoranabuhanga ritaraza, telefone zigendanwa zikiri mu mishinga, internet ikiri mu igeragezwa.
Icyo gihe nibwo hahimbwe imvugo nyinshi zikoreshwa nâ€™ubu nko â€˜Gutega indegeâ€™ nubwo ubu ryahindutse iryâ€™abafundi bahurira hamwe bategereje ubaha akazi mu gitondo.
Inyandiko â€œFemmes libres de Kigaliâ€ ya Marijke Vandersypen yasohotse mu kinyamakuru â€˜Cahiers dâ€™Ã©tudes africainesâ€, volume 17 nÂ°65, 1977, igaragaza ko uko iterambere ryiyongeraga i Kigali, abakora uburaya barushagaho kwiyongera ahanini bitewe nâ€™umubare munini wâ€™abavaga mu cyaro bajya mu mijyi.
Muri iyo myaka, utubari twari tumaze kwiyongera mu duce twâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali twarabicaga bigacika nko mu Kiyovu, Nyamirambo no mu mujyi rwagati.
Ubwiyongere bwâ€™abaturage mu Mujyi wa Kigali bugaragarira ku kuba abari batuye Kigali mu 1962 bari munsi ya 38,000, nyamara mu 1975 bari bageze ku 90,000.
Indaya zâ€™i Kigali zabaga mu byiciro, harimo iziciriritse zabaga mu bice bya Nyamirambo nâ€™ahandi hatuwe cyane, indaya ziyubashye zakoreraga cyane mu Kiyovu zigataha mu mujyi rwagati, indaya zo mu biro zakoraga nyuma yâ€™akazi nâ€™indaya zigenga zabaga ahanini zigizwe nâ€™abagore babuze abagabo zikorera mu rugo.
Utubari nitwo twabonekagamo indaya cyane twaba uduciriritse nâ€™utworoheje, hakaba na ba nyirâ€™utubari bazifashishaga mu gukurura abakiliya, bamwe bakaziha akazi.
Marijke Vandersypen mu nyandiko ye yavuze ko ubwo yakoraga ubushakashatsi, yasanze ahazwi nka Camp Swahili i Nyamirambo akabari byari bizwi ko habonekamo indaya nyinshi, abazishaka bifite bagaparika imodoka bakajya gutoranya izo bashaka, bakongera bakagenda.
Indaya ziciriritse
Ni indaya ahanini zabaga zigizwe nâ€™abakobwa baje baturutse mu bice byâ€™icyaro, baje gushaka amaramuko i Kigali.
Benshi muri aba bakobwa babaga mu duce dutuwe cyane, bagakodesha inzu ahanini zâ€™ibyumba bibiri ziri hagati ya 500 Frw na 1000 Frw ku kwezi. Bamwe babanaga ari nka babiri cyangwa barenga.
Marijke Vandersypen avuga ko nkâ€™i Nyamirambo hari inzu yâ€™ibyumba bitatu yasanze hacumbitsemo indaya zigera ku icumi.
Indaya zo muri icyo cyiciro akenshi zabaga mu nzu nto zâ€™icyumba kimwe cyangwa bibiri zitabamo sima. Nta kandi kazi abo bakobwa bagiraga uretse kwirirwa bazenguruka mu tubari bareba ko hari uwabareba irihumye. Akenshi aba bakobwa bahoraga bimuka kubera kubura ubukode.
Nubwo nta mubare nyawo uzwi wâ€™abari mu cyiciro nkâ€™icyo icyo gihe, ubuhamya bamwe muri bo bagiye baha umwanditsi bugaragaza ko bari benshi.
Icyo cyiciro cyabagamo izindi ndaya zo zabaga zifite akazi mu tubari, abagabo bazishimye bakazitahana mu ijoro. Ni ibanga akenshi babaga baziranyeho na ba shebuja babahaye akazi, kuko byatumaga nâ€™abakiliya biyongera.
Nubwo bose babaga bari mu cyiciro kimwe, ahanini batarageze mu ishuri cyangwa baracikirije amashuri, aba bo ngo ntibakundaga guhura nâ€™ubuzima bubi nkâ€™izindi ndaya ziciriritse, kuko bashoboraga kwiyishyurira amacumbi rimwe na rimwe bakaba bafite ayâ€™ubuntu babamo mu tubari bakoramo.
Marie, indaya yiyubashye yakoreraga ikigo cyigenga ifite imyaka 28 ubwo inyandiko yasohokaga mu 1977, yagize iti â€œBariya bakobwa (baciriritse) bafata umugabo wese babonye nta gutoranya. Ntawe basubiza inyuma apfa kuba azanye amafaranga. Bahura nâ€™abantu bavuye hose ku buryo bashobora no kubazanira indwara bakabanduza. Hari nubwo bibaviramo kubura urubyaro kubera izo ndwara.â€
Izo ndaya ziciriritse akenshi zabaga zifite abana. Nyuma yo kubyara, abenshi kubera kubura umwanya nâ€™ubushobozi bwo kwita ku bana babo, baboherezaga mu cyaro aho baturutse. Abatabikoze gutyo bagashaka abakozi (ababoyi) boroheje bo kubitaho.
Nubwo mu kazi kazo kubyara byabaga ari ikintu gishoboka cyane dore ko imibonano mpuzabitsina ikingiye yasaga nkâ€™itabaho, benshi muri izo ndaya zangaga kubyara kubi.
ThÃ©rÃ¨se wari ufite imyaka 19, yari atwite inda ya mbere. Yaje i Kigali avuye i Butare ari naho avuka, yanabanje gukorerayo uburaya.
Yagize ati â€œUbukene ubu buranyishe. Nta byishimo nkigira, nta mugabo ukindeba, ubu nirirwa mu madeni. Nsigaye nywa amazi masa. Nizeye ko nimara kubyara, nzongera nkasa neza, nkambara utwenda tunyegereye nâ€™inkweto ndende. Nizeye kongera gukundwa no kuri IBIS (hotel). Mama yambwiye ko azanderera umwana.â€
Amasaha ya saa kumi nâ€™imwe zâ€™umugoroba, ngo nibwo indaya zâ€™i Kigali zabaga zivuye mu rugo zasokoje, zambaye amajipo magufi cyangwa amapantalo zigatangira kuzenguruka utubari zishaka abakiliya cyangwa zikajya â€˜gutega indegeâ€™ bitewe nâ€™aho zahisemo abazishaka bazajya bazisanga.
