Nta mafaranga yihariye indaya ziciriritse zakoreraga muri icyo gihe ariko ahanini yabaga ari hagati ya 100 Frw na 400 Frw mu ijoro rimwe, akiyongera cyangwa akagabanyuka bitewe nâ€™ubwiza bwâ€™umukobwa.
ThÃ©rÃ¨se yavuze ko akenshi abakobwa bo mu tubari bishyuzaga mbere umugabo ushaka kubatahana kugira ngo akazi nikaba kenshi akabura umwanya wo kujyana nâ€™uwo mugabo, umugabo ataza kwisubiraho akajya gushaka abandi, ahubwo agombe amutegereza cyangwa arambirwe yigendere amafaranga ayasigarane.
Akenshi abakozi bo mu rugo bâ€™abakobwa bakorera indaya ziciriritse, nabo byarangiraga bavuyemo indaya kubera kwigana ba nyirabuja. Izo ndaya zo mu rugo zatangiraga ziryamana nâ€™amabandi, abacuruza ikarito nâ€™abandi basore baciriritse badashobora kwigondera indaya nkuru.
Indaya zo mu Kiyovu
Kiyovu niko kari agace gakomeye kandi kiyubashye muri Kigali. Kari agace kabonekamo utubari twiza, dusurwa nâ€™abadipolomate, abanyaburayi nâ€™abandi bifite.Wahasangaga abakobwa biyubashye nubwo nâ€™indaya ziciriritse zajyaga zihaza gake.
Ubwiza bwâ€™umukobwa mu Kiyovu nibwo bwamuzaniraga abakiliya cyangwa uburyo azi kubyinisha neza abagabo mu kabari. Hari ababonaga abagabo kubera ubwitonzi bagaragaza cyangwa se uburyo bazimo Igifaransa ku buryo babasha kuganira nâ€™abanyamahanga.
Abakobwa biyubashye bicururizaga mu Kiyovu abenshi babaga baba mu mujyi rwagati , bamwe baba bonyine cyangwa babana na bagenzi babo. Babaga mu nzu zimeze neza, zirimo sima zisize nâ€™irangi. Bakodeshaga inzu zihenze ku mafaranga agera ku 3000 ku kwezi.
Ni abakobwa babaga bazi kwiyambika neza, bahora bahinduranya imyenda bikaba akarusho ubwo byabaga bigeze mu mpera zâ€™icyumweru.
Benshi babaga bifuza abakiliya bâ€™abanyamahanga. Nubwo indaya nyinshi zitifuza kubyara zikiri muri ako kazi, izo mu Kiyovu zabyifuzaga igihe zahuye nâ€™abo banyamahanga kuko kubyarana nabo, byabaga bivuze guhabwa indezo itubutse.
Hari uwavuze uburyo yaryamanye kenshi nâ€™Umufaransa wabaga i Butare, ngo arebe ko yamutera inda azabyare umwana wâ€™umuzungu, birangira amubyaye se aramwanga, no mu cyaro aho yamujyanye kurererwa ahabwa akato.
Ati â€œUbundi umwana wâ€™umuzungu akwiriye kwitabwaho na se, akamujyana ku ishuri. Ntiyakabaye ahinga, arya ibijumba nâ€™ibishyimbo. Ubu umubonye wese amutunga urutoki, ngo dore kiriya cyana, nyamara umwana wirabura iyo ari mu bandi ntawe umumenya.â€
Abakobwa bo mu Kiyovu akenshi bakundaga gutemberera mu yindi Mijyi nka Gisenyi na Butare. Basohokeraga mu tubari two mu Kiyovu mu minsi isanzwe aho Primus yaguraga 30 Frw.
Mu Kiyovu, Abataliyani ngo bari bazwiho kwishyura indaya menshi naho Abafaransa bakaba ingona ku ifaranga.
Umutaliyani ngo yashoboraga kwishyura 3000 Frw mu ijoro rimwe mu gihe Umufaransa atarenzaga 1000 Frw. Abakobwa bazi ubwenge bo ntibishyuzaga abo banyamahanga ahubwo babigiragaho inshuti kugira ngo bazabitabaze mu minsi mibi.
ThÃ©rÃ¨se ati â€œUmuzungu iyo yagukunze ufite ababyeyi bâ€™abakene abubakira inzu kugira ngo nimujyana iwanyu azakirirwe mu nzu nziza aho yabasha kubona aho yicara. Iyo urwaye agushakira imiti igufasha. Iyo aguhaye amafaranga aba ari menshi umuryango wawe ugatera imbere. Iyo asubiye iwabo agusigira imodoka cyangwa inzu, ni ibyo tuba tubashakaho.â€
Hari nâ€™ababaga bategereje ko abo banyamahanga bazabagira abagore, bagasezera ku bukene burundu.
Muri iki cyiciro cyâ€™indaya habagamo nâ€™amashyari, uwo bagenzi be badashaka bakagurira amabandi akamukubita. Abazi ko bagezweho muri iyo minsi akenshi ngo bashakaga abasore bâ€™ibigango bâ€™abashomeri bo kubaherekeza, bakabishyura.
Indaya zo mu biro
Ni abakobwa cyangwa abagore babaga bafite akazi keza mu bigo byigenga cyangwa ibya Leta. Babaga bazi kuvuga neza Igifaransa, bazi aho igihugu kigeze nâ€™ibindi. Abenshi babaga ari abahembwa amafaranga atari menshi, bagahitamo kuba indaya ziyubashye ngo babashe gukemura ibibazo bahura nabyo.
Marie watanze ubuhamya, icyo gihe yari indaya yiyubashye ikorera ikigo cyigenga.
Yagize ati â€œAbakobwa cyangwa abagore batinya kwitwa indaya, bakifuza kugira undi mwuga ubarinda kwitwa gutyo. Nkâ€™iyo abanyamahanga bahuriye nâ€™umukobwa mu kabari cyangwa muri hoteli, barabaza ngo â€˜wowe ukora heâ€, undi yaba ahafite akahavugana ishema ati nkora aha nâ€™aha. Umunyamahanga yaba yamukunze bagahera aho baba inshuti.â€
Abafite isura nziza hari ubwo bagiraga inshuti nyinshi kandi nziza, rimwe na rimwe amafaranga bakorera mu buraya akaruta kure ayo bahembwa ku kwezi, bakaba bava mu kazi kabahemba ku kwezi bakaba indaya butwi.
Camille 25, ni umwe mu ndaya zo mu biro Marijke Vandersypen yasanze atongana nâ€™indaya iciriritse.
Camille yagira ati â€œWa mushenzi we , mwe mucunganwa nâ€™ijoro ngo mubashe kubaho . Twe dukora ku manywa nta pfunwe , twajya mu karuhuko mugatangira amanjwe. Nta soni mufite zo kunyita indaya?â€
Abo bakobwa akenshi babagaho mu buryo bwiyubashye kurusha abo mu Kiyovu. Babaga mu nzu nziza rimwe na rimwe umwe akaba yaba mu nzu wenyine kandi isa neza. Inzu babagamo zabaga zikodeshwa hagati ya 3500 Frw na 5000 Frw.
Abafite abana, babaga babaho neza, biga ku bigo byiza. Igihe abana babo bamaze gukura, hari abahitagamo kubajyana mu mashuri meza aho biga babamo kugira ngo babone uko bikorera akazi neza.
Indaya zo mu biro nta wapfaga kuzisanga mu tubari, akenshi zabaga zifite inshuti zâ€™abanyamahanga zijya gusura akazi karangiye, akaba ariho bagorobereza banywa inzoga zihenze nka Martini na Whisky, banaganira ku buzima bwâ€™igihugu.
Ni indaya zitapfaga kwishyuza ahubwo abo bagabo zagize inshuti akenshi babaga ari abanyamahanga cyangwa abaherwe batezeho byinshi kurusha amafaranga yâ€™ako kanya.
Bernadette umwe muri bo yagize ati â€œnyuma yâ€™igihe uramubwira uti nagize ibyago, ndashaka gusura mama ararwaye cyane, akaguha ibihumbi 10, cyangwa ibihumbi 15 ingunga imwe. Ayo urayabika ukazayakoramo igikorwa kigaragara. Hari nâ€™ubwo umubwira uti ndashaka kugura tourne disque, akaguha ibihumbi 20.â€
Izo ndaya hari ubwo zakoreraga amafaranga ashobora gutuma ziyubakira inzu, zirihira abana bazo amashuri agezweho , zigura imodoka, zitangira ubucuruzi nâ€™ibindi.
Indaya zigenga
Iki cyiciro cyabagamo akenshi abagore batanye nâ€™abagabo, bafite ubucuruzi buciriritse nkâ€™utubari two mu rugo kandi batuye mu duce tubamo abantu benshi.
Ni abagore bakoraga icyo bashatse igihe bashakiye dore ko nta mugabo wabaga abagenga. Abakiliya bâ€™abo bagore akenshi babaga ari abantu basanzwe ari inshuti zabo cyangwa ari ba bagabo badakunda ko hari ababonana nâ€™indaya ku muhanda cyangwa mu kabari.
Akenshi abo bagore babaga bafite abagabo baryamana nabo bazwi, adashobora kuryamana nâ€™abandi. Abo nibo yifashishaga bamuha ibyo akeneye.
Mu Kinyarwanda cyiza wavuga ko uwo mugore yabaga afite abinjira, baza mu masaha yâ€™umugoroba, akabari akagafunga bakinyabya mu gikari akaba ariho banywera.
Catherine wabaga muri Camp Swahili i Nyamirambo yagize ati â€œHari nkâ€™ubwo umugabo ava i Butare tuziranye, akaza kunsura, akavuga ati â€˜Uriya ni umugore utagira umugabo, niho ndararaâ€™. Akenshi aba ari abagabo bâ€™aha mu mujyi , akaba asanzwe aza hano nzi ko isaha nâ€™isaha azamfasha. Ntiyabona amafaranga ngo anyibagirwe.â€
Muri abo bagore bâ€™indaya, hari ababashaga kugira amahirwe bakabona abagabo muri ako kazi, bagashinga ingo. Ni abagore batinywaga cyane nâ€™abandi bagore bafite abagabo, ntawe ubagire inshuti ngo batazamutwarira umugabo.
Mu gitabo AIDS: Responses, Interventions and Care, hagaragazwa ko mu ndaya zari ziri mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu 1985, 88Â % byâ€™izabashije gupima icyo gihe bazisanzemo virusi itera SIDA.
Hagati ya 1982 na 1983, Leta yakoze imikwabu mu ndaya zo mu mujyi wa Kigali inyinshi zirafungwa hagamijwe kuzihashya.

Title: Bamporiki yanyuzwe nâ€™igitaramo Nyarwanda cyâ€™abiga muri Green Hills Academy abizeza kugisangiza Abanyarwanda
Body:
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™Urubyiruko nâ€™Umuco, Bamporiki Edouard, yanyuzwe nâ€™igitaramo Nyarwanda cyâ€™abanyeshuri biga muri Green Hills Academy (GHA) gisigasira umuco gakondo kikanatoza urubyiruko gukunda igihugu, abizeza ubufasha bushoboka kugira ngo bagisangize Abanyarwanda bose.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™Urubyiruko nâ€™Umuco, Bamporiki Edouard, yanyuzwe nâ€™igitaramo Nyarwanda cyâ€™abanyeshuri biga muri Green Hills Academy (GHA) gisigasira umuco gakondo kikanatoza urubyiruko gukunda igihugu, abizeza ubufasha bushoboka kugira ngo bagisangize Abanyarwanda bose.
Iki gitaramo cyabaye ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 7 Gashyantare ku cyicaro cyâ€™iri shuri, i Nyarutarama mu Karere ka Gasabo cyateguwe mu rwego rwo gusigasira umuco Nyarwanda no gutoza urubyiruko gukunda igihugu no kucyitangira igihe bibaye ngombwa.
Gikubiye mu cyo bise â€˜Rwanda Festival Dayâ€™, umunsi urangwa nâ€™ibikorwa bitandukanye bijyanye nâ€™umuco Nyarwanda birimo imikino nâ€™imbyino gakondo, ibikoresho bya Kinyarwanda, gusoma Ikinyarwanda, imigani nâ€™insigamugani nâ€™ibindi.
Aba banyeshuri bafite ubuhanga mu mikino nâ€™imbyino gakondo zigaruka ku mateka nâ€™umuco Nyarwanda, bakinnye umukino ugaruka ku butwari bwâ€™umukobwa Nyiramateke Robwa, wemeye guhara ubuzima bwe nâ€™ubwâ€™umwana yari atwitiye Abanya-Gisaka aho kumubyara ngo azabe ariwe ugaba igitero ku Rwanda.
Bamporiki yashimye uburyo abanyeshuri ba Green Hills Academy bakinnye imikino nâ€™imbyino gakondo, byimakaza umuco Nyarwanda, byâ€™umwihariko bikabaremamo umuco wo gukunda igihugu.
Ati â€œNdifuza ko munyemereye uyu mukino twazawereka Abanyarwanda benshi. Ubwo u Rwanda rwajyaga mu icuraburindi, imikino nkâ€™iyi ntiyari yemewe. Imibyinire nkâ€™iyi, imivugo nâ€™ibitekerezo nkâ€™ibi ntibyari byemewe.â€
â€œNiba mushobora gutegura imikino nkâ€™iyi ntabwo bikwiriye guherera hano. Minisiteri yâ€™Urubyiruko nâ€™Umuco yiteguye kubafasha kuyikinira mu cyumba kigari, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Itangazamakuru kikamenyesha Abanyarwanda ibyo mufite hano. Ndabibasezeranyije.â€
Bamporiki yavuze ko mu byâ€™ukuri imikino yâ€™abanyeshuri bo muri Green Hills Academy ijyanye nâ€™inshingano afite zo guteza imbere impano zishingiye ku muco Nyarwanda no gukunda igihugu muri rusange.
Ati â€œMuri gukora neza, murimo kunyorohereza akazi, murimo kuganisha u Rwanda aho rugomba kuba ruri. Icyerekezo 2050 tugiye kwinjiramo vuba aha nari ndimo kubona ishusho yâ€™u Rwanda nyarwo tuzaba dufite mu myaka 30 iri imbere. Murakoze kuri utu dushya.â€
Minisitiri Bamporiki yabwiye aba banyeshuri, abarezi nâ€™ababyeyi babo ko kuba u Rwanda uyu munsi rufite abantu bashobora kwitangira igihugu nâ€™umuco wacyo bitanga icyizere ko utazazimira.
Ati â€œAbakurambere bacu baravuze ngo imishinga yose yapfuye ni iyo bene yo banze gupfira. Icyatumye uyu muco wacu wari ugiye gupfa ni uko hari abanze kuwupfira bakidagadura uko bashaka ariko ntabwo u Rwanda rugipfuye kuko Inkotanyi zaruvanye ku manga, ziduha umurage utuma tuvuga amateka yacu twemye.â€
Umwarimu wâ€™umuco muri Green Hills Academy, Nahimana Serge, yavuze ko iki gikorwa kigamije guteza imbere umuco Nyarwanda byâ€™umwihariko no gutoza abana gukunda igihugu.
Ati â€œTugira abanyeshuri bo mu bihugu bitandukanye bafite nâ€™imico itandukanye ariko tukagira umwihariko wo kugira umunsi umwe wihariye ku Rwanda.â€
â€œAbana bacu biga Ikinyarwanda kuva mu mashuri yâ€™incuke kugeza mu yisumbuye nâ€™isomo ryâ€™umuco. Ni amasomo ikigo cyacu duha agaciro ku buryo umwana wese agira amahirwe yo kugira icyo yunguka ku Rwanda, yaba Umunyarwanda cyangwa umunyamahanga.â€
Umuyobozi wa Green Hill Academy, Lisa Biasillo, yanyuzwe nâ€™uburyo abanyeshuri bakinanye ubuhanga imikino nâ€™imbyino bitandukanye, ashimira abagize uruhare mu gutegura iki gitaramo.
Green Hills Academy ni ishuri ryâ€™ababyeyi riherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ryashinzwe mu 1997. Rifite icyiciro cyâ€™incuke, icyâ€™amashuri abanza nâ€™ayisumbuye, bahabwa amasomo mu ndimi zâ€™Igifaransa, Icyongereza, Ikidage nâ€™Ikinyarwanda.
Mu mashuri yisumbuye abanyeshuri bategurirwa gukora ibizamini mpuzamahanga nâ€™abarimu bâ€™inzobere baturuka mu bihugu bitandukanye ku Isi.
 Abitegura gusoza umwaka wa Gatandatu bakurikirana amasomo mpuzamahanga muri porogaramu yitwa â€œInternational Baccalaureateâ€ (IB), abafasha kwimenyereza kuvugira mu ruhame, akanabategura kuzaba abayobozi beza no gukomeza amasomo yabo muri za kaminuza hirya no hino ku Isi.
Amafoto: Dushimimana Ami Pacifique

Title: Uko Abanyoro bateye u Rwanda, bakabura uko barusohokamo bikarangira bamwe babaye Abanyarwanda
Body:
U Rwanda ni igihugu cyabaye igihangange kuva kera, gito mu buso ariko kikaba kinini mu mitekerereze ku buryo ibihugu byahoze bituranye narwo kuva kera biruzi nkâ€™ishyanga ritisukirwa.
U Rwanda ni igihugu cyabaye igihangange kuva kera, gito mu buso ariko kikaba kinini mu mitekerereze ku buryo ibihugu byahoze bituranye narwo kuva kera biruzi nkâ€™ishyanga ritisukirwa.
Ubuhanga bwarwo wabubaza Abanyoro, baruteye baje kwihimura bakahavana amateka na nâ€™ubu ataribagirana, biviramo bamwe muri bo kuyoba no kuyoberwa iyo baje baturuka, bagahitamo kuguma mu Rwanda ari ingazurwamuheto.
Ibyo bisekuru byâ€™Abanyoro babuze inzira nâ€™abafashwe mpiri ubwo bateraga u Rwanda, byaje kuhamara igihe bihinduka Abanyarwanda bo mu bwoko bwâ€™Indara nâ€™Abasigari bazwi cyane mu bice byo mu Majyaruguru nâ€™Iburengerazuba bwâ€™Amajyepfo.
Ayo moko abiri cyangwa imiryango migari, yaje yiyongera ku yandi 24 yari asanzwe mu Rwanda.
Ibitabo birimo icyitwa â€œIntwari zâ€™imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiroâ€™â€™ nâ€™igitabo â€œIyoroka ryâ€™Abanyarwanda, inkomoko yâ€™imiryango migariâ€ byombi byâ€™umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, bigaragaza ko Abanyoro bagabye ibitero ku Rwanda mu bihe byâ€™ingoma ya Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi, ahasaga mu wa 1411.
Abanyoro babanje kugaba igitero cyabo cya mbere mu Rwanda ku ngoma yâ€™umwami Kigeli Mukobanya ahasaga mu wa 1378, baratsindwa. Uko gutsindwa kwabasigiye umujinya nkâ€™ubwoko bwashakaga kwigarurira ibindi bihugu mu karere. Baragiye barisuganya bategura ikindi gitero cya kabiri, ari nacyo bagabye ku ngoma ya Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi, umuhungu wa Mukobanya.
Icyo gihe Abatasi bâ€™u Rwanda babwiye Mibambwe I Sekarongoro ko atazatsinda Abanyoro kuko bari benshi bikabije ugereranyije nâ€™abaje mu gitero cya mbere. Bwa kabiri, bari baje ari ingabo 10.000 mu gihe ingabo za Sekarongoro zo zari 4.000 gusa.
Icyo gihe Sekarongoro yagerageje kwitabaza umwami wâ€™u Bugesera Nsoro II Sangano, na Kimenyi II Shumbusho wâ€™I Gisaka na Mashira ya Nkuba ya Sabugabo, umwami wa Nduga,. Ibyo bihugu byanze kumutabara, bimutera utwatsi maze Sekarongoro abonye asumbirijwe kandi u Rwanda rwe rushobora gusibama, ahitamo guhunga nâ€™ingabo ze, abaturage ndetse nâ€™amatungo berekeza i Bunyabungo (mu ntara ya Kivu yâ€™Epfo ). U Bunyabungo bwatwarwaga na Mulira Muhoyo wari ku ngoma muri ibyo bihe, amutuza mu murwa mukuru wâ€™u Bunyabungo, ari wo Rusozi ( Bukavu yâ€™ubu) abandi banyarwanda batura ku nkengero zâ€™umugezi wa Rusizi.
Abanyoro baraje basanga Sekarongoro yagiye kera, bayogoza igihugu, batwara inka nkeya zishaje zahasigaye, batera Kimenyi wâ€™ i Gisaka ariko ntibyakomera, batera u Bugesera umwami Sangano baramufata baramuboha baramujyana ngo ajye kubereka aho umuturanyi we Sekarongoro yagiye.
Bafashe urwo rugendo kugeza aho bagereye mu Kinyaga aho bari bitegeye ingabo za Sekarongoro, nuko Sangano wâ€™u Bugesera bamwicira mu ishyamba rya Ngiga barenga bareba mu Kinyaga aho Sekarongoro yari aganje nâ€™abaturage be.
Amateka avuga ko Abanyoro bamaze imyaka ine bidegembya ku butaka bwâ€™u Rwanda mu gihe Sekarongoro nâ€™abaturage be bari barahunze.
Abanyoro bakurikiranye Mibambwe Sekarongoro i Bunyabungo, Mashira abaha inzira, ariko Mibambwe Sekarongoro yari yagarutse hakuno yâ€™umugezi wa Rusizi mu ngoma yâ€™u Busozo kuko Abanyabungo bari birukanye Abanyarwanda, kuko imfizi ya Sekarongoro yari yishe iya Muhoyo, Abanyarwanda barwana nâ€™Abanyabungo, ndetse Nyiramibambwe i Nyabadaha arahagwa.
Ubwo Abanyoro bari bahingutse, Abanyarwanda babanje kubatinya kubera ubwinshi bwabo. Bigeze ku mugoroba, Abanyarwanda biga ubucakura bwo gusambura amazu yâ€™ibyatsi yari hafi aho, bahira nâ€™ibindi byatsi ahari habazengurutse. Ubwo Abanyarwanda batangiye kugenda banyonyomba bigendera nkâ€™abahunze, nyamara barimo kuzenguruka ibirindiro byâ€™Abanyoro, mu rwego rwo kurema igico cyo kubata hagati.
 Aho abanyoro bari bakambitse bategereje gukoma imbarutso ngo rwambikane bakabona abanyarwanda bagenda uruhongohongo, bakagira ngo ni ukubatinya babahunga. Igihe kigeze, Abanyarwanda batwitse bya byatsi byâ€™inzu barundanyije, Abanyoro aho bakambitse bashya ubwoba batangira guhunga batazi nâ€™iyo bajya kuko ako karere batari bakamenyereye.
Umunyoro uhunze kubera ubwoba bwâ€™ikome ryâ€™umuriro yabonaga, akiroha mu muheto wâ€™ingabo zâ€™u Rwanda wahogeraga nâ€™amacumu avuza ubuhuha nuko ingabo zâ€™u Rwanda zica Abanyoro umusubizo, igitinyiro bashakaga muri Afurika yâ€™Iburasirazuba kiyoyoka burundu.
Uko bigaragara mu gitero cya kabiri Abanyoro bagabye mu Rwanda, haguye Abanyoro benshi kurusha abahaguye mu gitero cya mbere. Abanyoro bagiye barorongotana bahunga, bamwe batungukira mu Bungwe ahitwa Buhanga, babura inzira yabahuza nâ€™ababo, baguma mu ishyamba riri i Burwi bararikonda, bararitura. Abo Banyoro nibo biswe Indara [abantu bayobye inzira], nâ€™aho batuye hakurizaho kwitwa â€œBuhangaâ€“ndaraâ€.
Bamwe muri bo bahafatiwe mpiri abandi barayobagurika baza gutura mu Rwanda mu bice byâ€™Amajyaruguru mu turere twa Burera na Musanze, bakaba ari bo bagize ubwoko bwitwa â€œAbasigari cyangwa se Basigiâ€™â€™. Abandi banyoro barokotse umuheto wa Sekarongoro bagerageje kwambuka umugezi wâ€™Umuvumba uri mu karere ka Nyagatare, nuko bageze mu Nkore umwami waho Ntare abahukamo arabica arabatsemba, niko kumuhimba â€™â€™Kitabanyoro (Cyicabanyoro)â€™â€™.
Imiryango migari yâ€™Abasigari nâ€™Indara, ni ibisigara byâ€™Abanyoro basize mu Rwanda bikomoka mu gitero cya kabiri bahagabye. Ni ukuvuga ko Indara nâ€™Abasigari ari Ubuvivagiza bwâ€™Abanyoro baba mu Rwanda. Iyo miryango yabaye imwe mu miryango migari ituye mu Rwanda mu buryo buyigwiririye kuko ntihagira inkomoko nâ€™ubwo ihatuye igihe kirekire.
Aho imiryango yâ€™Abasigari yiganje kuri ubu ni mu Turere twa Burera na Musanze mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyaruguru naho imiryango yâ€™Indara, igatura mu Turere twa Gisagara na Nyaruguru. Abasigari cyangwa se Abasigi, nibo bakunze kwiyita â€œAbareraâ€™â€™ izina bakomora kuri Sekuruza wabo â€œMureraâ€™â€™.
Mu nzu yâ€™Abarera, ari nayo nzu imwe Abasigari bibumbiyemo, niho hakomotse umutware umwe rukumbi ukomoka mu Basigari watwaye mu gihugu cyâ€™u Rwanda, ari we Kabanda ka Mivumbi ya Ndabaramiye wo mu Basigari bâ€™Abarera, watwaraga Susheferi ya Gitare muri Sheferi yâ€™u Bukamba-Ndorwa muri Teritwali ya Ruhengeri.

Title: Hakizimana yanditse igitabo kirimo inzira zigeza umuntu ku bukire
Body:
Dieudonne Dâ€™Amour Nordkvist Hakizimana usanzwe yandika ibitabo, akaba umunyarwanda uba muri SuÃ¨de, yanditse igitabo kigaragaza inzira umuntu ashobora gucamo agatera intambwe imugeza ku bukungu.
Dieudonne Dâ€™Amour Nordkvist Hakizimana usanzwe yandika ibitabo, akaba umunyarwanda uba muri SuÃ¨de, yanditse igitabo kigaragaza inzira umuntu ashobora gucamo agatera intambwe imugeza ku bukungu.
Iyo umuntu abyutse mu gitondo akajya ku kazi yaba yikorera cyangwa akorera abandi byanga bikunze hari ikintu runaka aba yifuza kugeraho mu buzima bwe bwa buri munsi kandi kidatandukanye cyane no kuba ashaka ubukire.
Hari nâ€™abayoboka inzira zigayitse usanga bishoye mu gucuruza ibintu bitemewe kugira ngo babashe kubona ubukire.
Niba uhorana inyota yo gukira, umwanditsi Dieudonne Dâ€™amour Nordkvist Hakizimana, yanditse igitabo gikubiyemo amabanga menshi yatuma ukira mu kanya gato abari bakuzi udafite nâ€™urwara rwo kwishima bagatangira gutangazwa nâ€™impinduka zaje mu buzima bwawe.
Uyu mugabo yabwiye IGIHE ko impamvu yanditse iki gitabo ari uko igihe yigaga ibijyanye nâ€™ubukungu mu mu Bushinwa mu myaka yashize, hari amasomo akomeye yahaboneye.
Ati â€œ Maze kugera mu Bushinwa nkiga ibijyanye nâ€™ubukungu nkanakora muri sosiyete zitandukanye zâ€™abanya-Korea ndetse nâ€™abanya- SuÃ¨de , nahaboneye amasomo akomeye yatumye nanjye ntangira kwishingira ubucuruzi ndetse no guhimba ibintu binshya.â€
â€œ Maze gusanga ko ubuzima bwanjye nzabukomereza mu mahanga kubera umuryango nubatseyo, nasanze ko gushyira mu nyandiko ibyo nungutse no kubisangiza abandi ko ari inkunga naba nteye Igihugu cyacu kugira ngo kizamure imibereho yâ€™abaturage bacyo kandi buri munyarwanda wese akamenya ko afite imbaraga zo kugera ku bukungu no kubaho neza aramutse abishatse.â€
Akomeza avuga ko iki gitabo kimeze nkâ€™ikarita[Map] ikwereka inzira ushobora gucamo ugatera intambwe igera ku bukungu.
Muri iki gitabo cye yise â€˜Gukira Bishobokera Buri Wese, Ariko Biraharanirwaâ€™. hari aho agaragaza agira ati â€˜Ntukishimire ko ugeze ku ntego yawe; kuko umunsi wayigezeho uzitura hasiâ€™.
Iki gitabo kiri mu bice bitandukanye birimo ikivuga ngo â€˜Urufunguzo Ninjye Urufiteâ€™ aho uyu mwanditsi agaragazamo ibintu byinshi byerekana ko umuntu ariwe ugena ubuzima bwe, uko wagera ku byishimo byawe nâ€™ubuzima bwiza bwâ€™umunezero wifuza nâ€™ibindi.
Ikindi kirimo ni amahame yibanze yagufasha kugera ku ntsinzi ndetse no ku nzozi zawe.
Ikindi gice ni icya kabiri yise â€˜ Ubushobozi Bwawe Ntibugira Inganoâ€™ aho agaragaza ubushobozi bwihariye buri muntu afite ku buryo nta nâ€™umwe ukwiriye kwitinya no kwitakariza icyizere.
Ati â€œIki gitabo cyagufasha gushyira ubuzima bwawe mu cyerecyezo wifuza, kuba uwo wifuza kuba we, kugera aho wifuza kuzagera mu bukungu ndetse nâ€™ubuzima bwâ€™ibyishimo nâ€™umunezero wifuza, ushyize mu bikorwa amahame ndetse nâ€™inama bikirimoâ€.
Iki gitabo kuri ubu abenshi bashobora kukibona ku buntu bagiye muri Google Play Store bakandika mu ishakiro ijambo â€˜Gukiraâ€™ bakabasha kuba bakibona ku buntu. Iki gitabo kandi kiraboneka muri Library CARITAS i Kigali.
Dieudonne Dâ€™amour Nordkvist Hakizimana wanditse iki gitabo yavukiye mu Rwanda mu 1977, muri Komini Kibali ahahoze ari Perefegitura ya Byumba ubu ni muri Gicumbi mu Mjyaruguru.
Amashuri yisumbuye yayize muri IFAK ku Kimihurura na Groupe Scolaire De La Salle i Byumba. Mbere yo kujya i Burayi, yamaze imyaka 10 mu Bushinwa yiga ibijyanye nâ€™Ubukungu nâ€™Ubumenyamuntu. Ni umuyobozi wa Sosiyete Igitego ikorera muri SuÃ¨de, ikora ibijyanye no Guhanga udushya.
Amaze kwandika ibitabo birimo icyitwa â€˜Amashyiga yâ€™umunezeroâ€™ cyagiye hanze muri Nzeri 2019 , â€˜Happiness Triangleâ€™ cyangwa se â€˜Mpandeshatu yâ€™umunezeroâ€™ cyasohotse muri Kamena 2018, nâ€™ikindi yasohoye mu Ugushyingo 2019 cyitwa â€˜My Father Never Walked on Waterâ€™.

Title: Impamvu yâ€™imiziro imwe nâ€™imwe yari yihariye ku bagore bo mu Rwanda rwo hambere
Body:
Abantu benshi bakurikiranira hafi ibyâ€™imigenzo nâ€™imiziro yâ€™Abanyarwanda mu bihe byo hambere, bakunze kuvuga byinshi kubera imyemerere yâ€™Abanyarwanda ishingiye ku miziro, bagera ku byo abagore bagomba kuziririza, bagasya bitanzitse!
Abantu benshi bakurikiranira hafi ibyâ€™imigenzo nâ€™imiziro yâ€™Abanyarwanda mu bihe byo hambere, bakunze kuvuga byinshi kubera imyemerere yâ€™Abanyarwanda ishingiye ku miziro, bagera ku byo abagore bagomba kuziririza, bagasya bitanzitse!
Abenshi bagaragaza ko imyumvire yâ€™Abanyarwanda bo ha mbere yakandamizaga umugore hashingiwe ku miziro bamushyiragaho.
Muri iyi nkuru, twabakusanyirije amateka yâ€™imwe mu miziro yashyirwaga ku mugore nâ€™impamvu yayo, ikamutoza kudakora iki cyangwa se kiriya, kugira ngo urujijo rwâ€™iyo miziro rushire.
Nkâ€™uko tubikesha igitabo â€œUmuco mu Buvanganzoâ€™â€™ cyanditswe nâ€™Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere ku muco, amateka nâ€™ubuvanganzo, mu muco nâ€™amateka yâ€™u Rwanda hagabamo imibereho ishigiye ku miziro, imigenzo nâ€™imihango, yose igendanye no kunoza imibereho yabo ya buri munsi.
Imiziro ni ibintu byaziraga mu muco nyarwanda cyangwa byagombaga kubahwa, gufatwa neza no gutinywa, kurinda ibyiza byagezweho ngo hatagira ikibyangiza cyangwa se ubyangiza. Kenshi na kenshi yanatozaga kwirinda ingeso mbi, kugira ibyo wubaha nâ€™ibyo utinya, kwirinda kwandavura, kwiyandarika nâ€™ibindi.
Imiziro ni imyemerere-hame idutoza kudakora iki cyangwa se kiriya. Za kirazira zose zigendana nâ€™intera iyi nâ€™iyi igihugu kigezeho, niyo mpamvu usanga za kirazira izi nâ€™izi zaracyuye igihe, ugasanga izindi ziganje, hakavuka nâ€™izindi nshya.
Zimwe muri za kirazira zagengaga ubuzima bwâ€™umugore benshi bakunze kwikoma kubera kutazisobakukirwa, ni izi zikurikira:
Nta mugore wurira inzu:
Mu Rwanda rwo ha mbere cyaraziraga ko umugore yuyira inzu. Byaterwaga nuko nta makabutura cyangwa se amakariso yabagaho, byatumye bashyiraho uyu muziririzo ngo hatazagira umugore wurira inzu maze abari hasi ye bakamurunguruka bakabona ubwambure bwe bakamwubahuka. Bityo agata agaciro mu muryango kandi ari nyina wâ€™umuntu.
Nta mugore ujya aho abagabo bicaye:
Mu Rwanda rwo hambere cyaraziraga ko umugore ataramira aho abagabo bicaye. Byaterwaga nuko kera nta bibindo (Cotex) byabagaho.
Iyo abagore bajyaga mu mihango, biberaga iyo mu mbere no mu bikari kugeza igihe imihango ishiriye, umugore akabona kujya ahabona. Niyo mpamvu hashyizweho uyu muzizirizo ku bagore, kugira ngo atazajya ajya aho abantu bateraniye ari mu mihango bityo bakamwubahuka bakanamusuzugura.
Ariko nubwo aticaraga hagati muri bo, yicaraga hafi yabo nkâ€™uri kumwe nabo, ariko ku buryo ntawe umukenguza ngo amenye uko amerewe muri ibyo bihe.
Nâ€™iyo yabaga atari mu mihango, cyaraziraga kwicara mu bagabo kubera ko bashoboraga kumureba ikimero, bagatangira kumuzeyuka, bamukorakora uko biboneye. Yicaraga kure aho adashobora kwegerana nâ€™abagabo. Biba intandaro yo kumurinda ahantu hose hateraniye abagabo.
Nta mugore ukama inka:
Uyu muziro ujya gusa nâ€™uwo kurira inzu, kuko byose bisangiye impamvu. Nta myambarire yikwije abagore bagiraga mu bihe byo hambere yabafashaga guhisha ubwambure bwabo, ku buryo ubegereye cyangwa se ubari imbere atabasha kubarunguruka.
Niyo mpamvu bashyizeho umuziro wo kudakama inka kwâ€™abagore, kugira ngo batazatera iryâ€™abakamyi imbere yâ€™abashumba nâ€™abarenzamase, bakabona icyo bambariyeho.
Iyi miziro imwe nâ€™imwe twagaragaje, yari iyo guhesha umugore agaciro no kumurinda igisuzuguriro, nta mpamvu yo kuyigaya tuyigira icyasha ko yakandamizaga abagore, nyamara bwari uburyo bwo kubarinda no kubungabunga ubusugire nâ€™icyubahiro cyabo mu muryango nyarwanda.

Title: Ibitazibagirana mu gitero cyiswe icyâ€™Imigogo u Rwanda rwatsinzemo abanyankore
Body:
Buri bitero byose u Rwanda rwagabye mu mahanga, byagiye bibamo ibikorwa byâ€™ubuhangange bitazibagirana muri buri gitero. Igitero cyiswe icyâ€™imigogo ni kimwe mu bitazibagirana umwami Kigeli Rwabugili yagabye ku ngoma ya Nkore.
Buri bitero byose u Rwanda rwagabye mu mahanga, byagiye bibamo ibikorwa byâ€™ubuhangange bitazibagirana muri buri gitero. Igitero cyiswe icyâ€™imigogo ni kimwe mu bitazibagirana umwami Kigeli Rwabugili yagabye ku ngoma ya Nkore.
Igitabo â€œIntwari zâ€™imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiroâ€™â€™ cyanditswe nâ€™Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, kigaragaza ko muri Gashyantare 1894 ubwo Rwabugili yafataga umwanzuro wo kugaba igitero muri Nkore Abahinda bâ€™Abanyankore, bari batangiye guhangara u Rwanda bitwaje agashya kâ€™imbunda bahawe nâ€™Abongereza.
Ibyateye umujinya Rwabugili, ni igitero Ntare V Rugingiza rwa Migereka Umwami wa Ankole yari yagabye mbere ahengereye Rwabugili ari i Bunyabungo aza kunyaga inyambo zâ€™u Rwanda atwika ingoro yâ€™i Rutaraka hafi ya Nyagatare.
Mu kwihimura, abanyarwanda bagabye igitero muri Nkore batamitse umuheto, imyambi ivuza ubuhuha, inkota zihogera.
Abanyankore batangiye gupfa mu buryo bubatunguye, babaga bahagararanye ari babiri cyangwa se barenze, barimo gukokinga ( gushyira amasasu mu mbunda), umwe akabona mugenzi we aravuza induru nâ€™umwambi mu gituza wamwinjiye.
Mu gihe nawe akibaza ibibaye, akumva nawe bamufashe mpiri bambambuye imbunda bamucumita nâ€™inkota mu gituza, abandi barimo kubaca imitwe, noneho imiriro nâ€™urusaku rwâ€™amasasu, rurahagarara humvikana induru zâ€™abarimo gupfa nâ€™abarimo guhunga batabaza.
Rwabugili nâ€™Ingabo ze babonye ko umugambi wabo urimo kugera ku ntego, yahise asaba ingabo zose guhindura uburyo bwo kurwana, bose bagafata umurongo umwe wo kwirukankana Abanyankore barimo guhunga, ubundi bakaboherezamo urufaya rwâ€™imyambi nâ€™amacumu atagira ingano nâ€™inkota zihogera bica uwo bafashe mpiri.
 Gusubira mu buryo bwa gakondo, nuko aribwo bari bamenyereye, kandi bwihuta butanahusha umuntu uhunga, kandi bari bamaze kubona ko ntawe urasa ahunga. Abanyankore barashishaga imbunda bahiye ubwoba barimo guhunga. Ikindi kandi nâ€™ubwo Abanyarwanda bari bamaze kwambura imbunda Abanyankore, ntabwo bari bafite ubumenyi nâ€™ubuhanga bwo kuzirashisha. Bituma bazihorera bikoreshereza ubumenyi bwabo gakondo bwâ€™imirwano.
Amateka agaragaza ko muri icyo gitero Rwabugili yagabye mu Nkore yagitsinze mu buryo budasubirwaho, anyaga Abanyankore imbunda zigera ku Bihumbi Bibiri, ari nazo Musinga nâ€™Ingabo ze bifashishije barwana nâ€™Abadage nazo zikabananira, bakarashisha imiheto bakanatsindwa burundu, Abadage bagatangira gukoroniza u Rwanda.
Rwabugili nâ€™ingabo ze barakomeje baratanya bagana mu Majyaruguru yâ€™i Burengerazuba bwâ€™ingoma ya Nkore, bagera ku mugezi wa â€œRwiziâ€ ubabera inzambi mu kuwambuka ngo bakurikirane inkirirahato zâ€™Abanyankore zarokotse inzara zâ€™umuheto wâ€™inkotanyi cyane. Bitewe nuko ikiraro cyambuka uwo Mugezi Abanyankore bari bagiciye kugira ngo Ingabo zâ€™u Rwanda zitabakurikira, Rwabugili nabo bari kumwe, bahise biga ubucakura bukomeye, bwo gushaka icyo batindisha uwo mugezi ngo bagomere amazi yawo babone uko bawambuka ngo bakurikirane inkirirahato zâ€™Abanyankore.
Rwabugili wari ufite ishyaka ryinshi no kunyaruka mu mitekerereze, yahise yigira inama yo kurunda imirambo yose yâ€™Abanyankore muri uwo mugezi ngo babakoreho ikiraro babone uko bambuka kuko ibyo gutema ibiti byari kubatinza bagasanga Abanyankore babacitse. Nuko barunda imirambo yâ€™Abanyankore itagira ingano muri uwo mugezi wa Rwizi nkâ€™abarunda amasiteri yâ€™ibiti, bakora ikiraro gikomeye cyane, maze barambuka, bajya guhigisha uruhindu Umunyankore aho yari yahungiye hose.
Icyo gitero kiswe icyâ€™Imigogo, cyabaye icyorezo mu Banyankore, cyaguyemo abatagira ingano, abamenyekanye ni umuhungu wa Ntare witwaga Rumukwe wari umutasi wa Nkore, akarashisha nâ€™imbunda ifite amadarubindi kandi ikarasa kure.
Ingabo zâ€™u Rwanda zikimara kumwica, Rwabugili yahise afata iyo mbunda ye, atangira kuyirashisha kugeza amasasu ashizemo. Ni imwe mu zabaye iminyago bakuye mu ngoma ya Nkore bayizana ibwami, usibye ko yahiriye mu nzu mu bihe byâ€™intambara yo ku Rucunshu.
Abongereza barahurujwe nâ€™Abanyankore ngo baze kubatabara, umwongereza wari ugaragiwe nâ€™ingabo zikomeye nâ€™intwaro nyinshi zâ€™ikirenga, ageze i Nyagakoni Abanyankore bakunze kwita Nkoni abona imirambo yâ€™Abanyankore inyanyagiye hirya no hino mu gihugu, ashya ubwoba, ku mutima ati â€œAba bantu bishe ingabo bene aka kageni, ni nde wabikorereza?â€, bahitamo kwisubirira inyuma urugamba ararureka.
Igitero cya Rwabugili yagabye muri Nkore, cyabaye inkomoko yâ€™insigamugani nâ€™amarenga yabaye kimomo mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, aho bagira bati â€œ Kanaka yagaritse ingogoâ€ Byo kuvuga ko yishe abantu batagira ingano.
Uburyo bushya bwâ€™imirwano uko ari butati nibwo bwatumye Abanyarwanda barushaho gutangarirwa nâ€™Amahanga, bunatanga umusaruro ugaragara maze bagiriza Abanyankore babagusha ruhabo. Ubwo buryo burimo ubwo gukusha, kurashisha amano aribwo bakunze kwita â€œKurasa umugaramirizoâ€ no gukambakamba ushaka gufata mpiri umwanzi ngo umwambure intwaro.
Bamwe mu ngabo zâ€™ibihangange zazengereje amahanga ku ngoma ya Rwabugili harimo Kamananga ka Sebajura umwuzukuru wa Rwakagara, warasaga umwambi ugahitana batanu, Nyamuhenda wa Kejeje, umwega wâ€™Umuhenda, Umutekereza karundura wâ€™ubucakura mu mirwano yo muri Nkore, Bisangwa bya Rugombituri, Umugaba wâ€™imitwe yâ€™Ingabo yose ku ngoma ya Rwabugili, akaba nâ€™umuyobozi wigirira Icyizere nkâ€™icya Sebuja Rwabugili, akaba umutware wâ€™ingabo zâ€™Ingangurarugo.
Hari kandi Rwanyonga rwa Mugabwambere wari umugaba wâ€™Ingangurarugo Indwanyi idahusha wivuganye Kabego umwami wo ku Ijwi. Baramu ba Rwabugili barimo Kabare ka Rwakagara, wari umuhanga cyane mu kurwanira mu mazi mu bwato bwe bwitwaga â€œImbabaziâ€ Cyigenza cya Rwakagara watwaraga Ingoma za Rwabugili mu bwato bwitwaga â€˜Ishyakaâ€™ na Ruhinankiko wari indwanyi byâ€™akaburarugero.

Title: Ibikoresho gakondo bya Muzika, byabicaga bigacika mu Rwanda rwo hambere
Body:
Ibihe birahita, ibindi bikaza, ariko ibyiza byabaye mu bihe byahise ntibishobora kwibagirana. Umuziki ni intwaro ikomeye yabayeho kuva muntu yagera ku isi, ikamufasha mu byishimo no mu kababaro.
Ibihe birahita, ibindi bikaza, ariko ibyiza byabaye mu bihe byahise ntibishobora kwibagirana. Umuziki ni intwaro ikomeye yabayeho kuva muntu yagera ku isi, ikamufasha mu byishimo no mu kababaro.
Abanyarwanda nabo bagiraga umuziki ubafasha kwizihirwa, bakagira ibikoresho byabo bwite bakoreshaga bacuranga ngo uwo muziki urusheho kubanogera.
Mu Rwanda rwo hambere, bagiraga ibitaramo byâ€™ingeri eshanu, bikaba isoko yâ€™akayunguruzo kâ€™umutima-mutindi, umwe wa kinyamaswa, hakimakazwa umutimamana nâ€™umutimanama mu Banyarwanda.
 Ibitaramo byakorwaga mu Rwanda rwo hambere, byarimo ibitaramo byâ€™umuryango, Ibitaramo byâ€™uburere mboneraagihugu, Ibitaramo nyizihizangoma, ibitaramo byâ€™imihigo nâ€™ibitaramo byâ€™umuganura. Buri gitaramo cyabaga gifite abagomba kukitabira nâ€™ibikoresho byâ€™umuziki bigomba kwizihiza ibyo birori. Hakaba ibikoresho byakoraga mu bitaramo byâ€™ibwami nâ€™ibyakoreshwaga mu bitaramo byo muri rubanda.
Ibikoresho byâ€™umuziki byo mu Rwanda rwo hambere, byari bigabanyijemo ingeri eshatu bitewe nâ€™uko bikoreshwa kugira ngo bitange umuriri nyizihizagitaramo.
Ibikoresho byâ€™Inyamirya: Ni ibikoresho bifite uburyo bakomaho imbarutso, bukarema imirya inyuranye kandi yirangira, ari nayo isimburana mu kwizihiza indirimbo.
Ibikoresho byâ€™ubuhuha: Ni ibikoresho bakoreshaga mu muziki gakondo, ariko bigatanga umwirangiro ari uko bahushyemo,
Ibikoresho byâ€™inkomangano: Ni ibikoresho byakoreshwagwa mu muziki nyarwanda, bigatanga umwirangiro, ari uko babikomyeho nâ€™ikiganza, igititi cyangwa se ikirenge.
Izo ngeri zâ€™ibikoresho byâ€™umuziki nyarwanda, byabiciye bigacika zari zigizwe nâ€™ibicurangisho bitandukanye. Muri byo hari nka:
Urusengo: Urusengo, ni kimwe mu bikoresho byâ€™umuziki gakondo byâ€™inyabuhuha. Kubera umuriri ntagereranywa bifite, byatumye ruba kimwe mu bikoresho mpuzamuriri byâ€™ibwami. Gihanga aruha isumbwe rikomeye, ruba rumwe mu birango byâ€™u Rwanda nkâ€™ikirango cyâ€™amahoro nâ€™ubusabane. Urusengo rwo rugira imirya yâ€™ishakwe , inyahura nâ€™igihumurizo. Urusengo rwarangaga ingoma yâ€™u Rwanda, mu bihe bya Gihanga, nirwo bitaga â€˜Nyamilingaâ€™.
Inanga: Inanga ni igikoresho cyâ€™umuziki cya kera na kare, cyo mu bwoko bwâ€™ibinyamirya, ni kimwe mu byahanganywe nâ€™u Rwanda. Nkâ€™uko yabaga mu buvanganzo nyemvugo bwo muri rubanda, ni nako nâ€™ibwami bayikeneraga, mu bitaramo byaberaga ibwami. Inanga igira imirya irenga yitwa â€œimiyukiâ€nâ€™inihira yitwa â€œimihumurizoâ€cyangwa se ibihumurizo.
Umurya wâ€™inanga, ni kimwe mu byizihizaga ibitaramo bya kera, bigakesha ijoro, na nâ€™ubu kandi, inanga ni igikoresho kitajya kiva ku gihe, aho mu bitaramo ndangamuco ariyo iba ku ruhembe rwâ€™imbere mu kuranga u Rwanda.
Ingoma zâ€™imisango: Ni iza kera cyane mu Rwanda, zari zifite umwanya ukomeye mu Rwanda rwo hambere. Ni kimwe mu bikoresho byâ€™umuziki byo mu bwoko bwâ€™inkomangano. Haba mu mbyino, mu mihamirizo, no mu yindi myidagaduro, ingoma yabaga iya mbere.
 Ingoma zâ€™imisango, ni zimwe mu bikoresho byâ€™umuziki gakondo, byabiciye bigacika mu bihe byo ha mbere. Nâ€™ubwo zadutse hagati mu iyubakwa ryâ€™igihugu, zagize ibigwi byâ€™ikirenga kuruta ibindi bikoresho mpuzamuriri. Ingoma zâ€™imisango, arizo izi tuzi zikoreshwa mu birori zadutse ku ngoma yâ€™umwami Cyilima I Rugwe, ahasaga mu mwaka wa 1345. Zadukanywe nâ€™umunyamahanga Rwamuhama wâ€™Umutoro. Mbere yâ€™uko izo ngoma zaduka, mu Rwanda hari ubwoko bwâ€™ Ingoma- Ngabe gusa, yari ikirango cyâ€™igihugu.
 Ubuhanga nâ€™ubuhangange Abanyarwanda bahaye ingoma, byatumye barema amoko yazo agera kuri 4, arushaho gutanga umwirangiro utandukanye uryoshya ibirori byâ€™umurishyo wâ€™ingoma. Mu moko yâ€™ingoma harimo Ishakwe, Inyahura, Inumvu cyangwa Inumbiri nâ€™Ibihumurizo.
Amakondera: Amakondera ni ibikoresho byakoreshwaga mu bitaramo bikomeye ndangamuco, akaba yari afite umwanya ukomeye mu bitaramo byâ€™ibwami cyane cyane mu bitaramo byâ€˜Intore. Ni amwe mu bikoresho byâ€™umuziki nyarwanda byâ€™Inyabuhuha. Amakondera akomoka ku ngoma yâ€™umwami Rwabugili akaba yarayaramvuye i Bujinja kuri ubu habarizwa mu gihugu cya Tanzaniya.
Umuduri: Ni umwe mu bikoresho byâ€™umuziki byakundaga gukoreshwa mu buvanganzo nyemvugo bwo muri rubanda, ni umwe mu bikoresho byâ€™Inyamirya nkâ€™ibikoresho mpuzamuriri bifite imirya bakoraho ikabona kwirangira nkâ€™ Umuduri bita Umunahi cyangwa ibubura nâ€™iningiri.
Ihembe: Ihembe ,ni igikoresho cyâ€™umuziki kiri mu bwoko bwâ€™Inyabuhuha, atanga umwirangiro ari uko babanje guhuhamo.Ni igikoresho mpuzamuriri cyakoreshwaga cyane mu muhamirizo wâ€™intore, mu buvanganzo nyemvugo bwâ€™ibwami.
Umwirongi: Ni igikoresho cyâ€™umuziki cyamenyekanye cyane mu gukoreshwa nâ€™abashumba mu rwuri, kikaba ikirango cyâ€™amahoro. Iyo umushumba yahuhagamo, shebuja yahitaga yumva ko mu nama yâ€™inka ari amahoro.
Hari nâ€™ibindi bikoresho byâ€™umuziki byakoreshwaga mu buryo bwihariye cyangwa se bitakundaga no gukoreshwa cyane, akaba ari nayo mpamvu nta bwamamare bifite. Muri byo twavuga nkâ€™Ikinyuguri kijya mu mihango yâ€™imandwa, Urujegerezo, agakoko kâ€™inkomane kajegera bunyuguri kajya mu mihango irimo indirimbo, Urutaro rwari ikidasesa gicurangwa mu bitaramo byâ€™akarere aka nâ€™aka nâ€™ibindi.

Title: Uko umunaniro wazahaje Perezida Kayibanda agashaka kwegura
Body:
Umunaniro ukabije ni imwe mu ndwara zizwi cyane izahaza abayifite ku buryo itavuwe cyangwa ngo uyirwaye yitabaze abaganga bâ€™inzobere bamubwire icyo akora, bishobora kurangira ahatakarije ubuzima.
Umunaniro ukabije ni imwe mu ndwara zizwi cyane izahaza abayifite ku buryo itavuwe cyangwa ngo uyirwaye yitabaze abaganga bâ€™inzobere bamubwire icyo akora, bishobora kurangira ahatakarije ubuzima.
Iyo ndwara yazahaje Perezida GrÃ©goire Kayibanda mu myaka ya 1970 kugeza ubwo asabye kwegura ku mwanya wa Perezida ngo hashakwe umusimbura, abaminisitiri be bakabyanga.
Kayibanda yayoboye u Rwanda guhera mu 1961 kugeza mu 1973 ubwo yahirikwaga ku butegetsi na JuvÃ©nal Habyarimana wahoze ari Minisitiri we wâ€™Ingabo.
Mu ntangiriro zâ€™ubutegetsi bwe, ibintu byasaga nâ€™ibigenda neza mu ishyaka rye MDR Parmehutu ndetse benshi bamubonamo icyerecyezo kizima dore ko ari we wari waranashinze iryo shyaka, nyuma yo gushyigikirwa nâ€™Ababiligi bakaza gukuraho ubwami bwari bumaze imyaka amagana mu gihugu.
Akijya ku butegetsi, Kayibanda yatowe nâ€™abadepite muri manda yâ€™imyaka ine yagombaga kuzarangira mu 1965. Mu mwaka wa 1962 ubwo u Rwanda rwabonaga ubwigenge, hatowe Itegeko Nshinga, rishyiraho umubare wa manda ebyiri kuri Perezida, manda imwe ikamara imyaka ine.
Manda yatorewe mu 1961, yarangiye mu 1965 yiyamamariza indi yagombaga kurangira mu 1969 ndetse aranayitorerwa. Mu buryo bugaragara kugeza mu 1969, Kayibanda yari amaze kuyobora manda ebyiri ariko we siko yabibaraga ahubwo yumvaga ko amaze kuyobora manda imwe kuko iya mbere yatowe Itegeko Nshinga ritarajyaho kandi agatorwa nâ€™abadepite aho kuba abaturage.
Imvururu mu ishyaka, intandaro yo gushaka kwegura
Mu 1968, mu ishyaka MDR Parmehutu ari naryo ryari ryemewe mu gihugu, ryavutsemo imvururu, bamwe mu batangiranye ishyaka na Kayibanda batangira kumwivumburaho banenga imiyoborere ye.
Mu nyandiko yo mu 2010 ya Bagaragaza ThadÃ©e wabaye umudepite akaba na Minisitiri wâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga muri Repubulika ya mbere, yagaragaje ko nyuma ya 1965; ruswa, ikimenyane nâ€™indi myitwarire mibi yatangiye kwigaragaza mu bayobozi batandukanye ndetse no mu bucamanza, kugeza aho byavuzwe cyane bikagera no ku baturage bo hasi.
Ibintu byarushijeho kuba bibi mu 1968 ubwo bamwe mu bikomerezwa byo muri Leta ya Kayibanda byabonaga ko afite imigambi yo kwiyamamariza manda ya gatatu kandi Itegeko Nshinga ryaravugaga manda ebyiri gusa.
Muri uwo mwaka, bamwe mu badepite ba MDR Parmehutu bakoze raporo yagaragazaga imikorere mibi ya bamwe mu bayobozi bakuru bâ€™igihugu bashaka ko bamwe begura, ku munsi wa nyuma wo kuyemeza ishyaka ritera ubwoba abadepite bayo birangira raporo batinye kuyemeza.
Igitabo kivuga ku buzima bwa Kayibanda, Toute ma Vie pour vous mes frÃ¨res cyanditswe na Baudoin Paternostre, kivuga ko Itegeko Nshinga ryabuzaga Kayibanda kongera kwiyamamaza ryavuguruwe muri Gicurasi 1969 rikuraho umubare wa manda ntarengwa, ahubwo manda imwe igenerwa imyaka itanu aho kuba ine nkuko byari bisanzwe ndetse nâ€™imyaka 60 umukandida ushaka kuba Perezida yagombaga kuba atarengeje ivanwamo.
Kuri ba bayobozi nâ€™abarwanashyaka ba MDR Parmehutu bari bamaze kurambirwa Kayibanda, babaye nkâ€™abakubiswe nâ€™inkuba kuko inzozi zo kubona undi Perezida usimbura Kayibanda zari ziyoyotse.
Igitabo cya Paternostre kigira kiti â€œBa bantu bakekaga ko guhererekanya ubutegetsi bishoboka cyangwa se bumvaga ko ubutegetsi bwahabwa abandi, bahise babona ko bidashoboka. Batangiye kumushinja irondakarere cyane cyane gutonesha abo baturuka mu gace kamwe ka Gitarama no mu Majyepfo yâ€™igihuguâ€.
Kayibanda amaze kubona ko bamwe bashinganye ishyaka batangiye kumumenyera, yatangiye kugenda abasimbuza muri Guverinoma ashyiramo abandi bato bari barangije za Kaminuza, noneho umujinya ku bamurwanyaga urushaho kwiyongera.
Ibintu byarushijeho gukomera ubwo nâ€™abasirikare bakuru cyane cyane abo mu bice byâ€™Amajyaruguru batangiraga kwivumbura, bamushinja gutonesha abo bakomoka mu gace kamwe.
Kayibanda bivugwa ko muri iyo myaka ya 1969, yatangiye gucika intege no kugaragaza kwiheba kubera kubona bamwe bahoze ari inshuti ze aribo bari kumurwanya.
Paternostre ati â€œHari ubwo kenshi yajyaga agira irungu ryo kuba iruhande rwe atari kumwe na ba bayobozi bakuru bahoranye, yagiye akura mu duce twabo nyuma bakagenda bamwitaza kubera ubuzima.â€
Kwigunga no kwiheba kwa Kayibanda, byarakomeye biza kuvamo indwara kuko icyo gihe yasaga nâ€™uhanganye nâ€™ibibazo byâ€™igihugu ariko anahanganye nâ€™abahoze ari inshuti ze batari bakimwishimiye kubera ko yarenze ku masezerano.
Inyandiko zâ€™ibanga zâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Ubutasi cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (CIA) zo kuwa 10 Nzeri 1970, zigaragaza ko Kayibanda yageze aho arwara indwara yâ€™umunaniro ukabije wâ€™ubwonko, agasaba ko yegura abaminisitiri be bakabyanga.
Iyi nyandiko igira iti â€œBiravugwa ko Perezida Kayibanda arwaye umunaniro akaba ari gupanga gufata ikiruhuko akajya mu Burayi. Icyifuzo cye cyo kwegura giherutse kwamaganwa nâ€™abaminisitiri be ahubwo bamusaba kuba ashyizeho Perezida wâ€™agateganyo.â€
â€œMuri iyi minsi ubutegetsi bwa Kayibanda bwacitse intege cyane ku buryo aza gake mu murwa mukuru avuye mu mirima ye kandi asigaye agaragara gake mu ruhame. Ku butegetsi bwa Kayibanda, u Rwanda rwabaye nkâ€™urutagaragara ku buryo bisa nkâ€™aho abanyarwanda bakwishimira impinduka mu buyobozi nâ€™iyo yaba ari inzibacyuho.â€
Mu buyobozi bukuru bwâ€™ingabo, abasirikare bo mu bice byâ€™Amajyaruguru nâ€™Iburengerazuba nibo bari biganje. Nabo bari baratangiye gutera umugongo Kayibanda.
Paternostre mu gitabo cye yagarutse ku munaniro Kayibanda yari asigaye agaragaza kugeza ubwo nâ€™abasirikare buririye ku bushobozi buke yari asigaranye.
Ati â€œAbo basirikare bato babonye umunaniro Kayibanda yari afite nâ€™umutima uhagaze, batangira gutekereza kureka inshingano zabo za gisirikare ahubwo bakajya mu myanya yâ€™ubutegetsi bwa gisivile, biyumvamo uburyo bushya bwo gutuma igihugu gikomeza kujya mbere abandi bashaka kubyuririraho ku nyungu zabo bwite.â€
Paternostre avuga ko mu ntangiriro za 1973, buri wese yabonaga ko impinduka zâ€™ubutegetsi mu Rwanda ari ikintu gishoboka cyane cyane cyane hashingiwe ku matora ya Perezida nâ€™ayâ€™Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yari ateganyijwe muri Nzeri uwo mwaka ndetse no ku mvururu zari zimaze iminsi mu gihugu, abahutu bakomeje kumenesha abatutsi mu mashuri no mu kazi kandi bigaragara ko ntacyo ubutegetsi bwa Kayibanda bukora ngo buhoshe izo mvururu.
Uko kunanirwa guhosha imvururu zâ€™abahutu bibasiraga abatutsi, nizo Habyarimana yuririyeho ahirika Kayibanda ku butegetsi muri Nyakanga 1973 ariko bikavugwa ko ako kavuyo nâ€™ubundi katerwaga nâ€™abasirikare kugira ngo babone ibirego baheraho bahirika Perezida.

Title: Abakoresha ururimi rwâ€™Ikirera bafite impungenge ko rushobora gucika
Body:
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyaruguru mu turere tuvugwamo cyane ururimi rwâ€™Ikirera, bafite impungenge ko urwo rurimi rushobora gucika kubera ko abato batakirukoresha cyane.
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyaruguru mu turere tuvugwamo cyane ururimi rwâ€™Ikirera, bafite impungenge ko urwo rurimi rushobora gucika kubera ko abato batakirukoresha cyane.
Nkâ€™uko byemezwa na bamwe mu baturage batuye mu Turere dukoresha urwo rurimi rwâ€™Ikirera nka Musanze na Burera, ngo iyo bicaye hamwe baganira muri uru rurimi bumva bisanzuye cyane bagasabana.
Nyirakagori Thacienne, umukecuru wâ€™imyaka 72 yâ€™amavuko utuye mu Karere ka Musanze, avuga ko ururimi bavuga rurimo Ikinyarwanda cyiza nâ€™ubwo hari abacyumva baruvuga bakabaseka.
Yagize ati â€œIyo tugeze ahantu hatari iwacu nko mu yindi Ntara, uragambaga(uravuga) bagahita bamenya aho uturuka, hari nâ€™ibyo tugamba, ukabona badufashe nkâ€™abanyamahanga. Nkâ€™ubu iyo umusore yazanye umugore, tubyitaga gusohoza, mu gihe usanga hari abagamba ngo yasezeranye, yarongoye nâ€™ibindi."
Akomeza ati " Nkâ€™ubu ibyo bita gukubura, twe tubyitaga gukondora, iyo umubyeyi yabyaye abazwe, twe tuvuga ko yashyizwe ku ndiga kuko icyo abandi bitaga icyuma tukita indiga. Iyo turi hamwe dukoresha Ikirera cyacu tuba twisanzuye kandi twumva ari Ikinyarwanda cyâ€™umwimerere"
Munyazikwiye Rabani we yagize ati â€œUbu iyo nganiriye nâ€™umuntu nkumva ururimi agamba(avuga) mpita menya aho akomoka, nkamenya ngo akomoka mu Nduga, ku Gisenyi nâ€™ahandi. Dukunze kugamba twongeraho Ga, nka ndabiryaga, amazi garabuze. Guhamagara umuntu tugamba kwakura umuntu nâ€™ibindi, ubundi iki ni Ikinyarwanda cyumvikana"
Nâ€™ubwo bavuga ko guhurira ku rurimi rwabo gakondo rwâ€™Ikirera bituma bumva bisanzuye, ngo haracyari bimwe mu bimenyetso bibagaragariza ko rushobora kuzacika burundu, birimo kuba abana babakomokaho basigaye bagira ipfunwe ryo kurukoresha, aho biga ku mashuri bitewe nâ€™uko hari bagenzi babo babaseka.
Ibi ngo bituma iyo babasetse bagerageza kugorora imvugo yâ€™abo bigana bagenzi babo, bigatuma noneho barwica kurushaho. Ikindi ngo ni uko kuba haragiye haza gutura abantu baturutse mu zindi Ntara, nabyo ari kimwe mu byatumye ururimi rwabo rukendera, bikaba bibateye impungenge ko ururimi rwabo rushobora gusigara mu bakuze gusa, naho mu rubyiruko rukibagirana, kandi ariho bakagombye kurubungabungira.
Ibi kandi babihuza no kuba ngo ntaho wasanga rwigishwa, cyangwa ngo rube rufite aho rwanditse mu bitabo, ibintu ngo babona ko kubungabunga ururimi rwabo bitakoroha na gato, bagasaba ko rwahabwa agaciro yaba mu nyandiko, kurwigisha mu mashuri nâ€™ibindi.
Inteko Nyarwanda yâ€™Ururimi nâ€™Umuco (RALC) iherutse gutangaza ko indimi shami zishamikiye ku Kinyarwanda nkâ€™Ikigoyi, Ikirera nâ€™izindi, zikwiye kwitabwaho kuko ari umutungo wâ€™Igihugu ushobora no kugira akamaro mu rwego rwo gukungahaza Ikinyarwanda.
RALC ivuga ko izo ndimi shami ari nkâ€™ikigega cyajya cyitabazwa mu kongera andi magambo mu Kinyarwanda aho kujya kuyatira mu ndimi zâ€™amahanga.
Inteko Nyarwanda yâ€™Ururimi nâ€™Umuco itangaza ko ifite ikigega cyâ€™amagambo ibihumbi 97 akoreshwa mu myuga inyuranye aho kigenda gikurwamo amagambo ashyirwa mu nkoranyamagambo.

Title: Itandukaniro ryâ€™imitako gakondo yâ€™Abanyarwanda bo hambere nâ€™icyo yabaga isobanuye
Body:
Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Inzu Ndangamurage zâ€™u Rwanda giherutse kumurika igitabo gikubiyemo Ingeri zâ€™Imitako Gakondo yakoreshwaga nâ€™Abanyarwanda mu gihe cyo hambere bagamije kongerera ubwiza ikintu runaka bawutatseho.
Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Inzu Ndangamurage zâ€™u Rwanda giherutse kumurika igitabo gikubiyemo Ingeri zâ€™Imitako Gakondo yakoreshwaga nâ€™Abanyarwanda mu gihe cyo hambere bagamije kongerera ubwiza ikintu runaka bawutatseho.
Icyo gitabo gikubiyemo imitako igera ku 137 yâ€™ubwoko butandukanye cyasohotse mu 2019; buri umwe ufite umwihariko wawo bitewe nâ€™imiterere, uburyo ukoze nâ€™amabara awugize.
Benshi bayizi ku izina ryâ€™Imigongo ariko nkâ€™uko bigaragara muri icyo gitabo cyitwa "Ingeri zâ€™Imitako Gakondo" iyo mitako yose ntabwo yitwa imigongo ahubwo imigongo nayo ni bumwe mu bwoko bwâ€™imitako.
Nkâ€™uko bigaragara muri icyo gitabo harimo imitako yitwa Umwashi, Amababa yâ€™Intashya, Umuhigo, Igitoki, Amanyamanza, Ibaba, Itangaza, Ibigobe byâ€™uruzi, Inyemera nâ€™Akarizo kâ€™ingwe.
Hari kandi Ishobe, Igembe, Igishyamirane, Basangira, Intege zâ€™Abasaza, Imikako, Ingondo, Umugongo wâ€™Inzovu, Ibigobe byâ€™Uruzi, Ubusonga, Itangaza nâ€™iyindi.
Umushakashatsi mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Inzu Ndangamurage zâ€™u Rwanda akaba ari na we wayoboye itsinda ryâ€™abanditse icyo gitabo, Ntagwabira AndrÃ©, yavuze ko bacyanditse bafite intego eshatu arizo gusigasira amateka, kuyarinda no kuyamenyesha abakiri bato.
Yasobanuye ko iyo mitako nâ€™ubu ikoreshwa kandi ibisobanuro byayo bitahindutse ahubwo ikigamijwe ari ukugira ngo hatazagira abayiyitirira cyangwa bakayivangira bagatuma ita umwimerere wayo.
Ati â€œIyi mitako nâ€™ubu iracyakoreshwa kandi ibisobanuro byayo biracyari bya bindi nâ€™ubwo benshi batakibimenya.â€
Muri yo yasobanuye igera ku 10 avuga nâ€™akamaro kayo ahereye kâ€™uwitwa â€˜Ibabaâ€™ avuga ko ari umutako gakondo ushushe nkâ€™icyubi cyâ€™inyoni iguruka ari nayo mpamvu wahawe iryo zina.
Naho â€˜Itangazaâ€™ yavuze ko ari umutako ufite imvano ku ijambo rikomoka ku nshinga â€˜gutangazaâ€™ isobanura gushimisha cyangwa kureshya abareba, gutamuruka kwâ€™ahantu hatabonaga cyangwa mu gitondo.
Ati â€œMu yandi magambo, uyu mutako witwa itangaza kubera ko utangaza abawubonye.â€
Umutako witwa â€˜Igishyamiraneâ€™ ufite inkomoko ku ijambo igishyamirane rikomoka ku nshinga â€˜gushyamaâ€™ bisobanura kwibanga kwâ€™inka ishaka kurwana cyangwa kwica umuntu. Uyu mutako witwa igishyamirane kubera ko ushushe nkâ€™amahembe yâ€™ibimasa bishyamiranye.
Undi mutako gakondo witwa â€˜Inyemeraâ€™ cyangwa â€˜Impalaâ€™ wibutsa uko inyamaswa yâ€™impala iba imeze mu kirere iyo yiruka isimbuka cyane.
Hari kandi uwitwa â€˜Ibigobe byâ€™uruziâ€™ ukomoka ku ijambo ikigobe (ibigobe mu bwinshi) rivuga igice cyâ€™uruzi cyangwa ikiyaga cyinjira mu butaka.
Ntagwabira ati â€œIbigobe byâ€™uruzi rero ni ahantu uruzi rwaremye ibigonzi. Umutako gakondo witwa utyo wahawe iryo zina kubera ko imisusire yawo yibutsa ibigonzi byâ€™uruzi.â€
Umutako gakondo wâ€™Abanyarwanda witwa â€˜Akarizo kâ€™ingweâ€™ wakomotse kuri iyo nyamaswa yâ€™inkazi iba mu ishyamba. Igira umurizo muremure uhora uberamye kandi umutwe wawo uhese ureba hejuru. Uwo mutako nawo uba ari muremure, uberamye kandi uhese.
Iyo miterere yawo isa nâ€™iyâ€™umurizo wâ€™iyo nyamaswa niyo ituma bawita akarizo kâ€™ingwe.
Muri icyo gitabo harimo nâ€™umutako gakondo witwa â€˜Ishobeâ€™ bikomoka ku nshinga â€˜gushoberwaâ€™ isobanura kujya mu kaga ukananirwa kukivanamo. Wahawe iryo zina kubera ko ugoranye kuwukora. Ntagwabira ati â€œUmutako wâ€™ishobe ugoranye gukora kurusha indi witwa iryuzuye cyangwa ishobe ryuzuye.â€
Undi mutako ni uwitwa â€˜Igitokeâ€™ kuko ufite ishusho isa nâ€™iseri ryâ€™igitoke gifite amabere manini.
Hari kandi nâ€™umutako witwa â€˜Inkora yâ€™Abahigiâ€™; mu rurimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda, ijambo inkora risobanura ikirari cyâ€™ahantu haciye itsinda ryâ€™abantu, amatungo cyangwa inyamaswa.
Uwo mutako ugaragaza ishusho yâ€™ikirari kuko ari umurongo uvunaguye ariko ukomeza guhera ku ruhande rumwe rwâ€™igikoresho utatseho kugeza ku rundi.
Umutako wundi ugaragara muri icyo gitabo cyâ€™abashakashatsi ni â€˜Umutwekaâ€™ ukomoka ku myenda yâ€™Abadage.
Izina itweka rikomoka ku ijambo umutweka bisobanura ubwoko bwâ€™imyenda yadukanywe nâ€™Abadage mu Rwanda mbere ya 1916. Kuri iyo myenda habagaho amabara afite impande enye; abanyabugeni nâ€™abanyabukorikori bâ€™Abanyarwanda bagakora imitako isa nayo bayigana, iyo mitako ikitwa itweka. Umutako wâ€™itweka urimo ubwoko bwitwa ishobe.
Umushakashatsi mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Inzu Ndangamurage zâ€™u Rwanda, Ntagwabira AndrÃ©, yavuze ko igitabo gikubiyemo iyo mitako nâ€™ibisobanuro byayo bacyanditse mu gihe cyâ€™umwaka umwe ari itsinda ryâ€™abashakashatsi barindwi.
Yasobanuye ko nâ€™ubwo icyo gitabo gikubiyemo imitako 137 hari indi bavumbuye nyuma bityo bakaba nayo bateganya kuyishyira mu kindi gitabo bazandika.
Kugeza ubu Akarere ka Nyanza kafashe umwanzuro wo kurimbisha inzu nâ€™inyubako ziri mu Mujyi wa Nyanza hagamijwe kwimakaza isuku no kugaragaza ko aho hantu ari igicumbi cyâ€™umuco kuva hambere.
Inkuru wasoma: Ikigo cyâ€™Inzu Ndangamurage zâ€™u Rwanda cyamuritse igitabo gikubiyemo ingeri zâ€™imitako gakondo
