Title: Imiterere yâ€™amasano yâ€™ibanze ya Kinyarwanda
Body:
Amasano ya Kinyarwanda ni amwe mu ashobora kuzimira hatabayeho uburyo bunoze bwo kuyigisha abakiri bato ngo nabo bazayahereze abo bazabyara.
Amasano ya Kinyarwanda ni amwe mu ashobora kuzimira hatabayeho uburyo bunoze bwo kuyigisha abakiri bato ngo nabo bazayahereze abo bazabyara.
Kubera kwinjirirwa nâ€™indimi zâ€™amahanga, amasano nyarwanda agenda atakara, ugasanga aho kwita umuntu â€˜Mama wacuâ€™ abana baramwita Tante cyangwa Aunt, mubyara wawe ngo ni â€˜cousinâ€™ nâ€™ibindi.
Ubusanzwe mu muco nyarwanda umwana yakuraga azi amasano nâ€™abo mu muryango akomokamo bikamufasha kumenya uko yitwara kuri buri wese, ibyo aziririjwe kumukorera nâ€™ibindi.
Ibyo kandi byajyanaga nâ€™umuco, ku buryo ayo masano yageraga no ku gushyingirwa, hakaba abo umuco wemerera umuntu kuba yashyingiranwa na we nâ€™abo bibujijwe rwose.
Mu muco nyarwanda habamo ubwoko bubiri bwâ€™amasano, aya bugufi nâ€™aya kure. Akenshi ahabwaga umwanya ukomeye ni aya bugufi nubwo hari nâ€™aho aya kure yarebwagaho cyane.
Mu masano ya bugufi, hazaga data, uwo akaba ari umubyeyi wâ€™umugabo. Mama, ni umubyeyi wâ€™umugore. Mu yandi ya bugufi hari:
Mama wacu: Ni umuvandimwe wa Mama wâ€™igitsina-gore. Iyi sano ishobora kugera no kwa ba Sewabo wa Mama.
 Data wacu: Ni umuvandimwe wa Data wâ€™igitsina-gabo. Iyi sano ishobora kugera no ku kwa ba Se wabo wa Data.
Masenge: Ni umuvandimwe wa Data wâ€™Igitsina-gore (Mushiki wa Data). Iyi sano ishobora kugera no kwa ba Se wabo wa Data.
Marume: Ni umuvandimwe wa Mama wâ€™igitsina-gabo (Musaza wa Mama). Iyi sano ishobora kugera no kwa ba Se wabo wa Mama.
 Sogokuru: Ni umubyeyi wâ€™igitsina-gabo ubyara Data cyangwa se Mama. Iyi sano ishobora kugera no ku bavukana na we kugera no kwa ba Sewabo.
Nyogokuru: Ni umubyeyi wâ€™igitsina-gore ubyara Data cyangwa se Mama. Iyi sano ishobora kugera no ku bavukana na we kugera no kwa ba Se wabo.
Mushiki wanjye: Ni uwo tuvukana duhuje ababyeyi bombi wâ€™igitsina-gore, ashobora no kuba avuka ku mwihariko wa Mama cyangwa se wa Data, ni ukuvuga tudasangiye ababyeyi bombi. Undi ushobora guhabwa iyo sano, ni uwâ€™igitsina-gore ukomoka ku bavandimwe ba Mama bâ€™igitsina-gore cyangwa se abavandimwe ba Data bâ€™igitsina-gabo.
Musaza wanjye: Ni uwo tuvukana duhuje ababyeyi bombi wâ€™igitsina-gabo, ashobora no kuba avuka ku mwihariko wa Mama cyangwa se wa Data, ni ukuvuga tudasangiye ababyeyi bombi. Undi ushobora guhabwa iyo sano,ni uwâ€™igitsina-gabo ukomoka ku bavandimwe ba Mama bâ€™igitsina-gore cyangwa se abavandimwe ba Data bâ€™igitsina-gabo.
Murumuna wanjye:  Ni uwo tuvukana duhuje ababyeyi bombi, ariko muruta ubukuru, ashobora no kuba avuka ku mwihariko wa Mama cyangwa se wa Data, ni ukuvuga tudasangiye ababyeyi bombi. Undi ushobora guhabwa iyo sano, ni uwâ€™igitsina-gabo ukomoka ku bavandimwe ba Mama bâ€™igitsina-gore cyangwa se abavandimwe ba Data bâ€™igitsina-gabo, ariko muruta ubukuru, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Mukuru wanjye: Ni uwo tuvukana duhuje ababyeyi bombi, ashobora no kuba avuka ku mwihariko wa Mama cyangwa se wa Data, ni ukuvuga tudasangiye ababyeyi bombi. Undi ushobora guhabwa iyo sano, ni uwâ€™igitsina-gabo ukomoka ku bavandimwe ba Mama bâ€™igitsina-gore cyangwa se abavandimwe ba Data bâ€™igitsina-gabo ariko anduta ubukuru, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo). Iyo Sano ikoreshwa kandi ku bakomoka kwa Data wacu cyangwa se kwa Mama wacu, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Mukuru wanjye wo kwa Mama wacu: Ni umuvandimwe unduta ubukuru, ariko akomoka kwa kwa Mama wacu, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Mukuru wanjye wo kwa Data wacu: Ni umuvandimwe nduta ubukuru, ariko akomoka kwa kwa Data wacu, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Murumuna wanjye wo kwa Mama wacu: Ni umuvandimwe nduta ubukuru, ariko akomoka kwa kwa Mama wacu, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Murumuna wanjye wo kwa Data wacu: Ni umuvandimwe nduta ubukuru, ariko akomoka kwa kwa Data wacu, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gore na gabo).
Amasano ya kure-kuziguye
Muramu wawe: Ni umuvandimwe wâ€™umugore wawe, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku bitsina byombi (gabo na gore). Iyi sano ishobora kugera no kwa ba Se wabo wâ€™umugore wawe. Iyi sano kandi abayifitanye ni abo muva inda imwe bose bâ€™ibitsina byombi.
Muramukazi wawe: Ni umuntu wâ€™igitsina â€“gore uva inda imwe nâ€™umugabo wawe, iyi nyito ikoreshwa ku gitsina gore gusa. Iyi sano ishobora kugera no kwa ba Sewabo wâ€™umugabo wawe. Iyi sano kandi aba ayifitanye nâ€™abo muva inda imwe bose bâ€™ibitsina byombi.
Mubyara wawe: Ni umukobwa cyangwa se umuhungu uvuka kwa Nyokorome cyangwa se kwa Nyogosenge. Iyo sano ishobora no kugera ku bisanira byo kwa ba Sewabo wa Nyokorome cyangwa se cyangwa wa Nyogosenge.
Amasano ya kure kutaziguye
Umwinjira: Ni umugabo washatse mama wawe nyuma yâ€™urupfu rwa So, ariko akamutungira mu rugo rwa So. Iyo amutwaye iwe, aba yabaye umugore we undi ari umugabe.
Icyo gihe abana babyaranye bose baba ari abavandimwe bawe, musangiye amaraso ya mama wawe.
Mukeba wa mama wawe: Ni undi mugore wa So cyangwa se uwo babyaranye. Abana abyaye baba bafitanye isano ya hafi na we. Iyi sano na none igera no ku bagore ba Baramu bawe.
Musanzire wa So: Ni umuntu wâ€™igitsina gabo washatse mu muryango umwe na So (agashaka Nyokowanyu), muri make abagore babo bavukana. Bakunze no kubita â€œAbendahamweâ€. Abana bamuvutseho muba mufitanye isano ya bugufi.
Mukaso: Ni umugore wa Kabiri wa So, ashobora kuba yaramushatse umugore we wa mbere yarapfuye cyangwa se akiriho. Icyo gihe abana babyaranye bose baba ari abavandimwe bawe, musangiye amaraso kuri So.
Sobukwe: Ni umugabo ubyara uwo mwashakanye, iyi nyito ikoreshwa nâ€™ibitsina byombi. Iyi Sano irakomeza ikazagera no ku bo bavukana no kubo bava inda imwe kwa Se wabo.
Nyokobukwe: Ni umugore ubyara uwo mwashakanye, iyi nyito ikoreshwa nâ€™ibitsina byombi. Iyi Sano irakomeza ikazagera no ku bo bavukana no ku bo bava inda imwe kwa Se wabo.
Umukwe: Ni umugabo washatse umukobwa wawe. Iyi sano irakomeza ikagera no ku bo bavukana, ndetse ikazagera no ku bashatse nâ€™abakobwa ubereye Se wabo cyangwa Nyinawabo.
Umukazana: Ni umugore washatswe nâ€™umuhungu wawe. Iyi sano irakomeza ikagera no ku bo bavukana ndetse ikazagera no ku bashatswe nâ€™abagabo ubereye Se wabo cyangwa Nyinawabo.

Title: Zimwe mu ngeso zibangamiye ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda muri iki gihe
Body:
Ubukwe ni intangiriro yâ€™ishingwa ryâ€™umuryango, ukaba icyizere ku gukomeza kwaguka kwâ€™igihugu kuko abashyingiwe baba bitezweho kwibaruka, bakarerera neza igihugu kigakomeza kubaho no gutera imbere.
Ubukwe ni intangiriro yâ€™ishingwa ryâ€™umuryango, ukaba icyizere ku gukomeza kwaguka kwâ€™igihugu kuko abashyingiwe baba bitezweho kwibaruka, bakarerera neza igihugu kigakomeza kubaho no gutera imbere.
Uko iminsi ishira indi igataha, ikoranabuhanga rikomeza kwiyongera imico ikagenda ihura, bikoroha gutira no kwigana ibyâ€™abandi. Ibi hari ubwo bishora Abanyarwanda mu rwiganwa rudafite ubushishozi, mu itira ritagira ishingiro no mu ngeso zihutaza indangagaciro na kirazira byâ€™umuco nyarwanda.
Kugeza ubu hari ingeso zisa nâ€™izinjiye muri bamwe mu rubyiruko rwâ€™iki gihe, ku buryo hari impungenge ko izo ngeso zishobora kugira ingaruka ku ishingwa ryâ€™ingo mu minsi iri imbere nubwo hari nâ€™aho byatangiye kwigaragaza.
Igitabo â€˜Ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda, 2018â€™ cyâ€™Inteko Nyarwanda yâ€™Ururimi nâ€™muco, (RALC) , kigaragaza ko muri izo ngeso mbi harimo nko kuryamana mbere yo gushyingirwa, kutagira isoni zo kuryamana nâ€™abakubyaye cyangwa abo ubyaye, icyo ubu abantu bita ubupfubuzi nâ€™ubutinganyi.
Ubusambanyi 
RALC igaragaza ko mu bihugu byâ€™amahanga, akenshi umusore nâ€™inkumi bakundana kuryamana ntacyo biba bitwaye kuri bo. Ni imico yabo mu bihugu byabo, ifite aho ikomoka.
Bitewe nâ€™iterambere ryaba iryâ€™ikoranabuhanga nâ€™itangazamakuru ryâ€™ibyo bihugu, izo ngeso zatangiye kwinjira mu baturage bâ€™ahandi ku isi cyane cyane urubyiruko.
RALC ivuga ko ibyo bigira ingaruka ku myumvire yâ€™abateganya kurushinga nko gutinyuka ibyo batinyaga birebana nâ€™ubukwe.
Akamenyero ko kuryamana mbere yo kubana byemewe nâ€™amategeko gaturuka ku mibereho urubyiruko rwâ€™ubu rubamo yo kwibana no kuba kure yâ€™imiryango yabo. Abana batangira kubana umunsi ku wundi, ku mashuri bakiri mu gihe cyâ€™ubwangavu nâ€™ubugimbi, kugeza biga amashuri ya za kaminuza bakibana. Na nyuma yâ€™amashuri urubyiruko rukomeza kwibana mu kazi.
Mu gitabo, RALC ivuga ko umusore nâ€™inkumi bagera igihe cyo kubana baranyuze mu buzima bwinshi butuma bisanzuranaho kandi bigasa nkâ€™aho nta cyo bitwaye kuryamana ku bitwa ko bakundana. Bagera igihe cyo kubana, abenshi mu bakobwa baratwaye inda bigatuma bakora ubukwe buhutiyeho.
Gupfubura
Indi myitwarire idahwitse ibangamira ubukwe, RALC ivuga ko ari iya bamwe mu bakuze bashukisha urubyiruko amafaranga, impano nâ€™ibindi bintu bifite agaciro bagamije kurushora mu busambanyi.
Ibi bigaragarira ku bagabo bakuze bitwa shugadadi (Sugar daddy) nâ€™abagore bitwa shugamami (Sugar Mummy). Mu muryango nyarwanda birasanzwe ko abantu bakuru bashyikirana nâ€™abato ariko hakabaho imipaka igenga kubahana no gukurikiza amahame ngengamyitwarire yâ€™umuco wâ€™Igihugu.
Gusa uko iminsi ihita, hari bamwe mu bakuze barengera bakagirana imishyikirano idakwiye nâ€™urubyiruko kugeza barushoye mu ngeso mbi zâ€™ubusambanyi.
Ingeso yâ€™ubusambanyi hagati yâ€™abakuze nâ€™abato kandi ntisigana nâ€™indi yo gupfubura, aho umugore utanyuzwe nâ€™umugabo we mu gihe cyâ€™imibonano mpuzabitsina hari ubwo ashaka undi mugabo yishyura akamukemurira icyo kibazo.
Uwo mugabo cyangwa umusore wishyurwa azwi ku izina ryâ€™â€œumupfubuziâ€ cyangwa â€œumwunganiziâ€. Ni ingeso itavugwa cyane ariko iriho ndetse hari bamwe mu basore bagiye biyemerera ku mugaragaro ko bahoze ari abapfubuzi.
Mu nama nyunguranabitekerezo yabaye mu Ukuboza 2018 yahuje abayobozi bâ€™inzego za Leta nâ€™abafatanyabikorwa yigaga ku bibazo bibangamiye umuryango nyarwanda no kwihutisha iterambere rishingiye ku muryango utekanye, Depite Nizeyimana Pie yasabye Guverinoma kugira igikorwa ubupfubuzi bukarwanywa nkâ€™uburaya kuko busenya imiryango.
Ubwo RALC yakoraga ubushakashatsi ku bukwe bwa Kinyarwanda, Abanyarwanda bifuje ko hajyaho amategeko ahana abantu biyandarika cyangwa bakora imirimo yâ€™urukozasoni, ari uburaya ndetse nâ€™ubupfubuzi.
Izi ngeso zigira ingaruka ku bukwe bwa Kinyarwanda kubera ko nko kuryamana kâ€™umusore nâ€™umukobwa mbere yo kubana byemewe nâ€™amategeko, bituma bakora ubukwe buhutiweho kubera ko hari ubwo umukobwa aba yaratwaye inda. Ibyo ubwabyo bishobora kugabanya ubwizerane hagati yâ€™abashakanye kuko hari ubwo umwe na nyuma yo kubana akomeza gutekereza ko mugenzi we yamucaga inyuma.
Mu gihe umusore yishoye mu bupfubuzi biragoye ngo atekereze kubyo gushinga urugo kubera ko aba abona ibyo akeneye byose bitamugoye. Uwabaye umupfubuzi yubatse na we, nta cyizere ko azakomeza kwita ku muryango we.
No ku bakobwa cyangwa abagore ni uko, harimo abahitamo kwibana kubera ko baba bumva bihagije batifuza kugorwa nâ€™umugabo nâ€™amahame yâ€™umuco agenga abashakanye.
Umugore wishoye mu bapfubuzi afite umugabo nabwo urugo ruba rusa nkâ€™urwubatse ku manga, kuko iyo bimenyekanye bibyara amakimbirane yo mu muryango. Umugore wagiye mu gupfuburwa kandi biragoye ngo atekereze indi mishinga iteza urugo rwe imbere.

Title: Umwihariko wâ€™umugenzo wo gukirana wakorwaga nâ€™abageni nyuma yo gushyingirwa
Body:
Ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda hambere, bwari imbumbe yâ€™ibikorwa byinshi bitandukanye ariko byuzuzanya bigamije gusigasira umuco nâ€™indangagaciro zâ€™umuryango nyarwanda, hubakwa urugo rushya ruzibaruka amaboko azubaka igihugu.
Ubukwe bwa Kinyarwanda hambere, bwari imbumbe yâ€™ibikorwa byinshi bitandukanye ariko byuzuzanya bigamije gusigasira umuco nâ€™indangagaciro zâ€™umuryango nyarwanda, hubakwa urugo rushya ruzibaruka amaboko azubaka igihugu.
Gukirana ni umwe mu migenzo yakorwaga nâ€™abageni bo hambere, bigakorwa mbere yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina bwa mbere babaye umugabo nâ€™umugore.
Bwari uburyo umugeni yakoreshaga, akabanza kwiyima umugabo we mu gihe bagiye kubonana bwa mbere.
Mu gihe umukobwa agiye gushyingirwa, iwabo bamuzanaga bitwaje amavuta mu giseke, bagera ku mukwe bakayasiga umukobwa wabo ari menshi ari byo bitaga gutotobeka kugira ngo umugabo we namufata intoki ze zinyerere.
Mu muco nyarwanda cyaraziraga ko umukobwa ahita yemera kubonana nâ€™umugabo kuko bari gukeka ko asanzwe yiyandarika. Babanzaga gukirana, umukobwa akanga ko babonana, ariko akurikije impanuro yabaga yabanje guhabwa na nyirasenge, yazaga kwemera nyuma.
Inteko Nyarwanda yâ€™Ururimi nâ€™Umuco, RALC mu gitabo â€œUbukwe bwa Kinyarwanda, 2018â€, igaragaza ko hari ibice bimwe byâ€™Igihugu nko mu Bugesera, aho byari ishema ku mukobwa ko ananira umusore, akazamwemerera ko babonana ari uko abanje kugira icyo amugabira nkâ€™itungo cyangwa umurima.
 Icyo kintu yahabwaga kuko yananiye umugabo cyabaga ari icye bwite nâ€™iyo yasendwaga yarakijyanaga.
Nubwo umugeni yabanzaga kunanira umugabo, yazaga kugera aho akemera bakaryamana ku nshuro ya mbere.
Ni umugenzo mu myumvire umuntu ashobora gukeka ko ntacyo wari umaze kubera ko nâ€™ubundi umugeni yabaga yamaze gushyingirwa atari busubire iwabo ariko wari ufite igisobanuro gikomeye mu muco.
Kuba umugeni yarabanzaga kunanira umugabo, byahaga icyizere umugabo we ko nta ngeso mbi yigeze ajyamo kandi ko nâ€™undi wese uzashaka kumufata ku ngufu atazabigeraho.
Mu gitondo, iwabo wâ€™umukobwa bashakaga inzoga nâ€™ipfukire bakabijyana iwabo wâ€™umukwe bakajya kurisha umugeni kuko yabaga anywa amata gusa cyangwa arya duke cyane kuko kugira umutima nâ€™isoni byamubuzaga kugira icyo arya. Abâ€™iwabo ni bo bazaga kumumara isoni, bakamusangiza nâ€™umugabo we.

Title: Ikigo cyâ€™Inzu Ndangamurage zâ€™u Rwanda cyamuritse igitabo gikubiyemo ingeri zâ€™imitako gakondo
Body:
Hagamijwe kubungabunga amateka yâ€™u Rwanda no kuyasigasira, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Inzu Ndangamurage zâ€™u Rwanda cyamuritse ku mugaragaro igitabo gikubiyemo Ingeri zâ€™Imitako Gakondo.
Hagamijwe kubungabunga amateka yâ€™u Rwanda no kuyasigasira, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Inzu Ndangamurage zâ€™u Rwanda cyamuritse ku mugaragaro igitabo gikubiyemo Ingeri zâ€™Imitako Gakondo.
Ni igikorwa cyabereye mu Ngoro Ndangamurage igaragaza amateka yâ€™Ibwami iri mu Rukari mu Karere ka Nyanza.
Umuyobozi Mukuru Ingoro zâ€™Igihugu zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda, Amb. Masozera Robert, yavuze ko bahisemo kwandika icyo gitabo no kugishyira hanze kugira ngo amateka yâ€™u Rwanda abungwabungwe atazazimira.
Ati â€œNoneho turavuga ngo reka dukore igitabo twegeranye amabara yâ€™imitako gakondo yose dukore urutonde rwayo noneho tubyandikishe; byandikwe mu murage ukwiye kubungwabungwa byihutirwa kugira ngo abawiyitirira cyangwa abashaka kuwukoresha mu buryo budakuriije amategeko bajye babanza nibura babisabire uruhushya.â€
Imitako gakondo ikubiye muri icyo gitabo igera ku 136; benshi bayizi ku izina ryâ€™Imigongo ariko nkâ€™uko byasobanuwe yitwa â€œImitako Gakondoâ€ kuko imigongo ahubwo nayo ari bumwe mu bwoko bwâ€™imitako.
Amwe mu mazina yayo twavuga ni Amababa yâ€™Intashya; Umuhigo; Umwashi; Igitoki; Intege zâ€™abasaza; Itweka; Amaso yâ€™Inuma; Iraza; Ingeembe; Ibigobe byâ€™Uruzi; Akarizo kâ€™Ingwe; Umugore wishe Inzu.
Harimo kandi iyitwa Amanyamanza; Umwashi; Ibishyamirane; Basangira; Imikako; Ingondo; Umugongo wâ€™Inzovu; Ubusonga; Itangaza; nâ€™iyindi.
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Karere ka Nyanza bari bitabiriye imurikwa ryâ€™icyo gitabo bavuze ko ari igikorwa cyiza kizabafasha kubungabunga amateka ndetse byâ€™umwihariko bakayifashisha mu kurimbisha umujyi wabo.
Uwihinema BÃ©atrice ati â€œIbi ni ugusigasira umuco wacu kugira ngo udacika nâ€™abana bazabashe kuwukurikirana; nibabona ibi bazabibaza ababyeyi babasobanurire ko ari umuco nyarwanda. Ibi birakwiye kugira ngo abana bacu badafata ibyâ€™inzaduka bakibagirwa ibyâ€™iwabo.â€
Musengimana GÃ©rard nawe yagize ati â€œNyanza ni igicumbi cyâ€™amateka; ubu birumvikana ko tugiye kubyitaho cyane kuko twatangiye no gutaka inzu zacu mu mujyi dukoresheje iyi mitako gakondo.â€
Umuyobozi wâ€™Akarere ka Nyanza, Ntazinda Erasme, yavuze ko mu gukomeza guharanira ko iyo mitako gakondo itazima bahisemo kuyifashisha mu gusukura mujyi bashyigikira ko Nyanza iba igicumbi cyâ€™umuco.
Yavuze ko nkâ€™ubuyobozi bazakomeza gutoza abaturage gukoresha neza iyo mitako gakondo birinda kuyivangavanga uko biboneye.

Title: Amateka yâ€™u Bungwe bwâ€™Abenengwe, kimwe mu bihugu byabimburiye ibindi mu Rwanda
Body:
U Bungwe ni kimwe mu bihugu byahozeho mu Rwanda, dore ko ari kimwe mu bya mbere byahanzwe u Rwanda rutaritwa u Rwanda tuzi ubu, kikaba igihugu cyâ€™igihangange kuko cyageraga no mu Burundi bwâ€™ubu.
U Bungwe ni kimwe mu bihugu byahozeho mu Rwanda, dore ko ari kimwe mu bya mbere byahanzwe u Rwanda rutaritwa u Rwanda tuzi ubu, kikaba igihugu cyâ€™igihangange kuko cyageraga no mu Burundi bwâ€™ubu.
Igihugu cyâ€™u Bungwe cyahanzwe ahasaga mu mwaka wa 300 mu kibariro cyâ€™ibihe byacu. Umwami uzwi mu mateka yâ€™u Bungwe mu gihe cyâ€™umwaduko wâ€™ingoma Nyiginya ni uwitwa Rwamba.
Ibitabo â€œmizi yâ€™u Rwandaâ€, umutumba wa mbere ndetse nâ€™igitabo â€œIntwari zâ€™imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiroâ€™â€™ byombi byâ€™Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, bigaragaza ko u Bungwe bwari igihugu kitisukirwa, benecyo bari barahaye akabyiniriro kâ€™u Bungwe bwâ€™Abenengwe.
Abami batwaye igihugu cyâ€™u Bungwe, kugeza gitsindwa nâ€™u Rwanda barimo Mungwe, Mungwe, Karama, Rwamba, Samukende na Rubuga. Ingoma Ngabe yâ€™u Bungwe nkâ€™ikirango cyâ€™igihugu cyabo yari â€œNyamibandeâ€.
U Bungwe nicyo gihugu cyahanzwe mu bya mbere, mu bihugu byari bigize u Rwanda. Icyo gihugu cyagengwaga nâ€™Abenengwe bakura igisekuruza cyabo kuri Mungwe (Muntu Ngwe) wari murumuna wa Rurenge umukurambere wâ€™Abasinga bâ€™Abasangwabutaka wahanze igihugu cyâ€™u Budaha nâ€™u Bwishaza.
U Bungwe cyari igihugu kibumbye uturere dutandatu. Muri two hari u Busanza bwâ€™Amajyepfo, kuri bu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Ndora, Mamba, Gishubi, Kibilizi na Muganza yo mu Karere ka Gisagara.
U Busanza bwâ€™Amajyaruguru nabwo bwari akarere kâ€™ingoma yâ€™u Bungwe. Kuri ubu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Maraba, Simbi, Ruhashya, Rusatira na Mbazi yo mu Karere ka Huye, ndetse nâ€™Imirenge ya Save, Musha na Gikonko yo mu Karere ka Gisagara.
U Bufundu bwari akarere kâ€™ingoma yâ€™u Bungwe, kuri bu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Tare, Kamegeri, Kitabi, Uwinkingi, Buruhukiro, Kibirizi, Musebeye, Kibumbwe, Mbazi na Cyanika yo mu Karere ka Nyamagabe
Mu turere twari tugize igihugu cyâ€™u Bungwe harimo nâ€™Akarere ka Nyaruguru. Kuri bu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Rusenge, Mata, Ruramba na Kibeho yo mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, ukongeraho imirenge ya Gishamvu, Huye, Karama, Ngoma, Tumba na Mukura yo mu Karere ka Huye
Akandi karere kabarirwaga mu ngoma yâ€™u Bungwe ni Bashumba-Nyakare. Kuri ubu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Ngera, Nyagisozi na Ngoma yo mu Karere ka Nyarugururu, ukongeraho nâ€™imirenge ya Nyanza, Kigembe, Mukindo, Mugombwa na Kansi yo mu Karere ka Gisagara.
Akarere kâ€™u Buyenzi nako kari kamwe mu tugize igihugu cyâ€™u Bungwe. Kuri bu aho kari gaherereye ni mu Mirenge ya Kivu, Muganza, Nyabimata, Ruheru, Busanze, Munini na Cyahinda yo mu Karere ka Nyaruguru.
Igihugu cyâ€™u Bungwe, cyagengwaga nâ€™ibikomangoma byâ€™Abenengwe, ikirangamuryango cyabo cyari Ingwe . Umwami wariho ubwo Ingoma Nyiginya yâ€™ i Gasabo yadukaga yitwaga Rwamba ari na we wa mbere wafashe umukobwa we Nyirampirangwe akamushyingira Gihanga Ngomijana, wagengaga ingoma yâ€™i Gasabo akamubera umukwe.
Rwamba yari atuye muri Nyakizu ni ukuvuga, gakondo nkuru yabo, ari nayo yabaye ibimburiro ryâ€™ihangwa ryâ€™icyo gihugu cyahanzwe na Mungwe watuye mu Bisi bya Nyakibanda (Ubu ni mu Karere ka Huye mu Murenge wa Gishamvu).
Undi Mwenengwe wategekaga igihugu cye kugeza gitsindwa nâ€™ingoma Nyiginya ni Rubuga rwa Samukende, umuhungu wa Benginzage bakunze kwita Nyagakecuru na Samukende bo mu Bisi bya Huye.
Abenengwe nibo bambutse uruzi rwâ€™Akanyaru, bajya guhanga ibihugu byabo i Ngozi-Kayanza mu Burundi. Abenengwe baje mu Bungwe basanga igihugu kikiri amashyaba ya kimeza, baragitema, baragikonda kugeza bakigize igihugu gituwe.
Mu bihe byâ€™iyaguka ryâ€™u Rwanda, ubwo ibitero byo kwagura igihugu no kugihuza, uturere twaremaga ingoma yâ€™u Bungwe twaremye ingoma bitaga ingoma zâ€™abiyunze . Abazitwaraga bari bameze nkâ€™Abatware bâ€™uduce (zone) zabaga zifatanyije uturere tubiri mu rwego rwo gukaza umurengo no kongera imbaraga mu butegetsi bwabo, kugira ngo igihugu cyâ€™u Rwanda cyabicaga bigacika muri ibyo bihe, kitazapfa kubavogera.
Iyo ngoma yâ€™Abiyunze yâ€™u Bungwe yari igizwe nâ€™u Busanza bwa Nkuba ya Bagumana ( watwaraga u Busanza bwâ€™Epfo nâ€™ubwa Ruguru), u Bufundu bwa Rubuga rwa Kagogo ( watwaraga u Bufundu nâ€™u Buyenzi), nâ€™u Bungwe bwa Rubuga rwa Samukende ( bwari bugizwe na Bahumba-Nyakare na Nyaruguru).
Mu bice bikurikira, tuzabatekerereza indunduro yâ€™ingoma yâ€™u Bungwe.

Title: Dr Kimonyo yagarutse ku bibazo u Rwanda rwanyuzemo mu rugendo rwo kwiyubaka
Body:
Umwanditsi, inzobere muri politiki akaba nâ€™umujyanama wa Perezida, Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yagaragaje ko nubwo u Rwanda hari ibihe bikomeye kandi bibi rwanyuzemo, hari icyizere ko ibyagezweho bizasigasirwa kubera ko urubyiruko rwongeye kwiyumvamo ubunyarwanda.
Umwanditsi, inzobere muri politiki akaba nâ€™umujyanama wa Perezida, Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yagaragaje ko nubwo u Rwanda hari ibihe bikomeye kandi bibi rwanyuzemo, hari icyizere ko ibyagezweho bizasigasirwa kubera ko urubyiruko rwongeye kwiyumvamo ubunyarwanda.
Ibi yabitangaje ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu mu muhuro wâ€™abanditsi ugamije kungurana ibitekerezo (scÃ¨ne littÃ©raire) byâ€™umwihariko haganirwa ku gitabo cye â€˜Rwanda demain ! : Une longue marche vers la transformationâ€™ kivuga ku mbogamizi nâ€™ibitekerezo byiza byaranze inzira yo kongera kwiyubaka kâ€™u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Uyu muhuro (scÃ¨ne littÃ©raire) wateguwe nâ€™umwanditsi akaba nâ€™umunyarwenya Ntarindwa DiogÃ¨ne uzwi nka Atome mu biganiro akunze gutegura bivuga ku buvanganzo nâ€™ubwanditsi bizwi nka â€˜Atomiomâ€™.
Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo yagarutse ku bihe bibi u Rwanda rwanyuzemo, ahera mu mwaka wa 1959 ubwo Abatutsi bameneshwaga mu gihugu bikozwe nâ€™abari bari mu mashyaka nka Parmehutu ku bufasha bahabwaga nâ€™Ababiligi.
Kimonyo yavuze uburyo Abatutsi babaye impunzi muri icyo gihe babayeho nabi cyane mu bihugu bahungiyemo dore ko nta nâ€™imiryango yita ku mpunzi yari ihari, byatumye bamwe bakurizamo gupfa kubera imibereho mibi.
Ati â€œImpunzi zavuye mu Rwanda zabayeho nabi cyane, zicwa nâ€™inzara nâ€™indwara nâ€™ibisimba haba muri Uganda,Tanzania nâ€™i Burundi. Muri Congo ho bazijyanye ahantu habi cyane, ntabwo bashakaga kubaha ahantu hameze neza, babashyize ahantu hatari aho guturwaâ€.
Dr Kimonyo yavuze ko impunzi zakomeje guhanyanyaza, mu myaka ya 1960 zirisuganya zigaba ibitero byiswe ibyâ€™Inyenzi ariko ntibyazihira.
Zakomeje kubaho mu buzima bubi mu mahanga, bigeze mu myaka ya 1980, haba ibibazo bya Politiki hirya no hino muri Afurika, impunzi zâ€™Abanyarwanda zongera gufatwa nabi, ari nabwo abari urubyiruko muri zo icyo gihe bishyize hamwe, bagashinga FPR Inkotanyi bafite umugambi wo gusubira mu gihugu cyabo, kugeza ubwo batangije urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu no guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Gutsindwa kwa Guverinoma ya Twagiramungu no kugumuka mu banyamuryango ba FPR
Muri uwo muhuro, Dr Kimonyo yagarutse ku bihe bikomeye politiki yâ€™u Rwanda yanyuzemo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, cyane cyane ubwo hari hamaze gushyirwaho Guverinoma yâ€™Ubumwe.
Ni guverinoma yari igizwe nâ€™amashyaka atarijanditse muri Jenoside, ku isonga arimo MDR ya Twagiramungu Faustin ari na we wagizwe Minisitiri wâ€™Intebe.
Nta mwaka washize, aba mbere batangiye kwegura hashize amezi make igiyeho kubera kutumvikana.
Dr Kimonyo avuga ko uko kutumvikana kwatewe nâ€™uburyo abari muri Guverinoma bari bafite ibyerekezo bitandukanye nyamara bagomba guha igihugu icyerekezo kimwe.
Ati â€œGuveirnoma yâ€™ubumwe yagize gutsindwa kubiri. Ugutsindwa kwa mbere ni ukwa politiki kubera ko abantu bamwe batumvikanaga muri Guverinoma cyane cyane FPR na MDR kubera impamvu zitandukanye, nkâ€™ikibazo cyâ€™umutekano uburyo cyari kiri gukemurwa. Ayo mashyaka yombi kandi ntiyari afite imigambi imwe, ntabwo yabonaga ahazaza hâ€™u Rwanda kimwe.â€
Twagiramungu yeguye muri Kanama mu 1995, bukeye abandi ba minisitiri bavanwa muri Guverinoma.
Dr Kimonyo avuga ko mu myaka ya 1997/1998 haje kubaho ikindi kibazo cyo kugumuka kwa bamwe mu bari abayoboke ba FPR Inkotanyi, batangira kurya ruswa mu ishyaka haza umwuka mubi.
Ati â€œ Hari indi Guverinoma yagiyeho ariko nayo iza gutsindwa, ibangamirwa na bamwe mu banyamuryango ba FPR bari bagumutse mu 1997/1998 , bamwe bamagana ibintu bya ruswa byari bitangiye gukomera cyane. FPR yahise ijya mu bihe bibi cyane, ishaka uko yabivamo havanwaho abantu bakekwagaho ruswa.â€
Ibibazo byadindizaga Guverinoma bimaze kuvaho, nibwo hatangiye gutekerezwa ku hazaza hâ€™igihugu, hatangizwa ibiganiro byo mu Urugwiro ari nabyo byacuriwemo icyerecyezo 2020 kiri gusozwa.
Guverinoma yâ€™Ubumwe yarangiye mu 2003 ubwo hatorwaga Itegeko Nshinga hakaba nâ€™amatora ya Perezida, ya mbere kuva Jenoside yarangira.
Kimonyo yemeza ko urebye aho u Rwanda rugeze, nâ€™imyumvire urubyiruko rwâ€™ubu rufite, nta kabuza ko ibyagezweho bizakomeza gusigasirwa no kongerwa.
Ati â€œUrasanga rubyiruko rutangiye kwitabira ibintu byâ€™umuco kandi no kuva cyera, haba mu gushinga FPR, kurwanya igitugu no kubaka igihugu, umuco wâ€™ubunyarwanda no gukunda igihugu nibyo byari umusingi wâ€™ibyo twashoboye kugeraho. Urasanga urubyiruko muri iyi minsi rutangiye kwitabira ibyâ€™umuco.â€
Yashishikarije urubyiruko kujya rwitabira ibiganiro nkâ€™ibyo bigaruka ku byaranze u Rwanda, kugira ngo rwige uko ibyagezweho byakozwe nâ€™uko rwarushaho kubyongera.
Uretse igitabo â€˜â€˜Rwanda demain !â€™ Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo asanganywe ikindi gitabo cyitwa â€˜Rwanda : Un gÃ©nocide populaireâ€™ yasohoye mu 2008.

Title: Byinshi ku rurimi rwâ€™Ikirashi nâ€™uko ruvugwa mu Karere ka Kirehe
Body:
Ikirashi ni ururimi shami rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda ruvugwa nâ€™abaturage bitwa â€˜Abarashiâ€™ batuye mu Karere ka Kirehe, mu mirenge ya Mpanga na Nasho, ahahoze ari mu Gisaka.
Ikirashi ni ururimi shami rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda ruvugwa nâ€™abaturage bitwa â€˜Abarashiâ€™ batuye mu Karere ka Kirehe, mu mirenge ya Mpanga na Nasho, ahahoze ari mu Gisaka.
Ni ururimi rujya gusa neza nâ€™Ikinyankole, Igihaya nâ€™Ikinyambo nka zimwe mu ndimi zikoreshwa muri Uganda na Tanzania.
Abarukoresha bafite agahinda baterwa nâ€™uko abato batagishaka kurumenya ngo kuko ku ishuri batarukoresha bakibaza uburyo nibasaza ruzakendera bikabababaza.
IGIHE yaganiriye na bamwe mu barukoresha batubwira amagambo amwe nâ€™amwe nâ€™ibisobanuro byayo mu Kinyarwanda.
Gusuhuzanya mu Kirashi iyo ari mugitondo bakoresha â€˜Murayire ge, haba hacyeye bagakoresha â€˜ Agandaâ€™ cyangwa â€˜Musibire geâ€™ kubwira umuntu uti â€œ Amakuru ki uvuga Agandi shi, Mwiriwe mute bavuga Mwasiba kurungi.
Iyo ushaka kubwira umuntu uti â€˜uvuye heâ€™ bakoresha Waruga hi, muryoherwe ni Munuriwe.
Ibice byâ€™umubiri nkâ€™izuru ryitwa Enyindo, ukutwi ni ugutwi, irisho ni ijisho, urutoki rwâ€™insina ni Engemu, amasaka yitwa umugusha, amashaza akitwa ubushaza, ibishyimbo byitwa ibiharage, ibitoki ni ibitiki, ihene ni Embuzi, inka ni Ente.
Mfashingabo Mathiew wâ€™imyaka 54 usanzwe ari umukozi wâ€™Akarere ka Kirehe ushinzwe ibihingwa Ngengabukungu ni umwe mu bavuka mu Kagari ka Kankobwa aho yakuze asanga ababyeyi be bakoresha Ikirashi cyane kuruta uko bakoresha ikinyarwanda.
Avuga ko ubwo yajyaga gutangira amashuri abanza byamutonze cyane bitewe nâ€™uko atari azi ikinyarwanda bikajya bisaba abarimu kumufasha kumenya amwe mu magambo yâ€™ikinyarwanda.
Asobanura ko uko imyaka yagiye yigira hejuru Ikirashi cyagiye gicika intege bitewe nâ€™uko urubyiruko rwari kukimenyekanisha wasangaga rutinya kukivuga ngo bataruseka bagahitamo gukoresha ikinyarwanda.
Yasobanuye ko kandi uru rurimi rufite izindi ndimi gakondo zimeze nka rwo zikoreshwa no mu bindi bihugu nka Uganda na Tanzania.
Ati â€œUbu ikirashi kivugwa cyane mu tugari twa Kankobwa na Nyakabungo duherereye mu Murenge wa Mpanga kikanavugwa muri Ntaruka na Gashiru mu Murenge wa Nasho. Ni uduce duto kuko abakivugaga benshi barashajeâ€.
Mfashingabo avuga ko abavuga ikirashi bagabanutse cyane bitewe nâ€™uko abakivugaga benshi bashaje abandi bakivanga nâ€™abandi banyarwanda bigatuma bareka kukivuga, agasaba leta gushaka uko bahuza abantu bakikivuga kigasigasirwa ku buryo kitazakendera.
Ishisha Venuste wâ€™imyaka 60 uvuka mu Kagari ka Nyakabungo we avuga ko kuva akimenya ubwenge yasanze ababyeyi be bavuga ikirashi, avuga ko umuco wâ€™abarashi ufite byinshi uhuriyeho nâ€™abanyarwanda gusa bigatandukanywa nâ€™utuntu duto.
Ati â€œNkâ€™iwacu kera iyo umwana yavukaga habagaho gusangira guhambaye bakakuzanira ibicuma byâ€™inzoga mbere yuko umubyeyi yonsa umwana bwa mbere yabanzaga gucurura kuri ya nzoga. Nâ€™ubu abo duturanye mu ngo eshanu, esheshatu turabikora ndetse tugasangira nkâ€™abarashi.â€
Yakomeje agira ati â€œTwifuza ko hakwandikwa igitabo tukanoza ruriya rurimi rwacu kugira ngo ntiruzacike kuko abana bato ntabwo bakikivuga benshi bavuga ikinyarwanda gisanzwe. Abakobwa bacu benshi twabashyingiye abanyarwanda bituma bareka kugikoresha kigenda gikendera ariko hari abana bake bakivuga nubwo atari kinshi.â€
Umunyamabanga wa leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™urubyiruko nâ€™umuco Bamporiki Edouard avuga ko abakoresha indimi shami bakwiye kwitabwaho ngo kuko indimi shami zibitse ubumwe bwa bene zo.
Avuga ko kuba indimi shami zo mu Rwanda abazikoresha banakoresha ikinyarwanda bikwiriye gufatwa nkâ€™ubukungu.
Ati â€œAbakoresha ururimi shami rwâ€™ikirashi twabashishikariza ko uyu muco bawukomeraho kuko ni umuco ubahuza wubaka ubumwe bwabo nâ€™ubuvandimwe bwabo ntabwo ukwiye gucika tukanaboneraho kubaka uwâ€™abanyarwanda bose ariko duhereye kuri wa muco wacu uduhuza.â€
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda habarirwa indimi shami zitandukanye nkâ€™igikiga, ikigoyi, ikirera, amashi, ikirashi nâ€™izindi nyinshi zitandukanye.

Title: Imiryango ikomeye yakomotse ku muryango wâ€™umwami Cyilima II Rujugira
Body:
Mu mateka yâ€™abakurambere bafashije u Rwanda kuba igihangange, hari imiryango yagiye ihamya ibigwi nâ€™ibirindiro, ikagira amavugwa ku bwâ€™ibigwi nâ€™ibirindiro babaga barakoreye igihugu, hagati mu muryango mugari bakomokamo.
Mu mateka yâ€™abakurambere bafashije u Rwanda kuba igihangange, hari imiryango yagiye ihamya ibigwi nâ€™ibirindiro, ikagira amavugwa ku bwâ€™ibigwi nâ€™ibirindiro babaga barakoreye igihugu, hagati mu muryango mugari bakomokamo.
Cyilima Rujugira ni umwami wayoboye u Rwanda ahagana mu 1675 kugeza mu 1708, akaba umwe mu bakomotsweho imiryango myinshi kandi yagiye ikomera mu Rwanda.
Ni umwami wa 19 mu bami 28 bategetse u Rwanda, akaba nâ€™umwami wa 19 mu bantu 34 bagize uruhare mu mushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda. Izina rye ryâ€™ubutwari ryari â€œImpeshakuramaâ€™â€™.
Nkâ€™uko tubikesha igitabo â€œIyororoka ryâ€™Abanyarwanda, inkomoko yâ€™imiryango migari â€™â€™ ndetse nâ€™igitabo â€œIntwari zâ€™imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiroâ€™â€™ byombi dukesha Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, Cyilima II Rujugira ni mwene Yuhi Mazimpaka za Mibambwe Gisanura, Umwami wâ€™umunyiginya wo mu nzu yâ€™Abaganzu na Kirongoro cya Kagoro, ukomoka mu muryango mugari wâ€™Abega.
Amateka atugaragariza ko Umwami Rujugirwa rwa Mazimpaka, yabyaye abana benshi biganjemo Abahungu basaga batandatu barimo Gihana Nyamihana, Baziga, Mudenge, Gashikazi, Sharangabo na Ndabarasa ari nabyo byatumye inzu zimukomokaho ziba nyinshi.
Umuryango wâ€™umwami Cyilima Rujugira wabayemo ingabo zâ€™ibikongote ku ngoma ye nâ€™iyâ€™umuhungu we Kigeli Ndabarasa wamuzunguye ku ngoma. Banabaye abagaba bâ€™ingabo zâ€™intahusha mu gihe cye. Imitwe yâ€™Ingabo yatwarwaga nâ€™abana be harimo Abakemba batwarwaga na Sharangabo ya Cyilima Rujugira, Imvejuru zatwarwaga na Sharangabo ya Cyilima Rujugira, Indirira( Rugamba) zatwarwaga na Muciye ya Serutaro rwa Mukuku wa Mazimpaka, Abarima batwarwaga na Mitunga ya Cyilima Rujugira nâ€™umugabo we Seruhuga, Abatanyagwa batwarwaga na Gihana cya Cyilima Rujugira, Intarindwa zatwarwaga na Ndabarasa ba Cyilima Rujugira, Ababito batwarwaga na Ndabarasa ba Cyilima Rujugira, Indara zatwarwaga na Cyilima Rujugira rwa Yuhi Mazimpaka nâ€™Ababanda batwarwaga na Cyilima Rujugira rwa Yuhi Mazimpaka
Mu muryango wâ€™igihangange wa Cyilima Rujugira niho ahakomoka umutabazi wâ€™Umucengeri Gihana Nyamihana wari umuhungu wâ€™imfura ye, akaba nâ€™umugabo wa Nyiratunga waje kuba umugabekazi wa Yuhi Gahindiro, wemeye kumena amaraso ye kugira ngo u Rwanda rutsinde igitero cyâ€™ibihugu bine byari byishyize hamwe ngo bihanagureho u Rwanda, aribyo u Burundi, i Gisaka, u Bugesera na Ndorwa. Igitero cyagabwe ahasaga mu wa 1691.
Aba bagabo bâ€™Intarumikwa bafite inkomoko kwa Cyilima Rujugira, nibo babaye inkomoko yâ€™inzu zâ€™imiryango zo kwa Rujugira zikomoka mu muryango mugari wâ€™Abanyiginya.
Inzu zâ€™imiryango zikomoka kwa Cyilima Rujugira zirimo Abanyiginya bâ€™Abadenge bakomoka kuri Mudenge wa Cyilima Rujugira; Abanyiginya bâ€™Abakore bakomoka kuri Kanyankore ka Kanyoni ka Baziga ba Cyilima Rujugira; Abangiginya bâ€™Abahabanyi bakomoka kuri Bihabanyi bya Gashikazi ka Cyilima Rujugira; Abanyiginya bâ€™Abamo bakomoka kuri Rwamo rwa Gihana cya Cyilima Rujugira; Abanyiginya bâ€™Abanana bakomoka kuri Munana wa Gihana cya Cyilima Rujugira; Abanyigiya bâ€™Abasharangabo bakomoka kuri Sharangabo ya Cyilima Rujugira; Abanyigiya bâ€™Abarasa bakomoka kuri Ndabarasa ba Cyilima Rujugira;
Izindi nzu zihamye mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda zikomoka kwa Cyilima Rujugira, harimo nâ€™izo kwa Kigeli Ndabarasa umuhungu we wâ€™ubuheta nawe wabaye umwami. Mu nzu zâ€™imiryango zamukomotseho harimo Abanyiginya bâ€™Abanyemina bakomoka kuri Nyemina ya Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya bâ€™Abahebera bakomoka kuri Bihebera bya Semugaza wa Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya bâ€™Abarabyo bakomoka kuri Burabyo bwa Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya bâ€™Abanyabiguma bakomoka kuri Rwanyabiguma rwa Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya bâ€™Abaryinyonza bakomoka kuri Baryinyonza ba Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya bâ€™Abazenga bakomoka kuri Kazenga ka Kigeli Ndabarasa; Abanyiginya bâ€™Abamanuka bakomoka kuri Kimanuka cya Kigeli Ndabarasa;
Ngaho iyo mwama mukuru wa Cyilima Rujugira mu mizi yanyu mikuru.

Title: Ingoro yâ€™Abami yo mu Rukali yakiriye Inyambo Perezida Kagame yayigabiye
Body:
Ingoro yâ€™Umurage wâ€™Amateka yâ€™Abami iherereye mu Karere ka Nyanza mu Rukali yatangaje ko yakiriye imfizi yâ€™Inyambo yagabiwe na Perezida Kagame hagamijwe ko zororoka no kuzimurikira abanyarwanda ngo barusheho gusobanukirwa amateka yâ€™ibwami nâ€™icyo Inyambo zari zisobanuye.
Ingoro yâ€™Umurage wâ€™Amateka yâ€™Abami iherereye mu Karere ka Nyanza mu Rukali yatangaje ko yakiriye imfizi yâ€™Inyambo yagabiwe na Perezida Kagame hagamijwe ko zororoka no kuzimurikira abanyarwanda ngo barusheho gusobanukirwa amateka yâ€™ibwami nâ€™icyo Inyambo zari zisobanuye.
Ikigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda cyatangaje ko Perezida Kagame akigabiye iyo mfizi nyuma yo kubona ko ikenewe muri gahunda asanzwe agira zo gukurikirana ibikorwa bibera mu ngoro yâ€™abami yo mu Rukali akabona ko hakenewe imfizi nziza kugira ngo zororoke nâ€™abazisura babyishimire.
Kuwa Gatandatu tariki 8 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo iyo mfizi yagejejwe mu nyambo zo muri iyo ngoro iherereye mu Karere ka Nyanza hazwi nko mu Rukali, yakirwa nâ€™umuyobozi wâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Umurage, Amb. Robert Masozera.
Uyu munsi mu Rukali habaye umuhango wo kwakira imfizi yâ€™inyambo Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika @PaulKagame yagabiye #IngoroYâ€™UmurageWâ€™AmatekaYâ€™Abami iherereye @NyanzaDistrict @RwandaSouth @YouthCultureRW pic.twitter.com/DrGJnJxC58
â€” Museums of Rwanda (@RwandaMuseums) February 8, 2020
Gahongayire Yvonne, Ushinzwe Ingoro yâ€™Abami yo mu Rukali, yabwiye IGIHE ko biri muri gahunda ya leta yo guteza imbere inyambo zisobanuye byinshi mu mateka nâ€™umuco byâ€™u Rwanda.
Ati "Ririya shyo rero bari babibonye ko rikeneye inyambo kugira ngo zinororoke. Ni imfizi nziza bari bayitwemereye kugira ngo nâ€™abadusura bazibone kuko hari abanyarwanda benshi batazizi. Ni imfizi nziza izatubyarira Inyambo nziza."
Yavuze ko kubona imfizi nziza bifite icyo bisobanuye ku muco bari gusigasira wo kugarura Inyambo no gusobanurira abanyarwanda amateka yazo.
 Ati "Kuba yajemo ni ishema ku kigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™umurage, ni ishema byâ€™umwihariko ku ngoro yâ€™abami yo mu Rukali kuko twifuje kugarura umuco wâ€™ubworozi no kwereka abantu uko inyambo zabaga zimeze nâ€™icyo bisobanuye.â€
Yavuze ko izongera abasura iyo ngoro ndetse ashishikariza abanyarwanda kwitabira kuzisura kugira ngo basobanukirwe amateka yazo.
 Ati â€œAbanyarwanda baze barebe bamenye uko inka zabagaho, bamenye ngo inyambo zari zisobanuye iki ku mwami. Tuniteze nâ€™abashyitsi benshi kuko ni imfizi nziza. Bazaba benshi baza kuyireba kuko uko isa byonyine birakurura abantu.â€
Umuyobozi wâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Umurage, Amb. Robert Masozera; yashimiye Perezida wa Repubulika kuba yarahaye Abanyarwanda Ingoro nziza yâ€™Umurage Wâ€™Amateka yâ€™Abami imurikwamo inyambo, zari zaribagiranye mu muco nâ€™amateka byâ€™u Rwanda.
 U Rwanda rwiyemeje kugarura inyambo, aho rwashyizeho nâ€™urwuri zororerwamo rwa Gako ruherereye mu Karere ka Bugesera kugeza ubu rufite ishyo rimwe.

Title: U Bufaransa: Hasohotse igitabo gikubiyemo inyandiko zo mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
Body:
Hasohotse igitabo cyiswe â€˜Nuit Brouillard sur le Rwandaâ€™ ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda â€˜Ijoro ryâ€™uje ibihuâ€™, gikubiyemo inyandiko zanditswe nâ€™umunyamakuru wâ€™Umufaransa, Jean Chatain, wakoreraga igitangazamakuru â€˜Lâ€™HumanitÃ©â€™ mu gihe hakorwaga ubwicanyi muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Hasohotse igitabo cyiswe â€˜Nuit Brouillard sur le Rwandaâ€™ ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda â€˜Ijoro ryâ€™uje ibihuâ€™, gikubiyemo inyandiko zanditswe nâ€™umunyamakuru wâ€™Umufaransa, Jean Chatain, wakoreraga igitangazamakuru â€˜Lâ€™HumanitÃ©â€™ mu gihe hakorwaga ubwicanyi muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Jean Chatain mu kazi yakoze kagaragara mui iki gitabo, harimo kwerekana ukuntu ubugome burenze kamere bwari bwarinjijwe mu nterahamwe nâ€™utundi dutsiko twakoraga ubwicanyi dufashijwe na Leta yari iriho icyo gihe, tukaza kurwanywa nâ€™izari ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi icyo gihe.
Izo ngabo zagendaga zihura nâ€™imirambo inzira zose udasize iyacaga mu Akagera, isoko ya Nil, ibintu bihura neza nâ€™ibyo LÃ©on Mugesera yari yarahanuye muri mitingi yo ku Kabaya mu 1992 ko Abatutsi bazatemwa bakanyuzwa iyâ€™ubusamo baciye mu ruzi rwa Nil, bagana aho bakomoka muri Abssinie.
Ibyanditswe na Jean Chatain usanga mu nyadiko iri muri iki gitabo, bituma habaho kwibaza uko ubuyobozi bwâ€™icyo gihe bwa Leta yâ€™u Bufaransa, bwirengagije abicwaga bazira ko ari Abatutsi, ahubwo aho kubakiza bagatabara abicaga nâ€™ababayoboraga babaha ibikoresho nâ€™ibindi bari bakeneye.
Umwanditsi yerekana kandi agasanga abakoloni baragendeye ku mahame amwe nâ€™amwe bagahembera urwango bagacamo amoko ibice, bakabiba urwango rutagira ingano hagati yâ€™abanyarwanda ari rwo ba LÃ©on Mugesera bagendeyeho babiba ubwicanyi bwo gutema amajosi nâ€™imitwe byâ€™Abatutsi bakabajugunya muri Nyabarongo bagana mu ruzi rwa Nil.
Yibutsa mu nyandiko ze uko abasirikare bâ€™u Bufaransa, babaga boherejwe mu bihe bitandukanye babaga baje gufasha byâ€™umwihariko iyo Leta yabaga iri mu itegurwa rya jenoside.
Aha arabigarukaho mu buryo bwimbitse muri izo nyandiko ze ziri mu gitabo mu buryo bwimbitse.
Jean Chatain ni umwe mu banyamakuru bake bageze mu Rwanda muri icyo gihe cya jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi batanze ubuhamya bwâ€™ibyo babonye mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha ububi burenze kamere bwâ€™ibyabaga bibera ingabo za FPR, akaga kuko bagendaga bahura na byo mu nzira yo gushaka ko hagira urokoka no gushaka guhagarika ubwicanyi.
Uyu munyamakuru nubwo yifuzaga kubona iki gitabo cye gisohoka, ntiyagize ayo mahirwe kuko yitabye tariki ya 5 Ukuboza 2019 akikirangiza.
Iki gitabo kandi kirimwo inyandiko bita Iriburiro (PrÃ©face) yâ€™umwanditsi ku mateka ya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi uzwi cyane mu Bufaransa witwa Jacques Morel ari nawe ugikorera ubuvugizi muri ibi bihe kiri gushyirwa hanze.
Uyu yanditse igitabo kinini cyamenyekanye cyane yise â€˜La France au CÅ“ur du gÃ©nocide des Tutsiâ€™.
Usangamo uko ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 9 Mata 1994, i Kigali abaturage batangiye kwicwa, ibiganiro byo kuwa 30 Mata 1994, ku Mulindi, uyu munyamakuru yagiranye nâ€™abayobozi ba FPR.
Hari aho Mgr Rubwejanga yavuze ku mpunzi 800 ziciwe muri Ã©vÃªchÃ©. Ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 3 Gicurasi 1994, ubuhamya bwatanzwe nâ€™abapadiri ku bugome bwarimo bubera mu Rwanda, ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 6 Gicurasi 1994, ikiganiro Paul Kagame yahaye abanyamakuru ku mupaka wâ€™u Rwanda na Tanzania, tariki ya 9 Gicurasi 1994 amaraso menshi yaramenetse, harimo kandi ibya Radio rutwitsi RTLM kuri paji ya 75.
Muri iki gitabo unasangamo ibibazo byabajijwe uwari wungirije umuyobozi wa FPR icyo gihe kuri paji ya 89, ibohorwa ryâ€™Umujyi wa Byumba tariki ya 11 Gicurasi 1994, urupfu rwâ€™umwamikazi Gicanda kuri paji ya 117, iyicwa ryâ€™itsinda ryâ€™Abanyamakuru ku wa Mbere tariki ya 23 Gicurasi 1994 nâ€™ibindi.
Iki gitabo cyashyizwe hanze nâ€™inzu yâ€™ibitabo yitwa â€˜Edition Izubaâ€™ muri Mutarama 2020, gifite amapaji 283.
