Title: Impamvu umwami Rwabugili yafatwaga nkâ€™umugome, agakunda abagore
Body:
Abanyamateka bakunda kuvuga amateka ya Rwabugili basa nkâ€™aho bamunenga ngo kuko yari umwicanyi ruharwa mu gihe cyose yamaze ku ngoma ye.
Abanyamateka bakunda kuvuga amateka ya Rwabugili basa nkâ€™aho bamunenga ngo kuko yari umwicanyi ruharwa mu gihe cyose yamaze ku ngoma ye.
Babihera ku buryo nta mbabazi yagiraga ku rugamba, yicaga uwo bahanganye wese cyangwa uwo bamubwiye ko ari umugome nta gushishoza.
Niko umwami wabaye indwanyi koko, agakunda abagore byahebuje dore ko ari bo yishingikirizaga mu butasi, bakamuha amakuru yâ€™abamupangira imigambi mibisha.
Hejuru ya byose, Rwabugili yakundaga abana kuruta. Igitabo â€œIntwari zâ€™Imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda ruhagamya igitinyiroâ€ cyanditswe nâ€™Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, kigaragaza ko impamvu ya mbere yatumye Rwabugili afatwa nkâ€™umwami wâ€™umugome ari uko yapfushije nyina akiri muto ahasaga mu wa 1876, kandi agikeneye ukomeza kumuba hafi ngo bangaze amahanga, kandi agomba kumufasha gutegeka nkâ€™uko ihame ryâ€™iyimikabami ryari riri ku buyobozi bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Iryo hame ryavugaga ko umwami yagombaga gutegekana na nyina, yaba atakiriho bakamushakira undi ukomoka mu muryango wo kwa nyina cyangwa se undi mugore wâ€™umwami watanze ariko uri mu bwoko bwâ€™ibibanda byagombaga kuvamo Abagabekazi.
Ibinyoma byageretswe kuri nyina, bigatuma atanga, nyuma yaho agenzuriye agasanga baramubeshyeraga, byatumye mu mibereho ye ntawe yizera. Kuko mu babeshyeye nyina Murorunkwere ko atwite inda yâ€™umugaragu we Seruteganya, harimo abagore be batatu yakundaga [Nyiramarora, Nyiramparaye na Nyiraburunga wari kuzaba Umugabekazi ku ngoma izakurikiraho] kandi bari nâ€™abisengeneza bâ€™Umugabekazi Murorunkwere,
Impamvu ya kabiri yâ€™ubugome bwa Rwabugili, ni uko yarwanyijwe na se wabo Nkoronko, hakiyongeraho na Mukuru we Nyamwesa ya Rwogera bashaka kumwambura ingoma. Byatumye mu buzima bwe abaho azi neza ko nta muntu umukunda, nta nâ€™uwamucira akari urutega. Abaho agomba kwirwanaho mu buzima bwe bwose, kugeza asezeye ku Isi.
Yageze aho yanga gushaka undi mugabekazi wagombaga gusimbura nyina bagategekana, ahitamo gutegeka wenyine atagira umugabekazi.
Impamvu ya Gatatu yâ€™ubugome bwa Rwabugili, ni uko muri ibyo bihe byâ€™iyima rye, bimwe mu bihugu byari bikomeye byigaruriwe na ba sekuruza, byari bitangiye kwigomeka ngo byigaranzure u Rwanda bisubirane ubwigenge bwabyo. Kandi ibyo ntibyagombaga gushoboka, kuko umugambi wâ€™igihe kirekire wo kurwanya akajagari kâ€™uduhugu tutubakitse abami bâ€™i Gasabo bari baratangije, wagombaga gusohozwa nta kiwukomye mu nkokora.
Mu gihe nyina Murorunkwere yatangaga, nibwo ibyo bitero byari bigitangira, noneho Rwabugili akumva ibitero hirya no hino, akumva ngo aba nâ€™aba bigometse banga gutanga amakoro yâ€™ibwami, noneho byose byamuhuriraho bigatuma afata umwanzuro wihuse wo kugaba ibitero ntawe abigishijeho inama, kugira ngo acungure igihe cye.
Kutagira uwo yizera, kwifatira ibyemezo wenyine, kuzahazwa nâ€™amahanga yamuteraga yiyungikanya, byatumye afata ibyemezo bikaze byo kujya agaba ibitero bitagira Umucengeri. Mu mateka yâ€™Ingoma ya Rwabugili nâ€™ayâ€™ibitero yagabye mu mahanga, agaragaza ko nta Mutabazi wâ€™Umucengeri wabaye ku ngoma ye.
Impamvu ya Kane ariko yo idakanganye, nuko mu buzima bwe bwâ€™abato, yabubayemo yiga imikino njyarugamba gusa, ari nako akora imyitozo yo kurushyira mu bikorwa, bijyanye no gufata inshingano yo kuyobora akiri muto, aho yabikoraga ayobora abana bâ€™urungano rwe. Ibyo nabyo byatumye ashira ubwoba hakiri kare kandi akiri muto, hamwe nâ€™Ingabo zâ€™Ingangurarugo bakuranye mu muryango wâ€™ibwami kwa Rwogera.
Aha rero akaba ariho umuntu yakorera ubusesenguzi bwatuma Rwabugili akurwaho ikinegu. Kuko izo ngorane zose yahuye nazo mu iyima rye, nizo zatumye aba Umutabazi wâ€™Umucunguzi uhiye koko! Yitegura gutabarira u Rwanda nta na kimwe kimwisobye, kandi agakubita atababarira, akegura icumu rizira kunamuka.
Kugira abanzi benshi kandi bo mu muryango we, byatumye arushaho kugira amakenga cyane agahora yiteguye guhangana nâ€™uwamuvuguruza ku byemezo byo gutabarira igihugu yabaga yafashe, cyangwa se uwo ariwe wese washakaga kwigomeka ku butegetsi bwe.
Iyo mibereho igoranye Rwabugili yimanye Ingoma, yatumye aba mu bami bagabye ibitero bitasabye ko haboneka Umucengeri, kuko yabigabaga huti huti kubera ko byari byinshi, bigatuma atabona umwanya wo gushaka Umucengeri wamena amaraso ye kugira ngo u Rwanda rwigarurire ibindi bihugu.
Nubwo yateraga atabanje kohereza abacengeri, ibitero byose yagabye byaramuhiriye kugeza ku ndunduro yâ€™ubuzima bwe, nta na kimwe yatsinzwemo.

Title: Uko â€˜Girinkaâ€™ yifashishijwe mu guhangana nâ€™ubukene mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda
Body:
Inka yagiye igira amateka akomeye bikozwe nâ€™abami bâ€™u Rwanda, mu rwego rwo kuziteza imbere, kugira ngo ibe urufatiro rwâ€™ubukungu nâ€™umutekano wâ€™igihugu.
Inka yagiye igira amateka akomeye bikozwe nâ€™abami bâ€™u Rwanda, mu rwego rwo kuziteza imbere, kugira ngo ibe urufatiro rwâ€™ubukungu nâ€™umutekano wâ€™igihugu.
Inka yabaye ishingiro nâ€™inkingi ya mwamba mu kugena ahazaza hâ€™u Rwanda, aho Gihanga I Ngomijana wahanze ingoma yâ€™i Gasabo, yahaye umurongo ubworozi bwâ€™inka mu rwego ruhanitse, anazigira ikintu gitagatifu mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda.
Inka yabaye ishingiro mu kubaka ubukungu bwâ€™igihugu, ububanyi nâ€™amahanga, kurwanya ubukene mu benegihugu, umuhuza wâ€™imiryango nâ€™igikoresho cya Politiki yo kwigarurira ibihugu bigera kuri 29 byariho mu bihe byâ€™ihangwa ryâ€™igihugu cya Gasabo.
Mu gitabo â€œIntwari zâ€™imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiroâ€ nâ€™ikindi cyitwa â€œIkeshamvugo mu Kinyarwandaâ€ byombi byâ€™Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, hagaragaramo ko kubera icyo cyerekezo Gihanga yahaye Inka, byatumye aca iteka ko inka zigomba kuba nyinshi mu gihugu kandi buri muturage akabasha kugezwaho ibyiza bizikomokaho.
Gihanga yaciye iteka rishyiraho gahunda yo guteza imbere ubworozi bwâ€™inka no kuzigaba. Iyo gahunda yayise â€œGabirwaâ€™â€™, ari nayo yabaye inkomoko yâ€™izina ryâ€™Umurenge wa Jabana nâ€™ubundi bisobanura â€œGabirwaâ€. Guhera ubwo umuco wo kugabirana inka wimakazwa guhera ubwo, aho yabitoje ahereye ku gihugu cyâ€™igituranyi cyâ€™u Buliza cyane cyane mu Murenge wa Jabana.
Gahunda ya Gabirwa, niyo Gahunda ya mbere yashyizweho mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda, yo guteza imbere ubworozi bwâ€™inka no kuzigaba.
Uko imyaka yarushagaho kwicuma ari nako umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda urushaho kujya mbere, niko inka zarushagaho kugira ibigwi, ari no kuba nyinshi no kurushaho gukemura byinshi mu bibazo igihugu cyari gifite.
Ku ngoma ya Mibambwe Gisanura, yifashishije inka arwanya imirire mibi, aho yashyizeho amashyo akamirwa abakene, aho buri gitondo batondaga umurongo baje iwe mu Ruhango ndetse nâ€™ahandi henshi yagiye ashyira ayo mashyo yâ€™inka, baje gukamisha. Ibyo byatumye abaturage bakurizaho kumwita â€œRugabishabirengeâ€ kuko yagiraga ubuntu bwinshi.
Mu bihe byâ€™ingoma ya Yuhi Gahindiro inka yagize ibigwi bikomeye inahabwa nâ€™ishingano nyinshi cyane cyane mu kubaka ubukungu bwâ€™igihugu, ubuhahirane nâ€™ubutwererane bwâ€™abenegihugu nâ€™imibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage, ugereranyije nâ€™abamubanjirije. Ku ngoma ye, yaciye amateka menshi agamije ahanini imibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage.
Hari nkâ€™aho yagize ati â€œNta munyarwanda ukwiye kubaho atagira inka, amata, umugabo, umugore, abana nâ€™ibindi.â€ Mu gushyira mu bikorwa iryo teka, buri muntu wese yahawe inka yo korora, udafite umugabo kubera impamvu runaka baramushyingira, udafite umugore nawe nuko nâ€™abadafite abana ku mpamvu zo kuba inshike nâ€™izâ€™ubugumba, ababyaye benshi bakabaha abana, abadafite amata kubera inka zabo zatetse cyangwa se zitarabyara, bakayoboka iyo kwa Gahindiro cyangwa se ku batware be, bakajya gukamisha.
Mu bihe byâ€™ingoma ye, ni ukuvuga ahasaga mu wa 1746-1802, yaciye iteka rishyiraho gahunda ya â€œGirinkaâ€ naryo rifite umurongo wo guteza imbere ubworozi bwâ€™inka no kuziha umurongo wo kuba urufatiro rwubakirwaho ubukungu bwâ€™ikirenga bwâ€™igihugu nâ€™imibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage.
Kugira ngo iryo teka ryaciwe na Gahindiro ka Sentabyo rikwire kandi rikurikizwe, yarishyize mu ndamukanyo yâ€™Abanyarwanda. Aho bagombaga kuramukanye bifurizanya ibyo byiza byatuwe mu iteka ryâ€™umwami Yuhi Gahindiro. Baramukanyagaga bagira bati â€œGirinka, Girabana, Giramata, Girumugabo, Girumugoreâ€ nâ€™izindi.
Gahunda yaciwe nâ€™iteka rya Yuhi Gahindiro, niyo yiswe â€œGirinkaâ€, iba gahunda ya gatatu mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda igamije guteza imbere ubworozi bwâ€™inka.
No mu bihe bya Repubulika, cyane cyane mu bihe byo kongera kubaho kâ€™u Rwanda, nyuma yâ€™uko hahagaritswe Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Umukuru wâ€™igihugu cyâ€™u Rwanda Paul Kagame, ntiyatanzwe no gufata ibyiza biri mu muco nâ€™amateka yâ€™abakurambere mpangarwanda, ngo abyifashishe mu kubaka igihugu no kukizahura dore ko cyari kivuye habi.
Byatumye mu 2006 asaba ko buri munyarwanda agomba gutunga inka, ikaba ishingiro ryo kurwanya ubukene, kwimakaza imibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage no kurwanya imirire mibi. Muri uwo mwaka, nibwo yatangije gahunda ya â€œ Girinkaâ€™â€™ irongera igira ishyikizo mu mibereho yâ€™Abanyarwanda. Niyo gahunda ya kane mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda, yeteje imbere ubworozi bwâ€™inka mu Rwanda.
Izi gahunda zose, yaba iya Gihanga, yaba iya Gisanura, yaba iya Gahindiro ndetse nâ€™iya Kagame, zose zari zifite icyo zihuriyeho. Inka zahabwaga abaturage zose zabaga ari izâ€™ubuntu, ariko uyihawe akazagabira mugenzi we, nawe agatunga agatunganirwa, agahorana amata ku ruhimbi.
Haba mu bihe byâ€™abami, no mu bihe bya Repubulika, inka iracyabonwa nkâ€™igikoresho cyarwanya ubukene cyane mu Banyarwanda, kikaba nâ€™ishingiro ryo kwigira nâ€™imibereho myiza yuje ubuzima buzira umuze.

Title: Hagiye kumurikwa igitabo gihishura amabanga yâ€™imiryango ishaka icyubahiro igahishira abana bahohotewe
Body:
Igitabo cyiswe Lâ€™oncle GynÃ©cologue kivuga umwana wâ€™umukobwa wahohotewe inshuro ebyiri ariko agatereranwa nâ€™umuryango we, washakaga kurinda icyubahiro cyawo kigiye kumurikirwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Igitabo cyiswe Lâ€™oncle GynÃ©cologue kivuga umwana wâ€™umukobwa wahohotewe inshuro ebyiri ariko agatereranwa nâ€™umuryango we, washakaga kurinda icyubahiro cyawo kigiye kumurikirwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Ni igitabo Numuhire Caroline yanditse mu myaka 10 ishize ubwo yatangiraga amasomo ye ya kaminuza. Umwanditsi nta bushobozi cyangwa ubundi bufasha yari afite ariko amahitamo yâ€™ingingo cyibanzeho ishingiye ku nkuru ndende yatangariwe na benshi bijyanye nâ€™ubuhanga cyandikanye.
Inkuru mpimbano ikubiye muri Lâ€™oncle GynÃ©cologue ivuga ku mwana wâ€™umukobwa watewe inda nâ€™umusore bakundanaga yajya kwipimisha kugira ngo amenye uko ahagaze, agasaba ubufasha nyirarume witwa Mathias akahahurira nâ€™ibyago birenze ibyo yari afite kuko amufata ku ngufu.
Ntarindwa DiogÃ¨ne wamamaye nka Atome mu gusetsa ni we uzafasha Numuhire kumurika icyo gitabo muri Kigali.
Uyu munyarwenya ubihuza no kwandika avuga ko atari asanzwe aziranye na Numuhire ahubwo na we yakuruwe nâ€™ubuhanga buri muri icyo gitabo ahitamo gushaka inzira yo gusakaza ubutumwa bukirimo ku bantu benshi.
Ati â€œKu myaka ye ni ibintu bidasanzwe, ni igitabo cyandikanywe ubuhanga ku buryo ugitangiye agisoma kugeza akirangije. Yacyanditse ku buryo kigutera amatsiko ugashyirwa ari uko ukirangije. Sinari muzi naramumenye numva ari uwo gushyigikirwa kugira ngo atabyihererana.â€
Yakomeje avuga ko inkuru yuko Numuhire yacyanditse azayigarukaho mu imurikwa ryacyo izafasha nâ€™abandi kugira umuhate wo kwandika.
Ati â€œNjyewe nahuye nâ€™uwo mukobwa ambwira ibyo yanditse ndamubwira nti â€˜ibyo bintu ntubyihererane kandi hanze aha hari abandi bana bafite impano zo kwandika kugira ngo bamenye ko hari uwababanjirije bamufatireho urugero biba ari byiza. Kumva ko ari igitabo cyanditswe nâ€™umwana wâ€™umukobwa nta bundi bushobozi uretse ko ari uko yiyumvagamo iyo mpano. Numvise ari ikintu cyo gushyigikira.â€
Igikorwa cyo kumurika icyo gitabo giteganyijwe kubera kuri Westerwelle Start up Haus Kigali mu nyubako ya Fair View Building ku Kimihurura guhera saa Kumi nâ€™Ebyiri zâ€™umugoroba wo ku wa 29 Mutarama 2020.
Numuhire yavukiye muri Butare mu 1988. Yize ibijyanye nâ€™Iterambere ryâ€™Icyaro nâ€™Ubuzima mu yahoze ari Kaminuza Nkuru yâ€™u Rwanda. Yananditse ibindi bitabo birimo "Mirror Of Stolen Heartsâ€™â€™
Yabaye Umuyobozi wa Generation Rise, umuryango wita ku burezi bwâ€™umukobwa umufasha kugira ubumenyi bumuganisha ku ntego zâ€™ubuzima, kwitinyuka, kwigirira icyizere no kuvugira mu ruhame.
Kumurika icyo gitabo biri mu bikorwa byâ€™uruhererekane Ntarindwa yise Lâ€™Atomiom byo guteza imbere imishinga yâ€™indashyikirwa yâ€™abakiri bato mu buryo bukwiriye.
Lâ€™Atomiom izabanza kwibanda ku kumurika ibitabo mu bikorwa byiswe "ScÃ¨ne LittÃ©raireâ€™â€™ bigamije gukundisha Abanyarwanda kubyandika no kubisoma ariko nyuma izafata nâ€™ibindi bikorwa.
Biteganyijwe ko mu mezi ya mbere bizibanda ku bitabo byanditswe ku Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ariko bikazajya binareba ku zindi ngingo zitandukanye zirimo imibereho myiza na siporo.

Title: Twinjire mu gitabo â€˜Mamba Mentalityâ€™ gikubiyemo amabanga yafashije Kobe Bryant kuba igihangange muri Basketball
Body:
Umunsi umwe yaravuze ati â€œNtacyo ntakora ngo ntsinde umukino, byaba kwicara ku ntebe yâ€™abasimbura nzunguza igitambaro (afana) , haba guhereza amazi bagenzi banjye bari mu kibuga cyangwa kujya mu kibuga nkakinaâ€.
Umunsi umwe yaravuze ati â€œNtacyo ntakora ngo ntsinde umukino, byaba kwicara ku ntebe yâ€™abasimbura nzunguza igitambaro (afana) , haba guhereza amazi bagenzi banjye bari mu kibuga cyangwa kujya mu kibuga nkakinaâ€.
Iyo ni yo myumvire ya Black Mamba, akabyiniriro kâ€™umukinnyi wâ€™ibihe byose wa Basketball muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Kobe Bryant.
Izina Black Mamba, Kobe yaryiyise nyuma yo kureba filime â€˜Kill Billâ€™ ya Quentin Tarantino, aho umugore witwa Uma Thurman yashakaga kwihorera ku bagizi ba nabi bashatse kumwica we nâ€™umwana yari atwite. Uwo mugore yakoreshaga izina ryâ€™ibanga rya Black Mamba.
Ni imyumvire yamuyoboye imyaka 20 yamaze akinira LA Lakers ari nayo kipe yonyine yakiniye kuva yakwinjira muri NBA avuye mu mashuri. Yakinnye imikino 18 ya All-Star muri iyo myaka yose, atsinda amanota 33643. Yatwaye ibikombe bitanu bya NBA akinira LA Lakers.
Benshi bakura bafite abo bafata nkâ€™icyitegererezo, ndetse bumva bashaka kuba nka bo ariko Bryant yari yararenze iyo myumvire, ubwo bamwitaga Michael Jordan mushya akabasubiza ati â€œNtabwo nshaka kuba Michael Jordan, njye nshaka kuba Kobe Bryant.â€
Iyo mitekerereze yamuyoboye mu rugendo rwâ€™imyaka 20 na nyuma kugeza kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020 ubwo yagwaga mu mpanuka ya kajugujugu ari kumwe nâ€™umukobwa we wâ€™imyaka 13 nâ€™abandi bantu umunani.
Imitekerereze yo guhangana kugeza ku munota wa nyuma, yatumye mu Ukwakira 2018 Kobe Bryant yandika igitabo â€˜Mamba Mentality: How I Playâ€™ gikubiyemo impanuro, inama nâ€™uburyo yakoresheje ngo amare imyaka 20 akiri igihangange muri Basketball.
Mamba Mentality ni imvugo ikubiyemo kwiyemera no kwiyemeza, bigomba kuranga buri muntu, atari umukinnyi wa Basketball gusa, ahubwo no mu buzima busanzwe kugira ngo ube uwo ugomba kuba we.
Igitabo Mamba Mentality: How I Play, Kobe yacyanditse nkâ€™umurage ku bakiri bato bashaka kuba ibihangange muri Basketball no mu bundi buzima busanzwe.
Ni igitabo kigutwara kikakwinjiza imbere mu bitekerezo byâ€™umwe mu bakinnyi bâ€™ibihangange ba Basketabll Isi yagize, kikakwereka icyatumaga atsinda, amayeri yakoreshaga ngo atsinde, uko yiteguraga umukino nâ€™ibindi.
Muri icyo gitabo cyasohotse mu Ukwakira 2018, imyaka ibiri Kobe Bryant asezeye muri Basketball, hari aho yagize ati â€œNakundaga kubuza abantu amahoro, bakumva badatekanye. Ibyo nibyo bituma abantu bitekerezaho, bagakora impinduka. Ushatse wavuga ko natumye abantu batinyuka kuba abo ari bo mu buryo bwiza.â€
Ukurikiye imbwirwaruhame nyinshi za Kobe ku cyatumye aba igihangange, ijambo â€˜kubuza amahoro uwo bahanganyeâ€™ riza kenshi.
Yavuze ko buri mukinnyi wese babaga bari gukina, yamubuzaga amahoro bitewe nâ€™uwo ari we, bisobanuye ko yabanzaga gufata umwanya wo kwiga abakinnyi bagiye guhura.
Yagize ati â€œNatangiraga kumwigaho nkareba uko yitwara. Najyaga kureba amateka ye, nkanumva intego afite izo ari zo. Nigaga igituma yumva atekanye, ndetse nâ€™igituma yumva adatekanye. Nyuma yo kubimenya, namukoraga icyo nshatse, nkamukubita ahababaza mu gihe nyacyo.â€
Mbere gato yo gusohora igitabo cye, Kobe Bryant yavuze ko muri make Mamba Mentality, bivuze â€œkugerageza ibishoboka byose ukaba wowe nyawe kugeza ubwo nta wundi wowe usigayeâ€.
Imitekerereze ya Mamba Mentality, Kobe yayisigiye na LeBron James, umwe mu bihangange Isi isigaranye mu mukino wa Basketball.
Mu gitabo cye, Kobe avuga uburyo yigeze gukina mu ikipe imwe na LeBron James bakinira ikipe yâ€™igihugu, Team USA, akabona uburyo yitwara nabi akamuhindura akoresheje Mamba Mentality.
Kobe yagize ati â€œIntego yanjye buri gihe yabaga ari ukubabaza uwo duhanganye. Ikintu cyâ€™ingenzi njye na LeBron twaganiriye ni iyo mitekerereze yo kubabaza uwo muhanganye. Ndibuka hari ubwo twari turi gukina nabi, naje mu rwambariro tugiye mu karuhuko, mbabaza igituma twitwara nabi. Mu gice cya kabiri, LeBron yakoze ibidasanzwe, yazanye indi mitekerereze yo gutsinda. Guhera ubwo akina agamije kurusha abandi.â€
Igitabo cya Kobe Bryant cyâ€™amapaji 208 kiboneka mu nzu zigurisha ibitabo hirya no hino ku Isi no ku mbuga za internet zigurisha ibitabo nka Amazon.
Kobe Bryant wari ufite imyaka 41, yasize umugore nâ€™abana batatu.

Title: Urugamba rwâ€™injyanamuntu rwa Rwabugili, mu gitero cyâ€™Imigogo cyigishije Abanyarwanda uburyo bushya bwo kurwana
Body:
Mu bami bayoboye u Rwanda, iyo bigeze kuri Kigeli Rwabugili buri wese aca akarongo kuko ni umwe mu bami bâ€™indwanyi kabombo u Rwanda rwagize kuva ari umwaka kugeza ku munsi we wa nyuma.
Mu bami bayoboye u Rwanda, iyo bigeze kuri Kigeli Rwabugili buri wese aca akarongo kuko ni umwe mu bami bâ€™indwanyi kabombo u Rwanda rwagize kuva ari umwaka kugeza ku munsi we wa nyuma.
Mu bami bayoboye u Rwanda, iyo bigeze kuri Kigeli Rwabugili buri wese aca akarongo kuko ni umwe mu bami bâ€™indwanyi kabombo u Rwanda rwagize kuva ari umwana kugeza ku munsi we wa nyuma.
Ni umwami wahuye nâ€™ibizazane ubwo yateraga ubwami bwa Nkore muri Uganda, akagenda yitwaje imyambi nâ€™imiheto abo agiye kurwanya asanga bitwaje imbunda maze baramurasa karahava, ingabo ze nyinshi zirahatikirira.
Uburyo yari indwanyi, yatashye agatoki agakubita ku kandi, abigira amayeri maze aza gusubirayo ahakora akantu, imbunda zâ€™abagande zihinduka ubusa imbere yâ€™imyambi yâ€™abanyarwanda.
Nkâ€™uko tubikesha igitabo â€œIntwari zâ€™imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiroâ€™â€™ cyanditswe nâ€™Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, igitero Rwabugili nâ€™ingabo ze bagabye ku Banyankore bâ€™Abahinda ku nshuro ya kabiri, cyasize amateka ndetse cyitirirwa igitero cyâ€™imigogo, kuko cyasize imirambo myinshi yâ€™Abanyankole kugeza ubwo imwe bayifashisha bambuka umugezi.
Mu gitero cya mbere bagabye muri Ankole kiyobowe na Nyamuhenda wa Kajeje nâ€™ingabo zâ€™Ibisumizi yari atwaye, bazibiranyijwe nâ€™amasasu nâ€™imbunda byâ€™Abanyankole, niko gutabaza Rwabugili aho yari mu bitero yagabye mu Burengerazuba bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Rwabugili nâ€™ingabo ze bitabye Nyamuhenda, ngo baze gukuraho igisuzuguriro cyâ€™Abanyankole ku Rwanda kuko bwari ubwa mbere mu mateka Rwabugili atsindwa nâ€™abanyankole.
Bakoranyije abaturage, abagabo nâ€™abasore ngo bitegure bagabe ikindi gitero, bivaneho icyo gisuzuguriro.
Bakigera i Rutaraka babanje kwitoza uko bazarwana urwo rugamba, mu gihe ingabo zahasesekaye zitegereje izindi ko zihagera ngo bashoze urugamba, nibwo bitoyemo imitwe ibiri, umwe bawitirira Abanyankole, undi bawitirira Abanyarwanda. Barakirana karahava, umutwe wâ€™Abanyarwanda utsinda uwâ€™Abanyankole, bihita biha igihamya ko Abanyarwanda bazatsinda Abanyankole.
Mu gihe bari mu myitozo yâ€™uko bazivugana Abanyankole, Rwabugili yari yatarabukiye mu rugo rwe rwari i Gatsibo, aho agarukiye atangira gushyiraho abagaba bâ€™ingabo bâ€™icyo gitero. Hatoranyijwe Nyamuhenda wa Kajeje nâ€™Ingabo zâ€™Ibisumizi yari akuriye nkâ€™Umugaba wazo ngo bajye kurwana nâ€™Abanyankole bari bafite imitwe itatu itatu yâ€™Ingabo zirimo Imigogo nâ€™ingogo nâ€™umutwe witwaga Inyana wâ€™intwari zarobanuriwe gutoza kurashisha imbunda.
Ubwo Nyamuhenda bamuhaye izina ryâ€™ubugaba rya Kigeli Ndabarasa nkâ€™umukurambere wâ€™ibihangange byâ€™abami bâ€™u Rwanda byatsinze ingoma ya Ndorwa, bamuha nâ€™umugaba wungirije Ruvuzacyuma rwa Semuzigura watwaraga umutwe wâ€™ingabo zâ€™Abadahemuka. Rwabugili amuha izina ryâ€™ubugaba rya Mibambwe Sekarongoro Mutabazi, kuko ariwe wabashije gutsinda Abanyoro akabatsinsura burundu ubutazagaruka gutera u Rwanda.
Ibigwi byâ€™abo bami bagirije ayo mahanga, byahesheje u Rwanda ubugabo bwo guhangana nâ€™Abanyankole. Umutasi wa Rwabugili muri icyo gihe yari Kambwa ka Rwakarengwa.
Ntare Rugingiza rwa Migereka umwami wa Nkole, yagerageje kohereza Abatasi benshi ngo bamubwire imiterere yâ€™ingabo Rwabugili yitwaje, maze bamukurira inzira ku murima ko atazazitsinda, bagira bati â€œIngabo Rwabugili yitwaje, si abantu babyarwa, ubanza Rwabugili abahinga, akabasarura nkâ€™imyaka! Ikiruta ni uko twagirana imishyikirano tukabasubiza inka zabo, naho ubundi ntituzabakiraâ€
Icyakora Ntare yanze kumva izo nama zâ€™abatasi be akomeza kurasa mu ngerero zâ€™ingabo zâ€™u Rwanda byâ€™ubushotoranyi. Yiringiye imbunda yahawe nâ€™Abongereza, yibwira ko ari we uzifite wenyine, ntamenye ko na Rwabugili yari afite umutwe wâ€™ngabo ugizwe nâ€™abagabo bâ€™inkorokoro 60, barwanishaga imbunda bitwaga â€œIbyinigiriâ€.
Nyuma yo kurushaho gutekereza ku magambo Nyamuhenda yamubwiye yâ€™uburyo barashwe nâ€™ingabo zâ€™Abanyankole bagahitamo kugaruka kugira ngo zitabamara, Rwabugili yahise yunguka igitekerezo cyihuse dore ko yagiraga nâ€™ubwonko bunyaruka mu gushaka igisubizo cyâ€™ibibazo abajijwe mu buryo bwihuse.
Yahise abaha igitekerezo ati â€œNdabona muri iriya myuko bafite hari ikintu gishamitseho kimeze nkâ€™ishami ryâ€™igiti bakurura kigakaka, hanyuma bagahita bakura akandi kari mu nsi yaho bakohereza umuriro mu kirere. None ubwo bimeze bityo, niba barasa hejuru, nibajya batangira gukurura kiriya kintu gikaka mujye muhita muryama, kuko nabonye gitinda mu kugikurura, nibamara kuboherezaho uriya muriro bitegura kongera gukurura cya kintu gikaka nabonye kibatwara umwanya, mujye muhita mubyuka nâ€™ingoga mwoherezeyo imyambi nâ€™amacumuâ€™â€™.
Rwabugili kuba yarise imbunda imyuko, si uko atari azizi, ahubwo bwari uburyo bwo kuzihinyura no kuzitesha agaciro. Amateka yâ€™u Rwanda agaragaza ko icyo gitero cyo mu Nkole cyabaye Rwabugili afite imbunda zigera kuri 60 zari mu mutwe wâ€™Ingabo zâ€™Ibyinigiri. Bityo bakaba nta gaciro yazihaye mu bitero yagabye ku mahanga kuko we yabonaga kuzikoresha ari ukwisuzuguza no gutesha agaciro ubutwari bwâ€™Abanyarwanda.
Ingabo za Rwabugili nâ€™abagaba bâ€™Ingabo zose bari kumwe baba abarwanira mu mazi no ku butaka, bamaze iminsi itari munsi yâ€™itatu bitoza uko bazabigenza.
Umunsi warageze, basatira Ingabo zâ€™Abanyankole, zitangira kurasa nabo bakaryama, isasu ryamara gusohoka bagahita babyuka bwangu, bagatamika imyambi nâ€™amacumu mu gihe abandi bakirangariye mu byo kwambika amasasu mu mbunda no kwizihirwa nâ€™ako gashya kadutse, abandi bakaba baboherejemo urufaya rwâ€™imyambi nâ€™amacumu.
Babikoze rimwe, kabiri, ubwa gatatu babona bamaze kugarika Ingabo zâ€™Abanyankole nyinshi, nubwo hatabuze nâ€™Abanyarwanda bagwamo batari bacengewe neza nâ€™amabwiriza mashya yâ€™urugamba.
Rwabugili amaze kubona ko hari abamaze kumenya ubucakura bushya bwâ€™imirwano, atanga umurishyo wâ€™impuruza, Ingabo ziravunura zigaruka inyuma. Barongera basubira i Rutaraka bajya gusubiramo imigendekere yâ€™urugamba. Bamaze kubona ko uburyo bize aribwo kandi burimo gutanga umusaruro, batangiye gutekereza neza uburyo bakomeza urugamba, ariko nta ngabo nyinshi zikomeje gupfa.
Rwabugili yabunguye indi nama yâ€™uburyo bushya bwo gukomeza kurwana. Yatangiye kubaha imyitozo mishya yo kurasa imyambi bagaramye, ku buryo umuntu yashoboraga gutamika umwambi umuheto awufatiye mu mano ubundi akohereza, ibyo byari kubafasha kuticwa nâ€™amasasu yâ€™Abanyankole kuko bo barasaga hejuru gusa, ku buryo uryamye batabashaga kumuboneza mu cyico. Rwabugili nâ€™abagaba be bâ€™Ingabo, bitoza uwo mwitozo barawunoza neza neza, banawutoza nâ€™Ingabo bari bakuriye, babona ko nta cyababuza gutsinda Abanyankole. Uburyo bwo kurasa â€œUmugaramirizoâ€ bwinjira butyo mu mirwanire yâ€™Abanyarwanda.
Rwabugili ntabwo yari afite umugambi wo gutsinda Abanyankole gusa, ahubwo yashakaga no kubambura izo mbunda akazitwara nawe akazajya azirwanisha. Yahise abwira Ingabo ze ko bagomba no kwiga uburyo bwakoreshwa ngo babambure ziriya mbunda, atari ukubatsinda gusa.
Nyamuhenda wa Kajeje umugaba wâ€™ibisumizi, yunguka igitekerezo cyâ€™uburyo bamwe mu gihe baba barimo kurasana nâ€™Abanyankole barangamiye imirwano, hatoranywa undi mutwe wâ€™ingabo ukagenda wihishahisha mu byatsi ku buryo bagera ku ngabo zâ€™Abanyankore zikirangamiye imirwano, bakazifata mpiri bakazambura izo mbunda, dore ko muri ibyo bihe habaga ibyo bitero muri Gashyantare 1894, ibyatsi byâ€™umukenke biboneka muri ako Karere kâ€™i Burasirazuba, byari byishimiye imvura yâ€™umuhindo byari byarakuze cyane, ku buryo umuntu yashoboraga kugendamo akambakamba cyangwa se akicaramo ntumubone.
Aho niho bungukiye igitekerezo gikomeye cyo gufata imitwe yâ€™Ingabo irimo abagabo bâ€™abanyambaraga bakagenda bakambakamba nkâ€™ibikururanda bakagera mu rugerero hagati babatunguye, bakabambura izo mbunda.
Uburyo bushya bwâ€™imirwano bwatanze umusaruro mwinshi muri icyo gitero, kuko abatamikaga bagaramye, boherezaga imyambi nâ€™amacumu akica Ingabo zâ€™Abanyankole gitunguro batabona ubarasa uwo ariwe. Abakusha, bagenda babyuka baryama, bahaguruka, bicara, nibo barangaje Ingabo zâ€™Abanyankole noneho ntibamenya ko hari indi mitwe yâ€™Ingabo igiye kubagwa gitumo, indi irimo kubarasa iryamye.
Icyo gitero cyarangiye u Rwanda rutsinze abanyankole, barabica ku buryo bukomeye kugeza ubwo mu kugaruka bambuka, Abanyarwanda bifashishije imirambo yâ€™abanyankole ngo bambuke umugezi.

Title: Inzira yâ€™inzitane nâ€™ubuzima bugoranye umwami Yuhi Musinga yanyuzemo
Body:
Imyaka irasatira 76, Umwami Yuhi V Musinga atanze kuko yatanze ku wa 25 Ukuboza 1944, atangiye mu buhungiro, i Moba muri Congo nyuma yo kwirukanwa mu Rwanda nâ€™Ababiligi, agasimbuzwa umuhungu we Mutara III Rudahigwa.
Imyaka irasatira 76, Umwami Yuhi V Musinga atanze kuko yatanze ku wa 25 Ukuboza 1944, atangiye mu buhungiro, i Moba muri Congo nyuma yo kwirukanwa mu Rwanda nâ€™Ababiligi, agasimbuzwa umuhungu we Mutara III Rudahigwa.
Birashoboka ko Musinga ari umwe mu bami bâ€™u Rwanda bayoboye mu bihe bibi cyane, nta bunararibonye bwo guhangana nabyo afite, ndetse nâ€™ibizazane yahanganye nabyo kandi inkuruzi yabyo atarayigizemo uruhare.
Amateka agaragaza ko Musinga yabayeho mu bihe bibi kandi bikomeye, birimo amahwa nâ€™ubusharire bwinshi, uhereye mu bwana bwe, kugeza atanze.
Yuhi Musinga, ni uwa Kigeli Rwabugili na Nyirayuhi Kanjogera, ni umwe mu bana basaga cumi na batanu Rwabugili yabyaranye nâ€™abagore be bagera kuri 20. Yimye ingoma mu Ukuboza 1896 kugeza ku wa 12 Ugushyingo 1931.
Rwabugili yashatse Kanjogera mu buryo butunguranye, kuko se Rwakagara, yamuzanye ibwami nkâ€™uje kumutura Rwabugili, biza kurangira abaye umwe mu bagore bwa Rwabugili, ndetse wâ€™inkundwakazi kuruta abandi.
Rwabugili yashatse Kanjogera nyuma yâ€™urupfu rwa nyina Murorunkwere, wapfuye urwâ€™akagambane, igihe cyo kumwerera kigeze baraguriza umugore ugomba kweza Rwabugiri nkâ€™uko amategeko yâ€™ubwiru yabiteganyaga, inzuzi zerekana Kanjogera.
Ubukwe bwa Kanjogera bwabaye ahasaga mu wa 1879, bubera ku Ngara za Bumbogo bwa Gasabo ( ubu ni mu Kagali ka Ngara mu Murenge wa Bumbogo wo mu Karere ka Gasabo).
Abandi bagore ba mbere uko ari batatu bari baratesherejwe icyizere no kubeshya bagatuma inzirakarengane zipfa. Nguko uko Kanjogera yagiriwe icyizere yinjira mu buzima bwa Rwabugiri atyo.
Mu mvugo ivunaguye, Yuhi V Musinga wari ufite igisingizo cya Rugwizakurinda ni umwe mu bami bâ€™u Rwanda wahuye nâ€™insanganya mu buzima kurusha benshi, akaba umwami wasuzuguwe bikabije cyane kurusha abandi bami bose, umwami wasimbutse urupfu incuro nyinshi kurusha abandi.
Ni we mwami wa mbere mu Rwanda watunze amafaranga aturutse i Burayi. Ni na we wa mbere wize amasomo azanywe nâ€™abazungu. Yigishwaga na mwarimu Laurent Nduhura amusanga mu ngoro ye i Nyanza. Musinga yumvaga neza igiswahili akamenya amwe mu magambo yâ€™ikidage, ku buryo atari akeneye umusemuzi igihe yavuganaga nâ€™abazungu.
Mu myaka ye 35 yamaze ku butegetsi, mu Rwanda imbere habayemo ibitero 38 byâ€™ingabo zifite imbunda ziyobowe nâ€™abazungu, abarwanyi ari abanyamahanga bahanganye nâ€™abanyarwanda. Ahagana ku ndunduro yâ€™ubuzima bwe, Musinga yaba yarafunzwe incuro zirenga eshatu, muri za kasho zâ€™abazungu i Cyangugu ,i Uvira, nâ€™i Moba muri Congo.
Uko byatangiye
Abatarishimiye uko Rwabugiri arongoye umukobwa wo mu Abega, barateranye bafata umugambi wo kumubuza kubyara umwana wazaba umwami. Umuhungu we wâ€™imfura witwaga Munana yamubyaye ahasaga mu wa 1880 amaze kuvuka bashaka uko bamuroga birabananira, amaze kugira imyaka itanu baramwiba baramutwara arazimira burundu. Ubwo hari nko mu mwaka wa 1883.
Munana bamutwaye Kanjogera amaze igihe gitoya abyaye Musinga. Rwabugiri yamenyeshejwe iyo nkuru nziza yâ€™ivuka rya Musinga ari mu gitero cyâ€™i Minove mu karere ka Masisi, ku musozi witwa Kamuronsi. Hashize igihe gito Rwabugiri yongera kubona inkuru imumenyesha ko Munana yapfuye urupfu rutamenyekanye. Nyuma yaho Kanjogera yaje kuva i Giseke na Nyagisenyi ajya gutura i Mwima wa Nyanza.
Mu mwaka wa 1886 icyo gihe Musinga yari afite imyaka itatu, ba bantu batishimiye ko Kanjogera yabyara umwana uzaba umwami akagira umugabekazi uvuye mu muryango wâ€™Abega, barongera batuma abagizi ba nabi, biba Musinga baramutwara.
Musinga bamushyize mu giseke kinini cyane bamutsindagiramo, ku buryo atashoboraga kwinyagambura. Bamunyurana ku mayaga ya Butare bamujyanye kumuroha mu Kanyaru. Kubera kunanirwa, baratuye bararuhuka, agatotsi kabatwaye haza abajura bavuye kwiba inka. Barabakanze bariruka ya nkangara bayita aho, abo bajura barayikorera bayijyana iwabo, bayipfunduye basangamo umwana wâ€™umushishe. Bamubajije uko yitwa ababwira ko yitwa Musinga. Avuga amazina yâ€™ababyeyi be, babyumvise bagira ubwoba, kuko bumvise ari umwana wâ€™igikomangoma. Nyuma yaho biga ubwenge bwo kujya kubivuga ibwami.
Bagezeyo Rwabugili arabakira, bamubwira ko batoraguye umwana we, bamusobanurira uko bamubonye. Amaze kubyumva abategeka kujya kubibwira Kanjogera.
Kanjogera na we amaze kubyumva yabategetse kujya kumuheka bakamumuzanira. Musinga baramuheka bamugarura i Nyanza.
Nyuma yaho Kanjogera yongeye kubyara abandi bana babiri, umukobwa nâ€™umuhungu, bose barabaroga bapfa bakiri bato cyane. Musinga yakuze ari wenyine nta wundi muvandimwe bavukana kuri nyina, uretse abandi bana Rwabugili yari yarabyaranye nâ€™abandi bagore.
Aha niho agahinda nâ€™uburakari bwa Kanjogera byatangiriye. Kuba yari we mugore muto, umugore mwiza byahebuje, umugore wizewe kandi ukunzwe, akagira abanzi bamuhekuye incuro eshatu zose, byamuteye umutima mubi.
Mu buto bwa Musinga bavuga ko yari umusore wâ€™ingeso nziza, ukunda bakuru be na barumuna be bakomoka kuri se, kandi agakunda abaturage cyane. Ngo yakundaga intore, agakunda umukino wo kumasha, ubundi agakunda ibitaramo byâ€™amahamba, nâ€™amateka ya ba sekuruza. Itorero ryâ€™intore za Musinga ryitorezaga i Nyanza ahitwa mu Kaguri.
Kubera ko abiru nabo babaga bakomeye kandi bazi amabanga yose yâ€™ibwami, bashoboye kumvisha Rwabugili uko Umugabekazi atazava mu bwoko bwâ€™Abega, bituma bemeza ko Rutalindwa ariwe uzaba umwami uzamusimbura. Ibyo yabikoze ku itariki 22 Ukuboza 1885, umuhango wo kumwimika ubera muri Nyaruguru ahitwa mu Ngeli.
Muri uwo muhango wabereye mu Ngeli, hari umuhanzi wâ€™umusizi witwaga Ngurusu wazimije abwira Rwabugili ko ibyo akoze binyuranyije nâ€™amategeko.
Ati â€œNtaho byabaye gutsindira umwami umugore uhetse umuhungu wabyayeâ€. Rwabugili ararakara aramusubiza ati â€œNoneho si ugusiga ni ukwiterera mu mata nkâ€™isaziâ€
Koko kera kabaye Musinga yageze aho aba umwami bigoranye cyane, kuko byaciye mu ihirikabutegetsi bwa Rutalindwa ryabereye ku Rucunshu.
Ku ngoma ye yahuye nâ€™ibirushya byinshi, birimo abarwanyije ubutegetsi bwe bamuziza ko yabwambuye Rutalindwa wimitswe nâ€™ubwiru, nawe bikamubabaza cyane kuko nta ruhare yabigizemo.
Ingoma ye yagize ibihe bikomeye byinshi kandi bibi mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda, kuko inkingi za mwamba zari zisigasiye ubuzima bwâ€™igihugu, zashenywe ku ngoma ye, cyane cyane mu bihe byâ€™Abakoroni bâ€™Ababiligi. Kugeza ubwo bwamuciye ku ngoma ku wa 12 Ugushyingo 1931, nuko azungurwa ku ngoma nâ€™umuhungu we Rudahigwa, afata izina ryâ€™ubwami rya Mutara III Rudahigwa.

Title: Bamurangirwa yamuritse ibitabo bibiri, akebura abakerensa Ikinyarwanda
Body:
Umunyarwandakazi, Bamurangirwa Patricia yamuritse ibitabo bibiri bishya birimo ikivuga ahabi u Rwanda rwavuye nâ€™aho rugeze cyitwa â€˜New Rwanda From Hell to Heavenâ€™, na â€˜Africanismâ€™ gitanga inama ku banyafurika bashidukira amahanga basize ibyiza biri iwabo.
Umunyarwandakazi, Bamurangirwa Patricia yamuritse ibitabo bibiri bishya birimo ikivuga ahabi u Rwanda rwavuye nâ€™aho rugeze cyitwa â€˜New Rwanda From Hell to Heavenâ€™, na â€˜Africanismâ€™ gitanga inama ku banyafurika bashidukira amahanga basize ibyiza biri iwabo.
Mu muhango wo kumurika iki gitabo wabereye ku isomero rikuru ryâ€™igihugu ku Kacyiru kuri uyu wa Kane, Bamurangirwa yakebuye abanyarwanda banena ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda, ntibarwigishe abana babo, avuga ko bavangira umurage wâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™Iterambere ryâ€™urwo rurimi.
Bamurangirwa yavuze ko igitabo cye â€œAfricanismâ€ yacyanditse kugira ngo akangurire urubyiruko kwikunda no gukunda ibyâ€™iwabo.
Yavuze ko kigamije kubwira urubyiruko ko Afurika ifite byose bishobora gutuma itera imbere, igikenewe ari icyizere.
Ati â€œNabwiraga urubyiruko kugira ngo rwigirire icyizere, rumenye ko iwabo nta kihabuze, bamenye ko bashoboye.â€
Mu gitabo cya kabiri, New Rwanda From Hell to Heaven avugamo uburyo u Rwanda rwabashije kwivana mu mahano ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ubu akaba ari igihugu cyâ€™icyitegererezo muri Afurika.
Yavuze ko kucyandika byari no mu rwego rwo gushimira Inkotanyi zagize uruhare mu kubohora igihugu no guhagarika Jenoside, ndetse nâ€™ishimwe ku bacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside babashije kurenga ibihe bibi banyuzemo, bagafasha igihugu kwiyubaka.
Ati â€œ Nashatse uko nshimira Inkotanyi zahagaritse Jenoside nâ€™abacitse ku icumu barenze urwo rwego rwâ€™ibikomere bari bafite ku mutima no ku mubiri bakubaka u Rwanda. Nemeza ko nta muriro urenze ya mezi atatu abacitse ku icumu bari barimo. Ugereranyije kiriya gihe bari barimo, iyo shusho ukayishyira hamwe nâ€™iyâ€™uyu munsi, bakubwiye ko bari mu ijuru nta wabahakanya.â€
Mu muhango wo kumurika iki gitabo kandi, Bamurangirwa yagarutse ku gaciro kâ€™ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda, avuga ko ari ururimi rufite amahirwe yo kwaguka ariko rudatezwa imbere uko bikwiriye.
Ati â€œMu mahanga ababyeyi bavugana nâ€™abana indimi zo mu bihugu barimo. Muri Kigali ababyeyi bamwe na bamwe bakavugana nâ€™abana indimi zâ€™amahanga kuko abana biga mu mashuri aturuka muri ayo mahanga. Bigabanya uburemere Ikinyarwanda gishobora kuba cyagira kuko muri aka karere nta rurimi rurusha Ikinyarwanda uburemere.â€
Yavuze ko mu gihe Abanyarwanda ubwabo batazagira ishyaka ryo gukunda no kuvuga Ikinyarwanda, bizakomeza kukigabanyiriza imbaraga mu ruhando mpuzamahanga.
Abajijwe impamvu we atarandika igitabo mu Kinyarwanda, Bamurangirwa yavuze ko abizirikana, ko abanza kwandika mu ndimi zâ€™amahanga kugira ngo abanyamahanga bamenye ko u Rwanda na Afurika biriho.
Ati â€œMpitamo kubanza kwandika mu rurimi rwumvwa cyane cyane nâ€™amahanga kugira ngo batumenye ko duhari kandi dushoboye. Mbanze mbwire rubanda bakeka ko tutashoboye, bakeka ko tudahari.â€
Kuri ubu ibitabo bya Bamurangirwa biboneka mu iguriro ryâ€™Ibitabo cya Caritas mu mujyi wa Kigali, na Librairie Ikirezi.
Bamurangirwa amaze kwandika ibitabo bitanu byose biri mu rurimi rwâ€™Icyongereza. Harimo icyo yise â€œRwanda Yesterdayâ€ avugamo amateka yâ€™u Rwanda, â€˜â€˜Patriotismâ€ kigizwe nâ€™ibisigo biri mu Kinyarwanda no mu Cyogereza yahimbiye Perezida Kagame, icyo yahimbiye Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, ndetse nâ€™icyo yahimbiye Inkotanyi zambuka, â€œMy Motherâ€™s Dreamsâ€ agaragazamo uburyo yapfushije nyina akiri muto agacikiriza amashuri ye kandi inzozi ze zari ukwiga.

Title: Ibyo wamenya ku â€˜Bitare byâ€™Imihigoâ€™ bivugwa ko Umwami Rwabugiri yabugurijeho
Body:
Mu Murenge wa Kansi mu Karere ka Gisagara hagaragara â€˜Ibitare byâ€™Imihigoâ€™ abahatuye bazi amateka yaho bavuga ko ariho Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugili watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1853 kugeza mu 1895 yakundaga kuruhukira ari kumwe nâ€™Ingabo ze zikahakinira ikibuguzo.
Mu Murenge wa Kansi mu Karere ka Gisagara hagaragara â€˜Ibitare byâ€™Imihigoâ€™ abahatuye bazi amateka yaho bavuga ko ariho Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugili watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1853 kugeza mu 1895 yakundaga kuruhukira ari kumwe nâ€™Ingabo ze zikahakinira ikibuguzo.
Ibyo Bitare byâ€™Amateka biherereye mu Mudugudu wa Kaburanjwiri mu Kagari kâ€™Umunini. Hagaragara ibimenyetso birimo imyobo yerekana ko habugurijwe.
Umusaza uhatuye witwa Bitorwa Damien wâ€™imyaka 88 yâ€™amavuko, avuga ko amateka yâ€™ibyo bitare ayazi kuko yayabwiwe na Sekuru.
Ati â€œAhangaha niho Umwami Rwabugili yaruhukiraga nâ€™Ingabo ze; ibi bisoro mubonaho ni ibyâ€™aho zabugurizaga ziruhuka isaha yo kujya ku rugamba itaragera.â€
Akomeza asobanura ko muri icyo gihe aho ibyo bitare biri hari ishyamba ndetse ari naho Ingabo za Rwabugiri zambariraga zikahafatira nâ€™amafunguro mbere na nyuma yo kujya rugamba.
Ati â€œHari agasozi kari hepfo ahangaha basiganiraga bagiye inama bananirwa kukumvikanaho; Umwami wâ€™u Burundi akavuga ngo ni ake uwâ€™u Rwanda ngo ni akanjye banga kubyumvikanaho, banze kubyumvikanaho rero bakoresheje imirwano.â€
Isomo bakura kuri ayo mateka
Bitorwa avuga ko ayo mateka bagenda bayaherekanya kugira ngo aho hantu hatazibagirana. Kuri ubu barahazitiye ndetse ni ho abaturage bo mu Mudugudu wa Kaburanjwiri bakorera inama.
Iyo habaye umuganura ni ho bicara bakawizihiza ndetse bakungurana nâ€™ibitekerezo.
Ati â€œIyo habaye inama tuyumvira aha, twaba twejeje amasaka umuganura tukawizihiriza ahangaha.â€
Umuyobozi wâ€™Umudugudu wa Kaburanjwiri, Nteziryayo Samuel, yavuze ko biyemeje kuhasigasira uko bashoboye kuko bahafata nkâ€™ahantu hadasanzwe.
Ati â€œBitewe nâ€™uko Umwami yarwaniriraga u Rwanda ashaka icyaruteza imbere nâ€™icyahesha ishema Abanyarwanda, natwe tuhafata nkâ€™Ibitare byâ€™Imihigo aho twicara tukesa imihigo twarangiza kuyesa tugasoma ku Ntango yâ€™Amahoro.â€
Nteziryayo avuga ko usibye gusabana, bahakorera nâ€™ibikorwa byo gukebura abakoze nabi kugira ngo bikosore.
Ati â€œWa muntu watubereye ikigwari tukamunengera kuri ibi Bitare byâ€™Imihigo kugira ngo na we yumve ko agomba kujyana nâ€™abandi. Tuhafata rero nkâ€™Ibitare byâ€™Imihigo yo guteza imbere aho dutuye.â€
Asobanura ko bahisemo kuhazitira kugira ngo abantu batahavogera kandi ari ahantu hâ€™amateka.
Iyo hari umuturage wabatengushye akaba ikigwari bamushyira inyuma yâ€™uruzitiro bakamunenga, ubataha yagaruka yikosoye bakamwinjiza.
Ati â€œNiba tumubwiye ngo kurungira inzu agatinda uwo muntu turamunenga kugira ngo ntibizongere kubaho; akajya inyuma yâ€™uruzitiro agakerakera; uwesheje imihigo akajyamo hariya imbere agasoma ku Ntango yâ€™Amahoro undi akahakura isomo ko agomba gufatanya nâ€™abandi.â€
Nteziryayo yemeza ko ibyo Bitare byâ€™Imihigo bibafitiye akamaro kubera ko ibikorwa byâ€™imihigo bahakorera bimaze gutanga umusaruro.
Umudugudu wa Kaburanjwiri uherutse kuza ku isonga uhiga indi yose yo mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyepfo ugabirwa Inka yâ€™Imihigo na Perezida Kagame Paul.
Mu byatumye uhiga indi harimo kuba buri rugo rufite amashanyarazi akomoka ku mirasire yâ€™izuba; bakoresha amasibo nâ€™abakuze mu kugira inama abangavu nâ€™ingimbi ku buryo nta nda zâ€™imburagihe ziharangwa cyangwa ibindi byaha; buri rugo rufite inka nâ€™itungo rigufi byibuze rimwe.
Buri muryango ufite akarima kâ€™igikoni gahinzemo imboga, bafite nâ€™ibiti byâ€™imbuto byibuze bitatu; bose bafite amashyiga ya rondereza; nta mwana nâ€™umwe utiga, buri rugo rufite igipande cyâ€™umuganda; buri muryango ukorana nâ€™ikigo cyâ€™imari.
Nta muryango nâ€™umwe ukirangwamo amakimbirane; abaturage bose bawutuye bafite ubwisungane mu kwivuza; nta mwana ufite imirire mibi kandi nta bana bazerera.

Title: Imyaka 76 irashize Umwami Yuhi Musinga atanze, umugogo we nâ€™ubu waburiwe irengero
Body:
Imyaka 76 irashize, Umwami Yuhi V Musinga atangiye mu buhungiro, i Moba muri Congo nyuma yo kwirukanwa mu Rwanda nâ€™Ababiligi, agasimbuzwa umuhungu we Mutara II Rudahigwa.
Imyaka 76 irashize, Umwami Yuhi V Musinga atangiye mu buhungiro, i Moba muri Congo nyuma yo kwirukanwa mu Rwanda nâ€™Ababiligi, agasimbuzwa umuhungu we Mutara II Rudahigwa.
Birashoboka ko Musinga ari umwe mu bami bâ€™u Rwanda bayoboye mu bihe bibi cyane, nta bunararibonye bwo guhangana nabyo afite.
Musinga yimye ingoma ahagana muri Werurwe 1897, ayambuye mukuru we bahuje se, Mibambwe IV Rutarindwa. Byakurikiwe no kwitwikira mu nzu kwa Rutarindwa nâ€™umuryango we wose amaze kumenya ko yagambaniwe, urwo rupfu rukurikirwa nâ€™izindi zâ€™abari bashyigikiye Rutarindwa. Ibyabaye icyo gihe bivugwa mu mateka nka coup dâ€™etat yo ku Rucunshu.
Musinga yimye ingoma akiri muto, ku myaka 14 gusa, ari nayo mpamvu mu minsi ye ya mbere yayoborerwaga na nyina Kanjogera. Ni imyaka yari iruhije kuko Abakoloni bâ€™Abadage nâ€™abamisiyoneri ba mbere bari bari kwinjira mu Rwanda, bashaka abayoboke mu banyarwanda.
Abapadiri bera nâ€™Abadage baje mu 1900, basanze Yuhi V Musinga amaze imyaka ine ari umwami wâ€™u Rwanda.
Ku wa 2 Gashyantare 1900, abapadiri bera basabye uruhushya rwo gukorera mu Rwanda, ibwami babanza kubyanga ariko baza kwemeranya kuhakorera, gusa basabwa kutivanga mu mikorere yâ€™umwami.
Musinga yabanye neza nâ€™Abadage, yanga urunuka Ababiligi
Musinga yari afite ibibazo bye bwite byâ€™abigumuraga hirya no hino mu gihugu cyane cyane mu majyaruguru barimo nâ€™abavandimwe be bamuzizaga kujya ku butegetsi yishe Rutarindwa.
Igitabo Defeat Is the Only Bad News, Rwanda Under Musinga cyanditswe na Alison des Forges kigaragaza ko Musinga yatangiye guhura nâ€™ibibazo mu 1915 mu ntambara ya mbere yâ€™Isi, ubwo Ababiligi nâ€™Abongereza bateraga ingabo zâ€™u Budage mu Rwanda.
Mu 1915, Abadage basabye Musinga abasore bato bo kujya ku rugamba guhangana nâ€™Ababiligi, ababaha adashidikanya kuko atifuzaga ko Abadage batsindwa, ikindi yumvaga ko abo basore bazaba baratijwe kurwana nibagaruka bazaba bamwe mu bagize ingabo ze.
Mu 1916, Abadage baratsinzwe basimburwa nâ€™Ababiligi, biyegereza cyane abapadiri bera ndetse batangira gusa nâ€™abananiza Umwami Musinga.
Ababiligi bashakaga umubano nâ€™abapadiri bera, bifuzaga ko umwami nâ€™abatware ububasha bwabo bugabanywa, ntibakomeze gukandamiza abakene bari biganjemo abahutu.
Igitabo cya Des Forges kivuga ko â€œBamwe mu basirikare bâ€™Ababiligi biyemeje guha abahutu uburenganzira busesuye ku butaka bwabo nâ€™umusaruro wabo. Umusirikare wagombaga kumva umuhutu winubira umutware we, yagombaga kumenya mpamvu yo kwinuba kwe akabikemura.â€
Musinga yatangiye kubahukwa
Musinga yakomeje guhura nâ€™ibibazo, bamwe mu muryango we nâ€™abatware batangira kumwitaza kuko bari bamaze kubona ko Ababiligi ari bo bakomeye kumurusha.
Mu mpera za 1916, Rwagataraka umuhugu wa Rwidegembya watwaraga i Kinyaga, yashatse uburyo atabara se wari watangiye kwangwa akanafungwa nâ€™Ababiligi.
Mu kugura se, Rwagataraka yabeshyeye Musinga ko ahishe Captain Wintgens wari umugaba wâ€™ingabo zâ€™Abadage. Ababiligi baraje basaba Musinga kumubaha ariko undi agira ubwoba abaha umuja we. Padiri Huntziger abimenye yabwiye Ababiligi ko uwo yabahaye atari we, bituma Ababiligi bafata Musinga baramufunga.
Nyuma yo gukora iperereza, baje gusanga Musinga arengana baramurekura.
Ibi ubwabyo ryari ishyano, kumva ko umwami wafatwaga nkâ€™Imana mu banyarwanda ahangarwa nâ€™abanyamahanga agafungwa ku kagambane kâ€™umuturage we.
Akababaro ka Musinga, uburyarya bwâ€™Ababiligi
Mu 1917, Ababiligi batangiye kubona ko batahindura ibintu badakoranye na Musinga. Baramwiyegereje bamwumvisha ko niyemera gukorana na bo bazakomeza kurinda ingoma ye nâ€™icyubahiro cye. Bamuhaye impano zirimo imyenda nâ€™imodoka, bamusaba guha amadini ubwisanzure.
Mu kurushaho kumwiyegereza, mu ntangiriro za 1918, Rezida militaire wâ€™Ababiligi i Kigali, Major GÃ©rard-FranÃ§ois Declerck yagiye kwa Musinga ngo yumve uburyo asuzugurwa nâ€™Abapadiri bera.
Akababaro ka Musinga kagaragara muri Raporo yanditswe na Oscar AnthÃ¨me Defawe, umusirikare wâ€™umubiligi wabaga i Nyanza, akaba nâ€™Umujyanama wâ€™Umwami.
Hari aho Musinga agira ati â€œMu gihe cyâ€™Abadage, abatutsi bose nâ€™abahutu bisanzuraga iwanjye, buri wese yaranyubahaga nâ€™abapadiri ubwabo baranyubahaga. Ubwo bazaga bambwiye ko bazanywe nâ€™Imana yabo, ko ntawe bazagirira nabi kandi ko batazivanga mu mikorere yanjye."
"Umunsi Ababiligi bazaga, Abapadiri bahinduye imyitwarire. Batangiye kwivanga mu mikorere yanjye nâ€™ibindi bibi bitavugwa. Nubwo bavuga ko kubeshya ari icyaha, bo babeshye abayobozi babo bakuru.â€
Musinga yakomeje agira ati â€œIyo ngize icyo mbwira umututsi, iyo atagishaka ajya kureba padiri akamubwira ngo ntanyumvire. Iyo ngize icyo nsaba abahutu baturiye Misiyoni kugira icyo bankorera, bajya ku bapadiri bagasakuza ngo babagiriye nabi.
"Ahantu hose nshyize umutware, Abapadiri bashyirayo umukiristu ngo amugenzure. Uwo mukristu agakoranya abatishimiye umutware, hakaba impande ebyiri zitavuga rumwe ku musozi.â€
Musinga yanavuze ko ngo umunsi umwe Padiri Huntziger yigeze kumubwira ngo â€œ Guhera ubu Musinga wamanuwe mu ntera, ni njye mutware wawe. Ntabwo bikiri nka cya gihe ku bwâ€™Abadage [â€¦] Yavuze ko njyana abana banjye kwiga iwe ariko ntabo azabona. Yanyambuye imisozi, yanyambuye abaturage banjye, antwara ubutware bwanjye none arashaka no kunyambura abana kugira ngo nyuma bazansuzugure, ibyo ntibizigera bibaho.â€
Muri Kanama 1917, Ababiligi bongeye gusaba Musinga gusinya iteka riha abahutu ubutaka bukubye kabiri ubwo bari bafite no kugabanya igihe cyâ€™uburetwa kikava ku minsi itatu ikaba ibiri mu cyumweru.
Umwami ubundi yubahirwaga kuba afite ububasha bwo guhana, kwica agakiza. Mu 1917 Ababiligi bamusabye kujya abanza kubamenyesha igihe agize uwo ashaka guhana, kwica nâ€™ibindi. Mu 1920 bamutegetse kujya abanza kubamenyesha mbere yo kugira uwo agira umutware cyangwa uwo ahindura. Ibyo byari bisobanuye kumwambura nâ€™igitinyiro gike yari asigaranye.
Ababiligi bongeye gusaba Musinga nâ€™abatware kohereza abana babo mu mashuri kuko babonaga ejo hazaza abize ari bo bazaba bakenewe mu buyobozi. Bavuze ko nibabyanga amashuri azajyibwamo nâ€™abahutu nâ€™abatutsi bakennye, akaba ari bo bazayobora mu minsi iri imbere.
Muri Kamena 1918, Musinga yemeye ko abana bajya kwiga ariko asaba ko bubakirwa ishuri ryihariye kuko atashakaga ko bigishwa nâ€™abapadiri yashinjaga kwigisha agasuzuguro.
Ababiligi barabyemeye mu 1919 bafungura ishuri ridashamikiye ku bihayimana i Nyanza, yoherezayo abahungu be batatu Munonozi, Rudacyahwa na Rudahigwa, icyakora Munonozi na Rudacyahwa baje kwicwa na mugiga nyuma.
Umwami yasigaye ku izina
Ababiligi bakomeje gukorana bya hafi nâ€™Abapadiri. Impamvu ni uko mu nzego nyinshi zâ€™imitegekere nâ€™iterambere hari hakenewe abantu banyuze mu mashuri kandi abamisiyoneri nibo bari bafite amashuri menshi.
Abapadiri nabo bagombaga gukorana nâ€™Ababiligi kugira ngo abana barangije kwiga bahabwe akazi muri Leta, babeho neza bitume nâ€™abandi bagira ishyari ryo kugana Kiliziya Gatolika no kohereza abana babo kwiga.
Bamwe mu batware bakomeye nâ€™abatutsi bâ€™ibwami bari batangiye gukorana nâ€™abamisiyoneri. Umuhungu wa Musinga, Rwigemera na nyina Nyirakabuga bageze aho baramucika bajya kwibanira nâ€™abamisiyoneri.
Ibwami hatangiye kubaho kutavuga rumwe ku buryo mu 1924, Musinga yari asigaye ari umwami ku izina ariko ubutegetsi bwose bufitwe nâ€™abakoloni.
Igitabo The White Fathers Mission in Rwanda cyanditswe na Ian Linden, kivuga ko nyuma ya 1924 abakoloni bari bafite uburyo bwose bwo kuba bakuraho Musinga, bahura nâ€™ikibazo cyo kubona umuntu wizewe uzamusimbura.
Abaturage ntibari bakimufata nkâ€™umwami kuko amategeko menshi yavaga ku bakoloni, abayobozi ba Kiliziya ari bo baba hafi yabo kurusha abâ€™umwami.
Abonye ko amaboko atangiye kumushiraho, mu 1927 Musinga yandikiye Musenyeri LÃ©on Classe amumenyesha ko yifuza kongera kuba inshuti nâ€™abamisiyoneri ariko yasaga nâ€™uruhira ubusa kuko ibiganiro hagati ya Kiliziya nâ€™abakoloni byari bigeze kure ngo hashakwe uzamusimbura.
Mu 1927, Guverineri Henri Joseph Voisin yakoze amavugurura mu mitegekere nâ€™imikorere. Hashyizweho imisoro mishya, uburetwa , imirimo yâ€™amaboko nko gukora imihanda, gutegekwa guhinga ibihingwa bimwe nkâ€™ikawa, imyumbati nâ€™ibindi.
Ibyo bikorwa byaremereye cyane abaturage ndetse bamwe bahitamo guhunga. Jean Paul Kimonyo mu gitabo cye Rwanda un GÃ©nocide Populaire, avuga ko nyuma yâ€™ayo mavugurura nibura buri mwaka hahungaga abanyarwanda ibihumbi 50.
Musinga yambuwe ubutegetsi, acibwa mu gihugu!
Tariki 11 kugeza kuri 13 Nzeri 1931, Guverineri Mukuru wabaga muri Congo Tilkens yasuye Musenyeri Classe na Voisin ngo bapange itariki yo gukuraho Musinga.
Saa yine nâ€™igice ku wa 14 Ukwakira 1931 igihiriri ryâ€™abaja cyahagurutse i Nyanza giherekeje Musinga, abagore be batanu nâ€™abana be icyenda na nyina Kanjogera nâ€™abo mu muryango wabo, bajyanwa mu nzu yari yabateguriwe i Kamembe.
Musinga yasimbuwe ku ngoma nâ€™umuhungu we Rudahigwa wari warize mu mashuri yâ€™abazungu.
Yakomeje kuba i Kamembe ameze nkâ€™ufungishijwe ijisho. Tariki 2 Ukwakira 1933, nyina wa Musinga, Kanjogera yaje gupfa bakiri i Cyangugu.
Mu 1939 ubwo hadukaga intambara ya kabiri yâ€™isi, Musinga nâ€™abambari be bagaruye icyizere ko Abadage nibatsinda, bazamusubiza ku butegetsi.
Ababiligi bamaze kumenya ibyo byifuzo bya Musinga, bamufunze inshuri ebyiri i Kamembe, babonye akomeje, tariki 18 Kamena 1940 basinya Itegeko ryo kumwohereza muri Congo mu gace ka Moba, hafi yâ€™ikiyaga cya Tanganyika.
Ageze muri Congo, Musinga yongeye gufungwa nâ€™abaturage ba Congo bakeka ko ashaka kongera kwiyimika nkâ€™umwami ku butaka bwabo. Yakomeje kubaho atariho kugeza tariki 13 Mutarama 1944 ubwo yashiragamo umwuka.
Amateka avuga ko umugogo we watwawe nâ€™Ababiligi, ariko nta gihamya na kimwe cyemeza ko ari bo bawujyanye koko.
Mu 2017, Gakuba Jeanne dâ€™Arc wari senateri yasabye inzego zibishinzwe gukora uko zishoboye ngo umugogo wâ€™Umwami Yuhi V Musinga wajyanwe nâ€™Abakoloni bâ€™Ababiligi ugarurwe mu Rwanda.
Icyakora mu mpera zâ€™umwaka ushize, Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ikigo kâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda, Ambasaderi Robert Masozera yabwiye IGIHE ko nta gihamya ko uwo mugogo wajyanywe mu Bubiligi.
Yagize ati â€œTwakekaga ko bafite nâ€™umugogo wâ€™umwami Musinga ariko ntabwo byo babyemeza, natwe nta gihamya tubifitiye.â€
U Bubiligi bufite nâ€™ibindi bimenyetso ndangamateka byavanywe mu Rwanda mu gihe cyâ€™ubukoloni birimo nâ€™igisingo (ikamba) cyâ€™umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugili.

Title: Amateka adasanzwe yâ€™Abasigari nâ€™Indara babaye Abanyarwanda ku bwâ€™impanuka
Body:
U Rwanda kuva kera na kare rwahoranye abarutuye kavukire hakaba nâ€™abaruzagamo bashaka imibereho, bikarangira bashimye amaronko ntibazasubire iwabo.
U Rwanda kuva kera na kare rwahoranye abarutuye kavukire hakaba nâ€™abaruzagamo bashaka imibereho, bikarangira bashimye amaronko ntibazasubire iwabo.
Nâ€™uyu munsi birakorwa uretse ko bwo bica mu mategeko aho ushaka kuba umunyarwanda abisabira uruhushya yaba yujuje ibisabwa akemererwa.
Mu moko agera kuri 24 yâ€™abanyarwanda (imiryango migari ariyo dusangamo Abazigaba, Abagesera, Abegaâ€¦.), harimo ayisanze yabaye abanyarwanda ku bwâ€™impanuka, nta nâ€™umwe muri bo wigeze abirota.
Abo barimo ubwoko bwâ€™Abasigari nâ€™Indara, bamwe mu bagize inzu izwi nkâ€™Abarera bakomoka ku mukurambere wabo Murera. Ubu babaye abanyarwanda nkâ€™abandi ariko si ko byahoze kuko babaye bo bibatunguye, bavuye mu bwami bwâ€™u Bunyoro (muri Uganda), ubwo ubwami bwabo bwagabaga igitero ku Rwanda, rukabanesha abarokotse bakayoberwa aho baca basubira mu Bunyoro, bakaguma mu Rwanda.
Mu mwaka wa 1378, Ku ngoma yâ€™Umwami Kigeli Mukobanya wâ€™u Rwanda, nibwo u Bunyoro bwahawe amakuru yâ€™intasi, ko mu Majyepfo yabwo hari igihugu cyitwa Rwanda, kirimo kubica bigacika, cyazahaje ingoma zâ€™abami bâ€™ibindi bihugu, ubutaka bwabo kikabwomeka ku bwacyo.
Icyo gihe u Bunyoro, bwabafashe umwanzuro wo gutera u Rwanda rwa Mukobanya kugira ngo ari bwo busigara ari igihangange muri Afurika yâ€™Iburasirazuba.
Abanyoro nibo bayoboraga igihugu cyitwaga u Bunyoro nkâ€™uko izina rya benigihugu ribigaragaza, kikaba cyari kimwe mu bihugu byari biherereye mu Majyaruguru yâ€™Iburengerazuba bwâ€™u Rwanda, kuri ubu ni mu Burengerazuba wâ€™igihugu cya Uganda. Ni igihugu cyari cyarazengereje ibihugu bigituriye kibigira ingaruzwamuheto, ndetse cyari cyarabihatse.
Mu bihugu byari mu maboko yâ€™u Bunyoro harimo nkâ€™u Bugande, Bukiri, Bukede, Busogo, Toro na Nkore yâ€™Abahima.
Ku ngoma ya Mukobanya, Abanyoro bateye igitero cya mbere, gifite umugambi wo kunesha u Rwanda, bagasigara aribo baganje. Mu gitero cya mbere cyâ€™Abanyoro bagabye mu Rwanda, bigabanyijemo imitwe ibiri. Igitero kimwe cyamanutse mu Bugara, gica mu Ndorwa yâ€™i Burengerazuba gihinguka mu Buliza cyambuka Nyabugogo ahari urugabano rwa Gasabo nâ€™u Buliza, ugana i Ntora ( Ubu ni mu Murenge wa Gisozi) ahari ingoro ya Mukobanya.
Ikindi gitero cyaturutse mu Ndorwa yâ€™Iburasirazuba, gica mu Ngoma yâ€™u Rweya rwâ€™u Mubali, cyambukiranya i Gisaka (mu Ntara yâ€™Iburasirazuba ubu) gihinguka mu Bwanacyambwe, gihawe inzira nâ€™umwami wâ€™u Bwanacyambwe Nkuba ya Nyabakonjo. Abo nabo baje bagana ku ngoro ya Mukobanya.
Ingabo zâ€™u Rwanda zatunguwe nâ€™icyo gitero gikaze zirahanyanyaza ngo zirwane biranga ziraneshwa zirahunga. Abanyoro bakurikiranye Abanyarwanda, bashaka kubanyaga inka mu gihe bambukaga Nyabarongo, bagana mu Nduga. Abanyarwanda, babibonye, bashira ubwoba babifashijwemo nâ€™ingabo zâ€™Abanyenduga zari ziyobowe na Mashira ya Nkuba wari inshuti ya Mukobanya.
Nkuko tubikesha igitabo â€œIntwari zâ€™imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiroâ€™â€™ nâ€™ikindi cyitwa â€œIyororoka ryâ€™Abanyarwanda, inkomoko yâ€™imiryango migariâ€ byombi dukesha Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, ingabo zâ€™u Rwanda zimaze kwifatanya nâ€™izâ€™Abanye-Nduga, bahindukiranye ingabo zâ€™Abanyoro, barwanira ku Muganzacyaro wa Runda muri Kamonyi . Barazirwanyije bazambutsa Nyabarongo bagaruka mu Bwanacyambwe, bazamuka ku musozi wa Kigali, ari naho urugamba rwasibaniye bikomeye.
Aho urugamba rwâ€™inkundura rwaremeye, kuri ubu ni mu Kagali ka Cyivugiza mu Murenge wa Nyamirambo, mu Kagali ka Nyakabanda II ( cyane cyane ahubatse Stade) no mu Mudugudu wa Akanyamirambo mu Kagali ka Rwesero mu Murenge wa Kigali, yose yo mu Karere ka Nyarugenge.
Ingabo zâ€™u Rwanda zihageze, zacunshumuye izâ€™abanyoro, zirabica cyane izihonotse zirayoba zibura aho zaje zituruka.
Abanyoro bamaze gutsindwa mu gitero cya mbere, baragiye bitegura ikindi gitero cya Kabiri bagabye ahasaga mu wa 1411 ku ngoma ya Mibambwe Sekarongoro ka Mukobanya. Icyo gitero cya Kabiri cyâ€™Abanyoro cyari kirangajwe imbere nâ€™umuhungu wa Nyabwongo II Buhemu, ariwe bakunze kwita mu mateka :â€™â€™ Cwa Rya Nyabwongoâ€, wari ufite izina ryâ€™ubwami rya â€™â€™ Cwa I Cwamwaliâ€™â€™.
Se wa Cwa ari we Nyabwongo II Buhemu, yari yaraguye mu gitero cya mbere Abanyoro bagabye ku Rwanda mu bihe byâ€™ingoma ya Kigeli Mukobanya. Bagarutse barangajwe imbere nâ€™umuhungu we, baje kwihimura kuri Sekarongoro se Mukobanya, yari yarishe ingabo zâ€™Abanyoro nyinshi.
Muri icyo gitero cya kabiri, Abanyoro bazanye zimwe mu ngabo zâ€™ibihugu byari ibituranyi byâ€™u Bunyoro birimo nâ€™ibyo bwari bwaragize ingaruzwamuheto, ngo bize bibufashe kuza kwikiza u Rwanda. Izo ngabo zâ€™ibyo bihugu zarikusanyije ziyongereyeho nâ€™izâ€™Abanyoro, zishyika umubare usaga Ibihumbi icumi mu gihe izâ€™u Rwanda zageraga ku bihumbi bine.
Muri icyo gitero bagabye, batsinzwe uruhenu nkâ€™uko tuzabibona mu gice gikurikira, abasigaye barayoba bayoberwa aho baturutse baza kwisanga baraheze mu Rwanda. Mu bwoko bwasigaye mu Rwanda harimo Abasigari nâ€™Indara, bakunze kwita Abasigi ari nabo bibumbiye mu nzu yitwa â€˜Abareraâ€™ bakomoka kuri Murera.
Mu nkuru zikurikiyeho, tuzabatekerereza imigendekere yâ€™igitero cya Kabiri cyâ€™Abanyoro, ari nacyo cyabaye inkomoko yâ€™Abasigari nâ€™Indara.

Title: Gusura Ingoro yâ€™urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ku Mulindi byahagaritswe byâ€™agateganyo
Body:
Ikigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda (INMR) cyatangaje ko gusura Ingoro ndangamateka yâ€™urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu iherereye ku Mulindi byahagaritswe byâ€™agateganyo kubera imirimo yo kuyivugurura irimo kuhakorerwa.
Ikigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda (INMR) cyatangaje ko gusura Ingoro ndangamateka yâ€™urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu iherereye ku Mulindi byahagaritswe byâ€™agateganyo kubera imirimo yo kuyivugurura irimo kuhakorerwa.
Ingoro ndangamateka yo kubohora igihugu iri ku Mulindi wâ€™Intwari mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyaruguru, Akarere ka Gicumbi, Umurenge wa Kaniga, Akagari ka Mukindi, Umudugudu wa Nyakabungo.
Itangazo INMR yanyujije kuri Twitter kuri uyu wa 9 Mutarama 2020 rivuga ko gusura iyi ngoro byahagaritswe byâ€™agateganyo guhera ku wa 7 Mutarama 2020 kugeza undi munsi uzatangazwa.
Rigira riti â€œIkigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda kiramenyesha abantu bose ko kubera imirimo yo kubaka no gutunganya ingoro yâ€™amateka yâ€™urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu iherereye mu Karere ka Gicumbu ku Mulindi wâ€™Intwari, iyi Ngoro idasurwa guhera ku wa 7 Mutarama 2020. Tuzabamenyesha igihe izafungurirwa.â€
Iyi ngoro iherereye ahahoze ibiro bya FPR Inkotanyi, irimo nâ€™indaki Perezida Paul Kagame yakoreshaga mu gutanga amabwiriza igihe yari ayoboye urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu hagati ya 1990-1994 .
Umuyobozi wa INMR, Masozera Robert aheruka gutangaza ko imirimo yo gusana ingoro ya Mulindi yari ikenewe kuko nta bice bifasha mu kumurika intambara yâ€™urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu yari ifite.
Yagize ati â€œYari ikeneye kongererwa ubushobozi kuko yari ikennye ibikorwa bifasha kumurika amateka kandi mu kuyubaka, tugomba kwizera ko dusigasira amateka yâ€™urugamba rwo kubohora igihuguâ€
â€œImirimo yo kubaka ibikorwa bifasha kumurika nirangiraa muri Kamena uyu mwaka izaba ari igicumbi cyâ€™amateka yose yâ€™urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu guhera mu mizi kugera irangiye kandi mu buryo bwimbitse.â€
Masozera yasobanuye ko mu kwagura iyi ngoro hazongerwamo ibyumba byihariye byo kumurika ayo mateka bizaba bifite uburyo buyasobanura nka filimi mbarankuru ikoze mu majwi no mu mashusho.
Bizaba binarimo amakarita agaragaza inzira nâ€™uburyo byifashishwaga mu kuyobora urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, ibikoresho byifashishwaga mu rugamba nâ€™ibindi bikoresho bisobanura ayo meteka byakozwe nâ€™abahanga mu byâ€™ubugeni.
Biteganyijwe ko nyuma yo kwagura iyi ngoro izaba ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu bari hagati yâ€™ibihumbi 120-50 buri mwaka, ikinjiza arenga miliyoni 150Frw.
U Rwanda rufite ingoro umunani zâ€™umurage wâ€™u Rwanda ziherereye mu bice bitandukanye byâ€™igihugu. Umwaka ushize Ikigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™umurage wâ€™u Rwanda cyagaragazaga ko ingoro ndangamurage zisurwa nâ€™abantu 272 636, barimo Abanyarwanda 78%, zikinjiza miliyoni 310 643 966 Frw.

Title: Imvano yâ€™igitutu cyâ€™u Burayi na Amerika ku Rwanda ubwo Habyarimana yacudikaga na Koreya ya Ruguru
Body:
Intambara nâ€™ibitutsi, ibisasu kirimbuzi no kwigerezaho niyo makuru benshi bazi aturuka muri Koreya ya Ruguru yâ€™umugabo wâ€™igisunzu, Kim Jong Un.
Intambara nâ€™ibitutsi, ibisasu kirimbuzi no kwigerezaho niyo makuru benshi bazi aturuka muri Koreya ya Ruguru yâ€™umugabo wâ€™igisunzu, Kim Jong Un.
Iyo Koreya isa nâ€™iyitajwe nâ€™ibihugu kuri ubu, yabaye inshuti ikomeye yâ€™u Rwanda ku butegetsi bwa Perezida Habyarimana JuvÃ©nal mu gihe cyâ€™intambara yâ€™ubutita kugeza ubwo Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nâ€™u Burayi zari zimurabye ivu, bikamusaba amayeri ngo atabizira.
Habyarimana yashatse gukina amayeri Amerika nâ€™u Burayi, bamuha gasopo
Ikibazo cyo kutavuga rumwe kwa Koreya ya Ruguru nâ€™iyâ€™Epfo cyo mu 1948 ubwo zacikagamo kabiri, cyakomeje gukururuka kigeza mu 1973 ubwo Habyarimana yafataga ubutegetsi mu Rwanda.
Nkâ€™umuntu wari ugiye ku butegetsi vuba, yagombaga gushaka ibihugu byâ€™inshuti ariko agahera ku bitari bisanzwe bifitanye ubushuti bwa hafi nâ€™u Rwanda, kugira ngo inkunga iva hanze yiyongere.
Koreya ya Ruguru yari ishyigikiwe nâ€™ibihugu byâ€™u Bushinwa na Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Abasoviyeti, iyâ€™Epfo ishyigikiwe nâ€™u Burayi Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Ibihugu byinshi muri Afurika byari byarahisemo guca umubano nâ€™ibindi bikoresha Communisme ari nacyo gice Koreya ya Ruguru yabarizwagamo kugira ngo ba shebuja bâ€™i Burayi na Amerika babirebe neza, hato badakoma rutenderi ingoma zabo zigahirima.
Leta ya Habyarimana yashakaga ubufasha no kwimenyekanisha mu mahanga, yatangiye kugenda rwihishwa ikorana nâ€™ibihugu bikoresha Communisme, dore ko muri ibyo bihe byatangaga inkunga itubutse kandi itariho amananiza menshi nkâ€™ayo Amerika nâ€™u Burayi bashyiragaho.
U Rwanda rwatangiye kwiyegereza Koreya ya Ruguru, nayo irarukundira umubano uratangira.
Tariki 15 Mata 1974 mu Rwanda haje itsinda ryo muri Koreya ya Ruguru riyobowe nâ€™uwari Minisitiri wungirije wâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga, Chun Nyung Soo, ryakirwa na Perezida Habyarimana.
Icyo gihe Radio Rwanda yatangaje ko Koreya ya Ruguru yemeye gufasha u Rwanda mu bijyanye nâ€™amahugurwa yâ€™urubyiruko, kubaka inzu mberabyombi yâ€™urubyiruko nâ€™ibindi.
Radio Rwanda kandi yavuze ko iryo tsinda ryashyikirije Habyarimana ubutumwa buvuye kuri Perezida, Kim il Song wa Koreya ya Ruguru.
Inyandiko zâ€™ibanga za Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda zo muri ibyo bihe zashyizwe hanze nâ€™urubuga Wikileaks, zigaragaza ko Koreya ya Ruguru nyuma yaje no kwemera guha imyitozo urubyiruko rwâ€™ishyaka MRND ryari ku butegetsi, gutoza abasirikare ibijyanye nâ€™akarasisi nâ€™ibindi.
Uruzinduko rwâ€™intumwa za Koreya ya Ruguru mu Rwanda rwaje mu gihe Koreya zombi zari mu biganiro byo kwiyunga ariko bigatambamirwa nâ€™ibindi bihugu bikomeye.
Abasesenguzi icyo gihe bavugaga ko Koreya ya Ruguru nta gihambaye yashakaga ku Rwanda kitari ijwi ryarwo mu Muryango wâ€™Abibumbye.
Habyarimana icyo gihe yabwiye itsinda rya Koreya ya Ruguru ko u Rwanda rufata ikibazo kiri hagati ya Koreya zombi nkâ€™icyâ€™imbere mu gihugu gikwiriye gukemurwa hatajemo ukuboka kwâ€™amahanga.
Umubano wâ€™ibihugu byombi warakuze, ndetse Koreya ya Ruguru ifungura Ambasade yayo i Kigali.
Mu Ukwakira 1976, inyandiko zâ€™ibanga za Ambasade ya Amerika zigaragaza ko Habyarimana afatanyije na Ambasade ya Koreya ya Ruguru, bashyizeho Komite yiga ku kongera kwiyunga kwa Koreya zombi. Inama yabereye mu nyubako zâ€™uwari uhagarariye Koreya ya Ruguru mu Rwanda.
Iyo komite yari igizwe nâ€™abajyanama muri MRND, Umuyobozi Mukuru ushinzwe Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga muri Perezidansi, abo muri Minisiteri yâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga nâ€™abandi.
Iyo nama yabaye buri buke ngo Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa MRND wafatwaga nkâ€™umuntu wa kabiri ukomeye mu butegetsi, ajye mu ruzinduko i Pyongyang.
Iyo komite yashimwe cyane na Djeun Yeung Oun wari ushinzwe ibikorwa muri Ambasade ya Koreya ya Ruguru i Kigali, aho yavuze ko gushyiraho iyo komite bizongera ubushuti nâ€™umubano mu byâ€™ubukungu wâ€™ibihugu byombi.
Nubwo u Rwanda rwakoraga ibishoboka byose ngo rushimishe Koreya ya Ruguru, byakorwaga mu ibanga rikomeye ngo ibihugu bya Amerika nâ€™u Burayi bitabimenya.
Ibanga ryaje kumenyekana!
Mu 1976 intambara yâ€™ubutita yari irimbanyije. Gufatwa nâ€™abanyaburayi cyangwa abanyamerika ucuditse nâ€™ibihugu byâ€™Uburusiya, u Bushinwa nâ€™abakorana nabyo, byari icyaha kitababarirwa.
Ibihugu bya Amerika nâ€™u Burayi biciye muri Ambasade zabyo i Kigali, byaje kuvumbura ko u Rwanda ruri mu bushuti bwihariye na Koreya ya Ruguru.
Ubwo hari hashize iminsi Komite ishyizweho ndetse nâ€™Umunyamabanga wa MRND avuye muri Koreya ya Ruguru, Ambasaderi wâ€™u Bubiligi yahamgaje Minisitiri wâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga wâ€™u Rwanda, amusaba ibisobanuro ku mubano wihariye uhari na Koreya ya Ruguru.
Ambasaderi yamubwiye ko ababajwe no kuba u Rwanda ruri kugendera ku icengezamatwara rya Koreya ya Ruguru no guhengamira ku ruhande rumwe, avuga ko u Rwanda rukwiye kumenya neza inshuti zâ€™u Burayi nâ€™umwanzi wabwo.
Wikileaks igaragaza ko Minisitiri wâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga wâ€™u Rwanda yatunguwe, aryoshyaryoshya u Bubiligi, avuga ko umubano uri hagati yâ€™u Rwanda na Koreya udakanganye.
Yavuze ko u Rwanda rushyigikiye kongera kwihuza kwa Koreya zombi, gusa yemera ko kuba barashinze komite yiga kuri icyo kibazo ntibazanemo Koreya yâ€™Epfo kandi nayo biyireba, ari amakosa asabira imbabazi.
Yijeje u Bubiligi ko umubano wâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™icyo gihugu ndetse nâ€™ibindi bihugu byâ€™i Burayi na Amerika utazangizwa nâ€™iryo shyirwaho rya Komite kuko icyerecyezo cyâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga bwâ€™u Rwanda bakizi neza.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Bubiligi yavuze ko yifuza kubona inyandiko zâ€™ibyo Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa MRND yavugiye muri Koreya ya Ruguru, kugira ngo bemeze koko niba nta kindi cyihishe inyuma yâ€™uwo mubano udasanzwe.
Habyarimana yasuye Koreya ya Ruguru ahasiga amacumu, ahabwa umudari
Ibihugu byâ€™u Burayi na Amerika bimaze kwihanangiriza u Rwanda, rwagabanyije amarere ariko rukomeza kubana na Koreya ya Ruguru kuko yarufashaga muri byinshi.
Tariki 7 Kamena 1978, Habyarimana yahagurutse i Kigali agiye mu ruzinduko rwâ€™iminsi icumi muri Koreya ya Ruguru no mu Bushinwa.
Yahagurutse ku kibuga cyâ€™indege i Kanombe aherekejwe nâ€™abantu 70, bagenda mu ndege yatanzwe nâ€™u Bushinwa ya Boeing 107.
Uretse kuba uruzinduko rwâ€™iminsi icumi rudasanzwe ku mukuru wâ€™igihugu, bwari nâ€™ubwa mbere Habyarimana agiye hanze aherekejwe nâ€™abantu bangana gutyo, nkuko inyandiko za Ambasade ya Amerika zibigaragaza.
Habyarimana yakiriwe neza muri Koreya ya Ruguru no mu Bushinwa. I Pyongyang yakiriwe nâ€™indirimbo za MRND zaririmbwe mu Kinyarwanda nâ€™abana bo muri Koreya ya Ruguru.
Bivugwa ko Habyarimana yasigiye Perezida Kim Il-Sung amacumu nkâ€™ikimenyetso cyâ€™umubano mwiza, na we agororerwa umudari uzwi nka Order of the National Flag. Amacumu Habyarimana yatanze ari mu nzu ndangamurage yiswe International Friendship Exhibition, irimo impano Kim Il-Sung na Kim Jong-il bagiye bahabwa nâ€™abanyamahanga.
Nyuma yâ€™iminsi icumi, tariki 17 Kamena 1978, Habyarimana nâ€™abo bari bajyanye bagarutse mu Rwanda.
Ageze ku kibuga cyâ€™indege, yavuze ukuntu yashimishijwe nâ€™umuhate wâ€™Abashinwa nâ€™Abanya-Koreya nâ€™uburyo bamwijeje inkunga itubutse bazaha u Rwanda.
Icyo gihe Koreya ya Ruguru yavuze ko igiye kwihutisha umushinga wo kubaka ingoro yâ€™urubyiruko no guhinga umuceri kuri hegitari 200 mu Rwanda.
Banatanze inkunga ijyanye nâ€™imodoka zirekura amajwi nâ€™amashusho zigenewe urubyiruko ndetse nâ€™izâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™amatangazo ya Leta, Orinfor.
Mu 1979, Koreya ya Ruguru yahaye u Rwanda ibijyanye nâ€™intwaro za gisirikare imbunda zo mu bwoko bwa Howitzers, nâ€™imbunda nini zishobora guhangana nâ€™ibitero byo mu kirere.
Uwo mwaka kandi Koreya yemeye gufasha u Rwanda mu mishinga irimo uwo kubaka ikigo cyâ€™amashuri cyakira abanyeshuri 400, kubaka ibitaro nâ€™uruganda rwâ€™ibireti.
Umubano wâ€™u Rwanda na Koreya ya Ruguru warakomeje kugeza mu 1994 muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Nyuma yo guhagarika Jenoside, umubano wâ€™u Rwanda na Koreya ya Ruguru wabaye nkâ€™ukonje uretse ko nâ€™ijambo rya Koreya ya Ruguru mu ruhando mpuzamahanga ryasaga nkâ€™aho ntaryo, kandi intambara yâ€™ubutita yatumaga ibihugu byiremamo udutsiko nayo yari yarahosheje.
Tariki 18 Kanama 2010, Kim Jong Il wayoboraga Koreya yoherereje ubutumwa bwâ€™ishimwe Perezida Paul Kagame amushimira kuba yongeye gutorerwa manda ya kabiri ku majwi 93Â %.
Ibiro Ntaramakuru bya Koreya, Korea News Services (KNS) byatangaje ko Kim yifurije ishya nâ€™ihirwe Perezida Kagame ndetse ko yizeye iterambere ryâ€™umubano wâ€™ibihugu byombi.
Guhera mu 1994, nta mubano ushingiye kuri za ambasade ibihugu byombi bifite.

Title: Bamurangirwa agiye gusohora ibitabo bibiri birimo igikebura abanyafurika abategereje amakiriro mu mahanga
Body:
Bamurangirwa Patricia, Umunyarwandakazi uba mu mahanga, agiye gusohora ibitabo bibiri birimo icyo yise â€œAfricanismâ€ gikangurira urubyiruko gukunda Afurika no kwigirira icyizere.
Bamurangirwa Patricia, Umunyarwandakazi uba mu mahanga, agiye gusohora ibitabo bibiri birimo icyo yise â€œAfricanismâ€ gikangurira urubyiruko gukunda Afurika no kwigirira icyizere.
Bamurangirwa wâ€™imyaka 69, amaze kwandika ibitabo bitanu. Bibiri ateganya gusohora birimo icyo yise â€œAfricanismâ€ na â€œNew Rwanda From Hell to Heavenâ€ akazabimurika ku itariki 16 Mutarama uyu mwaka.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Bamurangirwa yavuze ko igitabo yise â€œAfricanismâ€ cyangwa â€œuburwanashyaka muri rusange ku mugabane wa Afurikaâ€ yacyanditse kugira ngo akangurire urubyiruko kwikunda no gukunda ibyâ€™iwabo.
Yagize ati â€œNi igitabo nanditse ari ugukangurira urubyiruko muri rusange, bigirire icyizere, bakunde iwabo, ndetse kandi na bo ubwabo bibuke kwiyubaha, bikunde ko ari beza ku mubiri, bamenye ko ubwenge babufite, ntibagire icyo bakeka cyangwa uwo bakeka wabaruta ku buryo ubwa ari bwo bwose kubera ko ari bo; kandi bamenye ko muri Afurika iwabo ntacyo babuze, bareke kurarikira ahandi hanze yâ€™umugabane wacu.â€
Bamurangirwa yavuze kandi ko iki gitabo yacyanditse kugira ngo kiburire urubyiruko rufite imyumvire yo kujya mu bihugu byâ€™abazungu bizeye kuhakirira.
Ati â€œkubera umubare munini wâ€™urubyiruko muri Afurika bafite iyo myumvire, ari abo nahasanze nâ€™abahansanze, nasanze ntabona ukundi mbwira abana bacu kugira ngo bigarure, biyemere, bakunde aho bari, bamenye ko ari heza kandi ntacyo habuze.â€
Indi mpamvu yateye imbaraga Bamurangirwa kwandika iki gitabo ni uko hari abandi bafite imyumvire nkâ€™iyo yarafite mbere yâ€™uko agera bihugu byo hanze yâ€™umugabane wa Afurika, ngo abone ko ibyo yatekerezaga atari byo.
Yavuze ko ibyo benshi bakeka ko mu bihugu byâ€™i Burayi na Amerika haba ubuzima bwiza, baba bibeshya kuko akenshi bajyayo bagakora akazi gasuzuguritse gahari, bahembwa amafaranga yâ€™intica ntikize.
Bamurangirwa avuga ko ubwe azi benshi bagiye bagenda bazi ko bagiye gukira, bikarangira babayeho ubuzima bubi, bakagira isoni zo kugaruka iwabo.
Yavuze ko hari icyizere cyâ€™uko imyumvire ibihugu bya Afurika byasigiwe nâ€™ubukoroni yo kumva ko bikennye kandi ntacyo byakwishoboza, yahinduka ariko mu gihe urubyiruko rubigizemo uruhare.
 Ati â€œTwebwe nkâ€™abirabura batwumvishije ko iwacu turi abakene natwe turabyakira. Kugira ngo tuzabyigobotore, ni byo bizakunda ariko ni urugendo rurerure ruzatangirwa nâ€™aba bana bacu, abana babyiruka badukundiye nâ€™ubwo bitoroshye twabigeraho.â€
 â€œInama yanjye ni uko bankundira nkabuhagira ubwo bukoroni bubarimo nkashyiramo ubundi, kuko urugendo ruracyari rurerure. Ntabwo byahita bishoboka ariko intangiriro yo irahari ntabwo twahita tuvuga ngo nta cyizere.â€
New Rwanda From Hell to Heavenâ€ cyo yagikomoye ku iterambere yasanze mu Rwanda ubwo yahagarukaga mu mwaka wa 2016, ubwo yari amaze imyaka isaga icumi atahakandagira.
Yavuze ko iterambere ryâ€™u Rwanda ari igihamya ko Afurika yatera imbere ishyize hamwe.
Kumurika ibyo bitabo ku mugaragaro bizaba tariki 16 Mutarama 2020 mu isomero rikuru ryâ€™igihugu ku Kacyiru guhera saa kumi nâ€™imwe.
Nubwo adafite amashuri menshi, ngo ntibimuza kwandika ibitabo kubera ko yegera inzobere muri uyu mwuga zikagenda zimugira inama.
Iduka â€™Waterstonesâ€™ niryo mu Bwongereza rimufasha gusohora ibitabo rikanabishyira ku isoko.
Mu Rwanda ibitabo bye biboneka mu maduka yâ€™ibitabo, Ikirezi na Caritas, ndetse nâ€™ababishaka bashobora kubisanga kuri interineti. Ibi bitabo bibiri yasohoye bizajya biboneka mu isomero ryâ€™igihugu.
Bamurangirwa amaze kwandika ibitabo bitanu byose biri mu rurimi rwâ€™Icyongereza. Harimo icyo yise â€œRwanda Yesterdayâ€ avugamo amateka yâ€™u Rwanda, â€˜â€˜Patriotismâ€ kigizwe nâ€™ibisigo biri mu Kinyarwanda no mu Cyogereza yahimbiye Perezida Kagame, icyo yahimbiye Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, ndetse nâ€™icyo yahimbiye Inkotanyi zambuka, â€œMy Motherâ€™s Dreamsâ€ agaragazamo uburyo yapfushije nyina akiri muto agacikiriza amashuri ye kandi inzozi ze zari ukwiga, â€œNew Rwanda From Hell to Heavenâ€ avugamo uburyo u Rwanda rwahindutse nyuma ya Jenoside. Igitabo cya gatanu ni icyo yise â€œAfricanismâ€ twabavwiyeho byinshi.
